45013009	Waar kì̵ Naan ɗi ni sat nee: "Taji a c`in ngaa kas, ki̶ taji a tukáa kas. Taji a cín wat kas, ki̶ taji a c`in zughur mbii kì̵ gurum kas." Waar ɗiisi mo ki̶ kaghar waar ɗi mo ɗee ɗi jir, mo kyak mo, mo lang a nkaa Waar ɗiisi mi̶ndong, ɗii ni sat nee, "A wal ngi̶nang fugha kaa sak fugha si."
45013010	Katɗang gurum wal gi̶ni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ɓe ba wurin nc`in mee mbii ɗiibish nwuri kas. Mpeemi̶ni wal ni a gam ki̶ Waar ni.
45013011	Wu gung ku wu c`in mbii mo ɗi jir, mpeeɗi wu man nee, pee ni wul, ku wu mii ɗi nsaam, mpeeɗi ɓam funu ni kus ki̶ mun yaksi, met ɗi jí mu shee cínzeen.
45013012	Mpar ni kus ki̶ kyes, ɓit ni kus kì̵ mang. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wu nook c`in ɗak ɗi mo a mu peenkoo. Mu ɓwaghat sun shi leelek ɗi mo a peeɓang.
45013013	Wu yit ku mu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n peeɓang kaa nyem ɗi moo tong ndi̶ghi̶n peeɓang mu puus si. Taji mu c`in mee mbii ashak ki̶ nyemɗiibish mo, koo nyemshwaa yughur mo kas. Mu put ki̶ sun funu mo aku ndi̶ghi̶n ngaa ki̶ cíishik, ki̶ bi̶lep, ki̶ zughur.
45013014	Amma wu mang mi̶se kì̵ Daa Jesu Kristi, ku wu yit pan ɗiibish mo jir ɗi mo pwat a ndi̶ghi̶n pan mu mi̶se fuu mo.
45014001	Gwar ɗi ba wurii ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen ni kas, ɓe wu lap wuri koo ɗi ba wuri ki̶ ɓal ni kas. Amma taji wu ɗee njighi̶r ki̶ wuri nkaa mbii ɗi mo ret ku wuri c`in kas.
45014002	Mee gurum, ɓe wuri ki̶ cínzeen ɗi wurin mmak se koo a luwa ɗiiɗang ye, amma gwar ɗi ba wuri ki̶ ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen ni kas, ɓe wurin mmak se a mbii ɗi mo sak mo a ndi̶ghi̶n maar ɓejee.
45014003	Gwar ɗi wurii mak se koo a luwa ɗiiɗang ye si, taji wuri ɓak gwar ɗi ba wuri mak se koo meye ni kas. Taji gwar ɗi wuri nook se ni si, wuri naa bish ki̶ gwar ɗi wurii se koo meye ni kas zak. Mpeeɗi Naan kì̵ ten lap wuri.
45014004	Wugha a we, ɗi wugha mak tokɗiyeel nki̶rom kì̵ mee gurum ye? A ngulu kì̵ ki̶rom ni mmak tokɗiyeel nwuri, kyet wurii c`in mbii ɗiiɓish aa, koo ɗiiret ye? Amma wuri ɗar mpeeɗi Naan wuri mak le wuri ɗar.
45014005	Mee gurum ɓe wuri pan nee, mee puus ni ɗes met kaghar puus mo, ki̶ mee gurum ɓe wuri pan nee, puus ni mo a ntiit jir. Wu yit ku koo a weye wuri man pan ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri.
45014006	Gwar ɗi wuri naa ne, mee puus ni ɗes met mmee puus si, wuri c`in pan mi̶ni a mpeku wuri cín ɗiiɗes ɗi nDaa funu. Gwar ɗi wurii mak se koo a luwa ɗiiɗang ye si, wuri riɓet ku wuri cín ɗiiɗes nDaa funu, mpeeɗi wuri pi̶lang Naan mpee mbii ɗi wuri se ni. Gwar ɗi ba wurii se koo a meye kas si, wuri kwarse ni a mpeku wuri cín ɗiiɗes ɗi nNaan zak.
45014007	Ba mee gurum ndi̶ghi̶n mun wuri tong ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi ni a mpee káa fi̶ri ɓejee ɗak kas, ki̶ ba mee gurum kì̵ muut a mpee káa fi̶ri ɓejee kas zak.
45014008	Katɗang mun ɗi ki̶ seen, ɓe mun ki̶ seen ni a mpee Daa. Katɗang mu murap, ɓe mu murap a mpee Daa. Mpeemi̶ni koo ɗi mun ɗi ki̶ seen, koo ɗi mu murap, ɓe mun a mu Daa.
45014009	Mbii ɗi ni le ku Kristi wuri muut, ɗang wuri waa baa yaghal a peemúut, a mpeku wuri ɗee ɗi a Daa ki̶ nyem ɗi mo ki̶ seen yaksi, ki̶ nyem ɗi mo kì̵ murap zak.
45014010	Katɗang ni aasi, ɓe wugha a we ɗangɓe aa tokɗiyeel nɗyemni̶ghi̶n fugha ye? A me le ɗangɓe wugha aa ɓák ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fugha ye? Mpeeɗi mun jir, mun nɗar ntoghom kì̵ Naan mpeku wuri tokɗiyeel ɗi mmun jir.
45014011	Mpeeɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee: "Wan ki̶n ten tuwoorpo shi toghom shikáa fi̶na nee, 'Gurum mo jir, mon nj`i kurum nfurum ntoghom fi̶na, ki̶ gurum mo jir mon nsat agaak shi li̶po furu nee, wan a Naan.' "
45014012	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe koo a weye ndi̶ghi̶n mun wurin nɗar ntoghom kì̵ Naan, ku wuri sat mbii ɗi wuri kì̵ ten c`in mo ɗi jir, shikáa fi̶ri.
45014013	Mpeemi̶ni, taji wu tokɗiyeel nshak kas, amma ni ret ku wu pan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo, mpeku taji wu le mmee mbii canshii, mee ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fuu, koo mbii ɗi ni le ku wuri taa ndi̶ghi̶n shikbish kas.
45014014	Wan, ngo ɗi wan a mu Jesu Kristi, wan man a zeen nee, ba mee mbiise ɗi, ɗi ni a ɗiibish mpee káa fi̶na kas, amma katɗang mee gurum cínzeen ne mbiise ɗiisi, ni a ɗiibish, ɓe azeen-nzeen ni ɗee a mbiise ɗiibish pe gwar mi̶ni ɗi.
45014015	Amma katɗang mbiise ɗi wugha aa se ni, nin nle canshii mmee ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fugha, ɓe ba wugha, aa mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n wal kas. Taji a yit ku mbiise ɗi wugha ki̶ se ni dughun mee gurum ɗi Kristi wuri kì̵ muut mpee gwar ni kas.
45014016	Taji a yit ku mbii ɗiiret ɗi aa c`in, ɓe ni le gurum mo waa satpo ɗiibish nkaa ni kas.
45014017	Ba mulki kì̵ Naan ni a se ki̶ shwaa kas, amma ni a c`in mbii ɗiiret, ki̶ tongriyang, ki̶ retnyit ndi̶ghi̶n Riin Ɗiiɓang.
45014018	Jir ngo ɗi wuri seyil nKristi ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiisi, ɓe Naan wurin nlap gwar ni, ki̶ gurum mon nriɓet gwar ni zak.
45014019	Mpeemi̶ni, wu yit ku mu c`in mbii ɗi nin nj`i ki̶ tongriyang, ki̶ mbii ɗi nin nle ku mu cínɓal ɗin nshak.
45014020	Taji wu wat ɗak kì̵ Naan mpee mbiise ɗi wuu se mo kas. Ni azeen nee, mbii mo jir mo a ɗiiɓang, amma ba ni a ndi̶re, ku mbii ɗi wugha ki̶ se, ni le canshii ngurum mo kas.
45014021	Mbii ɗi ni ret ku a c`in nɗiisi, katɗang mpee luwa koo shwaamwos ɗang nin nle canshii nɗyemni̶ghi̶n fugha, ɓe taji a se luwa koo shwaamwos kas.
45014022	Wugha ki̶ cínzeen nkaa mbii ɗiisi mo ɓe a yaa ni gang-gang nnaar fugha kì̵ Naan. Ngo ɗi wuri kat retnyit a ngo ɗi wuri man mbii ɗiiret, ɗang wuri c`in shi putughup mi̶ndong.
45014023	Amma ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ putughup mo vul nkaa mee mbiise ɗangɓe wuri se, ɓe wuri c`in a shikbish, mpeeɗi wuri se baa ashak ki̶ cínzeen kas. Koo mbii ɗiiɗang ye ɗi baa ni a mu cínzeen kas, ɓe ni a shikbish.
45015001	Mun ɗi muu ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen, ni ret ku mu ɓam nyem ɗi ba mo ki̶ ɓal kas. Taji mu wal a nkáa funu mo ɓejee ɗak kas.
45015002	Koo a weye ndi̶ghi̶n mun, ɓe ni ret ku wuri le ku ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri kat retnyit, mpeku wuri wurang ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen fi̶ri.
45015003	Mpeeɗi ba Kristi wuri wal a nkáa fi̶ri ɓejee kas. Ni a riran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee, "Fulup ɗi mo fulup wugha Daa Naan, ni taa nkaa wan."
45015004	Mpeeɗi jir, po ɗi mo kì̵ ran ndi̶ghi̶n po kì̵ Naan, mo ran ni a mpee mun, mpeku ni kám ɗi mmun, ku mu leyit ɗi nkaa Daa Naan. Ku mu ɗar ɓal-ɓal, ki̶ gung mputughup, ɗi mu kat ni ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan.
45015005	Naan ɗi wuri cín gung, ki̶ ɓam putughup mmun, wuri cín tongriyang nwun ashak, ki̶ wu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan mu Kristi Jesu.
45015006	Mpeku wun jir ashak shi putughup mi̶ndong, ki̶ shi ɗoo ɗiimi̶ndong, ɓe wu kwoop Naan, ɗi wuri a puun ki̶ Daa funu Jesu Kristi ɗi.
45015007	Mpeemi̶ni, wu lapshak mpee ɗiiɗes kì̵ Naan, kaaɗi Kristi wuri lap wun si.
45015008	Wan ki̶n sat nwun nee, Kristi wuri j`i ɗee a ki̶rom kì̵ nyem Yahudi mo, mpeku wuri kám zeen kì̵ Naan ɗi mmo, ki̶ mpeku wuri gampo ɗi Naan kì̵ ten sat ni ɗi mpuun furu mo.
45015009	Ki̶ mpeku gurum mo jir ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni mo jir, mo cín ɗiiɗes ɗi nNaan mpee yit naajeel fi̶ri. Kaaɗi mo kì̵ ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si nee: "Mpeemi̶ni ɓe wan nkwoop wugha nnaar kì̵ gurum ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil mo jir, ki̶ wan c`in kook mpee sum fugha."
45015010	Mo waa sat zak nee: "Wun nyem ɗi ba wun a nyem Yahudi mo kas, wu c`in retnyit ashak ki̶ nyem fi̶ri mo."
45015011	Ki̶ mo sat zak nee: "Wun nyem ɗi ba wun a nyem Yahudi mo kas, wu kwoop Daa Naan, wu yit ku gurum ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil si jir mo kwoop wuri."
45015012	Aizaya wuri sat zak nee, "Memee ndi̶ghi̶n dang kì̵ Jesse, wurin ndung j`i. Wurin nj`i se mulki nkaa gurum mo jir. A ndi̶ghi̶n wuri ɓe gurum mo jir ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni, moo leyit a nkaa wuri."
45015013	Naan ɗi wuri cín canciin nwun, wurin ngam wun ki̶ retnyit ki̶ tongriyang ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen fuu. Mpeku canciin fuu ndi̶ghi̶n iiko mu Riin Ɗiiɓang ni ɓul ɗi hakyeng.
45015014	Ɗyemnaa mo, wan shikáa fi̶na wan man azeen-nzeen nee, wun a ɗiigi̶gam shi ɗiiret, ki̶ wun kì̵ man azeen-nzeen, ki̶ wu mak mpee kám nshak zak.
45015015	Amma pak po ɗi wan ran nwun ndi̶ghi̶n wasika ni, wan ran ni shiɓal, mpeku wan lepan ɗi nwun nkaa mbii mo, ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiret ɗi Naan wuri cín ni nwan.
45015016	Wuri le wan ɗee a nguɗak kì̵ Kristi Jesu, mpee nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas. Wan c`in ɗak fi̶na ni a kaa pris si. Wan satpo Naan mmo, mpeku nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas, mo j`i ɗee ɗi a kaa mbiizughum ɗiili̶lap pe Naan ɗi, ku mo ɗee ɗi a ɗiiɓang, ɗi a Riin kì̵ Naan wuri le ku mo ɗee a ɗiiɓang.
45015017	Ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi Jesu, ɓe wan ki̶n cín roghop mpee ɗak ɗi wan pu c`in ni nNaan.
45015018	Ba wan mak sat mee mbii ɗik kas, see po nkaa ɗak ɗi Kristi wuri c`in ndi̶ghi̶n wan. Kaaɗi wuri j`i ki̶ nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas, har mo c`in mbii ɗi Naan wuri sat shi po, ɗi wan nkaa sat ni mmo ki̶ shiɗak ɗi wan ki̶n c`in mo.
45015019	Shi mbii aapo mo, ki̶ mbii lukshik mo, shiɓal kì̵ Riin ni, ndi̶ghi̶n mwaan fi̶na, yaghal nJerusalem, ki̶ peeɗi mo neer ni cighi̶rkaat, har Ilirikum, wan satpo ɗiiret nkaa Kristi.
45015020	Wan le putughup mpeku wan satpo ɗiiret ni ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n peeɗi ba mee gurum kì̵ kyam sat sum kì̵ Kristi ɗi kas. Mpeku taji wan ɗiklu nkaa kuk ɗi mee gurum kì̵ ten ɓwot kas.
45015021	Mpeeɗi ni a riran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee: "Nyem ɗi ba mo kì̵ kyam ki̶ling sum fi̶ri kas, mon nnaa wuri. Nyem ɗi ba mo kì̵ kyam ki̶lingpo nkaa wuri kas, mon mman shii kì̵ ni."
45015022	A ni le ɗang yit ɗes, ɓe gyet wan ki̶n riɓet so pe wun ɗi, amma ba wan katpee so ni kas.
45015023	Amma yaksi wan ki̶n kyes ɗak fi̶na nkoghop pee ɗiisi ni, ki̶ mpeeɗi gyet wan ki̶n kaghar mpee so naa wun ndi̶ghi̶n ɓit mo ɗes ɗi mo ki̶ ɗel si.
45015024	Wan canciin mpee naa wun. Wan riɓet so tong ashak ki̶ wun akuɗang wan ɗel so nSipen, mpeku wan kat ɓam ɗi pe wun, ki̶ mpeku wu sel wan mpee so ɗi. Aɓwoon ɗi wan kì̵ mwaan tok ki̶ wun, mpee rep teer mo diɓen.
45015025	Amma yaksi wan ndung so nJerusalem, mpeku wan so ɗiki̶ ɓam mpee nyem Jesu mo.
45015026	Eki̶lisya ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n Masidoniya ki̶ Akaya mo cín mee zughum nwan, mpeku wan nso ki̶ ni ɗi nyemjeel ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n nyem Jesu ɗin nJerusalem mo.
45015027	A mo shikáa furu mo riɓet c`in ki̶si, mpeeɗi azeen-nzeen ni ɗee a kaa káat si nkaa mo, ni ret ku mo ɓam mo. A mpeeɗi nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas, mo shaar ashak ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi mo a mu Riin. Mpeemi̶ni ɓe ni ret ku nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas, mo ɓam mo shi mbii ki̶kat furu mo ɗi mo a mu yil ɗiisi zak.
45015028	Aɓwoon ɗi wan ki̶n kyes ɗak ɗiisi ni, ki̶ wan ki̶n cín mbii ɗi mo kyak ni mmo, ɓe wan nso ntaa pe wun ɗi, a ar so nSipen ni.
45015029	Wan man nee, katɗang wan nso pe wun ɗi, ɓe wan nso a ndi̶ghi̶n gam mu ɗiiret kì̵ Kristi.
45015030	Ɗyemnaa mo, wan ɗang pe wun ndi̶ghi̶n Daa funu Jesu Kristi, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n wal ɗiisi ɗi Riin wuri cín mmun, wu c`in aduwa ashak ki̶ wan azeen-nzeen pe Naan ɗi, mpee wan shikáa fi̶na.
45015031	Wu ɗang pu wuri, mpeku wuri ɓam wan ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n sar kì̵ nyem ɗi ba mo cínzeen kas, ndi̶ghi̶n yil nJudiya, ki̶ mpeku ɗak fi̶na ɗi wan c`in ni ndi̶ghi̶n Jerusalem, ni ɗee a ɗiili̶lap pe nyem kì̵ Naan mo ɗi.
45015032	Ɗangɓe wan nwul pe wun ɗi shi retnyit, katɗang Naan riɓet, mpeku wan kat rep nookɗi pe wun ɗi.
45015033	Naan ɗi wuri a riyang wuri tong ashak ki̶ wun jir. Amin.
45016001	Wan ki̶n riɓet ku wu lap Fiibi ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ɗiimat, ɗi wuraa c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n Eki̶lisya ɗin nSenkiriya.
45016002	Wu lap wura ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Daa shi sar vul-vul, kaa mi̶se ɗi ni ret ku nyem ki̶ Naan mo c`in si. Wu ɓam wura ndi̶ghi̶n mɓam ɗi wuraa riɓet pu wun ɗi, mpeeɗi shikáa fi̶ra, wura ki̶ ɓam gurum mo ɗes, har ki̶ wan shikáa fi̶na zak.
45016003	Wu tok ki̶ Priskila ki̶ Akwila nwan, mo ɗi moo c`in ɗak ashak ki̶ wan ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi Jesu.
45016004	Jí mo ki̶ cín sut, koo ɗi a mpee muut mpee wan. Ba a wan ki̶n pi̶lang mo ɓejee kas, amma har jir ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n pee mo shini-shini.
45016005	Wu tok ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi moo kuur ashak ndi̶ghi̶n lu ki̶ mo ni zak. Wu tok ki̶ Ipenetus, gwar ɗi nwan wal wuri zam. A wuri a gwar ɗi wuri shee cínzeen nKristi ndi̶ghi̶n yil Eshiya.
45016006	Wu tok ki̶ Meeri ɗi wura c`in ɗak nwan ɗes hakyeng
45016007	Wu tok ki̶ Andronikus ki̶ Juniyas ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶na mo. Mo a nyem Yahudi mo kaa wan si, ɗi jí mo ndi̶ghi̶n lushaghat ashak ki̶ wan. Mo a ɗiimi̶man mɓut jeplop mo hakyeng, ki̶ zak, a mo a nyem ɗi mo shee so ndang Kristi akuɗang wan.
45016008	Wu tok ki̶ Amfiliyatus shaar fi̶na ndi̶ghi̶n Daa.
45016009	Wu tok ki̶ Urbanus, wuri ɗi wuri c`in ɗak kì̵ Kristi ashak ki̶ wun, ki̶ Sitakis ɗi wan wal nwuri zam.
45016010	Wu tok ki̶ Apellis ɗi gurum mo man nee, wuri a nguso ndang Jesu azeen-nzeen. Wu tok ki̶ nyemtulu kì̵ Aristobulus mo.
45016011	Wu tok ki̶ Herodiyon ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶na ki̶ nyem kì̵ Daa mo ɗi mon ntulu kì̵ Narsisus.
45016012	Wu tok ki̶ Traifona ki̶ Traifusa mo, ɗi mo kì̵ c`in ɗak nDaa ki̶ Persis shaar ɗak fi̶na ɗi wura c`in ɗak kì̵ Naan ɗes hakyeng.
45016013	Wu tok ki̶ Rufus ɗi Naan kì̵ ten bi̶lip wuri ki̶ ni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, wura ɗi wura ɗee a kaa ni̶ghi̶n fi̶na si zak.
45016014	Wu tok ki̶ Asinkritus, Filegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas ki̶ kaghar ɗyemni̶ghi̶n ɗi mo ashak ki̶ wun ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi jir.
45016015	Wu tok ki̶ Filologus, ki̶ Juliya, ki̶ Nerus, ki̶ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri ɗiimat, ki̶ Olimpas, ki̶ nyem kì̵ Naan ɗi mo ashak ki̶ mo jir.
45016016	Wu tokshik ki̶ shak shang-shang kaa ɗyemni̶ghi̶nshak mo si. Eki̶lisya kì̵ Kristi mo jir mo lop tokshik furu pe wun ɗi.
45016017	Wan ki̶n ɗang pe wun ɗyemnaa mo, wu tap ki̶ nyem ɗi moo j`i ki̶ ɓakpee, ki̶ mo wat cínzeen kì̵ gurum, mpeku mo c`in lek ɗi ki̶ kám ɗi wuu ten wu lap ni. Taji wu ɓàlkáa fuu ki̶ mo kas.
45016018	Mpeeɗi ba nyem mi̶ni moo seyil a nDaa funu Kristi kas, amma moo seyil a mɓut furu mo. Shi liispo kì̵ mo ɗiishang, ki̶ caapee ɗi ba ni nkaa zeen kas, ɓe moo num gurum ɗi ba mo man po ni riret kas.
45016019	Amma wuwun, ɓe gurum mo jir mo kì̵ ki̶lingpo nkaa cínzeen fuu ndi̶ghi̶n po ɗiiret ni, mpeemi̶ni, wan ki̶n c`in retnyit zam shi wun. Wan riɓet ku wu ɗee a nyemseen mo nkaa mbii ɗi mo a ɗiiret, amma wu shwat sar fuu mo aku nkaa pan mbii ɗiibish mo.
45016020	Naan ɗi wuri cín tongriyang ngurum mo jir, wurin mbiyaghas Shetan nder shii fuu mo. Ɗiiret kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi ni tong ashak ki̶ wun.
45016021	Timoti shaarɗak fi̶na, wurii tok ki̶ wun, Lusiyus ki̶ Jesen ki̶ Sosipetar ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶na mo, moo tok ki̶ wun aasi zak.
45016022	Wan Tartiyus, ɗi a wan a nguran wasika ɗiisi ni mPool, wan ki̶n tok ki̶ wun ndi̶ghi̶n Daa.
45016023	Gayus, ɗi wan ki̶n tong a ntulu fi̶ri, ɗi ni a peeɗi Eki̶lisya nii kuur ɗi, wurii lop tokshik fi̶ri nwun jir. Erastus, ɗi a wuri a nguyaa shaghal mu birni ni, ki̶ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu Kwartus moo lop tokshik furu. [
45016024	Ɗiiret kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi ni tong ashak ki̶ wun jir. Amin.]
45016025	Wu yit ku mu kwoop Naan! Naan wurin mmak le ku wu ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen fuu, ntiit ki̶ po ɗiiret ɗi wan kám ni nwun nkaa Jesu Kristi, ki̶ ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi ni a ɗiisi̶sok mpee ɓit mo ɗes, ɗi mo kì̵ ɗel yam-yam.
45016026	Amma mo kì̵ put ki̶ mbii ɗi gyet ni a si̶sok agaak yaksi. Mo kì̵ kám ni ngurum ɗin ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni mo jir, ɗi mo ki̶ sat ni ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan mo. Ɗi Naan ɗiingaa-ngaa wuri kì̵ ten sat mmo, ku mo sat ɗi ngurum mo jir, mpeku gurum mo cínzeen ɗi, ku mo c`in ɗyen kì̵ Naan ɗi zak.
45016027	Pe Naan ɗi wuri mmi̶shin ɓejee, ɗi wuri man mbii mo jir, ɗiihai ni ɗee a mu wuri ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi har ngaa-ngaa. Amin.
46001001	Po ɗiisi ni put a nsar kì̵ Pool, ɗi shi ɗom kì̵ Naan, ɓe Naan pet wuri ku wuri ɗee a laalop mu Kristi Jesu, ki̶ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu Sosfenes.
46001002	Wan ki̶n lop po ɗiisi ni so pe Eki̶lisya mu Naan ɗi ni nyil nKoronti. Nyem ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten bi̶lip mo le, mpeku mo ɗee ɗi a nyem fi̶ri mo ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi, ki̶ mpee nyem ɗi koo a neye, ɓe moo pet sum kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi ɗi wuri a Daa furu ki̶ Daa funu zak.
46001003	Ɗiiret kì̵ Naan ki̶ tongriyang ɗi ni put a pe Naan puun ki̶ Daa funu Jesu Kristi ni tong ashak ki̶ wun.
46001004	Wan pi̶lang Naan shidaar-shidaar mpee wun, mpeeɗi Naan wuri kì̵ naajeel fuu ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi Jesu.
46001005	Ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi, ɓe Naan wuri ki̶ cín man mbii mo wun, ki̶ man katpo riret ɗes hakyeng.
46001006	Mpeeɗi langting funu nkaa Kristi ni ɗee azeen-nzeen ndi̶ghi̶n wun.
46001007	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe ba wu nook kat mee zughum ɗi ni a mu Riin kì̵ Naan kas, kaaɗi wuu kyaghar mpee kum parpuus ɗi Daa funu Jesu Kristi wurin nj`i put agaak.
46001008	Wurin ncín ɓal nwun har peekyes ni, mpeku wu ɗee ɗi a ɗin ndi̶re-ndi̶re parpuus mu Daa funu Jesu Kristi.
46001009	Naan ɗi wuri kì̵ ten pi̶rep wun, ku wu ɗee ɗi a nyemtong ashak ki̶ Làa fi̶ri Jesu Kristi, Daa funu, wuri a nguzeen.
46001010	Ɗyemnaa mo, wan ɗang pe wun, ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi, nee, ni ret ku po fuu mo so ndangshak, mpeku taji mee ɓàkshak yaghal nnaar fuu kas. Amma ni ret ku wu ɗee a ɗiimi̶ndong ndi̶ghi̶n pan fuu mo ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi wu riɓet c`in mo.
46001011	Ɗyemnaa mo, nyemtulu kì̵ Klo mo j`i sat nwan nee, bi̶lep kì̵ yaghal nnaar fuu.
46001012	Mbii ɗi mo sat ni a nee, koo a weye ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ɓe wurii sat mbii mo shini-shini, pak moo sat nee, "Wan a mu Pool," koo "wan a mu Apolos," koo, "wan a mu Kefas," koo, "wan a mu Kristi."
46001013	Kristi wuri ɗee a ɗiiɓi̶ɓak me? Gyet mo pwas a Pool nkaa shiyeepyoghom mpee wun aa? Aa koo gyet mo c`in baptisma nwun a ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Pool ye?
46001014	Wan pi̶lang Naan, mpeeɗi ba gyet wan c`in baptisma mmee ngo kas, see a Krispus ki̶ Gayus ɓejee ɗak.
46001015	Mpeemi̶ni ɓe ba mee ngo mmak sat nee, gyet mo c`in baptisma wuɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n sum fi̶na kas.
46001016	(Amma gyet wan c`in baptisma nyemtulu ki̶ Stifanas mo. Katɗang ba a mo kas, ɓe ba wan pan nee, gyet wan c`in baptisma mmee ngo kas.)
46001017	Ba gyet Kristi wuri lop wan a mpeku wan c`in baptisma ɗi kas, amma gyet wuri lop wan, a mpeku wan satpo ɗiiret ni ɗi, ba a shi mee seen mu man satpo kas. Mpeku taji mo leɓal mu shiyeepmúut ki̶ Kristi ni ɗee a ɗiibuu kas.
46001018	Pe nyem ɗi mo nkaa lagham, ɓe po nkaa shiyeep ni a po ɗiibuu pe mo ɗi. Amma pe mun, nyem ɗi muu kat seen, ɓe shiyeep ni a iiko kì̵ Naan.
46001019	Mpeeɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee: "Wan nshirip seen kì̵ nyemseen mo, ki̶ wann mmang man ki̶ nyemman mo nle mmee koghop akuɗang."
46001020	Katɗang ni aasi, ɓe nguseen ni a neye? Ɓe nguman mbii a neye? Ɓe nguɓeetshik mɓut mɓít ɗiisi a neye? Naan wuri kì̵ ten cighi̶r kì̵ nyemseen mu yil ɗiisi ni ɗee a mwen mo.
46001021	Mpeeɗi ndi̶ghi̶n seen kì̵ Naan, ɓe yil ni shi seen ki̶ ni, ba ni man Naan kas. Amma ni ret Naan nyit mpee po ɗiiret ɗi mu sat ni, ɗi pak nyemki̶lingpo ni mo, ɓe moo sat nee, ni a po mu mwen mo. Amma ni a ɓam mpee nyem ɗi mo cínzeen.
46001022	Nyem Yahudi moo tang mbii aapo mo, ki̶ nyem Heleni moo tang a seen.
46001023	Amma mun, muu sat a po nkaa Kristi ɗi mo pwas wuri nkaa shiyeepyoghom. Ɗiisi ni ɗee a mbii canshii nyem Yahudi mo, ki̶ ni ɗee a po mwen pe nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas.
46001024	Amma pe nyem ɗi Naan kì̵ ten pi̶rep mo, koo a nyem Yahudi mo, koo a nyem Heleni mo, ɓe Kristi wuri a iiko mu Naan kì̵ seen fi̶ri zak.
46001025	Mpeeɗi mwen kì̵ Naan ni met nseen kì̵ gurum mo, ki̶ ɓwaar kì̵ Naan ni ki̶ ɓal met ɓal mu gurum mo.
46001026	Ɗyemnaa mo, wu pan kaaɗi Naan wuri pi̶rep wun si. Ba gyet wuri pi̶rep a nyem ɗi moo seen mu yil ɗiisi ɗes kas, ki̶ ba gyet a nyem ɗi mo ki̶ iiko ɗes kas. Ba a nyem ɗi gyet mo làa mo mɓut ndang mu nyemlong mo ɗes kas.
46001027	Amma Naan wuri bi̶lip a mbii ɗiimwen mu yil ni mo, mpeku wuri cín yitluwaan ɗi nyemseen mu yil ni mo. Naan wuri bi̶lip mbii ɗi ba mo ki̶ ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni kas, mpeku mo shoop mbii ɗi moo ɓal mo ɗi.
46001028	Naan wuri bi̶lip a mbii ɗi yil ni ɓees, ki̶ yil nii naa mo a kaa mbii ɗiibuu mo si, har kaa mbii ɗi ba mo ɗi kas si, mpeku ni twa mbii ɗi yil nii naa mo, a kaa mbii ɗi moo koghop ni si ɗi.
46001029	Mpeku taji mee ngo canjagham nyit kì̵ Naan kas.
46001030	Amma Naan wuri j`i ki̶ wun ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi Jesu, ki̶ wuri le Jesu Kristi a seen funu, ki̶ ɗiiret funu, ki̶ a mpee wuri ɗangɓe wu mak ɗee a ɗiiɓang nyit kì̵ Naan, ki̶ a wuri ang mun mɓut shikbish funu mo zak.
46001031	Ni a kaa ɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si nee: "Koo a weye ɗi wurii canjagham, ɓe ni ret ku wuri canjagham ni ndi̶ghi̶n Daa Naan."
46002001	Ɗyemnaa mo, kaaɗi gyet wan j`i pe wun ɗi, ɓe ba gyet wan satpo nwun nkaa mbii ɗiisi̶sok mu Naan ni mo a shi liispo ɗiishang ki̶ling, ki̶ man satpo mu seen kas.
46002002	Mpeeɗi, kaaɗi gyet wan ashak ki̶ wun, ɓe gyet wan kì̵ ten lesan a kaa ngo ɗi wuri man Jesu Kristi, ɗi mo kì̵ pwas wuri nkaa shiyeepyoghom si.
46002003	Gyet wan a shak ki̶ wun, ɓe wan a ndi̶ghi̶n cíinɓal, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n ki̶i̶rmuut ki̶ ɗaar zak.
46002004	Ki̶ gyet po ɗi wan ki̶n sat ni, ki̶ kám fi̶na ni mo, ba gyet wan ki̶n sat mo a shi po ɗiishang ki̶ling ki̶ seen mu man satpo kas, amma gyet ni a ndi̶ghi̶n kám mu iiko kì̵ Riin.
46002005	Mpeku taji wu le cínzeen fuu mo tong a ndi̶ghi̶n seen mu gurum mo kas, amma wu le cínzeen fuu mo a ndi̶ghi̶n iiko kì̵ Naan.
46002006	Amma muu sat a po ɗii mu man, pee nyem ɗi mo kì̵ wurang ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi mo a mu Riin kì̵ Naan. Ba man ɗiisi ni a mu yil ɗiisi kas, ki̶ ba ni put a pe nyem mulki mu yil ɗiisi mo, ɗi mon ndung ɗel so si kas.
46002007	Amma mun muu sat a po nkaa man kì̵ Naan ɗi ni a si̶sok ngurum mo, man ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten le mpee ɗiiɗes funu akuɗang wurii leyil ni.
46002008	Ba mee ngumulki mu yil ɗiisi mmak man man mi̶ni kas. Katɗang ɗi gyet moo man mi̶ni, ɓe ba gyet mon mpwas Daa ɗiiɗes nkaa shiyeepyoghom kas.
46002009	Kaaɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda si nee: "Mbii ɗi ba gurum kì̵ kyam naa ki̶ yit kas, ɗi ba gurum kì̵ kyam ki̶ling ni shi kom kas, ɗi ba putughup kì̵ gurum ki̶ kyam pan mbii ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ tap ɗak ni le, nyem ɗi mo wal nwuri mo kas."
46002010	Amma Naan wuri kámshii ki̶ mi̶ni mmun a shi Riin fi̶ri, mpeeɗi Riin wurii bi̶lip mbii mo jir, har koo ɗi a jurung kì̵ mbii aapo kì̵ Naan mo.
46002011	A gurum ɗiiɗang mmak man pan ki̶ mee ngo ye? Katɗang ba a riin kì̵ ngo ni kas ye? Ni aasi zak, ba mee ngo kyam man pan kì̵ Naan kas, see a Riin kì̵ Naan ɓejee ɗak.
46002012	Ba mun mu kat a riin mu yil ɗiisi kas, amma mu lap a Riin kì̵ Naan, mpeku mu manshii kì̵ mbii ɗi Naan wuri ten c`in mmun ɗi.
46002013	Mpeemi̶ni, po ɗi muu sat nwun, ba ni put a mɓut mman mu gurum kas, amma a Riin wurii woo ni mmun. Riin ni wurii woo zeen, mpee nyem ɗi mo kì̵ Riin kì̵ Naan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup furu mo.
46002014	Ngo ɗi ba wuri ki̶ Riin kì̵ Naan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri kas, ɓe ba wuri mak lap zughum ɗi mo a mu Riin kì̵ Naan kas. Mpeeɗi mbii ɗi mo a mu Riin kì̵ Naan, mo a po ɗiibuu pe ngo mi̶ni ɗi, ki̶ zak, ba pan ki̶ ngo mi̶ni mak manshii kì̵ mo ni kas, mpeeɗi a Riin kì̵ Naan ki̶ mak le gurum man mbii ɗiisi ni mo.
46002015	Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ Riin kì̵ Naan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri, ɓe wuri mak manshii kì̵ mbii ɗiisi ni mo, amma ba mee gurum mak tokɗiyeel nwuri kas.
46002016	Kaaɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si nee: "A we ki̶ man pan kì̵ Daa ye? Mpeku ngo mi̶ni ɓeetpo ɗi ki̶ wuri ye? Amma mun, mu man pan mu Kristi, mpeeɗi mun ki̶ Riin fi̶ri ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu mo."
46003001	Ɗyemnaa mo, ba wan mak katpo ki̶ wun kaa nyem ɗi mo ki̶ Riin kì̵ Naan si kas, amma wan katpo ki̶ wun a kaa nyem ɗii mu yil ni mo si, mpeeɗi gyet wun a laanjuu mo ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi mo a mu Kristi.
46003002	Gyet wan ki̶n cín a wur nwun. Ba gyet a mbiise ɗiiɓal kas, mpeeɗi ba gyet wu mak se mbiise ɗiiɓal kas, har yaksi ɓe ba wuu ɗaksuk mpee se mbiise ɗiiɓal ni kas.
46003003	Tong fuu, ni ɗi a mu yil ɗiisi, mpeeɗi wun kì̵ c`in zughur, ki̶ wuu jighi̶r ki̶ shak. Kiyeet ki̶ tong ɗiisi kám nee, wun ɗi a mu yil ni, ki̶ wuu mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan mu yil ɗiisi ni.
46003004	Katɗang memee fuu sat nee, wuɗi a mu Pool, ki̶ memee sat nee, wuɗi a mu Apolos, ashee azeen-nzeen ɓe wuu sat mbii mi̶ni mo a ndi̶ghi̶n pan mu gurum.
46003005	A we a Apolos ye? A we a Pool ye? Mun a ki̶rom kì̵ Naan, ɗi Naan wuri c`in ɗak mun ki̶ har wu cínzeen. Koo a weye ndi̶ghi̶n mun, ɓe gyet muu c`in a mbii ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten le nsar funu.
46003006	A wan kop, ɗangɓe Apolos wuri le am ɗiki̶, amma a Naan wurii le ni wurang.
46003007	Mpeemi̶ni ɓe ngo ɗi wuri kop mbii, ki̶ ngo ɗi wuri le am ɗiki̶, ɓe ba mo a mee mbii kas, amma a Naan mmi̶shin wuri kì̵ le mbii ni mo wurang.
46003008	Ngo ɗi wuri kop, ki̶ ngo ɗi wuri le am ɗiki̶, ɓe mo a ntiit-ntiit. Koo a weye ɓe wurin nlap kwat fi̶ri a ntiit-ntiit ki̶ ɗak ɗi ngo ni c`in.
46003009	Mun jir a shaar ɗak kì̵ Naan. Wun a bong kì̵ Naan, ki̶ wun a kaa lu ɗi Naan wuri ɗik si.
46003010	Shi ɗiiret ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten cín ni nwan, ɓe wan ki̶n ɓwot kuklu ni, a kaa nguman ɗiklu si, ki̶ mee ngo ɗiklu nkaa kuk ni. Amma ni a ting ku koo a weye, ɓe wuri tap ki̶ ɗikpee ɗi wurii ɗik ni nkaa kuk ni.
46003011	Ba mee kuk ɗi, ɗi mee gurum nwaa baa ɓwot ɗi, waa met kuk ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten ɓwot ni, shi Jesu Kristi kas.
46003012	Yaksi, katɗang mee ngo ki̶ ɗikpee nkaa kuk ni a shi zinariya, koo shi azurfa, koo shi jwak ɗiiki̶rim mo, koo shi yoghom, koo shi yangkas.
46003013	Ɓe ni ret ku ngo mi̶ni man nee, ret ki̶ ɗak fi̶ri nin nɗee agaak parpuus ɗi Daa Jesu wurin mbaaj`i ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi. Parpuus mi̶ni ɓe mon nwoo ɗak kì̵ koo a ngo ɗiiɗang ye, har a wus nkyam ret mu ɗak kì̵ koo weye.
46003014	Katɗang ba wus se mbii ɗi gurum kì̵ ten ɗik nkaa kuk ni kas, ɓe gwar mi̶ni nlap kwat.
46003015	Amma katɗang wus se mbii ɗi gurum kì̵ ten c`in ni, ɓe nin nɗee a ɗak ɗiibuu, amma gwar mi̶ni shikáa fi̶ri, ɓe wurin nkat ɓam, amma ni ɗee kaa wuri ɗel put wus ni a shi dikyet si.
46003016	Ba wu man nee, wun shikáa fuu wun a lu ɗiiɗes kì̵ Daa Naan kas aa? Ki̶ Riin kì̵ Naan ki̶ tong ndi̶ghi̶n wun kas aa?
46003017	Katɗang mee ngo wat lu kì̵ Naan ni, ɓe Naan wurin nwat gwar mi̶ni zak. Mpeeɗi lu kì̵ Naan ni a ɗiiɓang ki̶ a wuwun a lu kì̵ Naan ni.
46003018	Taji mee gurum numkáa fi̶ri kas, katɗang mee gurum ndi̶ghi̶n wun ɗi wuri ki̶ lekáa fi̶ri a kaa ngo ɗi ki̶ seen ny`iicinsi, ɓe ni ret ku gwar mi̶ni lekáa fi̶ri kaa mwen si, mpeku wuri kat seen ɗi.
46003019	Mpeeɗi seen mu yil ɗiisi ni a mwen nyit kì̵ Naan ɓejee, kaaɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si nee: "Naan wurii yak nyemseen mu yil ɗiisi mo, ndi̶ghi̶n seen furu ɗiibish."
46003020	Ki̶ zak, "Daa wuri man ne, pan kì̵ nyemseen mu yil ɗiisi mo ni a mbii ɗiibuu."
46003021	Mpeemi̶ni ɓe taji mee gurum canjagham nkaa gurum mo kas. Mpeeɗi mbii mo jir a muu.
46003022	Koo ɗi a Pool, koo a Apolos, koo a Kefas, koo ɗi a yil ɗiisi, koo ɗi a seen, koo ɗi a muut, koo ɗi a yaksi, koo ɗi a mbii ɗi mo akiyeen, ɓe mo jir a muu.
46003023	Ki̶ zak, wun a mu Kristi, ki̶ Kristi wuri a mu Naan.
46004001	Ni ret ku gurum mo man mun a kaa jeplop kì̵ Kristi mo si, ki̶ kaa nyemɗak mo, ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten le mbii fi̶ri ɗiisi̶sok mo ndi̶ghi̶n sar funu si.
46004002	Ni a ting nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten le mee mbii nsar furu, ɓe mo ɗee a nyem ɗi mon ncínzeen mmo.
46004003	Ba ni daampee nwan kas koo diɓen, katɗang wu kyam wan, koo ɗi kyam ni a nluɗiyeel mu gurum mo, ba wan ki̶n tokɗiyeel nsan kas.
46004004	Wan man nee, ba wan ɗel ɗiki̶ kas, amma jir ki̶si, ɓe ba ni kám ne wan a ɗin nshikbish kas. A Daa wuri a ngo ɗi wurii tokɗiyeel nwan.
46004005	Mpeemi̶ni ɓe, taji wu canɗiyeel nkaa mee gurum kas, see pee ni wul akuɗang. Wu gong baaj`i kì̵ Daa. Daa wurin nj`i le mbii ɗi mo a si̶sok mo ɗee agaak, ki̶ wurin nwang pan ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n putughup kì̵ gurum mo ɗee agaak zak. A ntiit ki̶ mi̶ni ɓe koo a weye, ɓe Naan wurin nkwoop wuri ntiit-ntiit ki̶ kwoop ɗi ni ret ku wuri kat.
46004006	Yaksi ɗyemnaa mo, wan ki̶n sat sumpo ɗiisi mo nkaa Apolos ki̶ san fi̶na, mpeku mu ɗee ɗi a mbiikám pe wun ɗi. "Taji wu c`in mbii mo met mbii ɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ni kas", ki̶ taji memee fuu c`in roghop nkaa mee gurum, ku wu ɓees mee gurum ɗi kas zak.
46004007	A we le wugha met niyee mo ye? Ba jí a Naan cín mbii ɗi wugha ki̶ mo jir kas aa? Katɗang ni aasi, ɓe a me le ɗang wugha ki̶ ɗiyeepkáa ye, kaa baají wugha li̶lap a nzughum si kas si ye?
46004008	Wuu ten wu kat mbii ɗi wuu riɓet mo jir. Wuu ten wu ɗee a nyemlong mo. Wuu ɗee a mishkagham mo, ba ashak ki̶ mun kas. Ɗyen nwan ku ɗi wuu ten wu ɗee a mishkagham mo, ku mun ɗee ɗi a mishkagham ashak ki̶ wun.
46004009	Nnaa kì̵ mi̶na, ɓe Naan wuri kì̵ le mun a jeplop kì̵ Jesu mo. Muu ɗee a nyem ɗi mo tong sham si̶ghi̶t ni, kaa nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten canɗiyeel muut mmo si, mpeku mo twa mun ɗi nyit kì̵ gurum mo ɗes. Mu ɗee a mbiishwar nyil ni jir, ki̶ nyit mu nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo, kì̵ nyit kì̵ gurum mo zak.
46004010	Mu ɗee a mwen mo mpee sum kì̵ Kristi, amma wun a nyemseen mo ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi. Ba mun ki̶ ɓal kas, amma wun ki̶ ɓal. Gurum mo c`in ɗiiɗes nwun, amma mo ɓees mun.
46004011	Har yaksi ɓe neen ki̶ láa mmun, ki̶ neen am ki̶ tu mun. Muu jwal a goklee mo, ki̶ gurum moo nas mun. Ba mun ki̶ mee tulu kas.
46004012	Muu c`in ɗak ɓal-ɓal shi sar funu mo. Katɗang gurum mo ɓees mun, ɓe muu le ɗiiret nkaa mo. Katɗang mo lejeel mmun, ɓe muu gung.
46004013	Katɗang mo satpo ɗiibish nkaa mun, ɓe muu lap mmo shi po ɗiiret. Yaksi si, ɓe mu ɗee a kaa giri̶ng ɗi gurum moo ɓeerpee ɗi si. Muu ɗee a mbii ɗiibish ɗi koo weye ki̶ kwar mun ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni.
46004014	Wan ki̶n ran ɗiisi nwun, ba a mpeku wan cín nashoop ɗi nwun kas, amma a mpeku wan kámshii ni ɗi nwun, kaa jep fi̶na ɗi wan wal mmo si.
46004015	Koo ɗi wun ki̶ nyemkám mo duɓu kaghapaat ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi, amma ɓe wun ki̶ puun a mi̶ndong. Mpeeɗi ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi, ɓe wan ki̶n ɗee a puun fuu ndi̶ghi̶n po ɗiiret ni.
46004016	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wan ki̶n ɗang pu wun, ku wu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan fi̶na zak.
46004017	A mbii ɗi ni le ni mmi̶ni, ɗangɓe wan ki̶n lop Timoti, ɗyem fi̶na, ɗi wan wal nwuri, ɗi wuri kì̵ ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n Daa, so pe wun ɗi. Wurin nlepan nwun nkaa mwaan fi̶na ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi Jesu. Mwaan fi̶na ni ntiit-ntiit kì̵ mbii ɗi wan ki̶n kám ngurum mo, koo a neye ndi̶ghi̶n Eki̶lisya mo.
46004018	Pak mo ndi̶ghi̶n wun, moo roghop kaa ba wan nkuɗi ki̶n mbaaso pe wun ɗi kas si.
46004019	Katɗang Daa wuri riɓet, ku wan so pe wun ɗi ki̶lak-ki̶lak, ɓe wan nnaa mbii ɗi nyemroghop ni moo sat, ki̶ wan nnaa iiko ɗi mo ki̶ ni zak.
46004020	Ba mulki kì̵ Naan ni a sat shi po kas, amma ni a iiko.
46004021	Wu riɓet a ɗiiɗang ye? Kyet wan nj`i pe wun ɗi a shi kám wa? Koo a shi wal mu riin ɗi ni a puɗok ye?
46005001	Azeen-nzeen gurum moo sat nwan nee nyemc`in ngaa mo ɗi nnaar fuu, kiyeet kì̵ ngaa ɗi koo a nyemk`um mo, ɓe ba moo c`in mi̶ni kas. Mpeeɗi wan ki̶ling nee, làa ki̶ saam ki̶ mat kì̵ puun fi̶ri.
46005002	Har ne, wuu c`in roghop ki̶ mi̶ni. Ba ɗi ni ret ku wu gam aa wat kì̵ putughup, ki̶ ɗi ni ret ku wu ceen kiyeet kì̵ nyem ɗi moo c`in mbii ɗiibish mi̶ni mo ndi̶ghi̶n tong ashak fuu kas aa?
46005003	Koo ɗi ba wan ashak ki̶ wun mɓut nan kas, amma wan ɗi ashak ki̶ wun ndi̶ghi̶n Riin, ki̶ wan ki̶n ten canɗiyeel ɗiibish ngo ɗi wuri kì̵ c`in mbii ɗiibish mi̶ni, kaa wan ɗi ashak ki̶ wun si.
46005004	Katɗang wu kuur ashak ndi̶ghi̶n sum ki̶ Daa Jesu, ɓe wan ɗi a shak ki̶ wun ndi̶ghi̶n riin, ki̶ iiko mu Daa funu Jesu ni ɗi ashak ki̶ mun.
46005005	Wu cín nguc`in ngaa ni nsar kì̵ Shetan, mpeku shin fi̶ri ɗi ni a mu c`in shikbish ni muut ɗi, amma riin fi̶ri ni ɗee ɗi a ɗiiɓi̶ɓam parpuus mu Daa Jesu.
46005006	Ba roghop fuu ni ret kas, koo diɓen. Ba wu man nee a rep yist lee ɓe nii fuk bred kas aa?
46005007	Mpeemi̶ni ɓe wu pwat ki̶ yist ɗiisi̶ghi̶r mu shikbish ni ndi̶ghi̶n tong fuu mo aku mpeku wu ɗee ɗi a nyem ɗiiɓang mo. Gyet Jesu Kristi wuri muut a mpee shikbish funu mo, a wuri a Laatum mu retnyit kì̵ Canɗel funu, ɗi mo kì̵ ten cín wuri kaa mbii wus mbiizughum si.
46005008	Mpeemi̶ni ɓe wu yit ku mu sekiyeen kì̵ c`in retnyit mu Canɗel funu, ba a shi bred ɗi nii yist ɗiisi̶ghi̶r mu shikbish ki̶ ɓutbish kas. Amma mu c`in retnyit mu Canɗel ni shi bred ɗi ba nii yist kas, bred ɗi ni a mu putughup mi̶ndong ki̶ zeen.
46005009	Gyet wan ki̶n ran nwun ndi̶ghi̶n wasika fi̶na ne taji wu ɓàlkáa fuu ashak ki̶ nyemc`in ngaa mo kas.
46005010	Ba gyet wan ki̶n satpo a nkaa nyemc`in ngaa ɗii mu yil ɗiisi mo, ki̶ nyemriɓet mbii mo, koo wat mo, koo nyem ɗi moo seyil nk`um mo kas. Katɗang wu riɓet ku taji mee mbii ɓàl wun ki̶ nyem ɗiisi mo kas, ɓe ni a ting ku wu pwat aku ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi ki̶n ndi̶ng-ndi̶ng mi̶ni.
46005011	Amma wan ki̶n ran nwun, nee, taji wu ɓàlkáa fuu ki̶ ngo ɗi wuri kì̵ pet shin a nguso ndang Jesu, ɗangɓe wurii c`in ngaa, koo riɓet mbii, koo seyil nk`um, koo satpo ɗiibish nkaa gurum mo, koo shwaamwos, koo c`inwat kas. Ba ni ret ku wu se mbiise ashak ki̶ gwar mi̶ni kas.
46005012	Ba ni a ɗak fi̶na mpeku wan tokɗiyeel nyem ɗi ba mo a nyemso ndang Jesu mo kas. Wan ki̶n tokɗiyeel a nyem ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n Eki̶lisya mo ɓejee.
46005013	A Naan wurii tokɗiyeel nyem ɗi ba mo a nyemso ndang Jesu kas. Wan sat nee. "Wu ceen ngo ɗiibish put a ku mɓut wun."
46006001	Katɗang memee ndi̶ghi̶n wun ki̶ mee po nkaa ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ɓe wu naa ni ret ku wuri mang po ni, so ki̶ ni ntoghom ki̶ nguɗiyeel ɗi ba wuri a ngucínzeen kas aa? Ba ni ret ku a nyem kì̵ Naan mo ɓeetpo mi̶ni kas aa?
46006002	Ba wu man nee, a nyem Jesu mon ntokɗiyeel nyil ni kas aa? Katɗang a wun nyaghal wu tokɗiyeel nyil ni, ɓe baa, wu mak ɓeet rep jep po ɗiilee-lee mo kas aa?
46006003	Ba wu man nee, parmeeci ɓe a mun ntokɗiyeel nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo kas aa? Katɗang ni aasi, ɓe a me le ɗang ba mu mak ɓeet ɗiyeel ɗii mu yil ɗiisi kas ye?
46006004	Katɗang wun ki̶ ɗiyeel mo, ɓe a me le ɗang wuu so ki̶ ɗiyeel ni a ntoghom ki̶ nyem ɗi ba mo a mee mbii pe Eki̶lisya mo ɗi kas ye?
46006005	Wan sat ɗiisi ni a mpeku ni shoop wun ɗi. A ni le ɗang ki̶n sat nwun nee, ba wun ki̶ mee gurum ɗiiseen ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ɗi wurin mmak ɓeet ɗiyeel mi̶ni mo nwun nyemso ndang Jesu mo kas aa?
46006006	Kyet ni ret ku nguso ndang Jesu mang ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri ngu so ndang Jesu zak, so ki̶ wuri nluɗiyeel, mpeku wuri ɗar ɗi ntoghom kì̵ nguɗiyeel ɗi ba wuri a ngucínzeen kas wa?
46006007	Katɗang wuu mangshak wu so ki̶ ni nluɗiyeel, ɓe ni kám nee, wuu taa wu ɗee ki̶n ndi̶ng-ndi̶ng mmi̶ni. Gyal ɗeesi ɓe wu yit ku ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fuu mo wat putughup wun met aku ɗi wun so ki̶ shak nluɗiyeel. Gyal ɗee si ɓe wu yit ku mo seen a wun kas aa?
46006008	Amma wun shikáa fuu, wuu wat putughup nshak, ki̶ wuu seen ashak zak. Koo ɗi wun a ɗyemni̶ghi̶n ɗiimi̶ndong ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi.
46006009	Ba wu man kas aa? Nee, ba nyemɗiibish mon nɗel mmulki kì̵ Daa Naan kas. Taji wu numkáa fuu kas. Ba nyemc`in mbii ɗiibish mo, koo nyemseyil nk`um mo, koo nyemc`in ngaa mo, koo mish ɗi moo teer ki̶ shak, koo mat ɗi moo teer ki̶shak, koo wat mo, koo nyemriɓet mbii mo, koo nyemshwaa mwos mo, koo nyemsatpo ɗiibish nkaa gurum mo. Koo nyemseen aki̶ gurum mo.
46006010	Ba mon mmak ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n mulki kì̵ Naan kas.
46006011	Gyet yam ɓe pak fuu mo kì̵ c`in mbii ɗiisi mo, amma mo kì̵ vwang wun mɓut shikbish. Yaksi mo kì̵ le ku wu ɗee a nyem kì̵ Naan. Yaksi ɓe Daa Jesu Kristi, ki̶ Riin kì̵ Naan funu, wuri ki̶ le ku wu ɗee a nyem ɗin ndi̶re mo nyit kì̵ Naan.
46006012	Meeɓe mee gurum sat nee. "Ba mee mbii ɗi ni cíi c`in ɗi kas." Ii, azeen, amma ba a mbii mo jir ɗi mo ki̶ koghop ni kas. "Pe wan ɗi, ɓe ni azeen-nzeen nee, ba mee mbii ɗi ni cíi c`in ɗi wan kas." Amma ba wan riɓet ɗee a ki̶rom kì̵ mee mbii kas.
46006013	Mee ngo tal nee, "Mbiise ni a mpee ɓut, ki̶ ɓut a mpee mbiise." Ni azeen, amma Naan wurin nshirip mo weet. Ba mo leshin kì̵ gurum, a mpee c`in mbii ɗiibish mo kaa ngaa si kas. Amma mo leshin kì̵ gurum a mpeku ni c`in ɗak ɗi Daa, ki̶ a Daa wurii tap kì̵ shin kì̵ gurum ni zak.
46006014	Naan wuri yaghal kì̵ Daa a peemúut, ɓe wurin nyaghal ki̶ mun a peemúut shi iiko fi̶ri aasi zak.
46006015	Ba wu man nee, suk fuu ni mo, a ɓeep kì̵ Kristi kas aa? Cirang ɗangɓe wan mmang mee ɓeep kì̵ Kristi, ku wan ɓal ni ashak ki̶ ɓeep mu mat ngaa ye? Ba mi̶ni mmak c`in kas koo diɓen!
46006016	Ba wu man nee, ngo ɗi wuri ɓàlshin fi̶ri ki̶ mat ngaa, ɓe wuri ɗee a nan ɗiimi̶ndong ki̶ mat ngaa ni kas aa? Mpeeɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee, "Mo vul, mon nɗee a nan ɗiimi̶ndong."
46006017	Amma ngo ɗi wuri ɓal shin ki̶ Daa, ɓe mo ɗee a ɗiimi̶ndong ndi̶ghi̶n Riin.
46006018	Wu swa wu baa aku pe mbii ɗiibish mo, kaa ngaa si. Koo a shikbish ɗiiɗang ye, ɗi gurum kì̵ c`in ni, ɓe wuri kì̵ c`in ni a ki̶ɓwoon ki̶ shin fi̶ri. Amma ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ c`in ngaa, ɓe wuri ki̶ c`in shikbish a nkaa shin fi̶ri.
46006019	Ba wu man nee, suk fuu ni a lu Riin kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii tong ndi̶ghi̶n wun kas aa? A Naan wuri cín Riin mi̶ni wun ki̶ ba wun a mukáa fuu kas.
46006020	Jesu wuri kì̵ seet wun shi mbii ɗiiki̶rim, mpeemi̶ni, ɓe ni a ting, ku wu c`in ɗiiɗes nNaan shi suk fuu mo.
46007001	Yaksi, ɓe wan ki̶n riɓet satpo nwun nkaa mbii ɗi jí wu ran mo. Ni ret ku gurum tong ɗiisí ɗin nlapmat.
46007002	Amma mpee jwaan mu c`in ngaa, ɓe ni ret ku koo a mish ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe wuri ki̶ mat fi̶ri, ki̶ koo a mat ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe wura ki̶ mish fi̶ra.
46007003	Ni ret ku mish ni wuri c`in mbii ɗi ni ret ku wuri c`in mmat fi̶ri, ki̶ ni ret ku mat ni wura c`in mbii ɗi ni ret ku wura c`in mmish fi̶ra zak.
46007004	Ba mat wura ki̶ iiko nkaa sat fi̶ra kas, amma mish fi̶ra wuri ki̶ ni. Ni aasi zak, ba mish wuri ki̶ mee iiko nkaa shin fi̶ri kas, amma a mat fi̶ri wura ki̶ ni.
46007005	Taji wu cíi nshak aki̶ suk fuu mo kas, see katɗang wuu ten wu riɓet ki̶shak nee, wun nnookɗi mpee rep mee pee mo lee ɗak, mpeku wu lekáa fuu ɗi mpee c`in aduwa. Amma aɓwoon mi̶ni, ɓe wu baa wu kaat ɗi ki̶shak, mpeku taji Shetan num wun mpee cíi yaasuk kas.
46007006	Wan ki̶n satpo ɗiisi mo nwun a kaa ciin si, ba wan ki̶n sat a mee Waar nwun kas.
46007007	Azeen, wan riɓet ku, ɗi wun ntong kaa wan si, amma koo weye, ɓe wuri ki̶ lap zughum pe Naan ɗi ɗik ki̶ mu gi̶ni̶ghi̶n. Naan wuri cín zughum mo mmun a shini-shini.
46007008	Yaksi, wan ki̶n sat nyem ɗi ba mo kì̵ c`inɗik kas, ki̶ matkáa mo nee, ni ret ku mo tong ɗiisí, kaaɗi wan si.
46007009	Amma katɗang ɓe ba mo mak yaasut kas, ɓe ni ret ku mo c`inɗik, mpeeɗi ngyal gurum c`inɗik, met aku ɗi kyaghar se seen ngurum.
46007010	Mpee nyem ɗi mo kì̵ c`inɗik, ɓe wan ki̶ mee Waar ɗi, (ba a wan kas, amma a Daa wuri ki̶ cín nwan,) mpeku wan sat ɗi mo nee. Taji mat wura ɓàkshak ki̶ mish fi̶ra kas.
46007011	Katɗang wura ɓàkshak ki̶ mish fi̶ra, ɓe taji wura baa c`in mee ɗik ɗi zak kas, kasɓe, wura baaj`i pe mish fi̶ra ɗi, ku mo ɗak ɗik furu ɗi. Taji mee mish wuri tuɗik mmat fi̶ri kas.
46007012	Mpee kaghar ni mo, ɓe wan sat nee, (ba a Daa wuri sat mi̶ni kas, a wan), katɗang mee nguso ndang Jesu, wuri ki̶ mat ɗi ba wura kì̵ cínzeen kas, ɗangɓe wuraa riɓet tong ashak ki̶ mish fi̶ra, ɓe taji wuri ɓàkshak ki̶ wura kas.
46007013	Katɗang mee mat so ndang Jesu wura ki̶ mish ɗi ba wuri kì̵ cínzeen kas, ɗangɓe wurii riɓet tong ashak ki̶ wura, ɓe taji wura ɓàkshak ki̶ wuri kas.
46007014	Mpeeɗi mish ɗi ba wuri kì̵ cínzeen kas, ɓe wuri ɗee a ɗiili̶lap nyit kì̵ Naan, mpee mat fi̶ri ɗi wura kì̵ cínzeen. Ki̶ zak, mat ɗi ba wura kì̵ cínzeen kas, ɓe wura ɗee a ɗiili̶lap nyit ki̶ Naan, mpee mish fi̶ra ɗi wuri cínzeen. Kat ki̶si kas, ɓe jep fuu mon nɗee a kaa jep kì̵ nyemk`um mo si, amma yaksi ɓe mo a ɗiili̶lap nyit kì̵ Naan.
46007015	Amma katɗang mish koo mat, ɗi ba mo kì̵ cínzeen kas, moo riɓet ɓàkshak, ɓe wu yit ku mo ɓàkshak ɗi. Katɗang ni aasi, ɓe ngucínzeen ni, kyet a mish aa, koo a mat ni ye, ɓe ngo ni ki̶ pee, mpee c`in mbii ɗi wuri naa ni ret. Mpeeɗi Naan wuri pi̶rep mun a mpeku mu tong ɗi riyang.
46007016	Wii mat so ndang Jesu, cirang yin mman ɗi ye? Ngul yin nyaghal yi ɓam mish fii? Wugha mish nguso ndang Jesu, cirang wugha mman ɗi ye? Ngul wughan nyaghal a ɓam mat fugha ye?
46007017	Koo weye, ɓe wuri tong ntiit ki̶ peeɗi Daa wuri le ngo ni, ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ pet ngo ni mpee ni. A ɗiisi ni a Waar fi̶na pe koo a Eki̶lisya ɗiiɗang ye.
46007018	Ngo ɗi gyet mo kì̵ ten can wuri akuɗang Naan kì̵ pet wuri, ɓe taji wuri tangpee ɗi wurin nɗee ɗi nsuluk kas. Ngo ɗi ba gyet mo kì̵ ten can wuri kas, ɗangɓe Naan pet wuri, ɓe taji wuri waa tang ar ɗi mon ncan wuri ɗi kas.
46007019	Mpeeɗi koo ɗi mo can ngo ni, ki̶ koo ɗi ba moo can ngo ni kas, ɓe ba mi̶ni mo kì̵ koghop ni kas. Amma mbii ɗi ni ki̶ koghop ni, a ɗi gurum ntap kì̵ Waar kì̵ Naan mo ɓejee ɗak.
46007020	Koo weye, ɓe wuri tong ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n peeɗi gyet wuri ki̶ni, akuɗang Naan pet wuri si.
46007021	Katɗang gyet wugha a ki̶rom, akuɗang Naan ki̶ pet wugha, ɓe taji mi̶ni daampee nwugha kas. Amma katɗang wugha mak katpee, mpeku a ɗee ɗi a mukáa fugha, ɓe a gung ku a kat ni ɗi.
46007022	Ngo ɗi gyet Naan pet wuri ɓe wuri kuɗi a ki̶rom, amma yaksi, ɓe wurii ɗee a mukáa fi̶ri ndi̶ghi̶n Daa. Ni aasi zak, ngo ɗi gyet wuri a laalu kaaɗi Naan pet wuri, amma yaksi ngo mi̶ni ɗee a ki̶rom mu Kristi.
46007023	Jesu Kristi si̶rep wun a shi toghom ɗiiki̶rim, mpeemi̶ni ɓe taji wu ɗee a ki̶rom mu gurum mo kas.
46007024	Ni aasi, ɗyemnaa mo, koo ɗi gyet mo pi̶rep wun a ndi̶ghi̶n tong ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe ni ret ku mu tong ɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n tong mi̶ni ashak ki̶ Naan.
46007025	Po nkaa nyem ɗi ba mo kì̵ c`inɗik kas, ɓe ba wan ki̶ mee Waar pe Daa ɗi, mpee mo kas. Amma wan ki̶n sat a pan fi̶na, kaa ngo ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n kussuk kì̵ Naan, ɓe gurum mo mak cínzeen wan si, ɓe wan ki̶n pan nee.
46007026	Mpee mbii daampee ɗi mo ɗi yaksi, ɓe wan naa ne ni ret ku taji gurum c`inɗik kas.
46007027	Amma katɗang wugha ki̶ mat, ɓe taji a tang ar mpee tuɗik ni kas. Katɗang ba wugha ki̶ mat kas, ɓe taji a tang ar mpeku a lapmat ɗi kas.
46007028	Amma katɗang wugha c`inɗik, ɓe ba wugha c`in a shikbish kas, ki̶ katɗang mee reep c`inɗik, ɓe ba wura c`in shikbish kas. Amma jir ki̶si, nyem ɗi mo c`inɗik, ɓe mon nkat jeel mu yil ni. Mpeemi̶ni, nnaa fi̶na ɓe taji gurum c`inɗik kas, mpeku taji wuri shwaajeel.
46007029	Mbii ɗi wan ki̶n riɓet sat ni nɗiisi ɗyemnaa mo, peeɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten bi̶lip ni le, ni kì̵ wul kus. Yaghal nyaksi, ɓe nyem ɗi mo ki̶ mat mo, ɓe mo tong kaa ba mo kì̵ kyam c`inɗik kas si.
46007030	Nyem ɗi mon mmaap, ɓe mo tong kaa nyem ɗi ba mon mmaap kas si. Nyem ɗi mon nretnyit, ɓe mo tong kaa ba mo a nretnyit kas si. Nyem ɗi mo nkaa nwor mo, ɓe mo tong kaa nyem ɗi ba mo ki̶ mee mbii kas si.
46007031	Nyem ɗi moo c`in ɗak ki̶ mbii mu yil ɗiisi mo, ɓe mo tong kaa ba mo ki̶ kyam c`in mee mbii ki̶ mbii mu yil ni mo kas si. Mpeeɗi mbii ɗii mu yil ɗiisi ni mo nkaa ɗel so.
46007032	Ɗyen nwan, ku taji wu daampee nsuk kas. Ngo ɗi ba wuri kì̵ c`inɗik kas, ɓe wurii le putughup fi̶ri a nkaa mbii ɗi mo a mu Daa. Wurii pan a ar ɗi wurin nc`in ɗak ɗi mo ret ɗi nDaa nyit.
46007033	Amma ngo ɗi wuri kì̵ c`inɗik, ɓe wurii le putughup fi̶ri a nkaa mbii mu yil ni mo, wurii pan a ar ɗi wurin c`in mbii ɗi mo ret ɗi mmat fi̶ri nyit.
46007034	Ɗiisi ni le ku pan fi̶ri mo ɓak vul mmi̶ni. Mat ɗi ba wura kì̵ c`inɗik kas, koo reep, ɓe wuraa le putughup fi̶ra a nkaa ar ɗi wuran nc`in mbii ɗi mo ret ɗi nDaa nyit, kì̵ ar ɗi wuran nɗee a ɗiiɓang ndi̶ghi̶n nan, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n Riin. Amma mat ɗi wura ki̶ c`inɗik, ɓe wuraa le putughup fi̶ra a nkaa mbii mu yil ni mo, ɗi wuran nc`in, mpeku ni ret ɗi mmish fi̶ra nyit.
46007035	Wan ki̶n sat ɗiisi a mpeku ni ɓam wun ɗi, ba wan cíi a c`inɗik nwun kas, amma wan sat po si mo a mpeku mbii mo so ɗi nwun ndi̶re-ndi̶re, ki̶ mpeku wu c`inɗak mu Daa ɗi shi putughup mi̶ndong.
46007036	Po nkaa reep ɗi wura kì̵ tong, har peeɗik fi̶ra ni kì̵ ɗel. Katɗang ɓe puun fi̶ra wuri naa nee, ba ni ret nwura kas, ki̶ katɗang mi̶se ni c`in, ɓe wuri c`in mbii ɗi wuri naa ni ret, ɓe wuri cín wura nɗik ɓe ba wuri c`in a shikbish kas.
46007037	Amma katɗang ɓe wuri naa nee, ba ni a ting ku wuri c`inɗik nreep fi̶ri kas, ki̶ wuri ɗar ki̶ pan fi̶ri nkaa mbii ɗi wuri naa ni ret nwuri, ki̶ wuri fes le putughup fi̶ri ɓal-ɓal nee, wurin mmak tap ki̶ wura, ɓe wuri c`in a mbii ɗi ni ret.
46007038	Ngo ɗi wuri c`inɗik nreep fi̶ri, ɓe wuri c`in a mbii ɗi ni ret, amma ngo ɗi ba wuri c`inɗik nreep fi̶ri kas, ɓe wuri c`in a mbii ɗi ni waa ret met.
46007039	Mat wura a nder ki̶ mish fi̶ra, har parpuus ɗi wurin mmuut. Katɗang mish ni muut, ɓe wura ki̶ pee mpee c`inɗik koo a weye ɗi wura ki̶ riɓet, amma ɓe see a ngo ɗi wuri ndi̶ghi̶n Daa.
46007040	Amma katɗang a nnaa mi̶na, ɓe wuran ntong shi retnyit met, katɗang wura nook c`inɗik. Pan fi̶na, ɓe wan ki̶ Riin kì̵ Naan zak.
46008001	Yaksi, po nkaa mbiise ɗi mo kì̵ ten c`in nk`um mo, mu man nee, mun jir mun ki̶ man. Man nii le ku gurum ɗiyeepkáa, amma wal nii tap ɗik gurum kàa riret.
46008002	Katɗang mee gurum ki̶ pan nee, wuɗi man mee mbii, ɓe ba wuri kì̵ man mee mbii kaaɗi ni ret ku wuri man si kas.
46008003	Amma ngo ɗi wurii wal nNaan, ɓe Naan man ngo mi̶ni.
46008004	Yaksi, po nkaa se mbiise ɗi mo kì̵ ten cín ni nk`um mo, mu man azeen nee, ba k`um mo ki̶ mee seen kas. Ki̶ zak, mu man nee, Naan wuri a mmi̶shin ɓejee ɗak.
46008005	Koo ɗi pak mbii mo ɗi, ɗi moo pet mo a naan mo, ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ki̶ ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, mpeeɗi naan mo ɗi ɗes, ki̶ daa mo ɗi ɗes zak.
46008006	Amma jir ki̶si, ɓe pe mumun ɗi, ɓe Naan wuri a mi̶ndong ɓejee, ɗi wuri a puun funu, a wuri le mbii mo jir, ki̶ a mpee wuri ɗangɓe mun ki̶ seen. Daa funu wuri a mi̶ndong ɓejee zak, wuri Jesu Kristi, ɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n wuri ɓe Naan le mbii mo jir, ki̶ a ndi̶ghi̶n wuri ɓe mun ki̶ seen.
46008007	Amma ba a gurum mo jir mo kì̵ man zeen ɗiisi ni kas. Pak mo ki̶ fes loghot kì̵ k`um mo hakyeng, har mpee cicinsi, ɓe katɗang mo se mbiise, ɓe moo pan ne mbiise ni a mu k`um. Ba pan ɗin mputughup furu ni ɓal kas, ki̶ mo pan nee, wuɗun kì̵ ɗee, a ɗiiwuwat mpee mbiise.
46008008	Ba mbiise mak j`i ki̶ mun kus ki̶ Naan kas. Koo ɗi mu se mbiise, ɓe ba mun nshee ɗi kas, ki̶ koo ɗi ba mu se mbiise kas, ɓe ba mun ntaa mu kat kas.
46008009	Amma wu tap taji katpee fuu mpee c`in mbii ɗi wuu riɓet ni ɗee a mbii canshii nyem ɗi ba cínzeen furu ni ɓal kas.
46008010	Mpeeɗi katɗang mee gwar ɗi ba cínzeen fi̶ri ni ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiisi mo kas, wuri naa wugha gwar ɗi wugha ki̶ man, aa se mbii nluk`um, ɓe ba nin nc`in ɓal nwuri ndi̶ghi̶n putughup ku wuri se mbiise ɗi mo kì̵ ten cín ni nk`um kas aa?
46008011	Ni aasi, ɓe shi man fugha, wugha le ku ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fugha ɗi Kristi kì̵ muut mpee wuri, wuri ɗee a ɗiili̶lagham.
46008012	Katɗang wugha c`in mbii mi̶ni, ɓe wugha c`in shikbish nkaa gi̶nang, mpeeɗi wugha ki̶ le ku putughup fi̶ri ɗi ba ni kì̵ ɗar ɓal-ɓal kas ni pal, ki̶ zak, wugha c`in shikbish a nkaa Kristi shikáa fi̶ri.
46008013	Mpeemi̶ni, katɗang mbii ɗi wan nse, nin nɗee a mbii le canshii nɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶na, ɓe ba wan nkuɗi ki̶n se mbiise mi̶ni zak kas, mpeku taji wan le ku ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶na canshii kas.
46009001	Ba wan mak c`in mbii ɗi wan ki̶n riɓet kas aa? Ba wan a laalop kì̵ Kristi kas aa? Ba wan ki̶n ten naa Daa funu Jesu Kristi kas aa? Ba gyet a wan satpo Naan ni nwun, ɗangɓe wu ɗee a nyemso ndang Daa kas aa?
46009002	Koo ɗi ba pak gurum mo lap wan kaa laalop kì̵ Kristi si kas, ɓe ni a ting wan a laalop kì̵ Kristi pe wun ɗi. Mpeeɗi wun a langting mu ɗak fi̶na kaa laalop kì̵ Kristi si pe Daa ɗi.
46009003	A ɗiisi ni a mbii ɗi wan ki̶n sat, nyem ɗi moo kyakpo ndang wan.
46009004	Ba wan ki̶ pee mpeku wan se mbiise ki̶ shwaa mbii shwaa kas aa?
46009005	Ba wan ki̶ pee, mpee lapmat ɗi wura a nguso ndang Jesu, ku wan pan wura ndang san kas aa? Kaaɗi kaghar jeplop kì̵ Kristi mo, ki̶ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n mo mu Daa, ki̶ Pita moo c`in si kas aa?
46009006	Aa koo a wan ki̶ Barnabas ɓejee ɗi ting see mu c`in ɗak aku mu kat mbiise ɗi mun nse ɗi aa?
46009007	A mee sooja ɗiiɗang wuri kì̵ kyam kwat shaghal ɗak ɗi wuri c`in nshin ye? A we kì̵ kyam kop anab mbong, ɓe ba wurin nyaghal se làa anab ni kas ye? A we kì̵ kyam kiyeer long mo, ɓe ba wurin nshwaa wur ki̶ mo ni kas ye?
46009008	Kyet wan ki̶n sat ɗiisi ni a shi pan mu gurum wa? Ba Waar kì̵ Mosis ni sat aasi zak kas aa?
46009009	Mo kì̵ ten ran ni ndi̶ghi̶n takarda Waar ki̶ Mosis nee: "Taji a lop shang nkus randong mpo, kaaɗi ni nkaa ti̶reng ɗiɓen mbong mpeku aas ni put ɗi kas." Naan wurii tap aa randong mo ɓejee aa?
46009010	Amma gyet wuri le ku mo ran Waar mi̶ni mo a mpee mun gurum. Mpeku ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ kop ki̶ ngo ɗi wurii ɗiip, ɓe mo c`in ɗak furu ɗi shi canciin mpee se ɗiɓen ni.
46009011	Katɗang mun, muu ten mu kop a mbii ɗi ni a mu Riin mɓut nwun, ɓe ba ni ret, ku wuwun wu ɓam mun ki̶ mbii ɗii mu yil ni mo kas aa?
46009012	Katɗang pak gurum moo kat mbii ɗiisi mo pe wun ɗi, ɓe ba ni ret ku mun, mu kat mbii mo ɗes met mumo ni pe wun ɗi kas aa? Ba mun muu le ting nwun, mpeku wu cín mbii ɗiisi mo ɗi mmun kas, amma muu gung mbii mo jir, a mpeku taji mu ɗaam sekiyeen mpo ɗiiret mu Kristi kas.
46009013	Ba wu man nee, nyem ɗi moo c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n Lu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes, ɓe moo kat mbiise furu a nlu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes ni kas aa? Ki̶ ba wu man nee nyem ɗi moo wus mbiizughum a peewus mbiizughum mo, ɓe moo se a pak mbiizughum ni kas aa?
46009014	Ni aasi zak, ɓe Daa wuri satpo nee. Nyem ɗi moo satpo ɗiiret ngurum mo, ɓe ni ret ku mo kat mbiise furu a ɗiɓut zak.
46009015	Amma, ba wan ki̶n kyam c`in ɗak ki̶ iiko fi̶na ɗiisi kas, ki̶ ba wan ran wasika ɗiisi nwun, a mpeku wu cín mbii mo ɗi nwan kas. Ngyal ɗeesi ɓe wan muut, met a kuɗi mee ngo le mbii ɗi wan ki̶n canjagham nkaa ni ɗee a mbii ɗiibuu.
46009016	Mpeeɗi koo ɗi wan ki̶n satpo ɗiiret ni, ɓe ba wan ki̶ pee mpee canjagham kas. Amma ki̶n satpo ɗiiret ni a mpeeɗi, a Naan wuri ki̶ leting wan, mpeku wan satpo ni ɗi. Jeel ɗi mpee wan, katɗang ba wan satpo ɗiiret nin ngurum mo kas.
46009017	Katɗang ɗi wan ki̶n satpo ni a shi ɗyen fi̶na, ɓe ɗi wan nkat kwat. Amma wan ki̶n satpo ɗiiret ni ngurum mo, ba a shi ɗyen fi̶na kas, mpeeɗi a ɗak ɗi Naan wuri ki̶ le ni nsar fi̶na mmi̶ni.
46009018	Kwat fi̶na ni a meye? A kwat fi̶na nin nɗiisi, a peeɗi Naan wuri ki̶ cínpee nwan, mpeku wan satpo ɗiiret ni ngurum mo shi zughum, ba wan ki̶n c`in ɗak ki̶ iiko fi̶na mpee tang kwat pe wun ɗi kas.
46009019	Koo ɗi ba wan a ki̶rom ki̶ mee gurum kas, amma wan ki̶n ten nlesan a ki̶rom kì̵ gurum mo jir, mpeku wan j`i ɗi ki̶ gurum mo ɗes nDaa.
46009020	Mpee nyem Yahudi mo, ɓe wan ɗee a kaa mo si, mpeku wan j`i ki̶ mo ɗi nDaa. Ki̶ zak, nyem Yahudi mo, a nder kì̵ Waar kì̵ Mosis, ɓe wan ɗee a kaa mo si, koo ɗi ba wan shikáa fi̶na wan a nder kì̵ Waar kì̵ Mosis kas. Amma wan ki̶n ɗee a kaa nyem ɗi mon nder kì̵ Waar kì̵ Mosis ni si, mpeku wan j`i ki̶ mo ɗi nDaa.
46009021	Mpee nyem ɗi ba mo ki̶ Waar kì̵ Mosis kas, ɓe wan ɗee a kaa mo si, mpeku wan j`i ki̶ mo ɗi nDaa. Amma ɓe wan ki̶n tap ki̶ Waar kì̵ Naan. Azeen-nzeen wan a nder kì̵ Waar mu Kristi.
46009022	Mpee nyem ɗi ba mo ki̶ ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen kas, ɓe wan fwang mo, mpeku wan j`i ki̶ mo nDaa. Wan ki̶n ten ɗee a mbii mo jir, pe gurum mo ɗi jir, mpeku koo ɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe wan ɓam pak mo ɗi.
46009023	Wan ki̶n lesan ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir, a mpee po ɗiiret ni, ki̶ mpeku wan kat pak ɗiiret mu po ɗiiret ni ɗi zak.
46009024	Ba wu man nee, ndi̶ghi̶n kaghan mu sushii, ɓe gurum mo ɗes moo swa, amma a ngumi̶ndong ki̶ lap zughum ni ɓejee ɗak kas aa? Ni aasi zak, ni ret ku wu swa, mpeku wu kat zughum ni ɗi.
46009025	Koo weye, ɗi wuri a ngusushii, ɓe wuri naa nkar shin fi̶ri ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir. Wurii kar shin fi̶ri, mpeku wuri lap zughum ɗi nii ki̶lak ki̶ wat ɗi, amma mumun, muu lap a zughum ɗi ba nin nkyam wat kas.
46009026	Ba wan ki̶n su a buu-buu kas, ki̶ cutpee ɗi wan ki̶n c`in ni, ba wan ki̶n cut a buu kas.
46009027	Amma wan ki̶n c`in ki̶ san fi̶na, mpeku san fi̶na ni ɓal ɗi, ku ni ɗee ɗi nder fi̶na kaa ki̶rom si, mpeku taji aɓwoon ɗi wan ki̶ satpo ɗiiret ni ngurum mo, ɗangɓe mo yaghal baa ki̶ wan shikáa fi̶na mɓwoon kas.
46010001	Ɗyemnaa mo, wan riɓet ku wu man nee, gyet puun funu mo jir, mo a nder kì̵ nluu, ki̶ gyet mo jir mo can am bahar ɗiinaat mo ɗel riyang ndang Mosis zak.
46010002	Gyet mo c`in baptisma mmo jir a ndi̶ghi̶n nluu, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n am bahar kaaɗi gyet mo so ndang Mosis si.
46010003	Gyet mo jir, mo se mbiise ɗi gyet Naan cín mmo ɗi ni a mu Riin.
46010004	Gyet mo jir mo shwaa am ɗi Naan cín mmo. Mpeeɗi gyet mo shwaa am ɗi gyet ni j`i put mɓut jwak. Gyet jwak ɗiisi ni mwaan ndang mo. Gyet jwak ɗiisi a Kristi shikáa fi̶ri.
46010005	Jir ki̶si, ɓe ba gyet Naan wuri kat retnyit ki̶ pak mo kas. Mpeemi̶ni ɓe mo murap ɗes a naar yil.
46010006	Yaksi, ɓe mbii ɗiisi mo jir, mo ɗee a mbiikám mumun. Mo gwak mun, mpeku taji mu kyaghar mbii ɗiibish mo, kaaɗi gyet mo c`in si kas.
46010007	Taji wu ɗee a nyemk`um mo, kaaɗi gyet pak mo ndi̶ghi̶n mo, mo c`in si kas, kaaɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si nee: "Gurum ni mo tong nyil, mpeku mo se gwom k`um, ki̶ shwaa yughur, ki̶ mo yaghal a ting mpee c`in kook."
46010008	Taji mu c`in ngaa kas, kaaɗi gyet pak mo ndi̶ghi̶n mo, mo c`in si, har gurum mo duɓu laarvul baakun, mo murap parpuus mi̶ndong.
46010009	Taji mu kyam Daa kas, kaaɗi gyet pak mo ndi̶ghi̶n mo, mo c`in si, ɓe har gyet nw`oo mo, twa mo.
46010010	Taji mu kyakpo nɗagham-nɗagham kas, kaaɗi gyet pak mo ndi̶ghi̶n mo, mo c`in si, har mo murap nsar ki̶ ngulop mu muut.
46010011	Mbii ɗi gyet ni kat mo, ni ɗee a mbiikám pe mun ɗi. Mo kì̵ ten ran mo, a mpeku mo gwak mun ɗi, mun ɗi peekyes ki̶ ɓit ni mo kì̵ j`i a nkaa mun.
46010012	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe koo a weye, ɗi wuri ki̶ pan ne wuɗi ki̶ ɗar ɓal-ɓal, ɓe wuri tap, taji wuri pal kas.
46010013	Ba mee jwaan ɗi nin nkat wun ɗi kas, see a ɗi nin nkat kaghar gurum mo jir zak. Naan wuri a nguzeen, ba wurin nyit ku mee jwaan kat wun, ɗi nin mmet mɓal fuu kas. Amma a shi jwaan ni, ɓe wurin nle ar put ni ɗi zak, mpeku wu mak gung jwaan ni ɗi.
46010014	Mpeemi̶ni ɗyemnaa mo, taji wu seyil nk`um mo kas.
46010015	Wan ki̶n katpo wun, a kaa nyem ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten kám ar ni wun si. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wu ɓeet ki̶ suk, nkaa mbii ɗi wan ki̶n sat ni.
46010016	Katɗang mu mang laaɗaa mu Tong Ashak ɗi muu pi̶lang Naan mpee ni, ɓe ba wu man nee, muu ɓàl a káa funu mo ashak ki̶ Kristi ndi̶ghi̶n toghom fi̶ri kas aa? Bred ɗi muu yilang si, ɓe ba wu man nee, muu ɓàl a káa funu ndi̶ghi̶n shin kì̵ Kristi kas aa?
46010017	Mpeeɗi bred ni a mi̶ndong, ɗi muu yilang ni mu se ashak. Ni aasi zak, mun ɗi ɗes, amma mun a nan ɗiimi̶ndong, mpeeɗi muu se a bred ɗiimi̶ndong.
46010018	Wu pan nkaa nyem Yahudi mo ndi̶ghi̶n nan, nyem ɗi moo se ndi̶ghi̶n mbiizughum ɗi mo wus ni, ɓe moo ɓal a káa furu kì̵ Naan ɗi moo c`in ni nwuri.
46010019	Wan ki̶n riɓet sat a meye? Kyet mbiise ɗi moo c`in nk`um, mi̶ni a mee mbii me? Koo a k`um ni a mee mbii ye?
46010020	Waash, wan ki̶n sat a nee, mbii ɗi nyemk`um moo fet mpee c`in zughum, ɓe moo c`in ni a riin ɗiibish mo, ba moo cín zughum ni a nNaan kas. Ba wan riɓet ku wu ɓàlkáa fuu mo ashak ki̶ riin ɗiibish mo kas.
46010021	Ba wun mmak shwaa mɓut laaɗaa mu Daa, ki̶ wu waa wu shwaa mɓut laaɗaa mu riin ɗiibish mo zak kas.
46010022	Taji mu c`in mee mbii ɗi nin nle ku Naan wuri c`in tughup kas. Kyet mun, mu ɓal met wuri wa?
46010023	Gurum mo sat nee, "Mu mak c`in koo meye, ɗi mu riɓet." Ni azeen, amma ba a mbii mo jir ɗi mo mak ɗik wun koo moo koghop ni mpee gurum kas.
46010024	Taji mee gurum tang mbii ɗi mo a mukáa fi̶ri kas. Amma ni ret ku wuri tang a mbii ɗi mo ret mpee niyee mo.
46010025	Wu se mbii ɗi moo si̶rep mo ndi̶ghi̶n kasuwa mu luwa mo. Taji wu talpo kas, mpee pan ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n putughup.
46010026	Mpeeɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee. "Yil ɗiisi ni a mu Daa, ki̶ mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ni jir."
46010027	Katɗang mee gwar ɗi ba wuri kì̵ cínzeen nDaa Jesu kas, wuri pet wun mpee sese ashak ki̶ wuri. Katɗang wuu lap ii, ne wunn nso, ɓe wu se mbii ɗi wurin nle a kiyeen fuu. Taji wu tal kas, mpee pan ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu.
46010028	Amma katɗang mee ngo kì̵ ten sat nwun nee, "Mo kì̵ ten cín luwa ɗiisi ni nk`um." Ɓe taji wu se luwa ni kas, mpee gwar ɗi wuri satpo mi̶ni nwun, ki̶ mpee pan ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n putughup.
46010029	Ba a mpee pan muu mo kas, amma a mpee pan kì̵ gwar ni. Mpeme ɗang pan ki̶ mee gurum nin ncíi nwan, mpee katpee ɗi wan ki̶ ni, mpee c`in mbii ɗi wan ki̶n riɓet ye?
46010030	Katɗang wan pi̶lang Naan mpee mbiise fi̶na. Ɓe cirang ɗangɓe gurum moo katpo ɗiibuu nkaa wan, mpee mbiise ɗi wan ki̶n ten pi̶lang Naan nkaa ni ye?
46010031	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe koo a mbii ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wuu c`in, koo a se mbiise, koo a shwaa mbiishwaa, ɓe wu c`in mbii mo jir mpee le Naan a ɗiiɗes.
46010032	Taji wu le ku mee gurum canshii kas. Koo ɗi ngo ni a ngu Yahudi kas, koo ɗi a Eki̶lisya mu Naan.
46010033	Kaaɗi wan ki̶n gung mpeku wan c`in mbii ɗi mo shang ɗi ngurum mo jir. Ba wan ki̶n tang a ɗiiret mukáa fi̶na kas, amma wan ki̶n tang a ɗiiret mu gurum mo ɗes, mpeku mo kat ɓam ɗi.
46011001	Wu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan fi̶na, kaaɗi wan ki̶n mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan mu Kristi si.
46011002	Wan kwoop wun, mpeeɗi wuu pan wan ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir, ki̶ wuu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n kám ɗi jí wan kám mo nwun zak.
46011003	Amma wan riɓet ku wu man nee, a Kristi wuri a káa kì̵ koo a mish ɗiiɗang ye, ki̶ a mish wuri a káa kì̵ mat fi̶ri, ki̶ Naan wuri a káa kì̵ Kristi.
46011004	Mpeemi̶ni koo mish ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wuri c`in aduwa, ki̶ satpo kì̵ Naan ndi̶ghi̶n ɗuu kì̵ gurum mo ki̶ káa fi̶ri a pi̶paa, ɓe wurii j`i ki̶ nashoop nkaa Kristi ɗi a wuri a káa fi̶ri mmi̶ni.
46011005	Koo mat ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wura c`in aduwa, ki̶ satpo kì̵ Naan ɗi ba wura paakáa fi̶ra kas, ɓe wuraa j`i ki̶ nashoop nkaa mish fi̶ra. Ɗi a wuri a káa fi̶ra, ki̶ zak, ɓe wura ɗee a kaa mat ɗi mo sak káa nwura ngau si mmi̶ni.
46011006	Katɗang ba mee mat paakáa fi̶ra kas, ɓe ni ret ku wura saa shoopkáa fi̶ra. Amma katɗang saa shoopkáa koo sak shoopkáa nin nj`i ki̶ nashoop mmat, ɓe ni ret ku wura paakáa fi̶ra.
46011007	Ba ni ret ku ngumish paakáa fi̶ri kas, mpeeɗi Naan ɗak mish a kaa shin si, ki̶ wurii kám a ɗiiɗes kì̵ Naan. Amma mat wura ki̶ kám a ɗiiɗes mu mish.
46011008	Ba gyet Naan ɗak mish a shi sat mu mat kas, amma gyet wuri ɗak mat a shi shin mu mish.
46011009	Ki̶ zak, ba gyet Naan wuri le mish a mpee mat kas, amma gyet wuri le mat a mpee mish.
46011010	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe ni ret ku mat paakáa fi̶ra, ku ni kám ɗi nee, wura a nder kì̵ mish fi̶ra, ki̶ mpee nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo zak.
46011011	Jir ki̶si, ɓe seen funu ɗi mun ki̶ ni ndi̶ghi̶n Daa, ɓe ba mat wura ɗik kì̵ mish fi̶ra kas, ki̶ ba mish wuri ɗik ki̶ mat fi̶ri kas zak.
46011012	Mpeeɗi gyet Naan wuri ɗak mat a shi mee ɗyes kì̵ mish, ki̶ ni aasi zak, yaksi ɓe a mat wura kì̵ làa mish. Mbii moo pwat a pe Naan ɗi jir.
46011013	Wun shikáa fuu, wu ɓeetpo ɗiisi ni, kyet nin ndi̶re mpeku mat wura c`in aduwa nNaan ndi̶ghi̶n kuur kì̵ gurum mo, ɗi ba wura paakáa fi̶ra kas wa?
46011014	Koo a shi ɗyen, ɓe ni kám nwun kas aa? Nee ni a mbii nashoop ku mish wuri ɗyel shoopkáa shwal-shwal.
46011015	Amma katɗang ɓe mat wura ɗyel shoopkáa ɗiishwal-shwal, ɓe mi̶ni a mbii jwat nwura kas aa? Mpeeɗi mo cín shoopkáa ɗiishwal-shwal ni nwura, a mpeku wura paakáa fi̶ra ɗi.
46011016	Amma katɗang mee ngo ki̶ riɓet ɓeetshik nkaa po ɗiisi, ɓe ba mumun, koo Eki̶lisya mu Naan mo, ɓe ba mu loghot ki̶ mee ar ɗi ni a mu seyil nNaan ɗi ni ɗik ki̶ mi̶ni kas.
46011017	Ndi̶ghi̶n waar ɗiisi, ɓe ba wan kwoop wun kas, mpeeɗi kuur fuu ni ba nii koghop ni kas. Mpeeɗi katɗang wu j`i wu kaat ndi̶ghi̶n kuur fuu, ɓe mbii ɗi wuu c`in ni mo, ɓe ba mo ret kas. Nii waa wuwat gurum mo met aku ɗi nin mɓam mo.
46011018	To, ɗin nshee ni, katɗang wu kuur, kaa Eki̶lisya si, mpee seyil nNaan, ɓe ba po fuu moo so ndangshak kas, har kaaɗi jí wan ki̶lingpo mi̶ni, ɓe wan ɗoghom cínzeen nni.
46011019	Ba ni ki̶ mee kyetwa kas, ni a ting, ku mo kat ɓàkshak ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n wun, mpeku mo man nyemso ndang Naan ɗin ndi̶re ni mo ɗi azeen-nzeen.
46011020	Katɗang wu j`i wu kaat ashak, ɓe ba wuu se a Tong Ashak mu Daa ni kas.
46011021	Mpeeɗi katɗang wu ɗoghom se ni, ɓe koo weye wurii yaa se mbiise ɗi wuri j`i ki̶ni, har wuu le ku neenláa mpak mo, ku pak moo shwaayughur ɗi.
46011022	Kai! ba wun ki̶ tulu ɗi wun nse ki̶ shwaa ɗi kas aa? A me le ɗang wuu toklong nkuur mu Eki̶lisya ki̶ Daa ye? Ki̶ a me le ɗang wuu cín nashoop nyem ɗi ba mo ki̶ mee mbii kas ye? Wan nsat a me nwun mpee mbii kaa ɗiisi si ye? Wan nkwoop wun aa? Waash, ba wan nkwoop wun kas koo diɓen.
46011023	Wan lap kám ɗiisi ni a pe Daa ɗi, ɗi wan ki̶n cín nwun si zak. Nee, mpar ɗi gyet mo seet Daa Jesu ɗi, ɓe Daa Jesu wuri mang bred.
46011024	Aɓwoon ɗi wuri ki̶ c`in aduwa mu pi̶lang Naan nkaa bred ni, ɓe wuri yilang ni, wuri sat nee: "Ɗiisi ni a san fi̶na, ɗi wan ki̶n cín ni mpee wun. Wu naa nc`in aasi, mpeku taji wu mander nwan kas."
46011025	Ni aasi zak, ɓe aɓwoon ɗi mo se mbiise, ɓe wuri mang laaɗaa, ɓe wuri sat nee, "Laaɗaa ɗiisi ni a ɓi̶lemcuk shi toghom kì̵ Naan ɗiipoo, ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n toghom fi̶na. Katɗang koo a pi̶rang ye ɗi wun nshwaa am anab ndi̶ghi̶n laaɗaa ni, ɓe wuu shwaa ni a mpeku taji wu mander wan kas."
46011026	Shii ki̶ ɗiisi ni a nee, koo a pi̶rang ye ɗi wuu se bred ni, ki̶ wu shwaa am anab ndi̶ghi̶n laaɗaa ni, ɓe wuu c`in a langting nkaa muut kì̵ Daa Jesu, har parɗi wurin mbaa j`i.
46011027	Katɗang mee ngo kì̵ se bred ni ki̶ shwaa am anab ndi̶ghi̶n laaɗaa mu Daa ni, ba a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗin ndi̶re kas, ɓe ngo mi̶ni kì̵ c`in a shikbish nkaa shin mu Jesu ki̶ toghom fi̶ri mmi̶ni.
46011028	Ni ret ku gurum shee kyamshin fi̶ri akuɗang wurii se bred, ki̶ shwaa am anab ɗi nin ndi̶ghi̶n laaɗaa mu Daa ni.
46011029	Mpeeɗi katɗang ba gurum manshii kì̵ shin mu Daa Jesu ki̶ toghom fi̶ri ni kas, ɗangɓe wuri ki̶ se bred ki̶ shwaa am anab ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n laaɗaa mu Daa ni, ɓe gwar mi̶ni ki̶ j`i aa ɗiyeel nkaa shin fi̶ri mmi̶ni.
46011030	A nii le, ɗangɓe pak fuu mo a gok, ki̶ ba pak mo ki̶ ɓal kas, har pak fuu mo ɗes, mo kì̵ murap.
46011031	Amma katɗang mu kyamsun funu mo azeen-nzeen, ki̶ mu c`in mbii mon ndi̶re-ndi̶re ɓe ba Naan tokɗiyeel mmun kas.
46011032	Amma Naan wurii tokɗiyeel mmun, ki̶ wurii kar mun, a mpeku taji wurin ncanɗiyeel ɗiibish mmun ashak ki̶ gurum ɗiibish, ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, parkyes kì̵ yil ni kas.
46011033	Mpeemi̶ni, ɗyemnaa mo, katɗang wu kuur ashak mpee se Tong Ashak mu Daa, ɓe ni ret ku wu kúmshak.
46011034	Katɗang neenláa mmemee fuu, ɓe ni ret ku gwar mi̶ni sese ntulu fi̶ri akuɗang wurii j`i kuur ni. Mpeku taji Naan wuri canɗiyeel ɗiibish nkaa wun jir, a peekuur fuu ni. Po nkaa kaghar mbii ɗi mo ɗee ɗi, ɓe see parɗi wan wul pe wun ɗi, ɗangɓe wan nsatpo nwun nkaa mo jir.
46012001	Ɗyemnaa mo, po nkaa zughum ɗi Riin kì̵ Naan wurii cín ngurum. Ba wan riɓet ku wu nook manshii ni kas.
46012002	Wu man nee, kaaɗi gyet wu kuɗi a nyemseyil nk`um mo, ɓe wuu seyil nk`um ɗi ba mo ki̶ seen kas, shi ar mo shini-shini.
46012003	Wan riɓet ku wu man nee, ba mee ngo, ɗi wurii katpo shi Riin kì̵ Naan, wurin mmak sat ne Jesu wuri a mbii fulup kas. Ki̶ ba mee gurum mak c`in langting nee, "Jesu wuri a Daa." Katɗang ba wurii mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n Riin kì̵ Naan kas.
46012004	Zughum ɗi Riin kì̵ Naan wurii cín ngurum mo, mo ɗi shini-shini, amma a Riin ɗiimi̶ndong wurii cín mo ngurum mo.
46012005	Ɗak mo ɗi shini-shini, amma Daa a mi̶ndong.
46012006	Man ɗi gurum moo c`in ɗak ɗishik mo shini-shini, amma a Naan ɗiimi̶ndong wurii c`in man ni ngurum mo, mpeku mo c`in ɗak ni ɗi.
46012007	Riin kì̵ Naan wurii kám shin ngurum mo ndi̶ghi̶n ar mo shini-shini, mpeku mo c`in ɗak ɗi nin mɓam niyee mo ɗi jir.
46012008	Mee gurum, ɓe Riin kì̵ Naan ni cín a zughum mu man satpo nwuri shi seen, ki̶ mee gurum ɓe Riin ni c`in a zughum mu man mbii nwuri.
46012009	Mee gurum, ɓe Riin ni cín a zughum mu cínzeen nwuri, ki̶ mee gurum ɓe Riin ni cín a iiko nwuri mpee bar nyemgok mo.
46012010	Mee gurum ɓe Riin kì̵ Naan ni cín a zughum mu c`in mbii aapo nwuri, ki̶ mee gurum ɓe Riin kì̵ Naan ni cín a iiko mu satpo Naan ngo ni. Mee gurum ɓe Riin wuri cín a man mu ɓàkyit nzughum ɗi mo put a pe Riin kì̵ Naan ɗi, ki̶ riin ɗi ba mo put a pe Naan ɗi kas zak. Mee gurum ɓe Riin wuri cín a zughum mu katpo shi li̶po mo shini-shini ngwar mi̶ni. Mee gurum zak, ɓe wuri cín a zughum ɗii mu manshii kì̵ pi̶ring ki̶ li̶po mu gurum mo shini-shini ngo ni.
46012011	A Riin kì̵ Naan ɗiisi wuri mi̶ndong, ɗi wuri cín zughum ɗiisi mo ngurum mo shini-shini zak, kaaɗi wuri naa ni ret nwuri nyit si.
46012012	Kristi wuri a kaa shin kì̵ gurum si. Kaaɗi wu man nee, shin kì̵ gurum ni ki̶ ɓeep mo ɗes, amma jir ki̶si ɓe shin kì̵ gurum ni a mi̶ndong ɓejee ɗak, koo ɗi ni ki̶ ɓeep mo shini-shini.
46012013	Mo c`in baptisma mmun jir a ndi̶ghi̶n Riin ɗiimi̶ndong, aasi ɓe mu ɗee a ɗiimi̶ndong, koo ɗi mun a nyem Yahudi mo, koo ɗi ba mun a nyem Yahudi mo kas, koo ɗi mun a ki̶rom mo, ki̶ koo ɗi mun a jeplu mo zak. Mun jir, ɓe muu ten mu lap a Riin kì̵ Naan ɗiimi̶ndong.
46012014	Ba shin kì̵ gurum ni ki̶ ɓeep a mi̶ndong ɓejee kas, amma ni kì̵ ɓeep mo a ɗes.
46012015	Katɗang shii sat nee; "Ba wan a sar kas, mpeemi̶ni ɓe ba wan a memee mɓut shin kì̵ gurum kas." Koo ɗi shii satpo mi̶ni, ɓe ba nin nnook ɗee a memee mɓut ɓeep mu shin kì̵ gurum kas.
46012016	Ki̶ zak, katɗang ɓe kom sat nee, "ba wan a yit kas, mpeemi̶ni ɓe ba wan a memee mɓut shin kì̵ gurum kas." Koo ɗi kom satpo mi̶ni, ɓe ba kom nin nnook ɗee a memee mɓut shin kì̵ gurum kas.
46012017	Katɗang ɗi shin kì̵ gurum ni a yit jir, ɓe ɗi gurum ki̶ ki̶lingpee a shi meye? Katɗang ɗi shin kì̵ gurum a kom jir ɓejee, ɓe ɗi cirang gurum nki̶ling ɗu kì̵ mbii mo ɗi ye?
46012018	Amma Naan wuri leɓeep mo shini-shini ndi̶ghi̶n shin kì̵ gurum, kaaɗi wuri naa ni ret nwuri nyit si.
46012019	Katɗang ɓe ɗi ɓeep ni a mi̶ndong ɓejee ɗak, ɓe ɗi shin kì̵ gurum ni a neye?
46012020	Kaaɗi ɓeep kì̵ gurum mo ɗi ɗes, amma ɓe shin kì̵ gurum ni a mi̶ndong ɓejee ɗak,
46012021	mpeemi̶ni, ɓe ba yit mmak sat nsar nee. "Ba wan ki̶n riɓet wii kas." Ki̶ zak, ba káa mmak sat nshii nee, "Ba wan ki̶n riɓet wii kas."
46012022	Azeen-nzeen, ba ni aasi kas, mpeeɗi rep ɓeep ɗi muu naa mo kaa ba mo ki̶ ɓal kas si, ɓe mo ki̶ koghop ni ɗes mpee shin kì̵ gurum.
46012023	Ki̶ muu tap ki̶ ɓeep ɗi muu ɓák mo ɗes zam. Ɓeep ɗi mo mɓut nsun funu mo, ɗi ba mo ret naa kas, ɓe muu tap ki̶ mo riret.
46012024	Amma ba muu cín ɗiiɗes mi̶ni mɓeep funu ɗiiret naa ni mo kas. A Naan wurii tap leshin kì̵ gurum aasi, mpeku ɓeep ɗi ba mo ki̶ ɓal kas, ɓe mu tap ɗi ki̶ mo riret zak.
46012025	Mpeku taji mee ɓàkshak yaghal ndi̶ghi̶n shin kì̵ gurum kas. Amma koo a ɓeep ɗiiɗang ye ɓe nii tap ki̶ gi̶ni̶ghi̶n.
46012026	Katɗang jeel taa nkaa mee ɓeep ni, ɓe kaghar ɓeep ni mo jir mon nshwaajeel ni. Amma katɗang mo kwoop mee ɓeep ni, ɓe kaghar ɓeep ni mo jir, mon nc`in retnyit ashak ki̶ ɓeep mi̶ni.
46012027	Wun jir wun a shin kì̵ Kristi, koo a weye ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ɓe wuri a memee mɓut mɓeep fi̶ri.
46012028	Ndi̶ghi̶n Eki̶lisya, ɓe Naan wuri kì̵ bi̶lip gurum mo le shini-shini. Ɗin nshee, ɓe wuri kì̵ bi̶lip jeplop kì̵ Jesu mo, ɗiivul, ɓe wuri bi̶lip nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan mo, ɗiikun, ɓe wuri kì̵ bi̶lip nyemkám mo. Ki̶ wuri bi̶lip nyem c`in ɗak mu mbii aapo mo. Ɗangɓe wuri kì̵ bi̶lip nyem bar gurum mo, ki̶ nyemɓam gurum mo, nyemnaa gurum mo, mpeku mo c`in ɗak ɗi ndi̶re-ndi̶re, ki̶ nyemkatpo mo shi liispo mo shini-shini zak.
46012029	Ba a gurum mo jir a jeplop kì̵ Jesu kas. Ba a gurum mo jir mo a nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan kas.
46012030	Ba a gurum mo jir, ɗi moo c`in ɗak ɗii mu aapo kas. Ba a gurum mo jir, ɗi mo mak yakshii kì̵ mbii ɗi moo sat shi liispo mo shini-shini kas.
46012031	Amma ni ret ku putughup fuu mo ɗee a nkaa zughum ɗi mo ki̶ koghop ni met ndi̶ghi̶n zughum ɗiisi ni mo. Yaksi, ɓe wan nkám wun mee mbii ɗi ni ret ku wu c`in met kaghar mbii mo jir.
46013001	Katɗang wan mak katpo shi li̶po mu gurum mo, ki̶ mu nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo, amma katɗang ba wan ki̶ wal ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶na kas, ɓe wan ɗee a kaa wal ki̶ garwa ɗi nin nfii si, koo kaa wal kì̵ kunguleng si.
46013002	Katɗang ɓe wan ki̶ zughum mu satpo kì̵ Naan nkaa mbii ɗi mon ndung j`i, ki̶ wan manshii kì̵ mbii ɗiisi̶sok mo, har ki̶ kaghar seen mo jir, ki̶ koo ɗi wan ki̶ cínzeen ɗi ni le ku wan sat njwak mo yaghal aku, a peeɗi mo ɗi, ɓe katɗang ba wan ki̶ wal ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶na kas, ɓe ba wan a mee mbii kas, koo diɓen.
46013003	Koo ɗi wan cín long fi̶na mo jir ngurum mo shi zughum, ki̶ koo ɗi wan cín san fi̶na mpeku mo wus ni ɗi, ɓe katɗang ba wan ki̶ wal kas, ɓe ba nii mee koghop pe wan ɗi kas, koo ɗiɓen.
46013004	Wal ni a gung mbii mo, ki̶ naajeel kì̵ gurum mo zak. Ba wal ni ki̶ c`in zughur koo canjagham kas koo wup nsat kas.
46013005	Ba wal ni ki̶ roghop, koo toklong ngurum mo kas. Ba wal ni ki̶ ɗar a nkaa mbii ɗi mo ret ni nyit ɓejee ɗak kas. Ba wal ni ki̶ langtughup, koo ni wet nyaa shikbish ɗi gurum kì̵ ni mputughup kas.
46013006	Ba wal ni ki̶ kat retnyit ki̶ mbii ɗiibish mo kas, amma wal nii kat retnyit a ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi mo azeen.
46013007	Wal ni ki̶ gung ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir, ki̶ nii cínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir zak. Wal nii canciin ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir, ki̶ nii yaa sat ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir.
46013008	Ba wal nii kyam taa kat kas. Ba wal nii kyes kas, har ngaa-ngaa. Amma satpo kì̵ Naan nkaa mbii ɗi mon ndung j`i mon nɗel so, ki̶ zughum mu iiko mu katpo shi li̶po mo shini-shini, mon nɗel so. Manshii kì̵ mbii mo, ɓe mi̶ni nɗel so zak.
46013009	Azeen ba man funu ni a ɗi gi̶gam kas, ki̶ zak, satpo kì̵ Naan nkaa mbii ɗi mon ndung j`i, ba ni a ɗiigi̶gam kas.
46013010	Amma katɗang parɗi ngo ɗi wuri a ɗiigi̶gam wurin nj`i, ɓe mbii ɗi ba mo a ɗiigi̶gam kas, mon nɗel so si.
46013011	Kaaɗi gyet wan kuɗi a làa, ɓe wan ki̶n katpo a kaa làa si. Wan ki̶n c`in a pan kì̵ jep mo ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶na, ki̶ zak, wan ki̶n c`in mbii mo a kaa làa si. Amma, yaksi kaaɗi wan a ngunan, ɓe wan yit ɗak ɗi mo a mu jep mo jir.
46013012	Mbii ɗi muu naa mo yaksi, ɓe muu naa mo a shir-shir kaaɗi muu naa muriin ndi̶ghi̶n mbii naayit ɗi ba ni naapee riret kas si. Amma parmeeci ɓe mun nnaa mbii mo riret shi yit ki̶ yit. Yaksi ɓe mbii ɗi wan man mo akáa-akáa ɓejee ɗak, amma parpuus mi̶ni ɓe wan mman mbii mo ndi̶re-ndi̶re jir, kaaɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten man wan si.
46013013	Mbii mo ɗi kun, ɗi ba mon nkyam ɗel kas, mo a cínzeen, ki̶ canciin, ki̶ wal, amma wal ni ɗes met mmo jir.
46014001	Ni ret ku wu naa tong ndi̶ghi̶n wal, ki̶ zak, wu le putughup fuu mo nkaa zughum ɗi Riin wurii cín mo, met jir, ɓe a zughum mu satpo Naan nkaa mbii ɗi mon nc`in.
46014002	Koo a weye ɗi wuri ki̶ katpo a shi mee li̶po ɗiici, ɓe wurii katpo aa Naan, ba wurii katpo aa gurum mo kas. Mpeeɗi ba mee gurum man mbii ɗi wuri sat ni kas, wuri sat a mbii ɗi mo a si̶sok ndi̶ghi̶n ɓal kì̵ Riin.
46014003	Amma koo a weye, ɗi wurii sat a mbii ɗi Naan kì̵ cín nwuri, mpeku wuri sat ɗi ngurum mo, ɓe wurii katpo aa gurum mo jir mmi̶ni. Mpeku wuri ɓal kwak ɗi ngurum mo, ki̶ zak, mpeku wuri ɓam mo ɗi, ki̶ mpeku wuri caa mo ɗi.
46014004	Ngo ɗi wurii katpo a shi mee li̶po ɗiici, wurii ɓam a káa fi̶ri ɓejee. Amma ngo ɗi wurii sat a po ɗi Naan kì̵ cín nwuri, mpeku wuri sat ɗi ngurum mo, ɓe wurii ɓam a Eki̶lisya ni jir.
46014005	Wan riɓet ku wun jir, wu katpo shi li̶po mo shini-shini, amma ɗyen nwan nee, ɗi wun jir, wun nsat a po ɗi Naan kì̵ cín nwun, mpeku wu sat ɗi ngurum mo. Ngo ɗi wurii sat a po ɗi Naan kì̵ cín nwuri mpeku wuri sat ɗi ngurum mo, ɓe gwar mi̶ni met ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ katpo shii mee li̶po ɗiici, see koo katɗang ɓe mee gurum ɗi, ɗi wurin mmak pi̶ring ki̶ po ni akuɗang, mpeku ni ɓam Eki̶lisya ni ɗi.
46014006	Yaksi ɗyemnaa mo, katɗang wan so pe wun ɗi, ɗangɓe wan katpo ki̶ wun a shi li̶po mo shini-shini, ɓe kyet wan ki̶ mee koghop ni pe wun ɗi wa? Katɗang ba wan so aa mee lop ɗiipoo nwun pe Naan ɗi, koo mee man, koo mee po ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ cín nwan, mpeku wan kám ɗi nwun kas, ɓe ba ni ki̶ mee koghop ni pe wun kas.
46014007	Koo a mbii c`in kook ɗi ba mo ki̶ mee seen kas, kaa kuleet ki̶ nɗeng-nɗeng si, katɗang ba ngutaa ni, taa ɗoo ni riret kas, ɓe cirang ɗang gurum mmanshii kì̵ kook ɗi gwar nii taa ɗi ye?
46014008	Ki̶ zak, katɗang ba ngutaa feer wuri taa ɗoo ni riret kas, ɓe cirang ɗang gurum mon ɗak sut mpee lek ye?
46014009	Ni aasi zak ki̶ wun, katɗang wu sat mbii mo a shi li̶po ɗiici ɗi ba gurum mo manshii ni riret kas, ɓe cirang ɗang gurum mon mmanshii kì̵ mbii ɗi wuu sat ni ɗi ye? Katɗang ni aasi, ɓe po ɗi wuu sat ni, ɓe kut ki̶ mang ni ɗel so ki̶ ni si jaap.
46014010	Azeen li̶po mo ɗi shini-shini ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, ki̶ koo a ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe ni ki̶ shii kì̵ ni.
46014011	Amma katɗang ba wan man li̶po ɗi mee gurum ki̶ sat kas, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a mi̶zep pe wan ɗi, ki̶ wan ɗee a mi̶zep pe gwar mi̶ni ɗi zak.
46014012	Ni aasi zak ki̶ wuwun. Kaaɗi wun wuu fes wu kyaghar zughum mo ɗi Riin kì̵ Naan wuri kì̵ cín mo, ɓe wu gung ku wu c`in ɗak ɗi, a shi zughum ɗi mon nc`in mɓam mpee ɗik Eki̶lisya ni.
46014013	Mpeemi̶ni, ngo ɗi wurii katpo shi li̶po mo shini-shini, ɓe wuri c`in aduwa, mpeku Naan wuri cín zughum mu man pi̶ring shii kì̵ mbii ɗi wurin nsat ni mo ɗi zak.
46014014	Mpeeɗi katɗang wan c`in aduwa nNaan shi mee li̶po ɗiiɗik, ɓe riin fi̶na nii c`in aduwa ni zak, amma ba pan fi̶na nii koghop ni kas.
46014015	Katɗang ni aasi, ɓe wan nc`in a meye? Wan nc`in aduwa shi riin fi̶na, ki̶ wan nc`in aduwa shi pan fi̶na zak. Wan nc`in kook ndi̶ghi̶n riin fi̶na, ki̶ wan nc`in kook ni shi pan fi̶na zak.
46014016	Katɗang wugha c`in aduwa mu pi̶lang Naan ndi̶ghi̶n kuur a shi riin fugha ɓejee, ɗi ba gurum mo ki̶ling mbii ɗi wugha sat ni kas, ɓe cirang mon nsat amin mpee aduwa mu pi̶lang ɗi wugha sat ni ye? Mpeeɗi ba gurum ni mo man mbii ɗi wugha sat ni kas.
46014017	Koo ɗi aduwa fugha mu pi̶lang Naan ni ret nNaan nyit, ɓe ba ni ɓam gi̶nang kas.
46014018	Wan pi̶lang Naan, mpeeɗi wan ki̶n katpo mo shi li̶po mo shini-shini met nwun jir.
46014019	Amma ndi̶ghi̶n kuur mu Eki̶lisya, ɓe ngyal wan satpo mo a paat ɓejee, ɗi gurum mon nki̶ling, ki̶ ni kám mbii mo zak, met ɗi wan nsatpo mo duɓu kaghapaat shi li̶po mo shini-shini ɗi ba gurum mo manshii ni kas.
46014020	Ɗyemnaa mo, taji wu c`in pan kaa jep mo si kas, wu ɗee kaa jep mo si ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiibish mo, amma wu ɗee kaa nyemnan mo si ndi̶ghi̶n pan fuu mo.
46014021	Mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee: "A shi gurum ɗi moo katpo ɗiici mo, ki̶ a shi li̶po kì̵ mi̶zep mo, ɓe wan nkatpo nyem ɗiisi mo, a ɗishik amma jir ki̶si, ɓe ba mon nki̶ling wan kas, Daa wuri sat aasi."
46014022	Katpo shi li̶po mo shini-shini, ni ɗee a alama mpee nyem ɗi ba mo cínzeen kas. Satpo ɗi Naan ki̶ cín mmee gurum, mpeku wuri sat mbii ɗi ngurum mo, mi̶ni a mpee nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten cínzeen mo, ba mi̶ni a mpee nyem ɗi ba mo ki̶ cínzeen kas.
46014023	Mpeemi̶ni katɗang nyem Eki̶lisya mo kaat ashak, ɗangɓe koo weye wuri ɗoghom katpo shi li̶po mo shini-shini, ɓe katɗang nyem ɗi ba mo man mee mbii kas, koo nyem ɗi ba mo kì̵ cínzeen kas, mo j`i ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n kuur fuu ni, ɓe wu pan ne, mon nsat nee wun a nyemtar mo kas aa?
46014024	Amma katɗang ɓe koo weye wurii sat a po kì̵ Naan, ɓe katɗang mee gurum ɗi ba wuri kì̵ cínzeen kas, koo gwar ɗi ba wuri man mee mbii kas, wuri j`i ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n kuur fuu ni. Ɓe po Naan ɗi wuu sat ni, nin nle ku gwar mi̶ni man nee azeen-nzeen ɗi a ngushikbish, ɓe po ɗi wuri ki̶ling ni, nin mɓiyang putughup fi̶ri.
46014025	Mbii ɗi gwar mi̶ni ki̶ pan mo a si̶sok ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri, ɓe mon nkàa put agaak, ki̶ har wurin ntaa nyil, ku wuri seyil ɗi nNaan, ki̶ wurin nsat ɗi nee, azeen-nzeen Naan wuri ɗi nnaar fuu.
46014026	A mbii ɗi wan ki̶n riɓet sat ni nɗiisi, ɗyemnaa mo. Katɗang wu kuur ashak mpee seyil nNaan, ɓe memee fuu ki̶ kook mu kwoop Naan, ki̶ memee ki̶ mbiikám, ki̶ memee ki̶ po ɗi Naan kì̵ woo nwuri, ki̶ memee ki̶ satpo ndi̶ghi̶n li̶po ɗiici mo, ki̶ zak, memee ki̶ pi̶ring mbii ɗi moo sat shi li̶po ɗiici ni mo. Wu yit ku mbii ɗiisi mo jir, mo ɗee a mbii ɗi mon c`in ɓal Eki̶lisya ni.
46014027	Katɗang mee gurum mo man katpo shi li̶po ɗiici mo, ɓe gurum mo kaa vul koo kun si, mo katpo ni ndangshak-ndangshak, ɓe ni a ting mee gurum pi̶ring shii kì̵ mbii ɗi mo sat ni ngurum mo jir.
46014028	Amma katɗang ba mee gurum ɗi, ɗi wurin mmak yakshii kì̵ mbii ɗi ngukatpo shi li̶po ɗiici ni wuri sat kas, ɓe gwar mi̶ni ɗok titik ndi̶ghi̶n kuur kì̵ Eki̶lisya ni, ɓe see wuri katpo mi̶ni a ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri ki̶ Naan ɓejee ɗak.
46014029	Gurum mo kaa vul koo kun si, mo katpo ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ cín mo, mpeku mo sat ni ɗi ngurum mo. Ni ret ku kaghar ni mo ɓeetshii ki̶ mbii ɗi mo sat ni.
46014030	Amma katɗang Naan wuri cín mee po mee gurum ɗi wuri ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n kuur ni, mpeku wuri sat ɗi ngurum ni mo, ɓe ni ret ku gwar ɗi wuri nkaa katpo nshee si wuri ɗok titik.
46014031	Wu mak satpo kì̵ Naan ni ngurum mo ndangshak-ndangshak, mpeku koo weye ɓe wuri kám mee mbii ɗi ku ni ɓam putughup ɗi nwuri zak.
46014032	Zughum mu satpo kì̵ Naan, ni a nder ki̶ ngusatpo Naan ni.
46014033	Ba Naan wuri a Naan ɗi wurii c`in mbii mo a ɓurish kas, amma wuri a Naan ɗi wurii tap c`in mbii mo ndangshak-ndangshak ndi̶ghi̶n riyang. Moo c`in aasi ndi̶ghi̶n Eki̶lisya mu nyem ɗiiɓang mo jir.
46014034	Ni ret ku, mat mo ɗok titik ndi̶ghi̶n kuur mu Eki̶lisya mo. Ba mu riɓet mmo, ku mo katpo kas. Amma ni ret ku, mo sham ki̶ káa furu mo, kaaɗi Waar kì̵ nyem Yahudi mo sat si.
46014035	Katɗang mo riɓet man mee mbii, ɓe mo tal pu mish furu mo ntulu. Mpeeɗi ni a mbii shooppee, mpeku mat katpo ndi̶ghi̶n kuur kì̵ Eki̶lisya mo.
46014036	Mo shee po kì̵ Naan ni a shi wun aa? Koo a wun a nyem ɗi po kì̵ Naan ni wul pe wun ɗi ɓejee ɗak ye?
46014037	Katɗang mee gurum ki̶ pan nee, wuɗi a ngusatpo kì̵ Naan, koo wuɗi ki̶ zughum ɗi ni a mu Riin, ɓe ni ret ku gwar mi̶ni man nee, mbii ɗi wan ki̶n ran nwun ni a Waar kì̵ Naan.
46014038	Katɗang gwar mi̶ni kwar ki̶ling po ɗiisi ni mo, ɓe taji wu ki̶ling wuri kas.
46014039	Mpeemi̶ni, ɗyemnaa mo, wu le putughup fuu mo a nkaa satpo kì̵ Naan, ki̶ taji wu cíi katpo ndi̶ghi̶n li̶po mo shini-shini kas.
46014040	Amma wu c`in koo a meye ndi̶ghi̶n ɗyen, ki̶ ndangshak-ndangshak zak.
46015001	Ɗyemnaa mo, yaksi ɓe wan riɓet baa lepan ɗi nwun, nkaa po ɗiiret, ɗi gyet wan ki̶n sat ni nwun, ɗi gyet wuu lap ni, ki̶ ɗi wu cínzeen, ɗi wuu ɗar a nkaa ni zak.
46015002	A shi po ɗiiret ɗiisi ni, ɓe wuu kat ɓam katɗang ɓe wu yaa po ɗi wan ki̶n sat ni nwun ɓal-ɓal. Katɗang aasi kas, ɓe cínzeen fuu ni a ɗiibuu.
46015003	Mbii ɗi gyet wan ki̶n lap ni, ɓe wan kì̵ cín a ni nwun, ɗi ni ki̶ koghop ni hakyeng nee; Kristi wuri muut mpee shikbish funu mo, kaaɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si.
46015004	Mo wum wuri, ɓe wuri yaghal a peemúut par shii ɗiikun, ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si.
46015005	Wuri shee kámshin fi̶ri mPita, ɗangɓe wuri kámshin fi̶ri njeplop fi̶ri ɗiikaghapaat baavul si mo.
46015006	Aɓwoon mi̶ni, ɓe wuri kámshin fi̶ri nyemcínzeen mo, ɗi mo met ɗaripàat a pee mi̶ndong. Pak nyem ɗi j`i mo naa wuri, mo ɗi ɗes ɗi mo kuɗi ki̶ seen, amma pak mo kì̵ ten murap.
46015007	Wuri kámshin fi̶ri nJemis zak, ki̶ jeplop fi̶ri ni mo jir.
46015008	Ɗangɓe a peekyes ni, ɓe wuri kámshin fi̶ri nwan zak, wan ɗi wan a kaa làa ɗi mo kì̵ ten taa làa, ɓe ba tar làa ni ki̶ wul kas si.
46015009	Mpeeɗi wan a ɗiilee mɓut jeplop kì̵ Jesu ni mo. Ba ɗi ni ret ku mo pet wan a memee mɓut jeplop kì̵ Jesu mo kas, mpeeɗi gyet wan ki̶n cín jeel Eki̶lisya kì̵ Naan.
46015010	Amma mpee ɗiiret ki̶ kussuk kì̵ Naan, ɓe wan ɗi, kaaɗi wan ɗi yaksi si. Ɗiiret ki̶ kussuk ɗiisi ɗi Naan wuri cín nwan, ni kì̵ c`in ɗak ɗes ndi̶ghi̶n wan. Har wan ki̶n c`in ɗak shiɓal met jeplop fi̶ri ni mo jir. Amma jir ki̶si, ɓe ba a wan c`in ɗak mi̶ni mo kas, amma a ɗiiret ki̶ kussuk kì̵ Naan ɗi ni c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶na.
46015011	Ni aasi, koo ɗi gyet, a wan satpo ni, koo ɗi gyet a mo satpo ni, ɓe muu sat a mbii ɗiimi̶ndong, ki̶ wun wuu cínzeen a po mi̶ni.
46015012	Katɗang moo satpo nee, Kristi wuri kì̵ yaghal a peemúut, ɓe a me le ɗang pak fuu moo sat ne, ba mee yaghal a peemúut ɗi mpee nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap mo kas ye?
46015013	Katɗang ba mee yaghal a peemúut ɗi, mpee nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap kas, ɓe ni kám nee, ba Kristi wuri ki̶ yaghal a peemúut kas mmi̶ni.
46015014	Katɗang ɓe ba ɗi Kristi wuri kì̵ yaghal a peemúut kas, ɓe po ɗiiret, ɗi muu sat ni ɗee a ɗiibuu, ki̶ ɓe ɗi cínzeen fuu ni ɗee a ɗiibuu zak.
46015015	Ɓe ɗi mu ɗee a nyem c`in langting mu ɗung mo nkaa Naan, mpeeɗi muu c`in langting nkaa Naan nee, a Naan wuri yaghal ki̶ Kristi a peemúut. Amma katɗang ɗi ni azeen-nzeen ne, ba nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap mon nyaghal a peemúut kas, ɓe ba Naan wuri kì̵ yaghal ki̶ Kristi a peemúut kas mi̶ni zak.
46015016	Katɗang ba nyem ɗi mo kì̵ murap mon nyaghal kas, ɓe ba Kristi wuri kì̵ yaghal kas zak.
46015017	Katɗang ɗi ba Kristi wuri kì̵ yaghal a peemúut kas, ɓe cínzeen fuu ni ɗee a ɗiibuu, ɓe ɗi har yaksi, wuu tong ɗi a mɓut shikbish fuu mo vit.
46015018	Ɓe ɗi nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap mɓut Kristi, mo kì̵ ɗee a ɗiili̶lagham mo mmi̶ni zak.
46015019	Katɗang ɗi canciin funu ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi ni a mpee seen ɗii mu yil ɗiisi ɗak, ɓe ɗi mu ɗee a mbii naajeel, met kaghar gurum mo jir.
46015020	Yaksi Naan wuri kì̵ yaghal ki̶ Kristi a peemúut azeen-nzeen. A wuri a ɗin nshee, mu yaghal a peemúut, mu nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap mo jir.
46015021	Kaaɗi gyet, muut ni ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, a mpee ngumi̶ndong, ni aasi zak, ɓe a mpee ngumi̶ndong, ɓe Naan wurin nyaghal ki̶ gurum ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap mo a peemúut zak.
46015022	Mpeeɗi a mpee Adam ɓe gurum mo jir mo murap, ni aasi zak, a ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi ɓe gurum mo jir mon nyaghal a peemúut ki̶ seen.
