46015023	Amma koo meye ɓe mo a ndangshak-ndangshak. A Kristi wuri a ɗin nshee mu yaghal a peemúut akuɗang. Katɗang wurin mbaaj`i, ɗangɓe nyem fi̶ri mon nyaghal a peemúut zak.
46015024	Ɗangɓe peekyes kì̵ yil nin nj`i wul, ɓe Kristi wurin ncín mulki ni nNaan puun, aɓwoon ɗi wuri kì̵ ten twa koo a mulki, ki̶ iiko, ki̶ koo a ɓal ɗiiɗang ye.
46015025	Mpeeɗi ting Kristi wurin nc`in mulki ni har parpuus ɗi Naan wurin nle shaarlek kì̵ Jesu mo ɗee nder shii fi̶ri.
46015026	Shaarlek ɗi wurin ntu ni a pee kyes ni, a muut.
46015027	Mpeeɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten le mbii mo jir nder shii fi̶ri. Kaaɗi mo ki̶ sat si nee, "mo kì̵ le mbii mo jir nder shii fi̶ri". Ɓe ni ɗee agaak ne, ba a Naan ɗee nder fi̶ri kas, amma Naan wuri kì̵ le mbii mo jir nder kì̵ Kristi.
46015028	Amma, aɓwoon ɗi mo kì̵ le mbii mo jir, nder kì̵ mulki mu Naan, ɓe Làa ni wuri shikáa fi̶ri, wurin nleshin fi̶ri nder kì̵ Naan. Naan ɗi wuri le mbii mo jir nder kì̵ Kristi, mpeku Naan wuri se mulki ɗi nkaa mbii mo jir.
46015029	Yaksi, katɗang ɓe ɗi ba mee yaghal a peemúut ɗi kas, ɓe ɗi nyem ɗi moo c`in baptisma mmo a koppee kì̵ nyem ɗi mo ki̶ murap, ɓe mon nkat a meye? Katɗang ɗi ba mee yaghal a peemúut ɗi kas, ɓe a me le ɗangɓe gurum moo c`in baptisma a koppee kì̵ nyemmuut mo ye?
46015030	Ki̶ zak, ɓe ɗi a me le ɗangɓe muu lappee, ku muu shwaajeel ɗi ki̶si shidaar-shidaar ye?
46015031	Ɗyemnaa mo, wan ki̶n naa muut, koo a puus ɗiiɗang ye. A roghop ɗi wan ki̶ni ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ɗi ni a seen funu ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi Jesu, Daa funu, a ni le ɗang wan satpo mi̶ni.
46015032	Katɗang ɗi gyet wan c`in lek ashak ki̶ luwayil mo nyil Afisus a mpee pan mu gurum ɗak, ɓe li̶ɓet ɗi wan nkat ni a meye? Katɗang ɓe ba mo yaghal ki̶ nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap a peemúut kas, "Ɓe wu yit ku mu se, mu shwaa, mpeku daɗaar ɓe mu murap ɗi."
46015033	Taji wu yit ku mee gurum num wun kas. Katɗang gurum ki̶ mwaan ashak ki̶ nyemɗiibish mo, ɓe mi̶se fi̶ri nin nɗee a ɗiibish zak.
46015034	Wu baa wu j`i ndi̶ghi̶n pan fuu mo kaaɗi ni ret ku wu c`in si, ki̶ wu nook c`in shikbish. Wan ki̶n sat nwun nee, ba pak fuu mo man Naan kas. Wan ki̶n sat ɗiisi a mpeku ni shoop wun ɗi.
46015035	Meeɓe, mee gurum ntal nee, "Cirang ɗangɓe nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap, mon mbaa yaghal ɗi a peemúut ki̶ seen ye? Mon nyaghal a shi kiyeet kì̵ sut ɗiiɗang ye?"
46015036	Wugha mwen! A man nee, katɗang a kop cirem ndi̶ghi̶n yil, ɓe see cirem nin nwam, ɗangɓe àas kì̵ mbii ɗi a kop ni kàa put.
46015037	Katɗang a kop mee cirem nyil, ɓe ba wugha ki̶ iiko nkaa ni kas, amma wugha ki̶kop a àas ni ɓejee ɗak. Bishmee ɓe, ni a àas kì̵ shwaa, kas meeɓe mee cirem ɗiiɗik.
46015038	Amma Naan wurin ncín mee shin ɗi nni, kaaɗi wuri kì̵ ten le ni si. Koo àas cirem ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe Naan wurin ntap cín shin ki̶ ni ɗik.
46015039	Ba nan mo a ntiit-ntiit jir kas. Gurum mo ki̶ nan muru ɗik, ki̶ luwa mo ki̶ nan muru ɗik, ki̶ ny`er mo ki̶ nan muru ɗik, ki̶ pupwap mo ki̶ nan muru ɗik zak.
46015040	Mun ɗi ki̶ sun ɗi mo a mu ɗengnaan, ki̶ mun ɗi ki̶ sun ɗi mo a mu yil ɗiisi zak. Amma sun funu ɗi mo a mu ɗengnaan, ret ki̶ ɗiiɗes kì̵ mo ni ɗik zak ki̶ sun funu ɗi mo a mu yil ɗiisi.
46015041	Ret kì̵ ɗiiɗes mu puus ni ɗik, ret kì̵ ɗiiɗes mu tar ni ɗik, ki̶ mu zar mo ɗik zak, jir ki̶si, ɓe pak ret kì̵ ɗiiɗes, mu zar ni moo met nshak zak. Mo ɗi ki̶ ɗiiɗes furu mo shini-shini.
46015042	Nin nɗee aasi zak, parpuus ɗi nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap, mon nyaghal a peemúut. Kaaɗi mo wum gurum, ɓe shin fi̶ri ni wam, amma kaaɗi Naan wurin nyaghal ki̶ gurum a peemúut, ɓe ba shin fi̶ri nin mbaa wam ɗi zak kas.
46015043	Kaaɗi mo wum gurum, ɓe nii bish naa, ki̶ ba ni ki̶ ɓal kas, amma parpuus ɗi Naan wurin nyaghal ki̶ ni a peemúut, ɓe nin yaghal a ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiɗes, ki̶ nin nret naa zak.
46015044	Kúm gurum ɗi moo wum ni aa shin mu nan ɓejee ɗak, amma parpuus ɗi Naan wurin nyaghal ki̶ gurum a peemúut, ɓe ni ɗen a shin mu riin. Kaaɗi sun ɗi ni a mu nan ni ɗi si, ɓe azeen-nzeen sun ɗi ni a mu riin ni ɗi zak.
46015045	Mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee; "Naan wuri shee le Adam wuri a gurum ɗiiseen." Amma Adam ɗii mu kyes ni, wuri a Riin mu seen, ki̶ wuri cín seen ngurum mo.
46015046	Ba gyet a ngo mu riin wuri shee j`i kas, amma gyet a ngo mu nan shee j`i ɗangɓe ngo mu Riin kì̵ baaj`i.
46015047	Gwar ɗi gyet Naan shee le wuri, ɓe gyet Naan ɗak wuri a shi yil, amma gwar ɗiivul ni wuri tong aɗeng sham ɗi.
46015048	Nyem ɗi mo a mu yil ni, ɓe mo a kaa gwar ɗi gyet Naan shee ɗak wuri shi yil ni si. Amma nyem ɗi mo a mu ɗeng, ɓe mo a kaa gwar ɗi gyet wuri tong a ɗeng sham ɗi si.
46015049	Kaaɗi muu lop a sun ɗi ni a kaa mu gwar ɗi gyet Naan ɗak wuri a shi yil si, ɓe mun nyaghal mu lop a sun ɗi ni a kaa mu gwar ɗi wuri tong aɗeng sham ɗi si zak.
46015050	Ɗyemnaa mo, wan ki̶n sat nwun agaak nee, ba gurum ndi̶ghi̶n mi̶se mu nan ki̶ toghom, mak sekop mu mulki kì̵ Naan kas. Ki̶ ba mbii ɗiiwam, nin mmak sekop a koppee kì̵ mbii ɗi ba nii kyam wam kas, zak.
46015051	Wu lekom, ku wan sat mee mbii ɗi ni a si̶sok ɗi nwun. Ba mun jir mun mmurap kas, amma Naan wurin ncighi̶r ki̶ sun funu ni mo jir.
46015052	Ki̶lak kaa ɗyaghapyit si, parpuus ɗi mon ntaa feer ɗii mu kyes ni, ɓe nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap, mon nyaghal ki̶ seen. Ba mon mbaa wam ɗi zak kas. Ɗangɓe mon ncighi̶r ki̶ sun funu ni mo jir.
46015053	Mpeeɗi ni a ting parpuus mi̶ni, ɓe sun funu ɗi mo a mu wam, mon nlop sun ɗi ba mi̶ni mon nkyam wam kas zak, ki̶ sun funu ɗi mo a mu muut, ɓe ba mon nkyam murap kas zak.
46015054	Aɓwoon ɗi sun funu ɗi mo a mu wam, mo lop sun ɗi ba mon nkyam wam kas, ki̶ sun funu ɗi mo a mu muut, mo lop sun ɗi ba mon nkyam murap kas zak. Ɗangɓe sumpo ɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ni ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nin ngam ɗi, ɗi ni sat nee: "Mo kì̵ tu muut hakyeng ki̶n ndi̶ng-ndi̶ng.
46015055	Muut, koghorong fii ni a neye? Muut, ɓal fii ɗi wii twa gurum mo ɗishik si ni a neye?"
46015056	Ɓal mu twapee kì̵ muut ni a shikbish, ki̶ a mpee Waar ɗangɓe shikbish ni kat iiko.
46015057	Amma yaksi, mu pi̶lang Naan, ɗi wuri cín se koghorong mmun ndi̶ghi̶n Daa funu Jesu Kristi.
46015058	Mpeemi̶ni ɗyemnaa mo, wu ɗar ɓal-ɓal. Taji wu le ku mee mbii tup wun kas. Amma wu sat a nc`in ɗak mu Daa shidaar-shidaar, mpeeɗi wu man nee, koo a ɗak ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wuu c`in ni mpee Daa, ɓe ba nin nkyam ɗee a mbii ɗiibuu kas, koo diɓen
46016001	Yaksi, ɓe po nkaa kyak shaghal ɗi wun ntul ni mpee ɓam nyem kì̵ Naan ɗi mo nyil nJudiya, ni ret ku wu c`in kaaɗi gyet wan ki̶n sat nEki̶lisya ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil nGalati mo c`in si.
46016002	Koo a puus Láadi ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe ni ret ku koo weye wuri le mee shaghal mpee cín zughum ntiit-ntiit ki̶ ɓal fi̶ri, mpeku katɗang parpuus ɗi wan nso pe wun ɗi, ɓe taji wu ɗee nkyak mee shaghal kas.
46016003	Katɗang wan nso wul pe wun ɗi, ɓe wan ncín wasika nyem ɗi wuu ten wu bi̶lip mo, mpeku mo so ɗi ki̶ shaghal ni nyil nJerusalem.
46016004	Katɗang wan naa ni ret, ku wan so nJerusalem, ɓe mon nso ashak ki̶ wan zak.
46016005	Wann nj`i pe wun ɗi, aɓwoon ɗi wan ki̶n so nyil mMasidoniya, mpeeɗi wan ki̶n riɓet yaa ar ni ɗel so a nyil mMasidoniya ni.
46016006	Meeɓe wan mpan nyém pe wun ɗi mpee rep pee mo lee ɗak, ki̶ meeɓe wan ntong pe wun ɗi mpee tar kut, mpeku wu ɓam wan ɗi, a ar mwaan fi̶na, koo pee ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wann nso ɗi.
46016007	Ɗyen nwan nnaa wun zam, ba a ɗi wan nnaa wun, ɓe wan a ar ɗel so ki̶lak-ki̶lak kas. Katɗang Daa wuri riɓet, ɓe wan ncanciin mpee so tong pe wun ɗi panpoong.
46016008	Amma wan ntong mpesi nyil Afisus, har see parpuus mu seriɓet mu Pentikos.
46016009	Mpeeɗi, peeɗi nwan ɗes mpee ɗiisi, mpeku wan katpee c`in ɗak ɗiiret, ki̶ ɗi nii koghop ni ndi̶ghi̶n nyil Afisus ni zak. Koo ɗi gurum mo ɗes moo kwar ɗak fi̶na ni.
46016010	Katɗang Timoti wuri so wul pe wun ɗi, ɓe wu kaat wuri riret nnaar fuu. Taji wu le mee ki̶i̶rmuut yaa wuri kas, mpeeɗi wurii c`in a ɗak kì̵ Daa, kaaɗi wan ki̶n c`in si zak.
46016011	Taji mee gurum ɓák wuri kas, amma ni ret ku wu ɓam wuri ndi̶ghi̶n mwaan fi̶ri, mpeku wuri sekiyeen ɗi ki̶ mwaan fi̶ri ni ndi̶ghi̶n riyang, ki̶ mpeku wuri baaj`i ɗi pe wan ɗi zak, mpeeɗi wan ki̶n leyit mpee naa baaj`i fi̶ri ashak ki̶ pak ɗyemnaa mo zak.
46016012	Yaksi, po nkaa ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu, Apolos, jí wan ki̶n satpo nwuri shiɓal nee, ni ret ku wuri so naa wun ashak ki̶ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n mo. Ba gyet ɗyen nwurin nso pe wun ɗi ntiit ki̶ mi̶ni kas, amma katɗang wurin nkatpee, ɓe wurin nso pe wun ɗi.
46016013	Wu tong shi gongpee, ki̶ wu ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen fuu. Wu ɗee a nyemgung mo ndi̶ghi̶n putughup, ki̶ nyemɗiiɓal mo.
46016014	Wu c`in mbii mo jir ndi̶ghi̶n wal.
46016015	Wu man nee, gyet a nyemtulu ki̶ Stifenas mo a nyem ɗi gyet mo shee cínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n nyil Akaya, ki̶ mo cín sut furu mo mpee c`in ɗak ɗi mo ɓam nyem kì̵ Naan mo ɗi zak. Wan ki̶n ɗang pu wun ɗyemnaa fi̶na mo.
46016016	Ku wu mwaan ndang mi̶se kì̵ gurum mo kaa mi̶ni mo si, ki̶ wu mwaan ndang koo weye ɗi wuri cín káa fi̶ri, mpee c`in ɗak mu ɓam, ashak ki̶ mo.
46016017	Ni fes ret nwan nyit zam, mpee j`i ki̶ Stifenas ki̶ Fortunatus, ki̶ Akaikus, mpeeɗi mo j`i ki̶ mbii mo nwan a koppee fuu, mbii ɗi ba jí wan ki̶ mo kas.
46016018	Ki̶ zak, mo caa wan, kaaɗi jí moo caa wuwun si. Gurum mo kaa mo si, ni ret ku wu cín ɗiiɗes mmo.
46016019	Eki̶lisya ɗi mon nkoghop nyil mu Eshiya moo lop tokshik furu mo so pe wun ɗi. Akwila ki̶ Priskila, ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi moo kaat ashak ndi̶ghi̶n tulu furu, mo lop tokshik mu nyemso ndang Jesu mo so nwun ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Daa.
46016020	Ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu, ɗi mo mpesi, moo lop tokshik furu mo so pe wun ɗi jir. Wu tok ki̶ shak ndi̶ghi̶n wal kaa mu nyemso ndang Naan mo si.
46016021	A wan Pool, ki̶n ran tokshik ɗiisi nwun, shi sar fi̶na.
46016022	Koo ngo ɗiiɗang ye ɗi ba wuri wal nDaa kas, ɓe wu yit ku gwar mi̶ni ɗee a mbiifulup. Daa funu wurin ndung baaj`i.
46016023	Ɗiiret kì̵ Daa funu Jesu ni tong ashak ki̶ wun jir.
46016024	Wal fi̶na ni tong ashak ki̶ wun jir ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Kristi Jesu. Amin.
47001001	Wasika ɗiisi ni put a nsar kì̵ Pool laalop mu Kristi Jesu, shi riɓet kì̵ Naan, ki̶ nsar kì̵ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu Timoti. Wan ki̶n lop wasika ɗiisi ni so pee Eki̶lisya kì̵ Naan ɗi mon nKoronti, ki̶ nyemso ndang Jesu ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n yil Akaya jir.
47001002	Ɗiiret, ki̶ riyang mu Naan puun funu, ki̶ mu Daa funu Jesu Kristi mo tong ashak ki̶ wun.
47001003	Wan ki̶n pi̶lang Naan puun kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi. Puun ɗi wuri gam ki̶ kussuk mu naajeel. Naan ɗi wuri a nguɓam mun jir.
47001004	A wurii ɓam mun mɓut njeel funu mo jir, mpeku mu katpee ɓam nyem ɗi moo shwaajeel mo shini-shini shi ɓam ɗi mun mu kat ni pe Naan ɗi si zak.
47001005	Katɗang ɓe mu shwaajeel ɗes, kaaɗi Kristi wuri shwaajeel si, ɓe Naan wurin mɓam mun ɗes ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi zak.
47001006	Katɗang mu shwaajeel, ɓe ni a mpee gang putughup fuu mo, ki̶ ni a mpee ɓam fuu zak. Katɗang Naan wuri ɓam mun, ɓe ni a mpee ɓam wun zak, ɗi nin nle ku wu gung kiyeet kì̵ jeel ɗi wuu shwaa ni mo, kaa mun si zak.
47001007	Mpeemi̶ni ɓe canciin funu ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ba ni mak yoghon kas, koo diɓen. Mpeeɗi mu man nee, kaaɗi wuu shwaajeel ashak ki̶ mun si, ɓe wun nkat ɓam ashak ki̶ mun aasi zak.
47001008	Ɗyemnaa mo, muu riɓet ku mu lepan nwun, nkaa jeel ɗi mu shwaa ni ndi̶ghi̶n yil Eshiya. Gyet jeel ni fes ten mun toghon-toghon hakyeng, har gyet ni met mmun mɓal, ki̶ har gyet muu pwat ki̶ putughup funu mo nee, baa mun mbar kas.
47001009	Ki̶ gyet mu naa kaa mo kì̵ can a ɗiyeel tukáa mmun si, amma ni c`in aasi, a mpeku taji mu gangkáa funu a nkaa sun funu mo kas, amma see mu gangkáa funu mo a nkaa Naan ɓejee ɗak. Naan ɗi wurii yaghal ki̶ gurum mo a peemúut.
47001010	Naan wuri kì̵ ten put ki̶ mun ndi̶ghi̶n muut ni, ki̶ wurin ndung put ki̶ mun ndi̶ghi̶n muut ni zak. Mun mu cínzeen nee, wurin mbaa put ki̶ mun ndi̶ghi̶n muut ni riyang zak.
47001011	Wu ɓam mun shi aduwa fuu mo, mpeku gurum mo ɗes mo pi̶lang Naan ɗi mpee mun, mpee ɓam ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ c`in ni mmun. Mpeeɗi Naan wurin nlap aduwa ɗi gurum mo ɗes moo c`in ni mpee mun.
47001012	A mbii ɗi muu canjagham ɗiki̶ nɗiisi, pan ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu mo ki̶ c`in langting nee, tong funu ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi ni a shi putughup mi̶ndong, mpee Naan, ki̶ pe wun ɗi zak. Ba a shi mee seen ɗi ni a mu gurum mo kas, amma a shi ɗiiret mu Naan.
47001013	Ba mu ran a mee po ɗiiluk nwun ndi̶ghi̶n wasika ni kas, amma a po nkaa mbii ɗi wun mmak tang ni, ɓe wun mmanshii kì̵ ni zak. Wan canciin nee, wun mmanshii kì̵ ni riret.
47001014	Kaaɗi wuu ten wu manshii kì̵ ni lee si nee, wun mmak canjagham shi mun, kaaɗi mumun ncanjagham shi wun si zak, parɗi Daa funu Jesu wurin nj`i ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi zak.
47001015	A mpeeɗi gyet wan naa ni ret aasi, a ni le ɗang gyet wan ki̶ riɓet so pe wun ɗi nshee, mpeku wu kat ɗiiret ɗi kaa yit vul si.
47001016	Wan ki̶n riɓet taa pe wun ɗi, a ar so mMasidoniya, ki̶ katɗang wan so mMasidoniya ni, ɓe wan nj`i taa pe wun ɗi zak, mpeku wu sel wan ɗi a ar so nyil nJudiya.
47001017	Ashee! kaaɗi jí wan riɓet c`in ki̶si, ɓe wan c`in a mbii ɗin nkan mmi̶ni aa? Aa koo, wu pan ne wan ki̶n c`in mbii a buu-buu, kaaɗi gurum mu yil ni moo c`in si ye? Ɗi wan nsat nee, "Ii" ɗangɓe aɓwoon, ɓe wan waa baa sat ne, "waash" zak aa?
47001018	Kaaɗi Naan wuri a nguzeen si, ɓe po ɗi muu sat nwun, ba ni a "Ii" ki̶ "waash" kas.
47001019	Po ɗi gyet Silas ki̶ Timoti ki̶ wan, mu sat nwun nkaa Jesu Kristi làa kì̵ Naan, ɓe ba po mi̶ni a Ii, koo waash kas. Amma ndi̶ghi̶n Naan, ɓe koo a pi̶rang ye, ɓe po mi̶ni a "Ii"
47001020	Mpeeɗi po ɗi Naan wuri tuwoorpo mo jir, ɓe mo gampo mi̶ni mo a ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu, ki̶ a mpee Jesu ɗangɓe muu sat nee, "Amin" zak mpeku mo le Naan ɗi a ɗiiɗes.
47001021	A Naan ɗi wuri bi̶lip mun leɗik, a wuri le mun ashak ki̶ wun ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi.
47001022	Wuri las alama fi̶ri nkaa mun, nee mun a mi̶ri mo. Wuri cín Riin fi̶ri ɗiiɓang mmun ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu mo, mpeku Riin ni kám ɗi mmun mbii ɗi wuri kì̵ le ni mmun akiyeen.
47001023	Amma wan pet Naan a langting fi̶na nee, mbii ɗi jí ni le ku wan nook so nKoronti ni, a mpeku taji wan lejeel nwun kas.
47001024	Ba muu gung a mpeku mu leting ɗi nwun nkaa mbii ɗi wu cínzeen nni kas koo diɓen, mpeeɗi wuu ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen ni. Amma muu c`in ɗak ashak ki̶ wun, mpeku wu kat retnyit ɗi.
47002001	Wan kì̵ lepan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶na nee, ba wann mbaaso pe wun ɗi kas, mpeku taji wan wat putughup nwun.
47002002	Katɗang ɓe wan wat putughup nwun, ɓe a we ɗee ɗi a ɗi wurin nle retnyit nwan ye? A wun nyem ɗi wan wat putughup nwun, ɓe a wun ncaa nwan.
47002003	A mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wan ran wasika ni nwun, mpeku katɗang wan j`i pe wun ɗi, ɓe taji wan kat mee mbii wat putughup mɓut nwun, nyem ɗi wu le retnyit nwan kas. Wan cínzeen nwun jir nee, retnyit fi̶na ni a muu jir zak.
47002004	Wan ran wasika ni nwun a shi putughup ɗiiwuwat hakyeng, ki̶ shi yitmwaan, ki̶ jeel ɗes zak. Wan ran wasika ɗiisi, ba a mpeku wan wat putughup ɗi nwun kas, amma a mpeku wu man ɗi nee, wan wal nwun zam.
47002005	Katɗang ɓe mee ngo kì̵ wat putughup mmee gurum, ɓe ba ngo mi̶ni wat a putughup mi̶na ɓejee ɗak kas, amma wuri wat a putughup muu, koo a putughup mu pak fuu mo. Ba ɗyen nwan nsatpo shiɓal nkaa ngo mi̶ni kas.
47002006	Mpee kiyeet kì̵ ngo mi̶ni, ɓe kar ɗi wun kì̵ ten cín nwuri, ni mak.
47002007	Amma yaksi, ɓe ngyal wu fwo ɗi ngwar mi̶ni, mpeku wu ɓam wuri ɗi, mpeku taji putughup ɗiiwuwat fi̶ri ni waa si̶ghi̶t daampee nwuri hakyeng.
47002008	Mpeemi̶ni wan ɗang pe wun, wu si̶ghi̶t wu kám wal fuu mon nwuri.
47002009	Gyet wan ran wasika ni nwun, a mpeku wan kyam wun ɗi, ku wan man ɗi nee, kyet wun a nyem c`in mbii mo, ndi̶ghi̶n ɗyen jir wa?
47002010	Koo ngo ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wu fwo nwuri, mpee mee ɗiibish ɗi wuri c`in, ɓe wan nfwo ngo ni aasi zak. Katɗang ɓe mee mbii mu fwo ni ɗi, ɓe wan nfwo ngo mi̶ni a mpee wun, mpee ɗiiret kì̵ Kristi.
47002011	Mpeku taji Shetan kat mee li̶ɓet ndi̶ghi̶n mun kas, mpeeɗi ba seen fi̶ri ɗiibish mo a ɗiisi̶sok mmun kas.
47002012	Kaaɗi wan baaj`i nTrowas mpee satpo nkaa Kristi ngurum mo, ɓe wan kat Daa wuri kì̵ wang ar mpee wan.
47002013	Jir ki̶si, ɓe ba putughup fi̶na ni kat retnyit kas, mpeeɗi ba wan kat ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶na Titus ɗi mpeemi̶ni kas. Mpeemi̶ni ɓe gyet wan sat ɗang-mukaat mmo, ɓe wan ɗel so nyil Masidoniya.
47002014	Wan pi̶lang Naan, ɗi a wurii sel mun shidaar-shidaar, ku mu ɗee ɗi a koghorong mo, mpee ɗiiret kì̵ Kristi. A shi mun, ɓe wuri pweer man kì̵ Kristi ɗi ni a kaa mbii ɗiiɗu shang-shang si, koo a mpee ɗiiɗang ye.
47002015	Mpeeɗi pe Naan ɗi, ɓe mun a kaa ɗu ɗiishang mo, mu Kristi, mpee nyem ɗi mo kat ɓam, ki̶ nyem ɗi mo a ar lagham.
47002016	A mu peekyes ni nɗiisi, ɗu ɗiivul ni a ɗu ɗii mu wam, mu muut ɗi nii so a peelagham. Amma a mu ɗin nshee ni nɗiisi, ni a fuwaap ɗiishang mu seen ɗi nii so a peeseen. A we mmak mang toghon kì̵ mbii ɗiisi mo ye?
47002017	Mpeeɗi ba mun a kaa pak gurum ɗi moo satpo Naan ni a mpee kat li̶ɓet mu shaghal kas. Po munu ni a mi̶ndong, mbii ɗi Naan wuri sat mmun, ɓe muu sat a po mi̶ni ntoghom kì̵ Naan aasi, ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi.
47003001	Yaksi, ɓe mun nwaa mu ɗoghom kwoop a káa funu zak aa? Kyet muu riɓet mee wasika ɗi mun nkwoop wun ɗishik, koo ɗi wuwun nkwoop mun ɗishik, kaaɗi pak gurum moo c`in si wa?
47003002	Wun shikáa fuu, a wun a wasika funu, ɗi mon nkwoop mun ɗishik ni. Mo kì̵ ran ni ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo, mpeku koo weye wuri man ni ɗi, ki̶ ku wuri tang ɗi zak.
47003003	Ni kám agaak nee, a Kristi shikáa fi̶ri wuri ran wasika ɗiisi ni mo ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo, ɗangɓe wuri lop ni nsar funu. Ba mo ran wasika ɗiisi ni a shi ing kas, ki̶ ba mo ran ni a nkaa sulet mu jwak kas. Amma mo ran ni a ndi̶ghi̶n putughup kì̵ gurum mo, shi Riin kì̵ Naan ɗi wurin mmeen har ngaa-ngaa.
47003004	Muu satpo mi̶ni, a mpeeɗi mu cínzeen nNaan ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi.
47003005	Ba mee mbii ndi̶ghi̶n mun, ɗi ni mak le ku mu sat nee, mu c`in mbii ɗiisi mo a shikáa funu kas. Ɗak ɗiisi ni a iiko ɗi muu mak c`in pak mbii mo, put a pe Naan ɗi.
47003006	Mpeeɗi a wuri le ku mu ɗee a nyem c`in ɗak mu ɓi̶lemcuk shi toghom kì̵ Naan ɗiipoo, ba a shi Waar ɗiiriran mo kas, amma a shi Riin. Waar ɗiiriran nii j`i ki̶ muut, amma Riin mu Naan wurii cín seen.
47003007	Gyet mo ran Waar kì̵ Mosis ni mo a nkaa sulet mu jwak mo, ki̶ kaaɗi gyet Naan cín Waar ni mo mMosis, ɓe ɗiiɗes mu Naan j`i put agaak. Koo ɗi gyet mi̶lep mu yit kì̵ Mosis nii kyes, ɓe ba gyet nyem Yahudi mo mak ti̶ghi̶r yit furu mo nkaa yit kì̵ Mosis kas, mpee peeɓang ɗi ni ɗes ni. Katɗang ɓe gyet Waar mu Mosis ɗi nii j`i ki̶ muut ni j`i aa ɗiiɗes aasi.
47003008	Ɓe ni a ting ɗak mu Riin mu Naan nin nɗes met mu Waar ni.
47003009	Mpeeɗi katɗang ɓe mo le ɗak mu Waar ɗi nii j`i ki̶ lagham a ɗiiɗes, ɓe azeen-nzeen ɗak mu Riin ɗi nin nj`i ki̶ ɗiiret mu Naan, ni a ɗiiɗes met ɗak mu Waar ni hakyeng.
47003010	Ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiisi, ɓe mu naa nee, mbii ɗi gyet ni a ɗiiɗes, ɓe mbii ɗi nin ntong ɗi har ngaa-ngaa ni fes met ɗi gyet yam ni.
47003011	Katɗang ɓe mo kám ne, mbii ɗi nin ndung ɗel so a ɗiiɗes, ɓe mbii ɗi nin ntong ɗi har ngaa-ngaa nin nɗen ki̶ ɗiiɗes met ɗi nin ndung ɗel so ni, ɗes hakyeng.
47003012	Mpeeɗi mun ki̶ canciin ndi̶ghi̶n po ɗiiret ni aasi, ɓe muu satpo funu shiɓal agaak hakyeng.
47003013	Ba mun a kaa Mosis si kas, ɗi gyet wuri paa yit fi̶ri shi fuwaat, mpeku taji nyem Yahudi mo naa kyes kì̵ ɗiiɗes, mu mi̶lep mu yit fi̶ri ɗi nin nɗel so si kas.
47003014	Mpeeɗi gyet pan furu ni mo a ɗiidudughur har mpee cicinsi. Katɗang ɓe mo ɗoghom tang po Naan ɗiisi̶ghi̶r, ɓe fuwaat paapee ɗiisi ni paa ni, ki̶ ni kuɗi, a ɗiipi̶paa pe mo ɗi. See katɗang gurum cínzeen nKristi ɓejee, ɗangɓe mon mmak mang fuwaat ni baa ki̶ ni.
47003015	Azeen-nzeen har cicinsi, katɗang mo ɗoghom tang Waar mu Mosis ni mo, ɓe fuwaat ɗiisi, nii paa putughup furu mo ɗi vit.
47003016	Amma katɗang mee gurum cighi̶r pe Daa ɗi, ɓe abet, mo mang fuwaat ni baa ki̶ ni aku pe ngo ni ɗi.
47003017	Daa wuri a Riin, ki̶ peeɗi Riin kì̵ Daa ni ɗi, ɓe gurum mo ɗee a mukáa furu.
47003018	Yaksi, mun nyemso ndang Jesu mo jir, ɓe mo kì̵ mang fuwaat ɗi ni paa yit funu mo baa ki̶ ni aku. Yaksi ɓe gurum moo naa a ɗiiɗes kì̵ Daa ndi̶ghi̶n tong funu mo, ki̶ wuri cighi̶r ki̶ mun, ku mu ɗee ɗi kaa wuri si, ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiɗes fi̶ri ɗi ni nkaa wurang. Ɗiisi ni put a pe Riin mu Naan ɗi wuri a Daa.
47004001	A Naan wuri cín ɗak mu satpo fi̶ri ɗiiret mo mun ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiret mu kussuk fi̶ri. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe taji ni waam wun kas.
47004002	Mu kwar c`in ɗak ɗiibish mo, ki̶ mbii naashoop ɗii a si̶sok, ki̶ mbii ɗi moo le naashoop ngurum mo jir. Ba mun nc`in ɗung ngurum mo, koo sat ɗung nkaa po kì̵ Naan kas. Amma mu sat zeen ni agaak, mpeku koo weye, ɓe wuri naa zeen funu ni ɗi, ndi̶ghi̶n ɗyen fi̶ri, nyit kì̵ Naan.
47004003	Katɗang ɓe po kì̵ Naan ɗi muu sat ni a ɗiipi̶paa, ɓe ni a pi̶paa a mpee nyem ɗi mo a ar lagham ɓejee ɗak.
47004004	Ba mo cínzeen kas, a mpeeɗi mishkagham ɗiibish mu yil ɗiisi wuri kì̵ paa yit furu mo, mpeku taji mo naa peeɓang mu po ɗiiret mu Kristi kas, ɗi wuri a ɗiimi̶ndong kì̵ Naan.
47004005	Mpeeɗi ba muu satpo ni ngurum mo a nkaa sun funu kas, amma muu sat a po nkaa Jesu Kristi, ɗi wuri a Daa, ki̶ mun shikáa funu ɓe mu ɗee a ki̶rom fuu mo mpee sum kì̵ Jesu.
47004006	Naan wuri kì̵ ten sat nee, peeɓang ni put a ndi̶ghi̶n peenkoo, ku ni ɓangpee ɗi. A wuri le ku ni ɓang putughup funu mo, mpeku ni cín peeɓang ɗi mmun, ki̶ mpeku mu man ɗiiɗes kì̵ Naan ɗi, ndi̶ghi̶n yit kì̵ Jesu Kristi.
47004007	Mun ki̶ long ɗii mu Riin kì̵ Naan ni, a ndi̶ghi̶n tughulwan. Shii kì̵ mi̶ni, a sun funu mo, mpeku mo kám iiko ɗiiɗes ɗiisi ni ɗi, agaak nee, ni a mu Naan, ki̶ ba ni a munu kas.
47004008	Moo ti̶reng mun koo a nkoghop ɗiiɗang ye, jir ki̶si, ɓe ba mo mpyan mun kas. Moo wuk mun, jir ki̶si ɓe ba ki̶i̶rmuut yaa mun kas.
47004009	Gurum mo lejeel mmun, jir ki̶si, ɓe pak gurum moo wal mmun. Moo hi̶r mun car nyil, jir ki̶si, ɓe ba mu murap kas.
47004010	Koo a pi̶rang ye, ɓe mun a ndi̶ghi̶n jeel mu muut, kaa kiyeet kì̵ muut ɗi gyet Jesu c`in si, mpeku gurum mo naa mi̶se kì̵ Jesu ni ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n sun funu mo.
47004011	Kaaɗi mun ɗi mmeen si, ɓe muu tong a tong mu muut mpee Jesu, mpeku mo kám mi̶se kì̵ Jesu ni ɗi, ndi̶ghi̶n sun funu, ɗi mo a mu muut si.
47004012	Ɗiisi ni kám nee, muut ni nkaa c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n mun, amma seen ni nkaa c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n wun.
47004013	Mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee, "Wan cínzeen, a ni le ɗangɓe wan katpo". A mpeeɗi mun mu cínzeen nNaan aasi, a ni le ɗang muu katpo zak.
47004014	Mu man nee, ngo ɗi wuri yaghal kì̵ Daa Jesu a peemúut, wurin nyaghal ki̶ mun ashak kì̵ Jesu aasi zak, ki̶ wurin nj`i ki̶ mun ashak ki̶ wun ntoghom fi̶ri zak.
47004015	Mbii ɗiisi mo jir a mpee wun, mpeku ɗiiret kì̵ Naan ni wul ɗi mɓut ngurum mo ɗes, ki̶ mpeku gurum mo ɗes mo pi̶lang Naan ɗi mpee ɗiiɗes fi̶ri.
47004016	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe ba ni waam mmun kas. Koo ɗi mun ki̶ sun ɗi ni a mu gurum, ɗi nii wam, amma jir ki̶si, ɓe koo puus ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe moo le riin funu mo ɗee a ɗiipoo.
47004017	Mpeeɗi rep jeel ɗi muu shwaa ni a mpee rep pee lee ɗak, nin nki̶lak ki̶ ɗel so, ki̶ nin nj`i ki̶ ɗiiɗes ɗi ni so ngaa-ngaa, ɗi ni met mu sat, ni met jir.
47004018	Ba muu leyit funu mo nkaa mbii ɗi gurum moo naa ni yaksi kas, amma muu leyit funu mo a nkaa mbii ɗi ba mu mak naa ni yaksi si kas. Mpeeɗi mbii ɗi gurum mo mak naa mo shi yit yaksi, ɓe a mo a mbii ɗi mon nki̶lak ki̶ ɗel so. Amma mbii ɗi ba gurum mo mak naa mo yaksi shi yit kas, a mo a mbii ɗi moo tong ɗi har ngaa-ngaa.
47005001	Yaksi ɓe mu man nee, katɗang ɓe sun funu ɗi mun ki̶ mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, mo wam, ɓe Naan wuri kì̵ ɗak mee sun funu ɗi mon ntong ɗi har ngaa-ngaa ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan. A Naan wuri ɗak sun mi̶ni mo shikáa fi̶ri.
47005002	Ndi̶ghi̶n sun funu, ɓe muu gwaar gwan, ki̶ muu kyaghar, mpeku Naan cín sun funu ɗi mo a mu ɗengnaan si ɗi mmun.
47005003	Mpeeɗi katɗang Naan cín sun funu mi̶ni mo mmun, ɓe ba mo mmak kat mun ngum kas.
47005004	Kaaɗi mu kuɗi muu tong ndi̶ghi̶n sun funu ɗi ni a mu yil ni, ɓe muu gwaar gwan mpee jeel ɗi muu shwaa. Ba a mpeeɗi ne, muu riɓet a ɓàkshak ki̶ sun funu ɗi mo a mu yil ɗiisi kas. Amma muu riɓet ku Naan cín sun funu ɗi mo a mu ɗengnaan si mmun. Ɓe sun funu ɗi mo ki̶ seen si, mon nɗee ɗi a koppee kì̵ sun funu ɗi mo a mu muut yaksi.
47005005	A Naan wuri ɗak mun, mpee cighi̶r ɗiisi mo, ki̶ wuri kì̵ ten cín Riin fi̶ri mmun, ɗi ni ɗee a alama mu mbii ɗi wuri kì̵ ɗak mo le mpee mun.
47005006	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe koo a pi̶rang ye, ɓe mun ki̶ cínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu, ki̶ mu man zak nee, kaaɗi mu kuɗi ndi̶ghi̶n sun funu ɗii mu yil ɗiisi, ɓe ba mun ashak ki̶ Daa kas. Mu jong ki̶ wuri.
47005007	Muu tong ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi ni a shi cínzeen, ba a shi mbii ɗi muu naa mo shi yit kas.
47005008	Azeen-nzeen mun ki̶ cínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu, ki̶ ɗyen mmun mɓàkshak ki̶ sun ɗiisi ni mo, mpeku mu tong ɗi ashak ki̶ Daa ntulu.
47005009	Mpeemi̶ni ɓe koo ɗi mun ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, ki̶ koo a ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗi nin ndung j`i, ɓe ɗyen mmun ku mu cín a mbii ɗi mo ret nNaan nyit.
47005010	Mpeeɗi ting, mun jir, mun nɗar ntoghom kì̵ mbiitong mu tokɗiyeel kì̵ Kristi, mpeku koo weye ɓe wurin nlap kwat mu ɗak ɗi wuri kì̵ cín mo, ɓe wuri kuɗi ndi̶ghi̶n shin mu yil ɗiisi. Kyet kwat ni a ɗiiret aa? Aa koo a ɗiibish ye?
47005011	A mpeeɗi mu manshii mu ki̶i̶r Daa, a ni le ɗang muu gung mpee dul gurum mo j`i pe Kristi ɗi. Ndi̶ghi̶n tong funu, ɓe Naan wuri man riret hakyeng, ki̶ muu canciin nee, wun wu man mun aasi zak, ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo.
47005012	Ba muu gung a mpeku mu waa mu baa mu sat mee ɗiiret ɗi nkaa sun funu mo pe wun ɗi kas. Amma muu kám a ar nwun, mpeku wu c`in retnyit ɗi shi mun, ki̶ mpeku wu katpee lappo ɗi nyem ɗi moo canjagham a shi ɗiiɗes furu mo. Ba a shi mi̶se furu mo kas si.
47005013	Mpeeɗi koo ɗi ba mun ɗi mɓut mi̶se funu mo kas, ɓe mi̶ni a mpee Naan, ki̶ katɗang mun ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n mi̶se funu mo, ɓe mi̶ni a mpee wun.
47005014	Yaksi, ɓe wal kì̵ Kristi nii se mulki ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu mo mpee wun, ki̶ mu man azeen nee, mee ngo mi̶ndong wuri kì̵ muut mpee gurum mo jir. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe gurum mo jir mo kyam muut zak.
47005015	Wuri muut a mpee gurum mo jir, mpeku nyem ɗi mo kì̵ lap seen fi̶ri, ɓe taji mo waa baa tong ɗi a mukáa furu zak kas. Amma see mo tong amu ngo ɗi wuri kì̵ muut mpee mo, ki̶ wuri waa baa yaghal a peemúut mpee mo zak.
47005016	Mpeemi̶ni, yaksi, ɓe ba mu kuɗi muu naa tong kì̵ gurum a shi yit ɗi mu yil ɗiisi kas. Jí muu naa Kristi a shi shin ɗi mu yil ɗiisi, amma yaksi, ɓe ba mu kuɗi muu naa wuri a shi shin ɗii mu yil si kas.
47005017	Koo ngo ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wuri tong ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi, ɓe ngo mi̶ni kì̵ ɗee a ɗiipoo. Mpeeɗi mi̶se fi̶ri ɗiisi̶ghi̶r mo kì̵ ɗel so jee, ki̶ koo meye ni kì̵ ɗee a ɗiipoo zak.
47005018	Mbii ɗiisi mo jir, a c`in kì̵ Naan, ɗi wuri cighi̶r ki̶ mun shaarlek fi̶ri mo, mpeku mu ɗee ɗi a shaar fi̶ri mo shi Kristi. Wuri cín ɗak ɗiisi mmun, mpeku mu cighi̶r ki̶ gurum mo, ɗi mo a shaarlek fi̶ri mo, mpeku mo ɗee ɗi a shaar fi̶ri mo zak.
47005019	A po ɗi mun nkaa sat ni ɗiisi nee, Naan wuri nkaa le gurum ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni, ku mo ɗee a shaar fi̶ri. Ba Naan wuri tang shikbish kì̵ gurum ni mo nkaa mo kas, ki̶ wuri kì̵ lepo mu cighi̶r ki̶ gurum ɗi mo a shaarlek fi̶ri mo, ku mo ɗee a shaar fi̶ri mo nsar funu zak.
47005020	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe yaksi mun a jeplop mu Kristi mo, ɗi Naan wurii pi̶rep gurum mo a shi mun. Mu ɗang pu wun a koppee kì̵ Kristi, wu yit ku Naan wuri cighi̶r ki̶ wun, ku wu ɗee ɗi a shaar fi̶ri mo.
47005021	Wuri ɗi ba wuri man c`in mee shikbish kas, ɓe Naan le wuri mang shikbish funu mo, mpeku ndi̶ghi̶n wuri ɓe mu ɗee ɗi a nyem ɗin ndi̶re mo, nyit kì̵ Naan.
47006001	Kaaɗi mun muu c`in ɗak ashak ki̶ Naan zak, ɓe mu ɗang pe wun, mpeku taji wu lap ɗiiret kì̵ Naan wu le ni a mbii ɗiibuu kas.
47006002	Wu ki̶ling mbii ɗi Naan wurii kì̵ sat nee: "Kaaɗi pee mu c`in ɗiiret ni wul, ɓe wan nc`in ɗiiret nwugha. Kaaɗi puus ɓam ni j`i wul, ɓe wan mɓam wugha zak." Azeen-nzeen wan sat nwun nee, cicinsi ni a pee mu lap ɗiiret mu Naan! Ki̶ zak, cicinsi ni a puus mu kat ɓam pe Naan ɗi.
47006003	Ba mu le mee mbii canshii mmee gurum kas, mpeku taji mo ɓees ɗak funu ni kas.
47006004	Amma koo a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe muu kám ngurum mo azeen-nzeen nee. Mun a ki̶rom mu Naan mo, ki̶ muu kám nee, mun a ki̶rom kì̵ Naan mo shi gung ki̶ shwaajeel ɗes, ki̶ mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n mbii lejeel mo.
47006005	Muu shwaanas, ki̶ mo naa mɓwaghat mun, ki̶ muu tong mɓut nyemyaghal ki̶ ɓi̶lep mo, ki̶ ɗak mo ɗes, ki̶ tong shi gongpee, ki̶ tong ki̶ neen, ki̶ ciin saam zak.
47006006	Muu kám zeen funu shi mi̶se ɗiiret ki̶ man, ki̶ gung shi mi̶se ɗii mu naajeel ndi̶ghi̶n Riin Ɗiiɓang, ki̶ shi wal ɗiiɗes zak,
47006007	ki̶ shi po ɗi mo azeen-nzeen, ki̶ shiɓal kì̵ Naan. Mun ki̶ zeen ni, kaa leelek ɗin ndi̶re mo si, nsarse ki̶ nsarkul funu mo.
47006008	Gurum mo le mun a ɗiiɗes, amma pak moo waa lejeel mmun zak. Pak gurum moo kwoop mun, amma pak moo waa ɓees mun zak. Moo le mun a kaa nyemɗung mo si, amma mun a nyemsat zeen mo.
47006009	Gurum mo le mun a kaa ba mo man mun kas si, amma mun a ɗii mi̶man pe mmo. Mu ɗee kaa muu mumurap si, amma mun ɗiki̶ seen. Mo ni̶ram mun, jir ki̶si, ɓe ba mo twa mun kas.
47006010	Mu ɗee kaa mun aa putughup ɗiiwuwat si, amma ɓe mun a mɓut nretnyit shidaar-shidaar. Mu ɗee kaa nyemjeel mo si, amma jir ki̶si, ɓe muu le ku gurum mo ɗes mo kat long. Mu ɗee kaa ba mun ki̶ mee mbii kas si, amma jir ki̶si, ɓe koo mbii ɗiiɗang ye ɓe ni a munu.
47006011	Wun nyem Koronti mo, wu man nee, ba mu sok mee mbii nwun kas. Gyet muu satpo nwun agaak mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu jir.
47006012	Ba gyet mu nook sat nwun mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu kas. Gyet a wun wu nook sat mmun mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo.
47006013	Wan ɗang pu wun kaa jep fi̶na mo si, mpeku wu woo mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo mmun.
47006014	Taji wu ɓàlsuk ashak ki̶ nyem ɗi ba mo cínzeen nNaan kas. Mpeeɗi a me ɓàl ɗak ɗiiret ki̶ ɗak ɗiibish ye? Ki̶ a me ɓàl peeɓang ki̶ peenkoo ye?
47006015	Ba mee shaar ashak ɗi nnaar kì̵ Kristi ki̶ Shetan kas. A me ɓàl ngucínzeen, ki̶ ngo ɗi ba wuri cínzeen kas ye?
47006016	A me ɓàl Lu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes ki̶ lu k`um ye? Putughup funu mo a peeɗi Naan wurii tong ɗi, kaaɗi wuri kì̵ ten sat si nee: "Wan ntong ashak ki̶ mo, ki̶ wan mmwaan nnaar furu zak. Wan nɗee a Naan furu, ki̶ mon nɗee a nyem fi̶na mo zak.
47006017	Mpeemi̶ni ɓe wu pwat aku, mɓut nyem ɗi ba mo cínzeen kas, ki̶ wu ɓàkshak ki̶ mo zak, Daa Naan wuri sat aasi. Taji wu tung mee mbii ɗi ni a ɗiirap kas, ɗangɓe wan nlap wun.
47006018	Wan nɗee a puun fuu, ki̶ wun nɗee a jep fi̶na ɗiimish mo, ki̶ ɗiimat mo. A Daa ɗiiɓal met jir, wuri satpo mi̶ni."
47007001	Shaar fi̶na mo ɗi wan wal nwun, kaaɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten tuwoorpo mbii ɗiisi mo mmun aasi, ɓe ni ret ku mu lesun funu mo ɗee a ɗiiɓang, ndi̶ghi̶n koo a mbii ɗiibish ɗiiɗang ye, ɗi nii wat nan funu mo, ki̶ riin funu mo zak. Ni ret ku mu ɗee a nyem ɗiiɓang mo riret ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan funu mo, mpee cín ɗiiɗes nNaan.
47007002	Wu wang putughup fuu mo mmun, mpeeɗi ba jí mu c`in mee mbii ɗiibish mmee gurum kas, ki̶ ba mu wat mee gurum kas zak. Ba jí mu seen a mee gurum kas.
47007003	Ba wan sat ɗiisi ni a mpeku wan le wun ɗi a nyemshikbish mo kas, amma wan satpo ɗiisi ni a mpeeɗi jí wan ki̶n ten sat nwun nee, mu wal nwun zam. Ki̶ koo ɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n muut, ki̶ koo ɗi mun ɗi ki̶ seen, ɓe mun ɗi ashak vit ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu mo.
47007004	Wan cínzeen nwun azeen-nzeen, ki̶ wan ki̶n c`in roghop ɗes a shi wun zak. Har wu fes wu caa putughup fi̶na ni riret hakyeng. Jir ki̶ jeel ɗi muu shwaa ni, ɓe wan nkaa c`in retnyit ɗes zam.
47007005	Kaaɗi gyet mu so mu wul nyil mMasidoniya si, ɓe ba gyet mu kat mee pee ɓwot sun kas. Gurum mo cín jeel mmun ɗes, koo a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiɗang ye. Gurum mo ɓi̶lep ki̶ mun, ki̶ gyet ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu mo, ɓe ki̶i̶rmuut ni ɗi zak.
47007006	Amma Naan wurii cínɓal ki̶ wurii caa putughup mu nyem ɗi ba moo ɓal mputughup kas. Gyet wuri c`in ɓal putughup funu mo shi j`i kì̵ Titus.
47007007	Ba a j`i kì̵ Titus ni ɓejee ɗak kas, amma ashak ki̶ ɗi gyet wu c`in caa putughup fi̶ri, har wuri sat mmun nee, wu kyaghar mpee naa wan, ki̶ wuu naajeel fi̶na, ki̶ ne, wun mɓwoon fi̶na zak. Po ɗiisi ni mo si̶ghi̶t le retnyit nwan ɗes hakyeng.
47007008	Koo ɗi gyet wan wat putughup nwun shi wasika ɗi wan ran nwun si, ɓe ba gyet ni daampee nwan, mpeeɗi wan ran wasika ni nwun kas. Gyet yam ɓe ni wat putughup nwan, mpeeɗi gyet wan naa nee, wasika nin wat putughup fuu mo zam. Koo ɗi gyet ni wat putughup nwan a mpee rep pee lee ɗak.
47007009	Amma yaksi wan kat retnyit. Ba ne mpeeɗi wasika ni le putughup fuu mo wat kas, amma a mpeku wu tuwap ɗi, mpee mbii ɗi mo le ku putughup fuu mo wat. Daa Naan wurii riɓet a kiyeet kì̵ wat kì̵ putughup mi̶ni, mpeeɗi nin nle ku wu tuwap. Mpeemi̶ni ɓe ba mu c`in a mee mbii ɗiibish nwun kas.
47007010	Mpeeɗi kiyeet kì̵ putughup ɗiiwuwat ɗi a Naan le, nii j`i ki̶ tuwap, ki̶ nii j`i ki̶ kat ɓam zak. Ba nii le ku gurum mak sat nee, "katɗang ɗin man oo!" kas. Amma putughup ɗiiwuwat mu yil ɗiisi, mi̶nii ki̶ j`i aa muut.
47007011	Wu naa, mbii ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ c`in ki̶ putughup ɗiiwuwat ni, ni le ku wu ɗak mi̶se fuu mo azeen-nzeen. Ki̶ ni le ku wuu riɓet kám agaak nee, ba gyet wu man mee mbii ɗiibish kas, har ni kì̵ le ku wu kat canciin. Nii le ku wu kat ɓal, ki̶ nii le ku wu kat gung ndi̶ghi̶n kar fuu zak. Mɓut mbii ɗiisi mo, ɓe koo a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe nii kám azeen-nzeen nee, wuu mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiret.
47007012	Koo ɗi gyet wan ki̶ ran wasika nwun, ɓe ba ni a mpee mee ngo ɗi wuri kì̵ c`in shikbish kas. Ki̶ ba ni a nkaa mee ngo ɗi mo c`in ɗiibish nwuri kas. Amma wan ran wasika ni, a mpeku ni kám ɗi nwun agaak ntoghom kì̵ Naan, wal fuu mpee mun.
47007013	A mpee mbii ɗiisi mo, ɗangɓe gyet putughup funu mo kat ɓal. Ba gyet ni ɓal a kwak funu mo ɓejee ɗak kas, amma mu kat retnyit ɗiki̶ ɗes, mpee retnyit kì̵ Titus, mpeeɗi gyet wun jir wuu kaat wuri shi retnyit.
47007014	Gyet wan ki̶n ten canjagham fuu nwuri, ɓe ba gyet mee naashoop yaa wan mpeemi̶ni kas. Mbii ɗi mu sat mo nwun si, mo azeen-nzeen. Canjagham funu ɗi mu sat nTitus nkaa wun, ni azeen aasi zak.
47007015	Wuri le putughup fi̶ri nkaa wun jir met ɗiiyam hakyeng. Kaaɗi gyet wuri pan nee, wun jir, wun a nyem ɗi wu lappo ɗi wuri sat mo nwun. Ki̶ wun kì̵ kaat wuri shi retnyit, ki̶ gyet wu c`in mbii ɗiiret wuri zak.
47007016	Wan kat retnyit mpeeɗi wan ki̶k nkaa wun riret hakyeng.
47008001	Ɗyemnaa mo, muu riɓet ku wu man po nkaa ɗiiret ɗi Naan wuri cín ni Eki̶lisya ɗi mon nyil mMasidoniya.
47008002	Koo ɗi jí mo kì̵ kyam mo shi jeel ɗiinaat, ki̶ mo nkaa shwaajeel mu mbii mo zak, ɓe jir ki̶si, retnyit furu ni ɗes. Ɓe ni le ku mo c`in mbii ɗiiret mpeeɗi mo cín mbii furu mo shi zughum, koo ɗi ba mo ki̶ mee mbii ɗes kas.
47008003	Wan man azeen nee, mbii ɗi mo cín ni a ntiit ki̶ ɓal furu, har ni met ɓal furu, mpeeɗi mo cín ni a shi riɓet kì̵ putughup furu mo.
47008004	Moo ɗang pu mun ɗes hakyeng nee, mu cín pee nɗun ki̶ mu leɗun mɓut nyem ɗi moo c`in ɓam mpee nyem Jesu mo si.
47008005	Har mo cín mbii mo ɗes met mbii ɗi muu lepan. Amma mo shee cín a putughup furu mon nDaa, ki̶ mun zak, ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi Naan ki̶ riɓet ku mo c`in.
47008006	Kaaɗi mu naa ni ret, ɓe mu lop Titus so pe wun ɗi, mpeeɗi jí a wuri shee c`in ɗak ɗiiret ɗiisi ni ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ɓe ni ret ku a wurin nsi̶ghi̶t sekiyeen ki̶ ɗak ni.
47008007	Wun kì̵ sekiyeen ndi̶ghi̶n koo a mbii ɗiiɗang ye, har ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen, ki̶ katpo, ki̶ man, ki̶ gung mbii mo ɗes, ki̶ wal ɗi wun ki̶ ni mpee mun. Ni ret ku wu sekiyeen ki̶ c`in ɗak ɗiiret mu cín zughum shi putughup mi̶ndong.
47008008	Ba wan ki̶n le a mee waar pe wun ɗi kas, amma ni a mpee kám gung ɗi nwun, mpeku wan man ɗi azeen nee, wal ɗi wun ki̶ ni, mpee ɓam niyee mo, ni azeen.
47008009	Mpeeɗi wun kì̵ man ɗiiret mu Daa funu Jesu Kristi, koo ɗi gyet wuri a ngulong, jir ki̶si, ɓe wuri lekáa fi̶ri ɗee kaa ngujeel si mpee wun. Mpeku ndi̶ghi̶n jeel fi̶ri ni, ɓe wu ɗee ɗi a nyemlong mo.
47008010	A pan mi̶na nkaa mbii ni nɗiisi, nin nret ku yaksi ɓe wu si̶ghi̶t kaghar mbii ɗi gyet wuu yaa c`in ni doghontagham si. Gyet a wun shee cín mbii, ki̶ wun kì̵ putughup mu cín mbii hakyeng.
47008011	Ni ret ku wu kyes kaghar ɗak ni shi riɓet kì̵ putughup fuu mo, ntiit ki̶ ɓal fuu, kaaɗi gyet wu shee c`in ni si.
47008012	Katɗang ɓe mee gurum ki̶ putughup ɗii mu cín mbiizughum, ɓe Naan nlap mbiizughum kì̵ ngo ni ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi ngo ni cín nNaan. Ba Naan wurin ntang a mbii ɗi ngo ni nɗin nni kas.
47008013	Ba wan satpo mi̶ni a mpeku pak gurum mo nook cín mbiizughum, mpeku ni toghon ɗi wuwun kas.
47008014	Amma a mpeku mo le mbii mo ɗee ɗin ndi̶re, ɓe wu ɓam mo yaksi, shi mbii ki̶kat fuu mo, mpeeɗi ba mo ki̶ mee mbii kas. Mpeku katɗang parpuus ɗi wu táa njeel, ɓe mo ɓam wun ɗi zak. Ɗiisi ni a mpeku mo ɓàk mbii mo ɗi ntiit-ntiit.
47008015	Kaaɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si nee: "Ngo ɗi wuri kyak ɗes, ɓe ba nin ngyar ɗes a wuri kas, ki̶ ngo ɗi wuri kyak lee, ɓe ba nin ngyar kat wuri kas."
47008016	Wan pi̶lang Naan, ɗi wuri lepan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup kì̵ Titus, mpeku wuri ɓam wun ɗi, kaaɗi wan ki̶n c`in wun si.
47008017	Ba wuri lap ii a mpee ɗang funu ɓejee ɗak kas, amma wuri kì̵ fes lepan fi̶ri, mpeku wuri so pe wun shi pan mukáa fi̶ri.
47008018	Muu lop wuri so pe wun ɗi ashak ki̶ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ɗi gurum moo fes cín ɗiiɗes nwuri, mpee satpo kì̵ Naan ndi̶ghi̶n Eki̶lisya mo jir.
47008019	Ba a mi̶ni ɓejee ɗak kas, amma Eki̶lisya mo bi̶lip wuri, mpeku wuri so ɗi ashak ki̶ mun, mpee so ki̶ mbiizughum ɗi muu cín ni, mpee le Daa a ɗiiɗes, ki̶ kám agaak nee, mun ki̶ putughup ɗi ni a mu ɓam zak.
47008020	Ba muu riɓet ku mee gurum kàss mun nkaa mbiizughum ɗiisi, ɗi gurum moo cín ni shi putughup mi̶ndong, ɗi mun nkaa c`in ni si kas.
47008021	Mbii ɗi muu riɓet nɗiisi, ku wu c`in mbii mo ɗi ndi̶re-ndi̶re, ba a ntoghom kì̵ Daa ɓejee ɗak kas, har ki̶ ntoghom kì̵ gurum mo jir zak.
47008022	Muu lop ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ashak ki̶ mo zak. Mun kì̵ kyam ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu wuri yit mo ɗes, ɓe mu kat wuri a nguɗak zam ndi̶ghi̶n ar mo shini-shini. Yaksi ɓe wurii c`in ɗak ni waa met ɗiiyam zak. Wuri kì̵ c`in ɗak ɗiiret ni ɗes mpee ɓam wun.
47008023	Titus wuri a shaarmwaan fi̶na, ɗi wuri c`in ɗak ashak ki̶ wan mpee ɓam wun zak. Mpee ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ɗiisi mo, ɓe mo a nyem ɗi Eki̶lisya mo lop mo, mpeku mo lesum kì̵ Kristi ɗi a ɗiiɗes.
47008024	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wu kám wal fuu mmo, mpeku Eki̶lisya ni mo man ɗi azeen-nzeen nee, jagham ɗi muu can ni mpee wun, ni a ndi̶re azeen-nzeen.
47009001	Po nkaa cín ɓam mpee nyemso ndang Jesu mo, ɓe ba ni a ting ku wan ran mee po nwun nkaa ni kas.
47009002	Mpeeɗi wan man sekiyeen fuu, har wan ki̶ canjagham shi wun ntoghom ki̶ nyem Masidoniya mo. Wan sat mmo nee, gyet doghontagham ɓe Eki̶lisya ɗin Akaya wura kì̵ ten ɗak sat mpee cín ɓam. Riɓet fuu mpee cín mbiizughum ɗi wu cín ni ɓalkwak ngurum mo ɗes ndi̶ghi̶n mo zam.
47009003	Amma wan lop ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ɗiisi mo so pe wun ɗi, mpeku taji canjagham ɗi mu sat shi wun, nkaa mbii ɗiisi ni ɗee a mbii ɗiibuu kas, amma mpeku wu tong ɗi shi ɗak suk, ki̶ mbiizughum ni, kaaɗi gyet wan ki̶n sat nwun nee, wu tong shi ɗak suk si.
47009004	Mpeeɗi katɗang pak nyem Masidoniya ni mo yaghal j`i ashak ki̶ wan, ɗangɓe mo j`i kat ba wuu ɗak suk kas, ɓe naashoop nyaa mun, ki̶ nin nsi̶ghi̶t yaa wun met nwan zak, mpeeɗi muu cínzeen nwun.
47009005	Ni aasi ɓe wan naa nee, ni ret ku wan ɗang ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ɗiisi mo, mpeku mo shee so pe wun ɗi nwan nti̶leng, mpeku mo kyak mbiizughum ɗi gyet wuu tuwoor ne, wun ncín niɗi. Katbaa wan ki̶n so wul pe wun ɗi, ɓe mo kì̵ ten kyak mbiizughum ni mo. Ɓe ni kám nee, wu cín mbiizughum ni a shi riɓet ki̶ putughup fuu mo, ba a mee gurum leting nwun kas.
47009006	Taji wu mander kas nee, ngo ɗi wuri kop cirem ɗiɓen lee ndi̶ghi̶n maar fi̶ri, ɓe wurin nɗiip ɗiɓen ni a lee ɗak. Ngo ɗi wuri kop cirem ɗiɓen ɗes, ɓe wurin nɗiip ɗiɓen ni ɗes aasi zak.
47009007	Koo weye ɓe wuri cín mbii ɗi wuri ki̶ pan mputughup mpee cín ni, ba a shi putughup vul-vul kas, ki̶ ba a gurum mo le ting nwuri kas. Mpeeɗi Naan wurii riɓet a ngo ɗi wurii cín mbiizughum, a shi retnyit ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri.
47009008	Naan wuri ki̶ iiko ɗi wurin ncín mbii mo nwun ɗes met mbii ɗi wuu riɓet mo. Mpeku koo a pi̶rang ye, ɓe wu kat mbii ɗi wuu riɓet mo, ɗi mpee suk fuu mo, ki̶ mpeku wu katpee cín mbiizughum ɗi shi putughup mi̶ndong mpee ɗak ɗiiret mo jir.
47009009	Kaaɗi mo ki̶ ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si nee: "Wurii cín mbii nyemjeel mo shi zughum ɗes, ki̶ shi putughup mi̶ndong. Ɗiiret fi̶ri nin ntong ɗi har ngaa-ngaa."
47009010	A Naan wurii cín cirem ngumaar, ki̶ a wurii cín mbiise mu se zak. A wurin ncín cirem nwun wu kop, ki̶ a wurin nle ku ni kàa wurang. Wurin nle ɗiiret nkaa ɗak fuu ɗin ndi̶re, ku ni ɗes ɗi hakyeng.
47009011	Wurin nle ku wu ɗee a nyemlong mo koo a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiɗang ye, mpeku wu naa ncín mbiizughum ɗi shi putughup mi̶ndong. Mbiizughum ɗi wun ncín ni, nin nɗee ngurum mo a mbii pi̶lang pe Naan.
47009012	Mpeeɗi ɗak fuu ɗiiret ɗiisi ni, ba ni ɓam a nyem kì̵ Naan mo ɓejee ɗak kas, amma ni waa si̶ghi̶t le ku gurum mo pi̶lang Naan ɗes zam.
47009013	Ɗak fuu ɗiiret ɗiisi ni kám nee, cínzeen fuu ni ɗar ɓal-ɓal hakyeng. Nin nle ku gurum mo le Naan a ɗiiɗes, mpee mbiizughum ɗi wu cín mo ashak ki̶ kaghar gurum ni mo shi putughup mi̶ndong. Ɓe ni kám agaak nee, wuu lappo ɗiiret mu Kristi ni azeen-nzeen.
47009014	A mpee wal ɗi gurum mo ki̶ ni mpee wun, ɓe mon nc`in aduwa mpee wun, mpeeɗi mo man nee, Naan wuri ki̶ cín ɗiiret nwun ɗes zam.
47009015	Wu yit ku mu pi̶lang Naan mpee zughum ɗi wuri cín mmun. Zughum ɗi ni met mɓal mu sat.
47010001	Wan Pool shikáa fi̶na, wan ɗang pu wun, mpee mi̶se mu puɗok ki̶ ɗiiret mu Kristi. Wan ɗi moo sat ne, wan a nguɗokpo titik, katɗang wan ashak ki̶ wun, amma ne wan ki̶n sat mbii mo nwun agaak, katɗang ba wan ashak ki̶ wun kas.
47010002	Wan ɗang pu wun, mpeku taji wu leting nwan satpo nwun shiɓal kas, katɗang wan j`i pe wun ɗi. Mpeeɗi wan man azeen nee, wan mak satpo shiɓal nyem ɗi moo sat ne, mbii ɗi muu c`in si ɓe ni a ɗak mu yil ɗiisi.
47010003	Koo ɗi muu tong a ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni, ɓe mbii ɗi mun nkaa c`in lek mpee ni, ba ni a mu yil ɗiisi kas.
47010004	Leelek ɗi muu c`in lek ɗishik, ba ni a mu yil ɗiisi kas. Amma leelek funu ni a iiko mu Naan, ɗi nin mmak shirip fwang ɗiiɓal mo.
47010005	Muu shirip po ki̶ nyem ɗi moo j`i ki̶ mbii langkáa nkaa man kì̵ Naan, ki̶ zak, muu shirip koo a fwang mu roghop ɗiiɗang ye ɗi nii daam man Naan ngurum mo. Ki̶ muu le ku koo a pan kì̵ weye, ɓe ni c`in ɗyen kì̵ Kristi ɗi zak.
47010006	Aɓwoon ɗi wun nkám agaak azeen-nzeen nee, wuu ki̶lingpo funu, ɓe mun ɗak sun funu riret mpee kar nyemcíi ki̶lingpee mo.
47010007	A me le ɗang wuu leyit fuu mo nkaa mbii ɗi mo a ɓwoon ye? Katɗang mee gurum ki̶ leshin ne, wuɗi a mu Kristi, ɓe ni ret ku wuri pan riret, ki̶ wuri man ne mun a mu Kristi zak.
47010008	Mpeeɗi koo ɗi wan canjagham ɗes shi iiko ɗi Daa wuri cín mmun, ɓe ni a mpeku mu ɗak wun ɗi, ba a mpeku mu shirip wun ɗi kas. Ba mee naashoop yaa wan kas.
47010009	Taji wu pan nee, wan ki̶n gung a mpeku wan leki̶i̶rmuut ɗi nwun shi wasika fi̶na ni mo kas.
47010010	Mpeeɗi pak gurum moo sat nee, mbii ɗi wurii ran ndi̶ghi̶n wasika fi̶ri ni mo toghon, ki̶ mo ɓal zam, amma katɗang gurum naa wurin nyit, ɓe ba shin fi̶ri ni ki̶ mee ɓal kas. Po ɗi wurii sat ni, ɓe ba nii koghop ni kas.
47010011	Ni ret ku nyemsatpo mi̶ni mo man nee, mbii ɗi muu sat ndi̶ghi̶n wasika, ɓe ba ni ɗik ki̶ mbii ɗi muu sat nwun nyit ki̶ yit kas, katɗang mu kaat ashak ki̶ wun.
47010012	Ba mu mak lekáa funu, koo mu kámkáa funu mo ntiit ki̶ nyem ɗi moo canjagham a shi sut furu mo kas. Mpeeɗi moo kám sut furu mo ki̶ shak, ki̶ moo kyamsut furu ki̶ shak zak. Nyem mi̶ni mo a mwen mo.
47010013	Ba mun ncanjagham ɗel peeɗi ni ret ku mu ɗar ɗi kas. Amma mu ɗar a nkaa pee ɗak ɗi Naan wuri ki̶ can ni mmun, ɗiisi ni ɓàl ki̶ ɗak funu ndi̶ghi̶n wun.
47010014	Wun a ndi̶ghi̶n pee ɗak ɗi Naan wuri ki̶ can mun, aasi ɓe ba jí mu canjagham mpee ɗak funu ɗik kas, kaaɗi gyet mu so ki̶ po mu Kristi ni nwun si.
47010015	Ba canjagham funu ni ɗel met mbii ɗi ni ret kas, ki̶ ba ni tuwaas ɗak ki̶ mee gurum mo kas. Amma mu canciin nee, a cínzeen fuu ni ɓul hakyeng, ɓe ɗak funu ndi̶ghi̶n wun, nin mɓul ɗes hakyeng zak.
47010016	Mpeku mu katpee satpo kì̵ Naan ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗi mo a kiyeen fuu. Ba mu canjagham a shi peeɗi mee gurum ki̶ kyam c`in ɗak ɗi kas.
47010017	Amma kaaɗi mo kì̵ ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si nee, "Jir ngo ɗi wuri canjagham, ɓe ni ret ku wuri canjagham ni a shi mbii ɗi Daa wuri ki̶ c`in."
47010018	Mpeeɗi ba Naan wuri riɓet ngo ɗi wurii kwoop a shin kas, amma see a ngo ɗi Daa wurii kwoop ɓejee.
47011001	Wan canciin nee, wun gung ki̶ wan mpee rep mwen fi̶na si. Kussuk wu gung ki̶ wan!
47011002	Wan ki̶n c`in zughur nkaa wun mpee Naan. Wun a kaa reep ɗi ba wura ki̶ man mish kas. Wan ki̶n tuwoorpo mpee cín wun nɗik, kaa matpoo si pe mish fi̶ra ɗi, a Kristi wuri a mish fuu ni.
47011003	Amma wan ki̶n ki̶i̶r, taji ni yaghal ɗee a kaa gyet nw`oo num Iif shi seen fi̶ri ɗii mu ɗung si kas. Taji mo yaghal num wun, ki̶ mo mer ki̶ pan fuu mo nkaa wal ɗiiret, ɗi wun ki̶ ni mpee Kristi kas.
47011004	A me le ɗang katɗang mee gurum j`i satpo nkaa mee Jesu ɗi ɗik ki̶ po ɗi mun mu sat ni nwun ɓe wuu ki̶ling po mi̶ni ye? Wu pan nee riin mi̶ni ɗik ki̶ Riin kì̵ Naan ɗi wuu kat ni me? Ki̶ wu pan nee, mee po kì̵ Naan ni ɗi ɗik waa met po Naan ɗi wuu lap ni me?
47011005	Wan man azeen nee, ba wan a ɗiikat met jir ndi̶ghi̶n jeplop ni mo kas.
47011006	Meeɓe, ba wan man satpo riret kas, amma ɓe wan man satpo ɗiiret ni. Muu kám man ni nwun agaak koo a pi̶rang ye mɓut mbii mo jir.
47011007	Ashee, gyet wan c`in a mbii ɗiibish, mpeeɗi gyet wan sham ki̶ káa fi̶na, mpeku Naan wuri ɗiyeep wun ɗi kaaɗi wan satpo kì̵ Naan ni nwun shi zughum si wa?
47011008	Wan lap ɓam pu pak Eki̶lisya mo, mpeku wan c`in ɗak ɗi nnaar fuu. Wan mak sat nee, gyet wan hi̶r a long furu mo, mpeku wan ɓam wun ɗi.
47011009	Kaaɗi gyet wan ɗi ashak ki̶ wun, ɓe ba gyet wan ki̶ mee mbii kas, ki̶ zak, ba gyet wan lejeel mmee gurum kas. Mpeeɗi ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ɗi mo tong mMasidoniya j`i ɗi, a mo j`i cín wan mbii ɗi wan ki̶n riɓet mo. A mpeemi̶ni, ɗangɓe koo a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe ba wan le mee jeel wun kas. Kaaɗi ba gyet wan lejeel wun kas si.
47011010	Mpeeɗi wan man nee, po ɗi wan ki̶n sat ni a po mu Kristi azeen, ɓe ba mee ngo mak cíi canjagham nwan ndi̶ghi̶n yil Akaya kas.
47011011	A me le ɗang wan sat ki̶si ye? A mpeeɗi ba wan wal nwun kas aa? Naan wuri man nee, wan wal nwun zam.
47011012	Ɗak ɗi wan nkaa c`in ni, ɓe wan sat a nc`in a ni, mpeku wan shaghatpo mu canjagham ɗi jeplop ɗi moo sat ne, ɗak furu ni a ntiit ki̶ munu.
47011013	Kiyeet ki̶ nyem mi̶ni mo a jeplop mu ɗung mo. Moo c`in a ɗak ɗii mu numpee mo. Moo lekáa furu kaa mo a jeplop mu Kristi mo si, amma ba mo a jeplop Kristi kas.
47011014	Ba ni ɗee a mbii aapo kas, mpeeɗi koo a Shetan shikáa fi̶ri, ɓe wurii leshin kaa wuri a ngulop mu peeɓang si.
47011015	Mpeemi̶ni ɓe ba ni ɗee a mbii aapo kas, katɗang ɓe ki̶rom mu Shetan mo lesut furu, kaa mo a nyem c`in ɗak ɗiiret mo si zak. A peekyes ki̶ ni, ɓe mon nlap kwat furu mo ntiit ki̶ ɗak furu mo zak.
47011016	Wan ki̶n baa sat ɗi zak nee, taji mee gurum pan ne, wan a mwen kas. Amma katɗang wu pan ne, wan a mwen, ɓe wu lap wan ɗiisi kaa mwen ni si, mpeku wan kat pee can rep jagham ɗi diɓen.
47011017	Po ɗi wan sat si, ɓe ba wan sat a mee po ɗi Daa wuri lop wan kas, amma wan ki̶n satpo ni a kaa mwen si, wan ki̶n satpo mi̶ni a kyap.
47011018	Kaaɗi gurum mo ɗes moo can a jagham ɗii mu yil ɗiisi ɓejee ɗak si, ɓe wan canjagham ni aasi zak.
47011019	Wun nyem ɗi wu seen ɓe wuu gung ki̶ nyemmwen mo shi retnyit.
47011020	Mpeeɗi katɗang, ɓe mee gurum le wun kaa ki̶rom mo si, koo wuri hi̶hi̶r wun, koo wuri se li̶ɓet nkaa wun, ki̶ koo wuri kám a ɓal mu tughur nwun, ki̶ koo wuri ni̶nas wun, jir ki̶si ɓe wuu gung ki̶ ngo mi̶ni.
47011021	Ni shoop wan mpee lap ii, ne gyet mun ki̶ ɓal mpee c`in mbii ɗiisi mo kas, amma katɗang mee gurum ki̶ canjagham nkaa mee mbii, ɓe wan ki̶n satpo ni a kaa mwen si. Wan ncanjagham aasi zak.
47011022	Katɗang ɓe, mo a nyem Hiburu mo, ɓe wan a ngu Hiburu zak. Katɗang ɓe, mo a nyem Yahudi mo, ɓe wan a ngu Yahudi zak. Katɗang ɓe mo a dang ki̶ Abraham, ɓe wan a dang ki̶ Abraham zak.
47011023	Katɗang ɓe mo a ki̶rom mu Kristi mo, ɓe wan a ki̶rom mu Kristi zak. Wan katpo ni a kaa ngutar si! Mpeeɗi wan c`in ɗak ɗi ni ɗes met mumo ni. Mo ki̶ ɓwaghat wan le lushaghat, ki̶ wan shwaanas met mo sat zak. Wan ki̶n shwaajeel mo shini-shini har kus ki̶ muut zak.
47011024	Gyet yit paat, ɓe nyem Yahudi mo fwo ngwam nwan laarkun baapofeer.
47011025	Nyemnan-nan mu Rom mo si̶ram wan shi kám yitkun. Nyem Yahudi mo car wan shi ndi̶ng yit mi̶ndong, mpeku mo tu wan ɗi. Yitkun ɓe jirgi am, ni taa pyan ki̶ mun. Wan ki̶n kyam teer ki̶ wet nkaa am bahar.
47011026	Shidaar-shidaar ɓe wan a ar mwaan mo ɗes, ki̶ wan ki̶n naa muut shi yit fi̶na mɓut ndung mo. Wan ki̶n naa muut nsar kì̵ nyemwat mo, ki̶ wan naa muut nsar kì̵ dang funu mo zak. Wan ki̶ naa muut nsar kì̵ nyemk`um mo. Wan ki̶n naa muut ndi̶ghi̶n birni mo, ki̶ zak, wan ki̶n naa muut a naar yil mo. Wan ki̶ naa muut nkaa am bahar mo. Wan ki̶n naa muut nsar kì̵ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n ɗii mu ɗung mo.
47011027	Wan ki̶n shwaaɗak mo, ki̶ wan ki̶n shwaajeel mo, ki̶n nnaa nteer mmeen, ki̶ wan ki̶ shwaaneen zak, ki̶ neen am tu wan zak. Yit mo ɗes ba wan kat mee mbiise kas. Wan ki̶n shwaakut, mpee ciin mbiisup,
47011028	ki̶ pak mbii mo ɗes ɗiki̶ zak. Mbii ɗi mo daampee nwan, koo puus ɗiiɗang ye, ni a mpeeɗi wan ki̶n tap ki̶ Eki̶lisya mo jir si zak.
47011029	Katɗang ba mee ngo kat ɓal kas, ɓe ni le ku ba wan kat ɓal kas zak. Katɗang mee ngo taa pal ndi̶ghi̶n shikbish, ɓe ni shwal nwan zam.
47011030	Katɗang ɓe ni a ting ku wan canjagham, ɓe wan canjagham ni a nkaa mbii ɗi nin nkám agaak ne ba wan ki̶ ɓal kas,
47011031	Naan puun kì̵ Daa Jesu ɗi sum fi̶ri ni kat ɗiiret har ngaa-ngaa. Wuri man azeen-nzeen nee, ba wan ki̶n sat a ɗung kas.
47011032	Ndi̶ghi̶n yil nDamaskus, ɓe gofna ɗi wurin nder kì̵ mishkagham Aretas wuri shaghatpo fwang ɗin nDamaskus mo, mpeku mo yaa wan ɗi.
47011033	Mo le wan sham ndi̶ghi̶n kacik ɗiiɗes mmee fung mu fwang mu birni ni, har wan put kagham nsar fi̶ri.
47012001	Wan ncanjagham a ting, koo ɗi ba wan kat mee li̶ɓet ndi̶ghi̶n ni kas. Amma yaksi ɓe wan nsekiyeen ki̶ satpo nkaa sughun mo, ki̶ mbii ɗi Naan wuri woo mo nwan.
47012002	Wan man mee gurum ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi ɗi gyet Naan mang wuri kàa ki̶ wuri ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan ɗiikun. Ni wul a ɓit mo kaghapaat baafeer yaksi. Kyet, gyet Naan kàa ki̶ wuri a ndi̶ghi̶n nan mu yil ɗiisi aa? Ɓe ba wan man kas, amma Naan man.
47012003	Wan man nee, mo mang gwar ni kàa ki̶ wuri a mparadayis. (Shii kì̵ mi̶ni a peeɗi Naan ɗi). Kyet a shi nan mu yil ɗiisi aa? Koo ba a shi shin mu yil ɗiisi kas aa? Ɓe ba wan man kas, amma Naan wuri man.
47012004	Wuri ki̶ling mbii mo, ɗi ba mon mmak sat mo shi po kas, ki̶ mbii ɗi ba gurum mo mak sat shi li̶po kas zak.
47012005	Wan ki̶n canjagham a shi gwar ɗiisi. Ba wan ki̶n canjagham a shi káa fi̶na kas. Amma wan ki̶n kám a ciin ɓal fi̶na agaak.
47012006	Koo ɗi wan riɓet canjagham ni, ɓe ba wan ɗee a mwen kas, mpeeɗi wan ki̶n sat azeen. Amma ba wan canjagham kas, mpeku taji mee gurum lepan nkaa wan, waa met mbii ɗi wurii naa wan ki̶n c`in mo, ki̶ mbii ɗi wurii ki̶ling pu wan kas.
47012007	Mpeku taji wan ɗiyeep káa fi̶na mpee sughun ɗiiɗes ɗiisi ɗi Naan kì̵ kám mo nwan kas. Amma mo le mee hi̶r ndi̶ghi̶n san fi̶na, ɗi ni ɗee a mee shwal pe wan ɗi, ngulop kì̵ Shetan wurii daampee nwan, mpeku taji wan canjagham ki̶ san fi̶na kas.
47012008	Wan ki̶n ɗang pu Daa yit mo kun, mpeku wuri shang mbii ɗiisi ni baa ki̶ ni aku.
47012009	Amma Daa wuri sat nwan nee, "Ɗiiret fi̶na ni mak wugha. Mpeeɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n ciin ɓal mu gurum, ɗangɓe mon naa gam ki̶ iiko fi̶na." Mpeemi̶ni ɓe wan si̶ghi̶t canjagham ndi̶ghi̶n ciin ɓal fi̶na ni. Mpeku iiko mu Kristi ni tong ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n wan.
47012010	Aasi ɓe wan ki̶n kat retnyit ndi̶ghi̶n sum mu Kristi, mpee ciin ɓal fi̶na ni, ki̶ kàss ɗi moo c`in nwan, ki̶ mbii daampee mo, ki̶ jeel mo, ki̶ luk mo shini-shini, mpee Kristi. Mpeeɗi katɗang ba wan ki̶ ɓal kas, ɓe wuri cínɓal nwan.
47012011	Wan ki̶n lesan ɗee a kaa mwen si, amma ɓe a wun wu le ku wan ɗee a mwen ni. Gyet ni ret ku a wun, wun nkwoop wan, mpeeɗi ba wan a ɗiikat met jir ndi̶ghi̶n jeplop ni mo kas, koo ɗi ba wan a mee mbii kas.
47012012	Naan c`in mbii lukshik ki̶ mbii aapo mo, ki̶ ɗak ɗiinan-nan mo shi wan, kaaɗi wan gung mpee c`in ɗak fi̶na mo shidaar-shidaar. Ɗak mu mbii aapo ɗi mo kám agaak nee, wan a ngulop azeen-nzeen.
47012013	Wan ki̶n c`in a me, kaghar Eki̶lisya ni mo ye? Ɗiiba wan ki̶n c`in mi̶ni nwun kas ye? Aa koo a mpee ɗi ba gyet wan le mee toghon nwun kas aa? Ɓe wu fwo ɗi nwan.
47012014	Yaksi ɓe wan ki̶n ɗak san mpee so pe wun ɗi, ɓe a so ɗiikun pe wun ɗi mmi̶ni. Ba wan le ku wu kwat wan kas, mpeeɗi ba wan ki̶n tang a mee mbii pu wun ɗi kas, amma wan ki̶n tang a wuwun. Mpeeɗi ba a jep mon ntang mbii le mpee puun furu mo kas. Amma puun ni mon ntang mbii le mpee jep furu mo.
47012015	Nin nret nwan nyit zam, mpeku wan cín mbii ɗi wan ki̶ ni jir, ki̶ san fi̶na zak, mpee ɓam wun. Wan wal nwun ɗes, amma ɓe wun wu wal nwan a lee ɗak aa?
47012016	Wu man azeen nee, ba gyet wan lejeel wun kas. Amma mee gurum sat nee gyet wan si̶seen nkaa wun, ki̶ wan lecip mu numpee wun zak.
47012017	Kyet wan ki̶n kyam seen a wun shi numpee mɓut nyem ɗi wan lop mo so pe wun ɗi wa?
47012018	Gyet wan ɗang Titus, ku wuri so pe wun ɗi, ashak ki̶ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ɗiisi. Kyet, gyet Titus wuri lap mee mbii pu wun ɗi wa? Ba a Riin kì̵ Naan ɗiimi̶ndong wuri sel mun weet kas aa? Ba mun weet muu c`in ɗak ni a ar ɗiimi̶ndong kas aa?
47012019	Ashee, puji ɗi ɓe wuu pan ne, mu j`i aa mee mbii langkáa mpee sun funu pe wun ɗi wa? Waash. Muu sat a po mu Kristi ntoghom kì̵ Naan. Shaar fi̶na mo, mbii ɗi muu c`in mo jir, ɓe muu c`in mo a mpee ɓam wun.
47012020	Mpeeɗi wan ki̶i̶r nee, meeɓe, katɗang wan so pe wun ɗi, ɓe wan nkat mi̶se fuu ni ɗik ki̶ mi̶se ɗi ɗyen nwan nkat wun ki̶ ni. Ki̶ zak, wun nnaa mi̶se mi̶na ni ɗik, ki̶ mi̶se ɗi ɗyen wun naa wan ki̶ ni. Meeɓe wan kat ɓi̶lep, ki̶ zughur, ki̶ tughup, ki̶ walnkáa, ki̶ ɗung ki̶ po ndagham-ndagham, ki̶ ɗiyeepkáa, ki̶ ciin tongriyang nnaar fuu.
47012021	Wan ki̶i̶r nee, katɗang wan mbaa nso pe wun ɗi, ɓe ba Naan fi̶na wurin nsham ki̶ wan ntoghom fuu kas. Katɗang Naan sham ki̶ wan ntoghom fuu, ɓe wan nkat putughup ɗiiwuwat, ki̶ gurum mo ɗes ndi̶ghi̶n wun. Nyem ɗi gyet mo ki̶ c`in shikbish yam, ɗangɓe ba mo ki̶ tuwap kas mpee mi̶se ɗiibish, kaa c`in ngaa, ki̶ kyaghar mu c`in mbii ɗiibish mo zak.
47013001	Wan ki̶n so pe wun ɗi, a ɗiikun nɗiisi. Mpeku mo man zeen ki̶ meepo azeen-nzeen, ɓe ni a ting ku mo kat langting mo vul koo kun.
47013002	Wan ki̶n gwak a nyem ɗi gyet mo c`in shikbish yam, ki̶ kaghar ni mo jir zak. Gyet wan ki̶n gwak mo, ɓe ba wan ɗi ashak ki̶ mo kas. Wan gwak wun kaaɗi gyet wan gwak wun ndi̶ghi̶n po fi̶na ɗiivul pe wun ɗi si, nee, katɗang wan mbaaj`i, ɓe wan ncín kar nyem ɗi jí mo c`in shikbish si, ki̶ kaghar ni mo.
47013003	Katɗang ɓe ɗyen nwun ku wu man azeen-nzeen nee, wan ki̶n satpo ɗiisi mo a shi iiko mu Kristi, ba ni ret ku wu man nee Kristi wuri ki̶ iiko ɗes. A wurin nkar wun, ki̶ a wurii kám iiko fi̶ri ndi̶ghi̶n wun.
47013004	Mpeeɗi koo ɗi gyet mo pwas wuri nkaa shiyeep, ɓe gyet a wuri cín shin ni mo pwas nkaa shiyeep ni, ɓe jir ki̶si, ɓe wuri ɗi ki̶ seen shi iiko mu Naan. Mun a nyem ɗi ba mun ki̶ ɓal kas, amma ndi̶ghi̶n iiko mu Naan shi Kristi, ɓe mun ɗi ki̶ seen, mpeku mu ɓam wun ɗi.
47013005	Wu kyamkáa fuu mo, ku wu man ɗi riret nee, kyet wuu mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen fuu ni mo wa? Wu kyamkáa fuu mo riret. Ba wu man nee, Jesu Kristi wurii tong a ndi̶ghi̶n wun kas aa? See koo katɗang wuu taa wu pal ki̶n ndi̶ng-ndi̶ng.
47013006	Muu riɓet ku wu man nee, ba mun mu taa mu kat kas.
47013007	Muu ɗang pu Naan ku taji wu c`in mee mbii ɗiibish kas. Muu ɗang pu Naan, ba a mpeku ni kám ɗi agaak ne, mun ki̶ se koghorong nkaa kyam ni kas, amma see a mpeku wun wu c`in mbii ɗiiret mo ɗi, koo ɗi wu naa kaa mun muu taa mu ki̶kat si.
47013008	Mpeeɗi ba ni mmak c`in ku mu c`in mee mbii nkaa zeen ni kas, amma see muu sat a zeen ni.
47013009	Muu kat retnyit, katɗang ba mun ki̶ ɓal kas, ki̶ wun ɗi ki̶ ɓal. Aduwa ɗi muu c`in ni a mpeku wu ɗee ɗi a ɗiigi̶gam.
47013010	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wan ran wasika ɗiisi so wun ɓe ba wan ɗi ashak ki̶ wun kas, a shiɓal ɗi Naan wuri cín ni nwan mpee ɗik wun, ba ni a mpee shirip wun kas.
47013011	Peekyes ki̶ ni, ɗyemnaa mo, ɗang mukaat. Wu ɗak mi̶se fuu mo. Wu ki̶lingpo fi̶na mo. Wu lappo ki̶ shak, ki̶ wu tongriyang ki̶ shak zak. Naan ɗi wuri a wal, ki̶ riyang, wurin ntong ashak ki̶ wun.
47013012	Wu tok ki̶ shak shi wal riret.
47013013	Nyem kì̵ Naan mo jir, moo tok ki̶ wun.
47013014	Ɗiiret kì̵ Daa Jesu Kristi, ki̶ wal kì̵ Naan, ki̶ shaar ashak ki̶ Riin Ɗiiɓang, mo tong ashak ki̶ wun jir. Amin.
48001001	Wan Pool, laalop kì̵ Jesu Kristi, ɗi ba a gurum mo pet wan, koo le kun ɗee a laalop fi̶ri kas, amma a shi riɓet kì̵ Jesu Kristi, ki̶ Naan puun, ɗi wuri yaghal ki̶ Jesu a peemúut.
48001002	Ɗyemnaa ɗi mo ashak ki̶ wan, moo lop tokshik furu mo so pe nyemso ndang Naan (Eki̶lisya) ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil nGalati.
48001003	Naan puun kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi mo naa wun shi yit mu naajeel, ki̶ mo cín tongriyang nwun zak.
48001004	Jesu Kristi wuri cín shin fi̶ri mpee shikbish funu mo, mpeku wuri ɓam mun ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n ɓit ɗiibish ɗiisi mo, ntiit-ntiit ki̶ riɓet kì̵ Naan puun funu.
48001005	Ɗiiɗes ɗee pe wuri har ngaa-ngaa ki̶ ngaa-ngaa. Amin.
48001006	Ni aapo nwan zam, mpeeɗi wu cighi̶r ku wu kwar ngo ɗi wuri pet wun shi yit naajeel mu Kristi ki̶lak-ki̶lak aasi, mpeku wu so ɗi ndang mee po Naan ɗiici.
48001007	Azeen-nzeen ba mee po ɗiiret waa ɗee ɗi, ɗi ni waa met ɗi wuu ki̶ling pe wan ɗi kas. Amma pak gurum moo daampee nwun, ki̶ mo riɓet cighi̶r ki̶ po ɗiiret mu Kristi ni.
48001008	Amma koo ɗi a mumun, koo ɗi a mee ngulop kì̵ Naan tong a ɗengnaan sham, ɗangɓe wuri sat mee po ɗiiret ɗi nwun, ɗik kì̵ mbii ɗi muu ten mu sat nwun, ɓe gwar mi̶ni ɗee a mbii ɗiibuu-buu har vit.
48001009	Kaaɗi muu ten mu sat si, wan ki̶n baa sat ɗi nee. Katɗang mee ngusatpo ɗiiret ɗi nwun ɗik ki̶ ɗi muu ten mu sat nwun, ɓe wu yit ku gwar mi̶ni ɗee nder kì̵ tughup mu Naan har vit.
48001010	Wu pan nee, wan ki̶n tang a ɗiiɗes pe gurum mo ɗi aa? Aa koo a pe Naan ɗi ye? Koo wu pan nee, wan tang a tong ɗyen ngurum mo ye? Katɗang ɗi wan ki̶n tang a tong ɗyen ngurum mo, ɓe ɗi ba wan a ki̶rom kì̵ Kristi kas.
48001011	Ɗyemnaa mo, ɗyen nwan ku wu man nee, po ɗiiret ɗi gyet wan ki̶n sat ni nwun, ba ni put a pe mee gurum ɗi kas.
48001012	Mpeeɗi, ba gyet wan lap ni a nsar kì̵ mee gurum kas. Ki̶ zak, ba a mee gurum kám ni nwan kas, a Jesu Kristi shikáa fi̶ri, wuri woo ni nwan.
48001013	Wu ki̶lingpo nkaa shiimwaan fi̶na, ɗi gyet yam, ndi̶ghi̶n seyil nNaan mu nyem Yahudi mo, mɓít mi̶ni, ɓe wan cínjeel Eki̶lisya kì̵ Naan mo hakyeng, har gyet wan ki̶n gung mpeku wan tu ni ɗi.
48001014	Gyet ndi̶ghi̶n gang fi̶na mo, ɓe wan met mmo jir, mpee mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n waar kì̵ nyem Yahudi mo. Gyet wan c`in zughur mpee mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n waar mu puun fi̶na ɗi moo ten murap mo.
48001015	Amma Naan ɗi wuri ten bi̶lip wan yam-yam, akuɗang moo làa wan, ɓe ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiret fi̶ri, ɓe wuri pet wan mpeku wan ɗee ɗi a mu wuri.
48001016	Ɓe ni ret nNaan wuri nyit har wuri kám Làa fi̶ri nwan, mpeku wan sat po ɗiiret ɗi nkaa wuri, nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas. Ba gyet wan ɓeet mi̶ni ki̶ mee gurum kas.
48001017	Ki̶ zak, ba gyet wan kàa nJerusalem, pe jeplop kì̵ Jesu Kristi mo ɗi kas, ɗi gyet wuri shee pi̶rep mo baa ɗang wurii pet wan. Amma wan so yil Arebiya, aɓwoon mi̶ni ɓe wan waa baaso nDamaskus.
48001018	Aɓwoon kì̵ ɓit mo kun, ɓe wan kàa nJerusalem, mpeku wan naa Kefas ɗi. Wan tong ashak ki̶ wuri mpee teer mo kaghapaat baapaat.
48001019	Ba gyet wan waa kaat ki̶ memee ndi̶ghi̶n jeplop kì̵ Jesu mo kas. Gyet wan kaat aa Jemis ɗyemni̶ghi̶n kì̵ Daa, ɓejee ɗak.
48001020	Ntoghom kì̵ Naan, ɓe mbii ɗi wan ran nwun, ba mo a ɗung kas.
48001021	Aɓwoon mi̶ni, ɓe wan so nkoghop nyil nSiriya ki̶ Silisiya.
48001022	Ba gyet nyemso ndang Kristi ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n Yahudi ni mo man wan kas.
48001023	Moo ki̶ling a gurum mo nkaa sat ni nee, "Gwar ɗi jí wurii cínjeel mmun si, yaksi ɓe wuri nkaa satpo ngurum mo nkaa cínzeen ɗi gyet wurii gung mpee tu ni."
48001024	Mo kwoop Naan mpee wan.
48002001	Aɓwoon ki̶ ɓit mo kaghapaat baafeer, ɓe wan baakàa nJerusalem, ashak ki̶ Barnabas. Gyet wan mang Titus mpan ɗiki̶.
48002002	Wan kàa nJerusalem ni, a mpeeɗi Naan wuri woo nwan ne, wan kàa ɗi. Gyet ntiit ki̶ mi̶ni, ɓe wan kaat ki̶ nyem ɗiinan-nan ni mo a si̶sok, mpeku wan sat ɗi mmo, po nkaa po ɗiiret ɗi wan nkaa sat ni nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas. Mpeku taji, ɗak ɗi gyet wan c`in ni ki̶ ɗi wan nkaa c`in ni yaghal ɗee a buu kas.
48002003	Amma Titus, ɗi wuri ashak ki̶ wan, koo ɗi wuri a ngu Heleni, ɓe ba gyet mo leting nwuri, ku mo can wuri ɗi kas.
48002004	Amma pak nyemso ndang Kristi ɗi mu ɗung si mo, mo tap j`i ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n mun, kaa nyemcoghol mo si, mpeku mo tap goghol mun, ku mo katpee ɗi mɓut mmun, ɗi mun ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi Jesu, mpeku mo le mu ɗee ɗi a ki̶rom furu mo.
48002005	Ba gyet mu cínpee mmo kas koo diɓen, mpeku mu tap ɗii zeen mu po ɗiiret ni ɗi mpee wun.
48002006	Amma mpee nyem ɗi mo lekáa furu mo a kaa mee mbii si, koo ɗi mo a we mo ye, ɓe ba ni daampee nwan kas. Ba Naan wurii shwatyit mmee gurum kas. Nyem ɗi wan ki̶n sat ni mmo, koo ɗi gyet mo a nyem ɗiinan-nan mo, amma ɓe jir ki̶si, ɓe ba gyet mo le mee mbii ɗik nkaa po fi̶na ni kas.
48002007	Kaaɗi mo naa nee, Naan wuri cín ɗak mu satpo ɗiiret ni nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas nsar fi̶na, kaaɗi wuri cín ɗak mu satpo ɗiiret ni mPita mpee nyem Yahudi mo si.
48002008	Ɓe mo naa nee, Naan ɗi wuri cínɓal mPita, mpeku wuri ɗee ɗi a ngusatpo ɗiiret ni nyem Yahudi mo, a wuri cínɓal nwan zak, mpekun ɗee ɗi a ngusatpo ɗiiret ni nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas.
48002009	Kaaɗi mo naa ɗiiret ɗi Naan wuri cín nwan, ɓe Kefas, ki̶ Pita, ki̶ Joon, ɗi gyet mo a nyemnan-nan mu nyemso ndang Naan ni mo, Eki̶lisya ni, mo cín sarse furu ɗii mu shaarshak nwan, ki̶ Barnabas. Mo sat nee, mun mu so mu satpo Naan ni nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas, ku wuɗun, so ɗi pee nyem Yahudi mo.
48002010	Mo sat mmun nee, taji mu mander nyemjeel ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n mo kas, a mbii ɗi gyet wan ki̶n fes le putughup fi̶na mpee c`in ni mmi̶ni.
48002011	Amma kaaɗi Pita gyet kàa nAntiyok, ɓe wan selsar wuri nyit, mpeeɗi mbii ɗi gyet wuri c`in ni ba ni nkaa ar kas.
48002012	Akuɗang pak gurum mo tong pe Jemis j`i ɗi, ɓe wurii sese ashak ki̶ nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas, amma kaaɗi das ɗiisi ni mo j`i wul, ɓe wuri kwar sese ashak ki̶ nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas, mpeeɗi wurii ki̶i̶r nyem Yahudi mo.
48002013	Ashak ki̶ wuri, ɓe kaghar nyem Yahudi ɗi mo a nyemso ndang Jesu mo, ba mo ɗar nkaa zeen kas, kaa wuri si, har ki̶ Barnabas zak, wurin mɓwoon ki̶ mo ndi̶ghi̶n mwaan furu ki̶ putughup ɗiivul-vul ni.
48002014	Amma kaaɗi wan naa nee, ba moo ɗar a ndi̶re-ndi̶re nkaa zeen mu po ɗiiret ni kas, ɓe wan sat mPita, nnaar furu nee, "Katɗang wugha ɗi wugha a ngu Yahudi aa tong a kaa ngo ɗi ba wuri a ngu Yahudi kas, ɓe cirang ɗangɓe wughan nle ting nyem ɗi baa mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas, ku mo tong kaa nyem Yahudi mo si ye?"
48002015	Mun shikáa funu, mo làa mun a nyem Yahudi mo, ba a nyem shikbish kaa kaghar gurum mo si kas.
48002016	Amma mu man nee, ba gurum ki̶ ɗee a ɗiiɓang nyit kì̵ Naan, a shi ɗak ɗi wuri c`in ni ndi̶ghi̶n Waar mo kas, amma gurum kì̵ ɗee a ɗiiɓang, a mpee cínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi. Har mun, mu cínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi, mpeku wu ɗee ɗi a ɗiiɓang shi cínzeen nKristi, ba a shi mee ɗak ɗi muu c`in ni ndi̶ghi̶n Waar ni kas. Mpeeɗi, shi ɗak ɗi gurum c`in ni ndi̶ghi̶n Waar ni, ɓe ba gurum nkyam ɗee a ɗiiɓang nyit kì̵ Naan kas.
48002017	Amma muu gung ku mu ɗee ɗi a ɗiiɓang ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi. Katɗang mo waa kat a mumun a nyemshikbish mo, ɓe ni kám nee, Kristi wuri a mee ngulop mu shikbish shing? Waash ba aasi kas koo ɗiɓen!
48002018	Amma katɗang wan ki̶n ɗik, a nkaa mbii ɗi wan ki̶n ten nshirip mo, ɓe wan ki̶n kám káa fi̶na agaak nee, wan a ngushikbish.
48002019	Wan ki̶n ɗee a ɗiimumuut ndi̶ghi̶n Waar ni, mpeku wan tong ɗiiseen pe Naan ɗi.
48002020	Mo pwas wan ashak ki̶ Kristi. Ba a wan ki̶n tong ndi̶ghi̶n seen ɗiisi kas, amma a Kristi wurii tong ndi̶ghi̶n wan. Ki̶ seen ɗi wan ki̶ ni yaksi ndi̶ghi̶n nan ɗiisi, wan ki̶n tong a shi cínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n làa kì̵ Naan, ɗi wuri wal nwan, har wuri c`in shin fi̶ri mpee wan.
48002021	Ba wan kwar ɗiiret kì̵ Naan kas, mpeeɗi katɗang gurum ki̶ ɗee a ɗiiɓang nyit kì̵ Naan, a shi Waar mo, ɓe muut ɗi Kristi wuri muut ni, ni ɗee a buu mi̶ni ki̶ ba nii mee koghop ni kas.
48003001	Kai! Wun nyem Galati mo, wu mwen zam. A soghot ɗiiɗang kì̵ se ɓut nwun ye? A yit fuu mo, ɓe mo sat nwun agaak kaaɗi mo pwas Kristi.
48003002	Wu ɗar a kun c`in mee tal ɗi pe wun. Gyet wu lap Riin ni a mpee ɗak ɗi wu c`in ni ndi̶ghi̶n Waar ni aa koo a mpeeɗi gyet wu cínzeen ye?
48003003	Wun wu mwen aasi wa? Gyet wu shee wu yaa a ndi̶ghi̶n Riin, amma yaksi, ɓe wuu riɓet kyes ni a ndi̶ghi̶n nan fuu mo aa?
48003004	Ashee wu shwaajeel ki̶ mbii mo shini-shini a buu mmi̶ni aa? Taji wu yit ku ni ɗee a ɗiibuu kas.
48003005	Wuri ɗi wuri cín Riin fi̶ri nwun, ki̶ wurii c`in mbii aapo mo ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ɓe wu pan nee, a mpeeɗi wuu tap ki̶ Waar ni mo aa koo a mpeeɗi wu ki̶ling, ki̶ wu cínzeen mpo ɗiiret ni ye?
48003006	Wu c`in pan nkaa Abraham, kaaɗi po kì̵ Naan ni sat si nee, "Wuri cínzeen nNaan har mo tang mi̶ni nwuri a kaa ngo ɗin ndi̶re si."
48003007	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe yaksi, wu naa a nyemcínzeen mo a jep kì̵ Abraham ni mo.
48003008	Ndi̶ghi̶n po kì̵ Naan, ɓe muu ten mu naa nee; Naan wuri le nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas, ku mo ɗee a ɗiiɓang nyit fi̶ri a mpee cínzeen. Mo satpo ɗiiret ɗiisi ni mɓít kì̵ Abraham nee, "A ndi̶ghi̶n wugha ɓe gurum mo jir, ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni mon nkat ɗiiret."
48003009	Ni aasi ɓe, nyem ɗi mo cínzeen, mon nkat ɗiiret ashak ki̶ Abraham, mpeeɗi gyet wuri kì̵ cínzeen.
48003010	Nyem ɗi moo le putughup furu mo, a nkaa ɗak mu Waar ni, ɓe mo a nder kì̵ tughup kì̵ Naan. Mo ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee, "Koo a weye ɗi ba wuri gam Waar ɗi mo ran mo ndi̶ghi̶n takarda mu Waar ni kas, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a nder kì̵ tughup kì̵ Naan."
48003011	Yaksi, ni ɗee agaak nee, ba mee gurum mak ɗee a ɗiiɓang nyit kì̵ Naan shi Waar mo kas. Mpeeɗi koo a weye, ɗi wuri ɗee a ɗin ndi̶re a mpee cínzeen fi̶ri, ɓe a wuri kat seen.
48003012	Amma ba Waar ni ɗar a nkaa cínzeen kas. "Koo a weye ɗi wurin ngam Waar ni mo, ɓe gwar mi̶nin nkat seen a shi mo."
48003013	Mun jir, mon ntokɗiyeel ɗiibish mun, mpeeɗi ba mu gam Waar ni mo jir kas, amma Kristi, wuri can mu ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiyeel ɗiibish ni. A mpee mun, ɓe wuri shwaajeel funu mo, har wuri mang ɗiyeel ɗiibish ni le nkaa shin. Ni a riran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee: "Koo a weye, ɗi mo pwas wuri nkaa ting, ɓe wuri a nder tughup kì̵ Naan."
48003014	Mpeku ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi Jesu, ɓe ɗiiret mu Abraham ni ɗee nkaa nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas. Ki̶ zak, mpeku mumun mu lap Riin ɗi Naan wurii ten tuwoor ni ne, wuɗin ncín mmun mpee cínzeen funu mo.
48003015	Ɗyemnaa mo, wan nc`in kám ki̶ mbii ɗi muu ten mu loghot ki̶ mo ndi̶ghi̶n tong funu mo shidaar-shidaar. Katɗang gurum mo vul moo ten ɓwaghatpo ashak nkaa mee mbii, ɓe nin nluk ku mee gurum ɗik teppo ɗi mo kì̵ ten ɓwaghat ni, ki̶ zak, ba mee gurum mak le mee mbii ɗiki̶ nkaa ni kas, mpeeɗi mo kì̵ ten ɓwaghat ni.
48003016	Ni aasi, Naan wuri kì̵ ten tuwoorpo mo Abraham yam-yam ki̶ dang fi̶ri. Ba mo ran a nee ki̶ dang fi̶ri mo kas. Katɗang ɗi mo sat ne, a dang fi̶ri mo, ɓe ɗi ni kám ne, dang ni mo a ɗes, amma mo ran a nkaa dang fi̶ri mi̶ndong ɓejee. Dang fi̶ri ɗiimi̶ndong ɗiisi ni a Kristi.
48003017	Mbii ɗi wan nkaa sat ni a nee, gyet yam-yam, ɓe Naan wuri kì̵ ten ɓi̶lemcuk shi toghom. Amma see aɓwoon kì̵ ɓit mo ɗarifeer ki̶ laarkun, akuɗang Naan wurii cín Waar ni nyem Yahudi mo. Waar ɗi Naan wuri cín ɗiisi ni, ba ni mak teppo ɗi gyet wuri kì̵ ten tuwoor ni kas, ki̶ zak, ba Waar ni mo mak watpo ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten tuwoor mo kas.
48003018	Katɗang ɗi Naan wurii cín zughum fi̶ri ngurum mo a mpeeɗi moo tap Waar ni, ɓe ɗi ba gurum mo kat zughum fi̶ri ni a mpee po ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten tuwoor ni kas. Amma mu man nee, a mpeeɗi gyet Naan kì̵ ten tuwoor ni, ɗangɓe wuri cín zughum ni Abraham.
48003019	To, a mee koghop ki̶ Waar ni ye? Naan wuri cín Waar ni mo, a mpeku mu man mbii ɗiibish mo ɗi. Gyet Naan wuri cín Waar ni mo mun, a mpeku mo fwang mun ɗi, mpee reppee lee, har parɗi pee ni wul, mpeku dang kì̵ Abraham ni j`i ɗi. Mpeeɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten tuwoorpo mi̶ni a nwuri. Naan wuri cín Waar ni a nyemlop fi̶ri mo, mpeku mo sham cín ɗi nsar kì̵ mee gurum ɗi gyet wuri a nguar naar kì̵ Naan ki̶ gurum mo.
48003020	Katɗang nguar ɗi mɓut mee mbii, ɓe ni kám mun nee wuri ɗar a naar kì̵ gurum mo vul. Amma ndi̶ghi̶n po ɗi gyet Naan tuwoor ni Abraham, ɓe gyet a Naan wuri mi̶shin ɓejee, ɗi gyet wuri tuwoorpo ni.
48003021	Kyet ɗiisi ni kám mmun nee, Waar ni a nkaa kaghan ki̶ po ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten tuwoor ni wa? Ba ni aasi kas koo diɓen. Katɗang gyet mee Waar ni ɗi, ɗi gyet nin mmak c`in seen ngurum mo, ɓe gyet ni mak le gurum mo ɗee a ɗin ndi̶re nyit kì̵ Naan. Amma ba mee kiyeet kì̵ Waar mi̶ni ɗi kas.
48003022	Amma kaaɗi mo ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si nee, mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni jir, mo a nder ki̶ shikbish. A nyem ɗi mo cínzeen Jesu Kristi, mo lap mbii ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten tuwoor ni nee, wuɗin c`in nyem ɗi mo cínzeen Kristi ɓejee.
48003023	Gyet akuɗang cínzeen ni j`i, ɓe mun a ɗii shishaghat nder kì̵ Waar ni, baaɗang Naan wuri wang ar ni mun, ku mu cínzeen ɗi nJesu Kristi.
48003024	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe gyet Waar ni a ngukám funu, akuɗang Jesu Kristi wurii j`i. Kaaɗi wuri j`i ɓe mu ɗee a ɗin ndi̶re nyit kì̵ Naan, mpeeɗi muu cínzeen nwuri.
48003025	Amma yaksi, kaaɗi Naan kì̵ wang ar ni mun, mpeku mu cínzeen ɗi Jesu Kristi, ɓe ba mu kuɗi a nder kì̵ ngufwang mun kas.
48003026	Mpeeɗi yaksi, ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi, ɓe wun a jep kì̵ Naan mo jir.
48003027	Wun ɗi moo c`in baptisma nwun jir ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi, ɓe wuu ɗee a ɗiibi̶ɓal ki̶ Kristi mmi̶ni. Mpeemi̶ni mu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n ɗyen mu Kristi.
48003028	Yaksi, ba mee shwatyit kuɗi nnaar ki̶ nyem Yahudi mo ki̶ nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas, koo naar ki̶ ki̶rom ki̶ jeplu mo kas, koo nnaar ki̶ mish mo ki̶ mat mo kas, mpeeɗi wun a ɗiimi̶ndong jir ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi.
48003029	Katɗang wun a mu Kristi, ɓe wun a jep kì̵ Abraham mo. Wuu lap mbii mo jir, ɗi gyet Naan wuri kì̵ ten tuwoor ni.
48004001	Mbii ɗi wan nkaa sat ni a nee, làa ɗi wurin nsekop, ba wuri met ki̶rom kas, naar ɗi wuri kuɗi a làa, koo ɗi a wurin nyaghal ɗyel long ni mo.
48004002	Kaaɗi wuri kuɗi a làa, ɓe a gurum moo tap ki̶ wuri zak. A gurum moo naa mbii fi̶ri mo, har parpuus ɗi puun fi̶ri le ni wul.
48004003	Ni ki̶ mumun aasi zak. Gyet yam, naar ɗi gyet ba mu manshii kì̵ zeen ki̶ mbii mo kas, ɓe gyet mun a ki̶rom mon nder kì̵ Waar kì̵ mbii ɗi gurum mo loghot ki̶ c`in mo, ɗi mu yil ɗiisi mo.
48004004	Amma kaaɗi pee ni wul kyap, ɓe Naan wuri lop Làa fi̶ri sham ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi. Mo làa wuri a kaaɗi moo ki̶ làa gurum mo si, nder kì̵ Waar.
48004005	Mpeku wuri ang nyem ɗi mon nder kì̵ Waar ni ɗi, ki̶ mpeku wuri le mun ɗee ɗi a jep kì̵ Naan mo.
48004006	Mpeeɗi wun a jep fi̶ri mo. Yaksi, ɓe Naan wuri lop Riin kì̵ Làa fi̶ri sham ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu mo. Riin ni wurii petpee shiɓal nee, Daa puun!
48004007	Yaksi, ɓe ndi̶ghi̶n Naan, ba wu kuɗi a ki̶rom mo kas, amma wun a jeplu mo. Katɗang wu ɗee a jeplu mo, ɓe wunn nsekop kì̵ mbii ɗi Naan wurin nc`in ni jep fi̶ri mo.
48004008	Gyet yam, ɓe baa wu man Naan kas, ɓe gyet wun a ki̶rom mo nder kì̵ riin ɗi ba mo a naan kas.
48004009	Amma yaksi kaaɗi wu man Naan si, koo kaaɗi Naan kì̵ man wun si, ɓe cirang ɗang wu cighi̶r ki̶ ɓwoon nNaan, ku wu waa wu baa wu so ɗi ndang Waar kì̵ mbii ɗi gurum mo loghot kì̵ c`in ni. Mu riin ɗii mu yil ɗiisi mo, ɗi ba moo mee ɓal kas ye? Ɗyen nwun ku wu baa wu ɗee ɗi a ki̶rom ki̶ mo zak aa?
48004010	Wuu tap kì̵ teer mo, ki̶ puus seriɓet mo, ki̶ tar mo, ki̶ pak teer mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɓit ni.
48004011	Amma wu cín ki̶i̶rmuut nwan, taji ɗak ɗi gyet wan c`in pe wun, ni yaghal ɗee a ɗiibuu.
48004012	Ɗyemnaa mo, wan ki̶n ɗang pe wun, ku wu ɗee kaa wan si. Kaaɗi wan ki̶n ɗee kaa wun si. Ba wu c`in mee mbii ɗiibish nwan kas.
48004013	Wu man nee, gyet a wan shee j`i ki̶ po ɗiiret ni nwun. Mbii ɗi gyet ni le ɗang wan tong pe wun ɗi, a mpeeɗi ba gyet wan nkagham kas.
48004014	Koo ɗi gyet shwal ni daampee nwan, ɓe ba gyet wu kwar wan kas, ki̶ zak, ba gyet wu ɓak wan kas. Amma gyet wu lap wan shi putughup mi̶ndong kaa gyet wuu lap a mee ngulop kì̵ Naan si. Azeen-nzeen gyet wu lap wan a kaa Kristi Jesu shikáa fi̶ri si.
48004015	To, retnyit ɗi gyet wu c`in ashak ki̶ wan si, ni a neye? Mpeeɗi wan sat nwun azeen, katɗang ɗi a mbii ɗi nin mmak c`in, ɓe ɗi gyet wun shwat yit fuu mo wu c`in nwan.
48004016	Cirang ɗangɓe wan ncighi̶r nɗee a shaarlek fuu ye? Mpeeɗi wan sat zeen ni nwun aa?
48004017	Nyem ɗi mo nkaa c`in ɗung nwun si mo, moo gung a mpeku mo kat ɗiiret ɗi nyit fuu, amma mbii ɗi ni le ɗang mo riɓet c`in ki̶si ni, ba ni ret kas. Mo riɓet a ku wu ɓàkshak ɗi ki̶ wan, mpeku wu ki̶ling a mo ɗi ɓejee.
48004018	Katɗang gurum mo tap ki̶ shak a mpee mbii ɗiiret, ɓe ni ret zam. Ɗiisi ni azeen-nzeen, koo a pi̶rang ye. Koo ɗi wan ashak ki̶ wun, koo ɗi ba wan ashak ki̶ wun kas, ɓe wan ki̶n pan wun.
48004019	Jep fi̶na ɗi wan wal nwun si mo, wan a kaa mat ɗi wura nkaa shwaajeel mpee làa-làa si. Wan nsat a nshwaajeel ni ɗak, har parɗi mi̶se fuu mo ɗee ntiit-ntiit ki̶ mu Kristi.
48004020	Ɗyen nwan nso pe wun ɗi zam, mpeku wan man ar ɗi wan nsat mbii ɗiisi mo ɗi nwun. Yaksi, ba wan man mbii ɗi wan nsat nwun kas. Mbii nii daampee nwan nkaa wun zam.
48004021	Wun nyem ɗi wu sat nee, wun a nder kì̵ Waar ni mo. Wu sat nwan yaksi, wu ki̶ling mbii ɗi Waar ɗiisi ni mo nkaa sat ni aa?
48004022	Mo ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee "Gyet Abraham ki̶ jep ɗiimish mo vul. Gyet ni̶ghi̶n kì̵ memee wura a ki̶rom, ki̶ gyet ni̶ghi̶n kì̵ ɗiivul ni, ba wura a ki̶rom kas."
48004023	Mo làa-làa kì̵ mat ɗi gyet wura a ki̶rom si, ndi̶ghi̶n nan, amma làa kì̵ mat ɗi gyet ba wura a ki̶rom kas si, mo làa wuri a ntiit-ntiit ki̶ po ɗi gyet Naan wurii ten tuwoor ni Abraham.
48004024	Po ɗiisi nii mee mbiikám ɗiijurung ɗi ɓut. Mat ɗiivul ɗiisi ni mo, mo ɗee a kaa tuwoorpo shi toghom mo vul shi, ɗi gyet Naan wuri sat ni mo. Hagar a mat ɗi gyet wura a ki̶rom si, wura ɗee a sumpo kì̵ po ɗi gyet Naan wurii tuwoor ni mMosis nkaa jwak Sinai. A wura ɗi wura làa-làa mo ɓe mo ɗee a ki̶rom mo.
48004025	Hagar wura ɗee a sumpo kì̵ jwak Sinai ɗi ni nyil Arebiya. Wura ɗee a kaa Jerusalem si, ɗi wura ki̶ jep fi̶ra mo, mo ɗi nkaa c`in ɗak ki̶rom har cicinsi.
48004026	Amma Jerusalem ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ba wura a ki̶rom kas, wura a ni̶ghi̶n funu.
48004027	Mo ki̶ ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee: "Wii jeer, yi c`in retnyit. Wii ɗi ba yii kyam shwaajeel mu làa-làa kas mpeeɗi mat ɗi mish ceen wura, wura kat jep mo ɗes met mat ɗi wura tong ashak ki̶ mish fi̶ra."
48004028	Yaksi, ɗyemnaa, mumun a jep ɗi mo ki̶ tuwoorpo nkaa wun kaa Aizik si.
48004029	Gyet yam ni, ɓe làa ɗi gyet mo làa wuri a ndi̶ghi̶n nan si, wuri cínjeel nlàa ɗi gyet mo làa wuri a ndi̶ghi̶n Riin. Ni aasi yaksi.
48004030	Amma, mbii ɗi mo ran ni ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan ni sat a meye? Ni sat nee, "A ceen ki̶rom ni wura ki̶ làa fi̶ra ni, mpeeɗi ba làa kì̵ ki̶rom nin mmak sekop ashak ki̶ laalu ni kas."
48004031	Ɗyemnaa mo, ba mumun a ki̶rom mo kas, amma mun a jeplu mo.
48005001	Mbii ɗi ni le, ɗangɓe Kristi wuri pwat ki̶ mun nder kì̵ Waar kì̵ nyem Yahudi ni mo, a mpeku mu ɗee ɗi a mu nangkáa sun azeen-nzeen. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wan ki̶n sat nwun nee, wu ɗar ɓal-ɓal kaa nyem ɗi mo a mu nangkáa sut si. Taji wu baa wu c`in káa fuu mmee ngo, mpeku wu baa wu ɗee ɗi a ki̶rom mmo kas.
48005002	Wan Pool, wan nkaa sat ni wun nee, katɗang wu yit mmee gurum can wun, ɓe ni ɗee agaak nee, mbii ɗi Kristi ki̶ c`in mpee wun, ɓe ni ɗee a buu mi̶ni.
48005003	Wan ki̶n riɓet ku koo a weye man azeen-nzeen nee, katɗang mee gurum waa riɓet ku mo can wuri, ɓe ni ɗee a ting ku wuri gam kaghar waar ni mo jir.
48005004	Wun nyem ɗi wuu pan nee, wuu ɗee a ɗin ndi̶re nyit kì̵ Naan, mpeeɗi wuu tap ki̶ waar ni mo, ɓe wu pwat ki̶ káa fuu mo aku ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi. Wuu ɗee a ɗiipi̶pal ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiret ɗi Kristi kì̵ ten c`in mo mpee wun.
48005005	Amma mun nyem ɗi ba muu leyit a nkaa can kas, ɓe ndi̶ghi̶n Riin shi cínzeen ɓe, muu tong a shi gongpee shi canciin mu ɗin ndi̶re mu Naan.
48005006	Katɗang mu ɗee a ɗiimi̶ndong ki̶ Kristi Jesu, ɓe ba ni kuɗi mee koghop ni kas, koo ɗi mo can gurum, ki̶ koo ɗi ba mo can gurum kas, amma mbii ɗi nii koghop ni a cínzeen ɗi nii kám sat ndi̶ghi̶n wal.
48005007	Jí yam, ɓe wun nkaa sekiyeen ndi̶ghi̶n po ɗiiret ni hakyeng, amma yaksi, ɓe a me le ɗang ba wu kuɗi wuu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n zeen ni kas ye?
48005008	Ba a Naan ɗi wuri pi̶rep wun, a wurii cíi sekiyeen nwun kas.
48005009	"A rep yist lee nii le ku bred wup."
48005010	Amma mpeeɗi mun a ɗiimi̶ndong ndi̶ghi̶n Daa funu, ɓe wan cínzeen nee, ba pan fuu mo waa ɗen ɗik, ki̶ mi̶na kas. Wan cínzeen nee, ngo ɗi wurii num wun si, koo ɗi wuri a weye, ɓe Naan nc`in kar nwuri.
48005011	Amma ɗyemnaa mo, katɗang wan ki̶n sat a nsatpo nee, can ni a ting, ɓe a me le ɗang wan ki̶n sat a nshwaajeel ɗak ye? Katɗang ni aasi, ɓe mo shang mbii ɗi ni le canshii ngurum mo ndi̶ghi̶n shiyeepyoghom kì̵ Kristi.
48005012	Nyem ɗi mo daampee nookɗi nwun si, wan fes nriɓet ku mo so pun sut ku mo ɗee ɗi a miyeermuut mo.
48005013	Ɗyemnaa mo, Naan wuri pi̶rep wun, mpeku taji wu ɗee a ki̶rom mo nder kì̵ waar mu nyem Yahudi mo kas, amma, taji wu le ku katpee fuu ni, ni ɗee a ar ɗi wun nc`in mbii ɗiibish mu nan mo ɗi kas. Amma ni ret ku wu walnshak ki̶ ɓamshak zak.
48005014	Mo gam waar ni mo jir a ndi̶ghi̶n po ɗiisi nee, "A wal ngi̶nang kaa sak fugha si."
48005015	Katɗang wu nɗee a kaa luwayil ɗi moo seshak si, ɓe wu tap taji wu twa shak kyes ki̶n ndi̶ng-ndi̶ng.
48005016	Wan ki̶n sat nwun nee, wu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n Riin, mpeku taji wu gam ɗyen mu nan ni kas.
48005017	Mpeeɗi mbii ɗi nan nii riɓet, ɓe ba mo a ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi Riin nii riɓet kas. Ki̶ zak, mbii ɗi Riin nii riɓet ɓe ba mo a ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi nan nii riɓet kas. Mbii ɗiivul si mo ba moo riɓet shak kas. Ɗiisi ni ɗee nee, ba wu mak c`in mbii ɗi wuu riɓet kas.
48005018	Amma katɗang wuu mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n Riin kì̵ Naan, ɓe ba wu kuɗi a nder kì̵ Waar ni kas.
48005019	Ɗak ɗi gurum moo c`in ndi̶ghi̶n mi̶se kì̵ gurum, ni agaak. Kiyeet kì̵ ɗak mi̶ni mo, a kaa cín ngaa, ɗak ɗiibish mo, c`in mbii ɗiibish nɗin yitluwaan.
48005020	Seyil nk`um, ɗak soghot, kwarshak, jighi̶r, zughur, tughup, riɓetkáa, ɓákshak, mi̶se ɗi ni a mu yilangpee.
48005021	Zughur ɗiibish, shwaayughur, kuur ashak ɗiibish mo, ki̶ mbii ɗiibish mo ɗi shini-shini. Wan ki̶n satpo nwun shiɓal, kaaɗi gyet wan ki̶n sat nwun si nee; nyem ɗi moo c`in mbii ɗiisi mo jir, ɓe ba mon nkyam ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n mulki kì̵ Naan kas, koo diɓen.
48005022	Amma ɗak ɗi gurum moo c`in ndi̶ghi̶n Riin kì̵ Naan mo a, walnshak, ki̶ retnyit, tongriyang, gung mbii mo, naajeel nshak, c`in mbii ɗiiret mo, cínzeen,
48005023	sham ki̶ káa, yaasuk. Mbii ɗiisi mo jir, ba mee Waar ɗi nkaa mo kas.
48005024	Nyem ɗi mo a mu Kristi Jesu, mo kì̵ ten pwas nan furu mo nkaa shiyeep ashak ki̶ kyaghar kì̵ ni.
48005025	Katɗang muu tong a ndi̶ghi̶n Riin, ɓe ni ret ku mu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n Riin ni zak.
48005026	Taji mu ɗiyeepkáa kas, ki̶ taji mu le tughup nshak kas. Taji mu c`in zughur ki̶ shak kas zak.
48006001	Ɗyemnaa mo, katɗang mee gurum taapal, ɓe wun ɗi wun ɗi ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n Riin kì̵ Naan wu ɓam wuri, mpeku wuri tuwap ɗi. Wu sham ki̶ káa fuu mo, kaaɗi wun nkaa ɓam wuri. Wu tap ki̶ káa fuu, mpeku taji wun wu waa wu ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n jwaan ni kas.
48006002	Wu ɓamshak, katɗang wu c`in aasi, ɓe wu gam Waar kì̵ Kristi mmi̶ni.
48006003	Katɗang memee fuu lekáa fi̶ri a mee mbii, amma ndi̶ghi̶n zeen ni, ɓe ba wuri a mee mbii kas ɓe, gwar mi̶ni num a kaa fi̶ri ɓejee ɗak.
48006004	Amma ni ret ku, koo a weye ɓe wuri kyam ɗak fi̶ri, ɗangɓe wurin ncanjagham shikáa fi̶ri, ba shak ki̶ ɗi wuri kám shin ki̶ mee gurum kas.
48006005	Koo a weye ndi̶ghi̶n mun ɓe wuri mang toghon ki̶ mbii ɗi wurii c`in mo shikáa fi̶ri.
48006006	Koo weye ɗi wuri nkaa lap kámpo kì̵ Naan, ɓe ni ret ku wuri ɓàk mbii ɗiiret mo jir, ashak ki̶ ngukám ni.
48006007	Taji mee gurum numkáa fi̶ri kas, mpeeɗi ba mee ngo nkyam num nNaan kas. Mbii ɗi gurum kop ɓe wurin nɗiip a ni.
48006008	Ngo ɗi wuri kop a ndi̶ghi̶n nan fi̶ri, ɓe wurin nɗiip a mbii ɗiiwam ndi̶ghi̶n nan ni. Amma ngo ɗi wuri kop ndi̶ghi̶n Riin kì̵ Naan, ɓe ndi̶ghi̶n Riin ɓe wurin nɗiip a seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa.
