48006009	Taji kwak funu mo waam mpee c`in mbii ɗiiret mo kas, mpeeɗi katɗang pee ni wul, ɓe mun nɗiip ɗiiret mu ɗak funu mo, kat ba mu taa mu muutleet kas.
48006010	Aasi, ni ret ku mu c`in mbii ɗiiret mo, kaaɗi mu katpee ni si. Mu c`in mbii ɗiiret ngurum mo jir, met jir, a ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu mo, ɗi mo a nyemso ndang Kristi mo.
48006011	Ran ɗiinan-nan ɗi wu naa si mo, a wan ran mo shi sar fi̶na so nwun.
48006012	A nyem ɗi mo riɓet canjagham ndi̶ghi̶n nan ɗiisi, a moo riɓet leting nwun, mpeku wu can-can ɗi, ki̶ zak, mpeku taji mo shwaajeel, mpee shiyeepyoghom kì̵ Kristi kas.
48006013	Nyem ɗi moo ten can mo, mo shikáa furu, ba mo tap ki̶ waar ni kas. Amma ni a riɓet ki̶ mo, ku mo can wun, mpeku mo katpee ɗi mpee canjagham nkaa wun ndi̶ghi̶n nan.
48006014	Amma pe wan ɗi ɓe a shi shiyeepyoghom kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi, a ni a mbii mi̶ndong ɗi nin mak le ku wan canjagham ɓejee ɗak. A mpee shiyeepmúut fi̶ri, ɓe mbii ɗi mu yil ɗiisi mo, ba mo kuɗii mee koghop ni pe wan ɗi kas. Ni ɗee a kaa moo ten pwas mo nkaa shiyeepmúut ki̶ Kristi, ki̶ zak, wan a kaa ngo ɗi ki̶n ten muut si, har wan ki̶n yit mbii mu yil ɗiisi mo mɓwoon.
48006015	Koo ɗi mo can gurum, ki̶ koo ɗi ba mo can gurum kas, ɓe ba nii mee koghop ni kas. Mbii ɗi nii koghop ni hakyeng nin nɗiisi, Naan wuri cín seen ɗiipoo mun.
48006016	Mpee nyem ɗi mo mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n seen ɗiipoo ɗiisi ni, ɓe mo a nyem kì̵ Naan mo azeen. Moo tongriyang kì̵ Naan ki̶ wurii naa mo shi yit naajeel zak.
48006017	Yaghal nyaksi, ɓe ba ɗyen nwan ku mee gurum daampee nwan zak kas, mpeeɗi mi̶mer ɗi mo nkaa san fi̶na, mo kám nee, wan a ki̶rom mu Jesu.
48006018	Ɗyemnaa mo, ɗiiret mu Daa funu Jesu Kristi ni tong ashak ki̶ riin fuu mo jir. Amin.
49001001	Pool laalop kì̵ Kristi shi riɓet kì̵ Naan, so pe nyem kì̵ Naan ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil Afisus, ɗi mo cínzeen nJesu Kristi azeen-nzeen.
49001002	Ɗiiret ki̶ riyang mu Naan puun funu ki̶ Daa funu Jesu Kristi mo tong ashak ki̶ wun.
49001003	Mu pi̶lang Naan puun, ki̶ Daa funu Jesu Kristi, ɗi wuri le ɗiiret fi̶ri nkaa mun, shi koo a ɗiiret ɗiiɗang ye ɗi ni a mu Riin ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan mo, shi Kristi.
49001004	Akuɗang Naan wurii leyil ni, ɓe wuri kì̵ ten bi̶lip mun, mpeku mu ɗee a mi̶ri ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi, mpeku mu ɗee ɗi a ɗiiɓang ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n wal mpeeɗi ba mee shikbish ɗi ntoghom fi̶ri kas.
49001005	Naan kì̵ ten sat nee, ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi, ɓe ɗin nle ku mu ɗee a jep fi̶ri mo. Ɗiisi ni put a ndi̶ghi̶n pan mu retnyit fi̶ri.
49001006	Wu yit ku mu kwoop wuri mpee ɗiiɗes mu yit naajeel fi̶ri, ɗi wuri c`in mmun nzughum ndi̶ghi̶n Làa fi̶ri ɗi wuri wal nwuri.
49001007	Mpeeɗi a shi muut kì̵ Kristi ɗangɓe mo fwoon mun, shii kì̵ mi̶ni nee, mo fwo shikbish funu mo mmun. Yit naajeel kì̵ Naan ni ɗes zam.
49001008	Wuri ɗoo ni nkaa mun ɗes, ki̶ seen ki̶ manshii kì̵ mbii mo jir.
49001009	Yaksi Naan wuri le ku mu man mbii ɗi mo a si̶sok mu pan fi̶ri mo, ntiit-ntiit ki̶ pan fi̶ri ɗi wuri kì̵ ten le ni, ku ni ɗee a ɗiigi̶gam ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi.
49001010	Mbii ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten sat ne, wuɗin nc`in mo katɗang pee ni wul. Ɓe Naan wurin nj`i ki̶ mbii ɗi wuri kì̵ ten le mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi ashak, ki̶ ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan ki̶ ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi jir, ɓe Kristi wurin nɗee a káa kì̵ mo jir.
49001011	Mon c`in mbii mo jir a ntiit-ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten sat ne wuɗin c`in mo. Naan wuri ten bi̶lip mun, ku mu ɗee a nyem fi̶ri mo ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi ntiit-ntiit ki̶ pan fi̶ri. Mbii mo ɗes aasi, ntiit-ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi wuri kì̵ ten sat ne wuɗin c`in mo pugyet ɗin nshee.
49001012	Mun ɗi mu shee canciin nkaa Kristi, wu yit ku mu kwoop Naan mpee ɗiiɗes fi̶ri.
49001013	A wuwun zak, wu ɗee a nyem kì̵ Naan mo kaaɗi wu ki̶lingpo ɗi azeen ni. Po ɗiiret ɗi ni j`i ɓam wun, kaaɗi wu cínzeen nKristi si, ɓe Naan wuri ki̶ le stam fi̶ri nkaa wun, ku wu ɗee ɗi a mi̶ri. Kaaɗi wuri cín Riin Ɗiiɓang ni nwun ntiit-ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi wuri kì̵ ten sat si.
49001014	Riin Ɗiiɓang ɗi Naan wuri cín ni mun, wuri ɗee a mbii ɗin shee ɗi ni kám mun nee, muu lap mbii ɗi Naan ten sat nee wuɗin c`in nyem fi̶ri mo. Ɗiisi ni kám mun nee, Naan wurii cínpee nyem ɗi mo a mi̶ri mo, mpeku mu kwoop Ɗiihai fi̶ri ɗi.
49001015	Mpee mbii ɗiisi, ɓe yaghal mparpuus ɗi wan ki̶ling po nkaa cínzeen fuu ni ndi̶ghi̶n Daa Jesu, ki̶ wal fuu ni mpee nyem kì̵ Naan mo jir,
49001016	ɓe ba wan ki̶n nook pi̶lang Naan mpee wun kas. Wan ki̶n pan wun ndi̶ghi̶n aduwa fi̶na mo.
49001017	Wan ki̶n ɗang pu Naan ki̶ Daa funu Jesu Kristi, puun ɗiihai shidaar-shidaar nee. Ɗi wurin ncín Riin wun, ki̶ wuri le kuwu ɗee a nyemseen mo, ki̶ mu woo man kì̵ Naan nwun riret hakyeng.
49001018	Ku yit kì̵ putughup fuu mo wang ɗi, mpeku wu man mbii ɗi wuu canciin ɗiki̶ ɗi wuri kì̵ ten pi̶rep wun mpee ni, ki̶ kop ɗi wurin ncín nyem fi̶ri.
49001019	Ba mee ngo mmak kám ɗiiɗes fi̶ri, ɗi ni nkaa c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n mun kas, mun nyem ɗi mu cínzeen nwuri. Iiko ɗi ni nkaa c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n mun, ni ntiit-ntiit ki̶ ɗiiɗes mu ɓal fi̶ri.
49001020	Ɗi gyet wuri c`in ɗak ki̶ni, mpeku wuri yaghal ɗii Kristi a peemúut, ki̶ Naan wuri le ku Kristi kàa tong nsarse fi̶ri ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan mo.
49001021	Kristi wuri met ɓal kì̵ mishkagham mo jir, ki̶ iiko, ki̶ ɓal, ki̶ ɗes mu mulki mo jir. Sum fi̶ri ni met kaghar sum mo jir. Ba a ndi̶ghi̶n ɓit ɗiiyaksi ɓejee ɗak kas, amma ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n ɓit ɗi mon ndung j`i akiyeen.
49001022	Naan wuri kì̵ ten le mbii mo jir ndershii fi̶ri, ki̶ zak wuri le wuri ɗee a káa ki̶ mbii mo jir mpee Eki̶lisya ni.
49001023	Kuur ki̶ nyemso ndang wuri mo, a shin fi̶ri, ɗi mo gam ki̶ wuri shikáa fi̶ri, ɗi wuri gam mbii mo jir, koo a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiɗang ye.
49002001	Gyet yam ɓe, wun a ɗiimumurap ndi̶ghi̶n riin mpee cíishik mu shikbish fuu mo.
49002002	Gyet ntiit ki̶ mi̶ni, ɓe wuu mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n kyaghar ɗiibish mu yil ɗiisi, ki̶ wuu ki̶ling a ɗoo mu mishkagham mu ɓal kì̵ riin ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n kut mo, riin ɗi nii se mishkagham nkaa nyem ɗi mo kwar c`in ɗyen kì̵ Naan.
49002003	Gyet muu tong a kaa mo si, ndi̶ghi̶n kyaghar mu nan funu mo. Ki̶ gyet muu c`in mbii ɗi mu naa mo shang nnan funu mo, ki̶ pan mu putughup funu mo zak. Har ndi̶ghi̶n tong funu, kaa kaghar gurum mo si, ɓe jí muu ten mu ɗee a ɗi munn nshwaajeel mpee tughup kì̵ Naan.
49002004	Amma mpeeɗi kussuk kì̵ Naan ki̶ wal fi̶ri ni ɗes zam,
49002005	ɓe koo ɗi gyet mun a ɗiimumurap ndi̶ghi̶n shikbish funu mo, ɓe wuri le ku mu kat seen ashak ki̶ Kristi. Ni a mpee yit naajeel kì̵ Naan, ɗangɓe mu kat ɓam.
49002006	Naan wurin nle ku mu yaghal ashak ki̶ Kristi, ki̶ wurin nle ku mu tong ashak ki̶ wuri ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan mo mpee sum kì̵ Kristi Jesu.
49002007	Ndi̶ghi̶n ɓit ɗi mon ndung j`i, ɓe wuri nkám mmun ɗes kì̵ ɗiiɗes fi̶ri ɗi ba mee gurum mak kám ni kas. Ɗiisi ni a yit naajeel fi̶ri ɗiiɗes mpee mun ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi Jesu.
49002008	A mpee yit naajeel kì̵ Naan, ɗangɓe wu kat ɓam, mpeeɗi wu cínzeen. Ba wu kat ɓam ɗiisi ni a mpee mee ɗak ɗiiret ɗi wu c`in kas, ni a zughum mu Naan.
49002009	Ba ni a mpee mee ɗak kas. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe taji mee gurum ɗiyeepkáa fi̶ri kas.
49002010	A Naan wuri le mun shi sar fi̶ri, kaaɗi mun ɗi si, amma yaksi ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi, ɓe wuri le mun a mpee c`in ɗak ɗiiret mo, ɗi wuri kì̵ ten ɗak ni le mpee mun, mpeku mu c`in mo ɗi.
49002011	Taji wu mander kas, nee, gyet yam ɓe wun a nyem ɗi ba mo làa wun a nyem Yahudi mo kas. Ɓe gyet nyem Yahudi ɗi jí mo lesut a nyem ɗi mo can mo ndi̶ghi̶n nan shi sar kì̵ gurum mo, moo pet wun a nyem ɗin nsuluk mo.
49002012	Taji wu mander kas nee, gyet mɓít mi̶ni mo, ɓe ba wu kus ki̶ Kristi kas, ki̶ ba gyet wu man Naan kas. Gyet mo shwat wun ndi̶ghi̶n jep mu nyem Yahudi mo, ki̶ gyet wun a mi̶zep mo. Mpeeɗi Naan kì̵ ten ɓi̶lemcuk shi toghom, ki̶ ba gyet wun ki̶ mee mbii canciin ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni kas.
49002013	Amma, yaksi ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi Jesu, ɓe wun ɗi gyet wu jong, mo kì̵ j`i ki̶ wun kus, shi toghom kì̵ Kristi.
49002014	A Kristi j`i ki̶ tongriyang mmun, har wuri le ku nyem Yahudi mo ɗee a ɗiimi̶ndong ki̶ nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas. Wuri shirip kok ɗi gyet nii ɓàk mun, mpeku mu ɗee ɗi a shaarshak.
49002015	Wuri mang Waar kì̵ nyem Yahudi mo baa ki̶ni aku, mpeku wuri waa le gurum ɗiipoo mo ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n dang ɗiivul si mo. Ɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiisi, ɓe wurii j`i ki̶ tongriyang.
49002016	A shi muut fi̶ri nkaa shiyeepyoghom, ɓe wuri tu mbii ɗi nii j`i ki̶ kwarshak ngurum mo. A shi shiyeepmúut fi̶ri, ɓe wuri ɓàl dang mo shini-shini, ku mo ɗee a ɗiimi̶ndong ndi̶ghi̶n Naan.
49002017	Jesu wuri j`i satpo, mu riyang nwun. Wun nyem ɗi gyet wu jong ki̶ Naan, ki̶ zak, wuri j`i ki̶ po ni nyem ɗi gyet mo kus ki̶ Naan zak.
49002018	A ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi ɓe mun gurum jir, mu mak j`i ndi̶ghi̶n Riin ɗiimi̶ndong pu puun funu ɗi.
49002019	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe yaksi, wun nyem ɗi ba wun a nyem Yahudi mo kas, ba wu kuɗi a mi̶zep mo kas. Yaksi wun a ɗiimi̶ndong ki̶ jepyil mu nyem kì̵ Naan mo, ki̶ wuu ɗee a jeplu kì̵ Naan mo zak.
49002020	Mo ɗik wun a nkaa kuk ɗi jeplop kì̵ Jesu mo, ki̶ nyem satpo kì̵ Naan mo kì̵ ten ɗik ni. Jesu Kristi wuri shikáa fi̶ri, a nhi̶k ɗiiɗes mu kwang kì̵ lu ni.
49002021	A ndi̶ghi̶n wuri, ɓe jir kaghar lu nii ki̶kkàa nkaa wuri, ki̶ a wurii le ku lu ni wurang, ku ni ɗee a lu ɗiiɓang mu Daa.
49002022	A ndi̶ghi̶n wuri, ɓe mo ɗik wun, ku wu ɗee a peeɗi Naan wurii tong ɗi, shi Riin fi̶ri.
49003001	A mpee ɗiisi, ɓe wan Pool, wan a shishaghat mpee Kristi Jesu, mpee wun nyem ɗi ba wun a nyem Yahudi mo kas.
49003002	Azeen-nzeen wu man nee, ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiret kì̵ Naan, ɓe wuri cín ɗak ɗiisi ni nwan, mpeku wan c`in ni ɗi mpee wun.
49003003	Naan wuri woo mbii ɗiisi̶sok mo nwan ɗi wuri kì̵ ten sat nee wuɗin nc`in nwan. Wan ki̶n ran po nwun lee nkaa ni.
49003004	Katɗang wu tang mbii ɗi wan ki̶n ran ni, ɓe wun mmanshii kì̵ man fi̶na, nkaa mbii ɗiisi̶sok mu Kristi.
49003005	Gyet yam, ɓe ba mo woo mbii ɗiisi̶sok ni mo ngurum mo kas, amma yaksi ɓe Naan wuri kì̵ woo ni agaak pee jeplop kì̵ Jesu Kristi mo, ki̶ nyemsatpo Naan ɗiiɓang mo, shi Riin fi̶ri ɗiiɓang.
49003006	Mbii ɗiisi̶sok ni a nee, nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas, yaksi ndi̶ghi̶n po ɗiiret ni, ɓe mo kat ɗiiret mu Naan ashak ki̶ nyem Yahudi ni mo. Ki̶ zak yaksi, ɓe nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas, mo ɗee a mbii ɗiimi̶ndong. Mo mak sekop ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten tuwoor ni, ɗi wuri gam ni ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi.
49003007	A mpee po ɗiiret ɗiisi, ɓe Naan wuri le ku wan ɗee a nguc`in ɗak fi̶ri, ntiit ki̶ zughum ɗiiret mu yit naajeel fi̶ri ɗi wuri kì̵ cín ni nwan, ɗi ni nkaa c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n ɓal fi̶ri.
49003008	Koo ɗi wan a ɗiitaakat met jir ndi̶ghi̶n nyem kì̵ Naan mo, amma Naan wuri cín ɗak ɗiisi ni nwan, ɗi ni a satpo ɗiiret ni pee nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas. Po nkaa long kì̵ Kristi ɗi ba ni ki̶ peekyes kas.
49003009	Ki̶ zak, mpeku wan le ku gurum mo manshii kì̵ mbii ɗiisi̶sok mu Naan, ɗi Naan ɗi wuri le mbii mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni jir, ɓe wuri kì̵ ten sok mbii ɗiisi ni mpee ɓit mo ɗes.
49003010	Pan fi̶ri ɗiisi ni, yaksi ndi̶ghi̶n nyemso ndang wuri mo, ɓe ɗiiɗes mu seen fi̶ri ni ɗee agaak ndi̶ghi̶n ar mo shini-shini, pe nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo ki̶ iiko ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan mo.
49003011	Ntiit-ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten sat ne, wuɗin nc`in ni so ngaa-ngaa, ɗi wuri gam ni ndi̶ghi̶n ɓàlkáa funu ashak kì̵ Kristi Jesu Daa funu.
49003012	Ki̶ cínzeen funu ndi̶ghi̶n wuri, ɓe mu kat ɓal mputughup, ku mu so ɗi ntoghom kì̵ Naan, ba a shi ki̶i̶rmuut kas.
49003013	Wan ki̶n ɗang pu wun, taji kwak fuu mo murap kas, mpeeɗi wan nkaa shwaajeel mpee wun. Shwaajeel fi̶na ni ki̶ koghop ni pe wun jir.
49003014	A mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wan ki̶n kurum ntoghom kì̵ puun.
49003015	A mpee wuri, ɓe koo a weye ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan ki̶ ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi moo kat sum.
49003016	Wan ki̶n ɗang pu Naan ndi̶ghi̶n long fi̶ri ɗiiɗes, mpeku wuri cín iiko ɗi nwun ndi̶ghi̶n Riin fi̶ri. Mpeku wu kat ɓal ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo.
49003017	Mpeku Kristi wuri tong ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo, mpeeɗi wu cínzeen nwuri. Wu shamseen, ki̶ wu ɗar nkaa kuk ɗi ni a wal.
49003018	Mpeku wun, ashak ki̶ nyem kì̵ Naan mo, ɓe wu man kaam, ki̶ shwal, ki̶ wurang, ki̶ jurung mu wal kì̵ Kristi ɗi.
49003019	Ki̶ zak, mpeku wu man wal kì̵ Kristi ɗi ni met kaghar man mo jir, ki̶ mpeku wu gam ɗi ki̶ man Naan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo.
49003020	Yaksi, pe wuri, ɗi wuri ki̶ iiko ɗi ni c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n mun, met mbii ɗi mu mak ɗang mo, koo pan mo ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu.
49003021	Ɗiiɗes ni ɗee a mu Naan ndi̶ghi̶n nyemso ndang wuri mo, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi Jesu mpee pee mo jir, yaghal nyaksi ki̶, har ngaa-ngaa. Amin.
49004001	Wan ɗi wan a shishaghat mpee sum kì̵ Daa. Wan ki̶n ɗang pu wun, mpeku wu mwaan-mwaan ɗi mo lapshak ki̶ petpee ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ pi̶rep wun mpee ni.
49004002	Wu sham ki̶ káa fuu mo. Wu c`in mbii mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗyen, ki̶ wu gung zak. Wu kám wal fuu mo agaak, ki̶ wu fwangshak zak.
49004003	Wu gung, ku wu tap ɗi ki̶ ɓàlkáa ɗi Riin wuri cín ni nwun, shi tongriyang ɗi ni ɓàl wun ashak.
49004004	Shin ni a mi̶ndong, ki̶ Riin ni mi̶ndong ɓejee. Kaaɗi mo ki̶ pi̶rep wun, ndi̶ghi̶n canciin mi̶ndong nkaa mbii ɗi mo ki̶ pet wun mpee ni.
49004005	Daa a mi̶ndong, cínzeen ni a mi̶ndong, baptisma ni a mi̶ndong.
49004006	Naan a mi̶ndong, ɗi wuri a puun funu jir. Wuri met mbii mo jir, ki̶ a wurii c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n mun jir, ki̶ a wuri ndi̶ghi̶n mun jir zak.
49004007	Amma koo a weye ndi̶ghi̶n mun, ɓe wuri kì̵ lap ɗiiret ntiit-ntiit kì̵ zughum kì̵ Kristi.
49004008	Kaaɗi mo kì̵ ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda ki̶ Naan si nee: "Kaaɗi Kristi wuri kàa aɗeng, ɓe wuri pan ki̶rom ɗiiyiyak mo ɗes ashak ki̶ wuri, ki̶ wuri cín zughum ngurum mo zak."
49004009	Yaksi, ɓe nee, "wurii kàa a ɗeng", ɓe shii kì̵ mi̶ni a meye? Shii ki̶ mi̶ni nee, nshee ɓe wuri sham ndi̶ghi̶n jurung kì̵ peekyes kì̵ yil ɗiisi.
49004010	Mpeemi̶ni, gwar ɗi gyet wuri sham, a wuri a gwar ɗi wuri kàa a ɗeng-ɗeng a kiyeen ki̶ ɗengnaan mo, mpeku wuri gam mbii mo ɗi jir.
49004011	A wuri c`in zughum ngurum mpeku pak mo ɗee ɗi, a jeplop mo, ki̶ pak mo ɗee a nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan mo, ki̶ pak mo ɗee ɗi a nyembishara Naan mo, ki̶ pak mo ɗee ɗi a Pasto mo, ki̶ pak mo ɗee ɗi a nyemkám mo zak.
49004012	Wuri cín zughum ɗiisi mo, a mpeku ni ɗak nyem kì̵ Naan mo ɗi, mpee ɓamshak, ki̶ mpeku mo ɗik shin kì̵ Kristi ɗi.
49004013	Ni aasi, ɓe mun jir, mu yaghal mu ɗee a ɗiimi̶ndong ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen funu, ki̶ man funu ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n Làa kì̵ Naan. Mun nyaghal mu ɗee a nyemɗiiseen mo, har ku mu wul mpee gam kì̵ ɗiiɗes mu Kristi.
49004014	Ɓe ba mu kuɗi a jep ɗiiɗween mo kas mmi̶ni, ɗi mon nnum mun so si, har ki̶ mo mang mun pán, shi koo a kiyeet kì̵ kám ɗiiɗang ye kas. Mo a nyemseen mo ɗi mo a koghorong mpee c`in ɗung.
49004015	Amma ni ret ku mu sat zeen ni ndi̶ghi̶n wal. Ni ret ku mu wurang ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir, ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi ɗi wuri a káa funu.
49004016	A mpee wuri, ɗangɓe koo a ɓeep ɗiiɗang ye, mo shini-shini, mo tap ɓàl ashak, ki̶ koo a peeɓal ɗiiɗang ye, nii kat ɓal a ndi̶ghi̶n wuri. Katɗang koo a ɓeep ɗiiɗang ye ni ki̶ c`in ɗak fi̶ra riret, ɓe shin nin nwurang, ki̶ ni ɗik sat kàa ndi̶ghi̶n wal zak.
49004017	Ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Daa, ɓe wan ki̶n satpo wun shiɓal nee, taji wu sat a ntong kaa nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas si, ɗi pan furu mo a ɗiibuu.
49004018	Pan ɗin ndi̶ghi̶n putughup furu mo, ni a mu peenkoo, ba mo ki̶ mee li̶ɓet ndi̶ghi̶n seen ɗi Naan cín kas, mpeeɗi ba mo ki̶ mee man kas, ki̶ mo ɗee a nyemciishik mo.
49004019	Ba mo kuɗii nashoop kì̵ mee mbii kas. Mo fes cínkáa furu mo mpee c`in mbii ɗiibish mo, ki̶ moo kyaghar mpee c`in koo a mbii ɗiibish ɗiiɗang ye. Ba moo mee yaasut kas.
49004020	Amma ba a mbii ɗi wun wu kám pe Kristi ɗi mmi̶ni kas!
49004021	Mo sat nee, wuu ten wu ki̶lingpo nkaa wuri, ki̶ mo kám nwun a ndi̶ghi̶n wuri, kaaɗi zeen ni ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu si.
49004022	Wu shwat suk fuu ɗiisi̶ghi̶r ni mo wu baa ki̶ mo aku, ɗi jí moo num wun ndi̶ghi̶n kyaghar mu nan.
49004023	Ni a ting ku putughup fuu mo ki̶ pan fuu mo ɗee a ɗiipoo.
49004024	Ki̶ zak, ni a ting ku wu jwal suk fuu ɗiipoo ni mo, ɗi Naan wuri ɗak mi̶ni kaa shin fi̶ri si, ki̶ni woo káa ki̶ni agaak ndi̶ghi̶n seen ɗi ni azeen-nzeen ɗi ni a ɗiiret ki̶ ɗiiɓang.
49004025	Mpeemi̶ni, wu baa ki̶ ɗung ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ki̶ koo weye ɓe wuri sat a zeen ngi̶ni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri ɓejee ɗak. Mpeeɗi mun a ɗiimi̶ndong ki̶ shak.
49004026	Katɗang wu langtughup, ɓe taji wu c`in shikbish kas. Taji puus shamru, ɓe wun ɗi nkaa langtughup kas.
49004027	Taji wu cínpee nShetan kas.
49004028	Ngo ɗi jí wurii c`in wat, ɓe taji wuri baa c`in ɗi kas, amma ni ret ku wuri c`in ɗak ɗiiret shi sar fi̶ri, mpeku wuri mak cín mee mbii ɗi nyem ɗi mo mɓut njeel mo.
49004029	Taji po ɗiibish mo put ndi̶ghi̶n po fuu mo kas, amma see a mbii ɗiiret mo, ɗi mon nɗik wun, kaaɗi ni tap ret ki̶ pee ni si. Mpeku ni j`i ɗi ki̶ ɗiiret nyem ɗi moo ki̶ling ni.
49004030	Taji wu wat putughup nRiin Ɗiiɓang mu Naan kas, wuri ɗi a wuri ɗee a langting nee, wuu ɗee a ɗii fufwang mpee parpuus ɗi mon mɓam wun.
49004031	Wu pwat ki̶ po ɗiiɗeet mo, ki̶ tughup ki̶ ɓutbish, ki̶ fuluppee ashak ki̶ c`in nyang mo jir.
49004032	Amma ni ret ku wu naajeel ki̶ shak, kì̵ wu fwo ɗin nshak, kaaɗi Naan wuri fwo ɗi nwun ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi si.
49005001	Kaaɗi wun a jep kì̵ Naan mo si, ɓe ni a ting ku wu kám shiimwaan kì̵ Naan.
49005002	Ki̶ zak, wu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n wal, kaaɗi Kristi wuri wal mmun si, har wuri c`in shin fi̶ri mpee mun kaa zughum kì̵ mbiizughum ɗi ni ɗu shang-shang nyit kì̵ Naan si.
49005003	Amma, taji po nkaa ngaa, ki̶ mbii ɗiibish mo, ki̶ riɓet mbii mo pwat ndi̶ghi̶n po fuu mo kas. Mpeeɗi po nkaa kiyeet kì̵ mi̶ni mo, ba ni ret ku mo pwat mpo kì̵ nyem kì̵ Naan mo kas.
49005004	Taji mee po ɗiibish mu le nashoop koo po mu mwen mo, koo po ɗiibuu mo, mo pwat ndi̶ghi̶n po fuu mo kas, amma wu yit ku a pi̶lang put mpo fuu mo.
49005005	Taji wu mander nee, nyem ɗi moo c`in ngaa, ki̶ nyem ɗi pan furu mo a ɗiibish, koo a nguzughur, ɓe ba kiyeet kì̵ nyem mi̶ni moo mee li̶ɓet mu sekop ndi̶ghi̶n mulki kì̵ Kristi ki̶ mu Naan kas.
49005006	Taji wu yit ku mee gurum num wun shi po ɗiibuu mo kas, mpeeɗi a mpee mbii mo kaa ɗiisi mo si, ɓe tughup kì̵ Naan nii taa nkaa nyemcíi ki̶lingpee mo.
49005007	Mpeemi̶ni, taji wu ɓàlkáa fuu ashak ki̶ mo kas.
49005008	Gyet yam, ɓe wun a ndi̶ghi̶n peenkoo, amma yaksi wun a ndi̶ghi̶n peeɓang, ndi̶ghi̶n Daa. Ni ret ku wu mwaan kaa nyem ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n peeɓang ni si.
49005009	Ɗak kì̵ nyem ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n peeɓang, ni a ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiiret mo, ki̶ ɗin ndi̶re mo, ki̶ zeen zak.
49005010	Wu gung, ku wu kám mbii ɗi mon nret nNaan nyit.
49005011	Taji wu lesar fuu mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗak ɗi mo a mu peenkoo, ɗi ba mo ki̶ koghop ni kas, amma ni ret ku wu woo ɗak mi̶ni mo agaak.
49005012	Ni a mbii nashoop mpee satpo nkaa mbii ɗi moo c`in mo a si̶sok.
49005013	Amma katɗang koo a meye ɗi ni agaak, a peeɗi peeɓang ɗi, ɓe ni ɗee a ɗi gurum mo mak naa ni. Mpeeɗi jir mbii ɗi gurum mo mak naa ni, ɓe ni a ndi̶ghi̶n peeɓang.
49005014	Ni a kaaɗi mo ki̶ ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda ki̶ Naan si nee: "Ngusaam, a mii, a yaghal a peemúut! Mpeku Kristi wuri cín peeɓang ɗi nwugha"
49005015	Wu tap ki̶ shiimwaan fuu mo. Taji wu mwaan kaa mwen mo si kas, amma wu mwaan kaa nyemɗiiseen mo si.
49005016	Wu c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n koo a pee ɗiiɗang ye, mpeeɗi teer ɗiiyaksi ni mo, moo gam ki̶ mbii ɗiibish mo.
49005017	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe taji wu ɗee a mwen mo kas, amma wu manshii kì̵ mbii ɗi Daa wuri riɓet ku wu c`in.
49005018	Taji wu shwaa am anab har ni yughur wun kas, mpeeɗi mi̶nii mak jwaan wun, amma wu ɗee a ɗiigi̶gam shi Riin Ɗiiɓang.
49005019	Wu katpo ki̶ shak shi kook ɗii mu kwoop mo, ki̶ kook ɗi mo a mu Riin. Wu c`in kook ɗiiret mo nNaan, kì̵ pi̶lang ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo.
49005020	Koo pi̶rang ye ɓe wu pi̶lang Naan puun mpee mbii mo jir ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi.
49005021	Wu sham ki̶ kaa fuu mo nder kì̵ shak, mpeku wu cín ɗiiɗes ɗin nKristi.
49005022	Mat mo, wu sham ki̶ káa fuu mo nder kì̵ mish fuu mo, kaaɗi wuu c`in nDaa si.
49005023	Mpeeɗi mish wuri a káa kì̵ mat, kaaɗi Kristi wuri a káa kì̵ Eki̶lisya si, shii kì̵ mi̶ni a shin fi̶ri, ki̶ wuri shikáa fi̶ri wuri a Nguɓam fi̶ra zak.
49005024	Kaaɗi Eki̶lisya wuran nder kì̵ Kristi, ni aasi zak, wun mat mo, wu sham ki̶ káa fuu mo nder kì̵ mish fuu mo ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir.
49005025	Mish mo, wu wal mmat fuu mo, kaaɗi Kristi wuri wal Eki̶lisya ni si, har wuri cín shin fi̶ri mpee wura.
49005026	Mpeku wuri le wura ɗee ɗi a ɗiiɓang shi vwang wura ki̶ am, ki̶ shi po kì̵ Naan.
49005027	Mpeku wuri ɗak Eki̶lisya ni le ɗi nshin, ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiɗes, ki̶ ɗiimen, ba ashak ki̶ mee rap, koo mee pee taakat mɓut mo kas. Mpeku mo ɗee ɗi a ɗiiɓang ba ki̶ mee rap kas.
49005028	Ni ret ku mish mo wal mmat furu mo kaa sut furu si. Ngo ɗi wuri wal mmat fi̶ri, ɓe wuri wal a nshin fi̶ri mmi̶ni.
49005029	Ba mee gurum kì̵ kyam kwar shin fi̶ri kas, amma wurii tap cín mbiise nni, ki̶ wuri tap ki̶ni riret, kaaɗi Kristi wurii c`in Eki̶lisya si
49005030	Mpeeɗi mun a ɓeep mu shin fi̶ri.
49005031	A mpeemi̶ni, ɓe gurum wurin nyit puun fi̶ri ki̶ ni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ku wuri ɓàlkáa ɗi ashak ki̶ mat fi̶ri, ku mo vul mo ɗee ɗi a ɗiimi̶ndong.
49005032	Ɗiisi ni a mee mbii ɗiiɗes ɗiisi̶sok. Mbii ɗi wan ki̶n sat ni, a nkaa Kristi ki̶ Eki̶lisya.
49005033	Koo ɗi arang ye, ɓe wu yit koo weye wuri wal mmat fi̶ri, kaa shin fi̶ri si, ki̶ mat wura cín ɗiiɗes mmish fi̶ra zak.
49006001	Jep mo, wu lappo kì̵ puun fuu mo ndi̶ghi̶n Daa, mpeeɗi mi̶ni a mbii ɗin ndi̶re.
49006002	"A cín ɗiiɗes mpuun fugha a ki̶ ni̶ghi̶n fugha mo," ɗiisi ni a Waar ɗin nshee ɗi mo kì̵ ten le,
49006003	"mpeku a tong ɗi riyang, ki̶ mpeku a kat teer mo ɗi ɗes ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni."
49006004	Puun mo, taji wu le ku putughup kì̵ jep fuu mo wat, har ni le ku mo c`in tughup kas, amma wu kiyeer mo, ki̶ wu kar mo ndi̶ghi̶n kám ɗi mo a mu Daa Naan.
49006005	Ki̶rom mo, wu lappo kì̵ nyem ɗi moo ɗyel wun nsar furu mo. Ki̶n sat a puun fuu ɗi mo a mu yil ɗiisi ni. Wu lappo furu mo ndi̶ghi̶n ki̶i̶r ki̶ ɗaar shi putughup mi̶ndong, kaaɗi wuu c`in nKristi si.
49006006	Taji wu c`in ɗak a yit kì̵ gurum mo ɓejee, ku mo kwoop wun ɗi kas, amma wu c`in ɗak kaa ki̶rom mu Kristi mo si. Wu c`in ɗyen kì̵ Naan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo.
49006007	Wu c`in ɗak shi putughup ɗiiret, mpeeɗi wuu c`in a nDaa Naan, ba a mmee gurum kas.
49006008	Taji wu mander kas nee, ɗak ɗiiret ɗi gurum ki̶ c`in mo, ɓe wurin nwaa lap a kwat kì̵ ni pe Daa ɗi, koo ɗi wuri a ki̶rom, koo ɗi wuri a laalu.
49006009	Wun nyem ɗi wun ki̶ ki̶rom mo wu c`in mbii ɗiiret mmo zak. Taji wu wuk mo kas, mpeeɗi wu man nee, Daa furu ki̶ muu, wuri a ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ba wurii shwatyit kas.
49006010	Peekyes ni, wu ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n Daa ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n iiko mu ɗiiɗes fi̶ri.
49006011	Wu jwal leelek ɗi Naan wuri cín mo nwun jir, mpeku wu mak ɗar ɗi ɓal-ɓal nkaa Shetan ki̶ numpee fi̶ri.
49006012	Mpeeɗi ba muu c`in lek ni a nkaa gurum mo, ɗi moo nan ki̶ toghom kas, amma ni a nkaa mulki, ki̶ nyem iiko ɗi mo a mu Shetan mo, ki̶ nkaa mulki ki̶ nyem peenkoo ɗin ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan mo.
49006013	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wu jwal leelek ɗi Naan wuri ncín wun, mpeku wu ɗar ɗi ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n teer ɗiibish mo. Mpeku taji Shetan wuri se koghorong nkaa wun kas.
49006014	Wu ɗar ɓal-ɓal shi ɗak suk, ki̶ ɓwaghat ɓwoon fuu mo shi zeen, ki̶ c`in mbii ɗin ndi̶re mo, kaa kawung ɗi nii fwang tughur ngurum si.
49006015	Wu jwal kwaghazak nshii fuu mo, mpee satpo ɗiiret, ɗi nii j`i ki̶ tongriyang.
49006016	Koo pi̶rang ye, ɓe wu mang kawung ɗi ni a cínzeen ashak ki̶ wun, mpee fwang pas mu wus ɗi gwar ɗiibish ni wurin mpwas j`i nkaa wun.
49006017	Wu mang ɓam ɗi Naan wuri c`in nwun, kaa mbiikáa shaghal ɗi nyemlek moo lop mpeku ni fwang káa ɗi mmo si. Ki̶ wu ɗyel po kì̵ Naan ni, kaa kwai ɗii Riin Ɗiiɓang wuri cín nwun si.
49006018	Wu c`in aduwa, ki̶ ɗang mpee mbii ɗiisi mo shidaar-shidaar ndi̶ghi̶n Riin. Wu tong shi gongpee, ki̶ zak, wu gung ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir. Wu c`in aduwa mpee nyem kì̵ Naan mo jir.
49006019	Wu c`in aduwa mpee wan zak, mpeku Naan wuri c`in mbii ɗi wan nsat mo ɗi, ki̶ mpeku wan sat mbii ɗiisi̶sok mu po ɗiiret ni mo, ɗi shiɓal ba a shi ki̶i̶rmuut kas.
49006020	A mpee po ɗiiret ni, ɗang mo lop wan mpeku wan sat ni ɗi. Ɓe wan a shishaghat shi ti̶sek mu shaghal yaksi. Koo ɗi wan a shishaghat, ɓe wu c`in aduwa nNaan, mpeku wuri cínɓal ɗi nwan, kun satpo ɗiiret ni ɗi shiɓal, kaaɗi ni ret kun c`in si.
49006021	Tikikus ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ɗi muu wal nwuri, ɗi wuri a ki̶rom kì̵ Daa azeen-nzeen, wurin nsat mbii mo nwun jir, nkaa ɗak ɗi wan nkaa c`in ni.
49006022	Wan ki̶n ten nlop wuri so pe wun ɗi, a mpeku wuri satpo ɗi nwun nkaa wan, ki̶ mpeku wu man tong funu ɗi, ku ni ɓam putughup fuu mo ɗi zak.
49006023	Naan puun, ki̶ Daa funu Jesu Kristi mo cín tongriyang, ki̶ wal, ki̶ cínzeen nɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu mo jir.
49006024	Ɗiiret kì̵ Naan ni ɗee ashak ki̶ nyem ɗi mo wal nDaa funu Jesu Kristi, shi wal ɗi ba nii peekyes kas har ngaa-ngaa.
50001001	Wasika ɗiisi ni put a nsar kì̵ Pool ki̶ Timoti ki̶rom kì̵ Daa Jesu Kristi mo, so pe nyem kì̵ Naan mo ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil nFilipi ɗi mo ɓàlkáa furu mo ashak ki̶ Kristi, har ki̶ nyem ɗiinan-nan mu Eki̶lisya, ki̶ nyemɓam mo, ki̶ Bishop mo, ki̶ Diikon mo.
50001002	Naan puun funu ki̶ Daa funu Jesu Kristi, mo cín ɗiiret ki̶ tongriyang nwun.
50001003	Wan ki̶n pi̶lang Naan koo a pi̶rang ye, katɗang wan pan wun,
50001004	ndi̶ghi̶n aduwa ɗi wan ki̶n c`in ni mpee wun shidaar, ɓe wan ki̶n c`in ni shi retnyit.
50001005	Mpeeɗi wu fes wu ɓàlkáa fuu ki̶ mun ndi̶ghi̶n po ɗiiret ni, yaghal mpuus ɗi gyet wu shee ki̶ling ni har cicinsi.
50001006	Wan man azeen-nzeen nee, Naan ɗi wuri yaa c`in ɗak ɗiiret ɗiisi ndi̶ghi̶n wun, wurin nsat a nc`in ni har parpuus ɗi Jesu wurin mbaaj`i.
50001007	Wan ki̶n pan wun ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶na shidaar-shidaar, mpeemi̶ni, ɓe ni ret ku wan kat pan mi̶ni nkaa wun. Mpeeɗi wu ɓàlkáa fuu mo ki̶ wan ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiret ɗi Naan wuri cín nwan. Kaaɗi yaksi, ɓe wan ndi̶ghi̶n lushaghat, ki̶ kaaɗi gyet wan so nluɗiyeel mpeku wan satpo mu put ki̶ káa fi̶na ɗi nkaa po ɗiiret ni, ki̶ zak, mpeku wan kám ɗi ngurum mo nee, po ɗiiret ni azeen-nzeen.
50001008	Naan wuri a langting fi̶na, pan ɗi wan ki̶ ni mpee wun ni a kaa wal ɗi Jesu Kristi shikáa fi̶ri wuri ki̶ ni mpee mun si.
50001009	Wan ki̶n c`in aduwa nNaan, mpeku wal fuu ni naa nwurang ɗi, ki̶ mpeku wu kat man ki̶ seen ɗi wun mman ɓeet mbii mo ɗi ndi̶re-ndi̶re.
50001010	Mpeku wu bi̶lip mbii mo ɗi riret, ki̶ zak, mpeku wu ɗee ɗi a ɗiiɓang, ɗi ba wun ki̶ mee rap kas parpuus ɗi Daa Jesu wurin mbaa baaj`i.
50001011	Seen fuu mo gam ki̶ mbii ɗiiret mo azeen-nzeen, ɗi a Daa Jesu wuri mak c`in ni ɓejee, mpee le Naan a ɗiiɗes ki̶ kwoop wuri.
50001012	Ɗyemnaa mo, wan riɓet ku wu man nee, jeel ɗi mo kat wan, ɓe ni le ku po ɗiiret ni sekiyeen.
50001013	Har sooja ɗi moo tap ki̶ lu kì̵ mishkagham nRom, ki̶ pak gurum mo, mo man nee, wan a shishaghat a mpee sum kì̵ Jesu Kristi.
50001014	Pak ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu mo ɗes ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n Daa mo waa kat ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n putughup furu mo, mpee satpo ɗiiret ni shi putughup mi̶ndong, ba a shi ki̶i̶rmuut kas, mpeeɗi wan a shishaghat a mpee sum kì̵ Jesu.
50001015	Ii, azeen-nzeen, pak moo satpo ɗiiret nkaa Kristi a mpee zughur, ki̶ pak moo sat ni a mpee ɓi̶lep, amma pak moo sat a shi putughup mi̶ndong.
50001016	Nyem ɗi moo satpo ɗiiret nkaa Kristi shi putughup mi̶ndong si, moo sat mi̶ni a ndi̶ghi̶n wal, ki̶ zak, mo man ne, wan a shishaghat a mpee sum kì̵ po ɗiiret ni.
50001017	Amma nyem ɗi moo satpo ɗiiret nkaa Kristi a mpee zughur si, moo riɓet wat a putughup fi̶na, ki̶ mo pan nee, wuɗun j`i aa jeel nkaa wan ndi̶ghi̶n lushaghat ni.
50001018	Ba ni daampee wan kas, katɗang mo satpo ɗiiret nkaa Kristi, koo a mpee mbii ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe ni ret nwan nyit. Koo ɗi moo sat a ndi̶ghi̶n pan ɗiibish, koo ɗi moo sat a ndi̶ghi̶n pan ɗiiret, ɓe wan nsat a nkat retnyit ɗak, mpeeɗi gurum moo ki̶lingpo ɗiiret nkaa Kristi koo neye.
50001019	Mpeeɗi wan man nee, shi aduwa fuu mo mpee wan, ki̶ ɓam ɗi ni put pe Riin kì̵ Jesu Kristi ɗi, ɓe mon nfwoon wan.
50001020	A ɗyen fi̶na ki̶ canciin fi̶na nɗiisi nee, ba wan c`in mee mbii ɗi nin nj`i ki̶ nashoop nkaa wan kas. Amma riɓet fi̶na, ku wan satpo ɗiiret ni shiɓal ba shi ki̶i̶rmuut kas mpeku koo a mpee ɗiiɗang ye, ki̶ koo a pi̶rang ye, ɓe wan cín ɗiiɗes ɗi nKristi shiɓal ki̶ san fi̶na jir. Koo ɗi wan ɗi ki̶ seen, ki̶ koo ɗi wan muut.
50001021	Pe wan ɗi, ɓe seen fi̶na ni a Kristi, ki̶ muut fi̶na ni a li̶ɓet zak.
50001022	Amma katɗang wan sat a ntong ndi̶ghi̶n nan ɗiisi ɗak, ɓe wan nc`in ɗak ɗi nin mɓam gurum mo. Yaksi ba wan man ar ɗi wan mbi̶lip kas.
50001023	Wan ɗee a kaa kamlang a naar kì̵ am si. Pan ɗiivul mo ɗul wan so ndi̶ghi̶n ar mo vul. Wan ki̶n riɓet kun muut yaksi, mpeku wan so ntong ɗi a shak ki̶ Kristi, mi̶ni ret nwan met.
50001024	Amma ni ki̶ koghop ni zam, mpeku wan tong ɗiiseen ndi̶ghi̶n nan ɗiisi, mpee ɓam wun.
50001025	Mpeeɗi wan man zeen ni aasi. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wan man nee, ba wan mmuut yaksi kas, wan ntong ɗi, mpeku wan ɓam wun ɗi ku wu sekiyeen ɗi shi retnyit ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen fuu.
50001026	Mpeku katɗang wan mbaaj`i pe wun ɗi zak, ɓe wu kat mbii ɗi wun ncanjagham ɗi shi wan, mpee seen ɗi wun ki̶ ni ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi Jesu, mpee tong ɗi wan ntong ashak ki̶ wun ni.
50001027	Ni a ting ku wu mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi po ɗiiret kì̵ Kristi ni sat ne wu c`in mo. Mpeku koo ɗi wan nj`i naa wun, koo ɗi ba wan nkatpee baaj`i naa wun kas, ɓe wan ki̶ling ne, wuu ɗar ɗi ɓal-ɓal, kì̵ po fuu mo ɗee a ɗiimi̶ndong, ki̶ pan fuu mo ɗee a ɗiimi̶ndong zak. Mpeku wu c`in lek ɗi ashak, mpee po ɗiiret, ɗi wuu cínzeen ni.
50001028	Taji wu ki̶i̶r shaarlek fuu mo kas, koo diɓen. Ɗiisi nin nkám mmo nee, Naan wuri kì̵ ten ɓam wun, amma wurin ntwa mo mpee shikbish furu mo. Mpeku wu man ɗi zak nee, Naan shikáa fi̶ri, wurin ncín koghorong ni wun aasi.
50001029	Naan wuri cínpee nwun, ba a mpeku wu cínzeen ɗi nKristi ɓejee kas, amma mpeku wu shwaajeel ɗi mpee wuri zak.
50001030	Yaksi wu mak c`in lek ni ashak ki̶ wan. Lek ɗiisi ni a lek ɗiimi̶ndong ki̶ ɗi gyet wu naa wan nkaa c`in ni, ki̶ kaaɗi wu ki̶ling nee, wan ɗi a nkaa c`in lek mi̶ni har cicinsi.
50002001	Katɗang seen fuu ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi mo ɗee a ɗiiɓal. Katɗang wal fi̶ri ni ɓam wun, katɗang wuu shaar ashak ki̶ Riin fi̶ri, katɗang wuu naajeel kì̵ shak ki̶ walnshak,
50002002	ɓe wu le ku retnyit fi̶na ni gam, ki̶ pan fuu mo ɗee a ɗiimi̶ndong ki̶ wal fuu ni ɗee a ɗiimi̶ndong ki̶ putughup fuu mo ɗee a ɗiimi̶ndong ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir.
50002003	Taji wu c`in mee mbii mpee riɓetkáa koo ɗiyeepkáa kas, amma wu sham ki̶ káa fuu mo. Wu cín ɗiiɗes nshak met nkáa fuu mo.
50002004	Taji memee fuu ɗee ntap aa mbii ɗi mo a mukáa fi̶ri ɓejee ɗak kas, amma wu tap ki̶ mbii mu niyee fuu mo zak.
50002005	Wu yit ku mi̶se fuu mo ɗee a kaa mi̶se ɗi Kristi wuri ki̶ ni.
50002006	Jesu ɗi wuri a ɗiimi̶ndong kì̵ Naan, amma ba wuri lekáa fi̶ri ntiit-ntiit kì̵ Naan kas. Ɗi ni ɗee a mbii ɗi wurin nyaa ni karmat shiɓal ku wuri ɗee ɗi kaa Naan si.
50002007	Amma Jesu wuri sham ki̶ káa fi̶ri, har wuri leshin a káa ki̶rom si. Mo làa wuri ndi̶ghi̶n nan kaa kaghar gurum mo si.
50002008	Amma kaaɗi gyet wuri ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n nan kaa gurum si, ɓe wuri sham ki̶ káa fi̶ri, har wuri cín shin fi̶ri mpee muut nkaa shiyeepyoghom.
50002009	Mpeemi̶ni ɓe Naan ɗiyeep wuri a ɗiiɗes hakyeng, ki̶ wuri c`in sum nJesu, ɗi ni met kaghar sum mo jir.
50002010	Mpeku ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Jesu, ɓe gurum mo jir ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, ki̶ nder kì̵ yil ɗiisi, ɓe mon nj`i kurum ntoghom kì̵ Jesu.
50002011	Ki̶ zak, koo a li̶po ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe nin nsat nee, Jesu Kristi wuri a Daa, mpee ɗiiɗes kì̵ Naan puun.
50002012	Mpeemi̶ni, wun ɗi wan wal nwun si mo, kaaɗi shidaar ɓe wuu naa nc`in mbii ɗi jí wan sat ne, wu c`in mo, ɓe wan ashak ki̶ wun si. Ɓe wu sat a sekiyeen ki̶ c`in mbii ɗi gyet wan sat ni mo nwun ɗak. Koo ɗi ba wan kuɗi ashak ki̶ wun kas, ɓe wu cín ɗiiɗes nNaan, ki̶ wu ki̶i̶r wuri ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo zak. Wu c`in ɗak shiɓal fuu mo, mpeku ɓam fuu ni ɗee ɗi a ɗiigi̶gam.
50002013	A Naan ɗi wurii c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo shidaar-shidaar. A wurii le ku wu c`in mbii ɗi mo ret wurin nyit. Wurin nc`in ɓal nwun mpeku wu c`in mbii ɗiiret ni mo ɗi.
50002014	Wu c`in mbii mo jir, ba a shi po nɗagham-nɗagham koo ɓeetshik kas.
50002015	Mpeku taji gurum mo naa bish fuu kas. Mpeku wu ɗee ɗi a ɗiiɓang kaa jep kì̵ Naan ɗiigi̶gam mo si, ɗi moo tong ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiibish si, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n gurum ɗi mo gam ki̶ shikbish si. Wu ɗee a peeɓang mɓut mmo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi ni, kaa peeɓang mu zar ɗi mo aɗeng si.
50002016	Kaaɗi wuu satpo ɗiiret mu seen ni mo si. Katɗang wu c`in aasi, ɓe wan nkatpee mpee canjagham shi wun parpuus kì̵ Kristi. Mpeeɗi parpuus mi̶ni, ɓe nin nɗee agaak nee, ɗak ɗi jí wan ki̶n c`in ni, ba ni a buu kas.
50002017	Koo ɗi mon nfet wan, ku mo ɗoo toghom fi̶na kaa mbiizughum si mpee cínzeen fuu ndi̶ghi̶n Naan, ɓe ni ret nwan nyit, ki̶ ni shang nwan ashak ki̶ wun jir.
50002018	Ni aasi zak, ni ret ku wuwun, wu c`in retnyit ashak ki̶ wan zak.
50002019	Katɗang Daa Jesu Kristi wuri riɓet, ɓe wan ki̶n lepan nee, wan nlop Timoti so pe wun ɗi ki̶lak. Mpeku katɗang wuri baaj`i, ɓe wan ki̶lingpo ɗi nkaa tong fuu, ku ni caa wan ɗi.
50002020	Ba wan ki̶ mee ngo kaa wuri si kas, ɗi wuri ki̶ c`in shin fi̶ri azeen-nzeen mpee sekiyeen fuu.
50002021	Kaghar gurum ni mo ɗee a nc`in mbii ɗi mukáa furu mo ɓejee ɗak, ba mo kak ki̶ sekiyeen mu po kì̵ Jesu Kristi kas.
50002022	Wun shikáa fuu wuu man tong kì̵ Timoti, mpeeɗi wan ki̶ wuri, mun a kaa puun ki̶ ɗyem fi̶ri si, ɗi muu c`in ɗak ashak mpee satpo ɗiiret ni.
50002023	Mpeemi̶ni wan lepan, mpeku wan lop wuri so pe wun ɗi ki̶lak-ki̶lak. Mpeku wan man sekiyeen ki̶ mbii mo ɗi.
50002024	Wan cínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n Daa nee, Ba nin ntong ɗes kas, ɓe wurin nle ku wan shikáa fi̶na wan so pe wun ɗi.
50002025	Wan ki̶n pan nee, ni ret ku wan lop Epafradaitus ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu, wuri a shaarɗak fi̶na, ɗi wuri kì̵ c`in lek ni ashak kì̵ wan, so pe wun ɗi. Gyet a wun lop wuri j`i pe wan ɗi, mpeku wuri ɓam wan ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n ɗak mo.
50002026	Gyet wuri ki̶ fes lepan mpeku wuri naa wun ɗi jir, amma wuri ki̶ putughup ɗiiwuwat mpeeɗi ba gyet wurin nkagham kas kaaɗi gyet wu ki̶ling si.
50002027	Azeen-nzeen ba gyet wurin nkagham kas, har gyet wuri kus ki̶ muut, amma Naan wuri naajeel fi̶ri. Ba Naan naa a jeel mi̶ri ɓejee kas, amma har ki̶ wan ɗiki̶, mpeku taji wan kat putughup ɗiiwuwat nkaa putughup ɗiiwuwat kas.
50002028	Mpeemi̶ni, wan ki̶n fes nlepan, mpeku wan lop wuri so pe wun ɗi. Mpeku wu kat retnyit ɗi mpee baa naa wuri shi yit fuu mo, ki̶ mpeku putughup mi̶na ni pan saam ɗi zak.
50002029	Mpeemi̶ni, wu lap wuri ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Daa shi retnyit hakyeng. Wu cín ɗiiɗes kiyeet kì̵ nyem mi̶ni mo.
50002030	Gyet ɗee ɗi a lee ku wuri muut mpee ɗak kì̵ Kristi. Gyet wuri cín seen fi̶ri, mpeku wuri ɓam wan ɗi, ndi̶ghi̶n ɗak ɗi ba wun shikáa fuu wu mak c`in ni kas.
50003001	Ɗyemnaa mo, mpee kyes kì̵ ni, ɓe wu c`in retnyit ndi̶ghi̶n Daa. Ba ni daampee nwan mpee baa ran po ɗi gyet wan ki̶n ten ran mo nwun kas, amma ni a mpeku ni ɓam wun ɗi, ku wu tong ɗi riyang.
50003002	Wu tap ki̶ nyem ɗi moo c`in mbii ɗiibish, kaa as mo si. Nyem ɗi mo sat nee, ni a ting ku gurum mo can-can.
50003003	A mun a ɗi mo kì̵ can mun, ba a mo kas. Mpeeɗi muu seyil nNaan a ndi̶ghi̶n Riin fi̶ri, ki̶ muu c`in retnyit ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi, mpeeɗi seen funu mo a ndi̶ghi̶n wuri. Ba muu gangkáa funu mo a nkaa mbii ɗi gurum moo c`in, ɗi mo a mu nan kas.
50003004	Katɗang ɓe ɗi wan riɓet, ɓe ɗi wan mmak gangkáa fi̶na, nkaa mbii ɗi gurum moo c`in mu nan ni. Mpeemi̶ni, katɗang mee gurum ki̶ pan ne; wuɗi ki̶ mbii gangkáa ndi̶ghi̶n nan ni, ɓe wan met ngwar mi̶ni hakyeng ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi mo a mu nan ni mo.
50003005	Kaaɗi gyet mo làa wan, ɓe aɓwoon ɗi wan wul teer pokun, ɓe mo can wan. Wan a ngu Yahudi, ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Benjami. Wan a ngu Hiburu, làa kì̵ nyem Hiburu mo kyap. Katɗang a ndi̶ghi̶n ar mu tap ki̶ Waar mu nyem Yahudi mo, ɓe wan ki̶n tap ki̶ Waar ni a kaa nyem Farisi mo si.
50003006	Gyet wan ki̶n cín jeel nyemso ndang Jesu mo. Nkoghop mu tap ki̶ Waar mu nyem Yahudi mo, ɓe wan ki̶n tap ki̶ Waar ni mon ndi̶re-ndi̶re jir.
50003007	Amma ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi gyet wan ki̶n kat mo, kaa li̶ɓet si, ɓe yaksi wan le mo ɗee a ɗiibuu mpee sum mu Kristi.
50003008	Ii, azeen-nzeen, wan ki̶n le mbii ɗiisi mo ɗee a ɗiibuu, mpeeɗi yaksi, wan ki̶n man ɗiiɗes mu wal kì̵ Kristi Daa fi̶na, ɗi ni met mbii mo jir. Mpee sum fi̶ri, ɓe wan ki̶n fwo mbii mi̶ni mo jir. Yaksi, ɓe wan naa mo ɗee a kaa peeɗi mo ɓeer a gi̶ring si, har wan kwar mo jir. Mpeku wan ɗee ɗi a mu Kristi.
50003009	Ku wan tong ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n wuri. Ba a mpee ɗiiret mukáa fi̶na kas, ɗi wan mak kat ni a mpee tap ki̶ Waar ni mo kas. Amma a mpee ɗiiret ɗi mu kat ni mpee cínzeen ɗi mun ki̶ ni ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi. A ɗiiret ɗi ni put a pu Naan ɗi, ɗi ni ɗar a nkaa cínzeen.
50003010	A mbii ɗi wan ki̶n fes nriɓet nɗiisi, kun man iiko mu yaghal a peemúut fi̶ri. Ku wan shwaa pak jeel fi̶ri ni ɗi zak, kì̵ mpeku wan ɗee ɗi kaa wuri si ndi̶ghi̶n muut fi̶ri.
50003011	Mpeku koo ɗi a me c`in ye, ɓe wan kat yaghal a peemúut ni ɗi zak.
50003012	Ba ne wan ki̶n ten kat mbii ɗi wan ki̶n leyit nkaa mo ni kas. Koo ɗi ba wan ki̶n ɗee a ɗin ndi̶re-ndi̶re kas, amma wan ki̶n gung mpeku mbii mi̶ni mo ɗee ɗi a mi̶na, mpeeɗi Kristi wuri le ku wan ɗee a mi̶ri.
50003013	Ɗyemnaa mo, ba wan ki̶n lesan nee, wan ki̶n ten nkat mbii ɗiisi ni mo kas, amma mbii mi̶ndong ɗi wan ki̶n c`in. Wan ki̶n mander mbii ɗi mo kì̵ ten ɗel. Yaksi, wan ki̶n leyit fi̶na ndi̶re-ndi̶re a nkaa mbii ɗi mo ati̶leng fi̶na ɓejee ɗak.
50003014	Wan ki̶n gung mpee so wul a peekyes mu ɗak fi̶na, mpeku wan lap kwat ɗii mu kàa aɗeng ɗi ashak kì̵ Jesu Kristi, ndi̶ghi̶n petpee ɗi Naan wuri pet wan ni ɗi.
50003015	Wu yit ku pan ɗiisi, ni ɗee ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu mo. Mun nyem ɗi mun ki̶ seen, katɗang mee mbii ɗi, ɗi ba wu manshii ni kas, ɓe Naan wurin nkámshii ni nwun.
50003016	Ni ret ku mu yaa mbii ɗi muu ten mu kat ni ɓal-ɓal.
50003017	Ɗyemnaa mo, wun jir wu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan fi̶na, ki̶ zak, wu naa nyem ɗi mwaan furu mo a ɗiiret ndi̶ghi̶n ar ni, kaaɗi mun muu ɗee a mbiikám pe wun ɗi si.
50003018	Wan ki̶n ten sat mbii ɗiisi mo nwun, yit ɗes. Yaksi, ɓe wan baa sat a ni ɗi nwun, har shi yitmwaan. Gurum mo ɗi ɗes ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ɗi mo a shaarlek mu shiyeepmúut mu Kristi.
50003019	Peekyes kì̵ nyem ɗiisi ni mo, a muut mu aawus ɗi ba nii peekyes kas, mpeeɗi naan furu ni a ɓut furu mo. Ba mo ki̶ mee naashoop kas. Moo ɗiyeepkáa furu mo. Mo fes le putughup furu mo a nkaa mbii ɗii mu yil ɗiisi mo.
50003020	Amma mumun, ɓe tulu funu ni a ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan. A peeɗi muu gong Nguɓam funu Daa Jesu Kristi ɗi wurin ntong aɗeng sham ɗi.
50003021	Wurin ncighi̶r ki̶ sun funu ɗiimeet si mo, mpeku mo ɗee ɗi kaa shin mu ɗiiɗes fi̶ri si. Shi iiko fi̶ri ɗiisi, ɓe wurin nj`i ki̶ mbii mo jir, ku mo ɗee ɗi ntoghom fi̶ri.
50004001	Mpeemi̶ni ɗyemnaa mo, ɗi wan wal nwun. Wan ki̶n fes nriɓet wun, ɗi wan ki̶n kat retnyit a shi wun, ki̶ wan ki̶n c`in roghop a shi wun zak. Wu ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n Daa.
50004002	Wan ki̶n satpo Yudiya, ki̶ wan ki̶n satpo Sintiki nee. Ni ret ku mo tongriyang ki̶ shak, mpeeɗi mo weet mo a ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi.
50004003	Wan ɗang pe wugha ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶na, ɗi muu c`in ɗak ashak, kussuk a ɓam mat ɗiisi mo. Mpeeɗi mat ɗiisi ni moo c`in ɗak ashak ki̶ wan ndi̶ghi̶n satpo ɗiiret ni, ashak ki̶ Ki̶limen ki̶ kaghar das ɗi jí muu c`in ɗak ashak ki̶ mo jir. Nyem ɗi sum furu mo a ɗiiriran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda mu seen.
50004004	Wu c`in retnyit ndi̶ghi̶n Daa shidaar-shidaar. Wan baa sat a ni ɗi nwun zak nee, wu c`in retnyit.
50004005	Wu yit ku gurum mo jir, mo naa gung fuu. Mpeeɗi baaj`i ki̶ Daa nii wul kus.
50004006	Taji wu yit ku mee mbii daampee nwun kas, amma ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir, ɓe wu sat mbii, ɗi wuu riɓet mon nNaan, ndi̶ghi̶n aduwa ki̶ ɗang.
50004007	Riyang kì̵ Naan ɗi ni met man mo jir, ni tap ki̶ putughup fuu mo ki̶ pan fuu mo, ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi Jesu.
50004008	Ɗyemnaa mo, peekyes kì̵ ni, ɓe koo meye ɗi ni azeen, koo a meye ɗi ni mak cín ɗiiɗes, koo a meye ɗi ni a ɗin ndi̶re, koo a meye ɗi ni a ɗiiɓang, koo a meye ɗi ni a wal, koo a meye ɗi ni a mu naajeel, koo katɗang nii mee mbii ɗiiret met jir ɗi, koo ɗi nii mee mbii ɗi ni ret pi̶lang ɗi, ɓe wu c`in pan nkaa mbii ɗiisi mo jir.
50004009	Mbii ɗi gyet wuu ten wu kám mo, ki̶ mbii ɗi gyet wuu ten wu lap mo, ki̶ mbii ɗi gyet wuu ten wu naa mo, ki̶ mbii ɗi gyet wuu ten wu ki̶ling mo pe wan ɗi. Naan ɗi wuri cín tongriyang mmun, wurin ntong ashak ki̶ wun.
50004010	Wan kat retnyit ndi̶ghi̶n Daa hakyeng, mpeeɗi gyet wuu ɗoghom mander nwan, amma yaksi wuu pan wan. Azeen, gyet wuu pan wan, amma ba gyet wu kat a pee mpee ɓam wan kas.
50004011	Ba ne, a mee mbii jee nwan kas, mpeeɗi gyet wan ki̶n ten kám ar mu gung ndi̶ghi̶n koo meye ɗi wan ki̶ ni. Koo ɗi ni ɗes, ki̶ koo ɗi ni a lee, ɓe wan ki̶n tong a shi retnyit.
50004012	Wan man kaaɗi wan nsham ki̶ káa fi̶na, katɗang ba wan ki̶ mee mbii kas, ki̶ zak, wan man mbii ɗi wan nc`in katɗang wan ki̶ mbii mo ɗes. Ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir, ɓe wan ki̶n kám mbii ɗiisi̶sok ɗiisi, mpeku wan katpee ɗar ɗi ɓal-ɓal, koo a ndi̶ghi̶n hi̶ɓi̶l kì̵ koo a ndi̶ghi̶n neen.
50004013	Wan mak c`in mbii mo jir, a ndi̶ghi̶n ɓal ɗi Kristi wurii c`in nwan shidaar-shidaar.
50004014	Wan pi̶lang wun, mpeeɗi jí wu ɓam wan ndi̶ghi̶n jeel fi̶na.
50004015	Wun nyem Filipi mo, wu man shikáa fuu nee, gyet nshee kì̵ po ɗiiret ni, kaaɗi gyet wan yaghal yit yil mMasidoniya, ɓe ba mee Eki̶lisya ɗi ni cínkáa fi̶ra ashak ki̶ wan mpee cín zughum mo, ki̶ lap zughum mo kas, see a wun ɓejee ɗak.
50004016	Har kaaɗi gyet wan ndi̶ghi̶n yil nTasoloni, ɓe wuu lop ɓam so nwan nki̶shak-nki̶shak, ba a yit mi̶ndong koo vul ɓejee kas.
50004017	Ba ne, a mpeeɗi wan ki̶n tang a mee zughum pe wun ɗi kas, amma wan riɓet ku wu kat li̶ɓet ɗiki̶ nkaa kwat fuu mo.
50004018	Wuu ten wu kwat wan ki̶nɗing, mpeeɗi wan ki̶n kat mbii ɗi wan ki̶n riɓet ni, har ni ɗes met mbii ɗi jí wan ki̶n riɓet ni. Mpeeɗi wan ki̶n lap zughum ɗi wu lop j`i nwan nsar kì̵ Epafradaitus. Mbiizughum fuu ɗiisi ni, mo ɗu shang-shang a kaa zughum ɗi gurum moo cín nNaan si. Mbiizughum ɗi mo shang nNaan nyit hakyeng.
50004019	Naan wuri cín mbii ɗi wuu riɓet mo nwun jir ntiit-ntiit ki̶ ɗiiɗes mu long fi̶ri ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi.
50004020	Ɗiiɗes ni ɗee a mu Naan puun funu har ngaa-ngaa, ki̶ ngaa-ngaa. Amin.
50004021	Wu tok ki̶ nyem kì̵ Naan ɗi mo a mu Kristi jir. Ɗyemnaa ɗi mo ashak ki̶ wan, moo tok ki̶ wun.
50004022	Nyem kì̵ Naan mo jir moo tok ki̶ wun. Met jir, a nyem kì̵ Naan ɗi mon ntulu kì̵ mishkagham ɗiiɗes Siza.
50004023	Ɗiiret kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi ni tong ashak ki̶ riin fuu mo jir. Amin.
51001001	Wasika ɗiisi ni put a nsar mi̶na Pool, ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten bi̶lip wan mpeku wan ɗee ɗi a laalop mu Jesu Kristi, ki̶ Timoti ɗymni̶ghi̶n funu ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi.
51001002	So pe nyem kì̵ Naan ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil nKolosi, ki̶ pe ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu mo ɗi mo ɓàlkáa furu mo ashak ki̶ Jesu Kristi. Ɗiiret kì̵ Naan puun funu ki̶ tongriyang fi̶ri ɗee ashak ki̶ wun jir.
51001003	Muu c`in aduwa nNaan mpee wun shidaar-shidaar. Ki̶ zak, muu naa pi̶lang Naan ɗi wuri a puun kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi.
51001004	Mu pi̶lang Naan shidaar-shidaar, mpeeɗi mu ki̶ling nee, cínzeen fuu ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi nii sekiyeen, ki̶ zak ne, wuu wal nyem kì̵ Naan mo jir.
51001005	Mbii ɗi ni le ɗang wu cínzeen nKristi, ki̶ wuu wal ngurum mo, a mpeeɗi wuu leyit nkaa mbii ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten ɗak ni le ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, mpeku wuri cín ni ɗi nwun. Wu ki̶lingpo nkaa mbii ɗiisi mo a ndi̶ghi̶n po ɗiiret ɗi ni azeen ɗi jí wuu ten wu ki̶ling ni.
51001006	Po ɗiiret ɗiisi ni, nin nkaa so wul koo a pee ɗiiɗang ye ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi. Nii cighi̶r ki̶ putughup kì̵ gurum mo, har nii le ku mo c`in ɗak ɗiiret mo. Yaksi, gurum mo ɗes, mo nkaa cínzeen ɗiki̶-ɗiki̶. Ni aasi, ɓe ni kì̵ so wul mpee fuu, ki̶ ni nkaa cighi̶r ki̶ putughup fuu mo, mpeku wu c`in ɗak ɗiiret mo ɗi. Yaghal mparpuus ɗi jí wu shee ki̶ling ni, ɓe yaksi wu manshii kì̵ ni azeen-nzeen, kaaɗi Naan wuri le ɗiiret nkaa wun si.
51001007	Wu shee ki̶lingpo ɗiiret ɗiisi, a mpo kì̵ Abafaras, ɗi muu wal nwuri, ki̶ wuri a shaarɗak funu. Wuri c`in ɗak kì̵ Jesu Kristi shi putughup mi̶ndong nnaar fuu a koppee funu.
51001008	A wuri sat mmun po nkaa wal fuu ndi̶ghi̶n Riin Ɗiiɓang.
51001009	Ni aasi, ɓe yaghal mparpuus ɗi jí mu ki̶lingpo mi̶ni nkaa wun, ɓe muu c`in aduwa mpee wun shidaar-shidaar. Muu ɗang pu Naan, mpeku wuri gam wun ɗiiseen mu man ɗyen fi̶ri, man ɗi ni put a pe Riin fi̶ri j`i ɗi.
51001010	Man mi̶ni le, ku mwaan fuu mo lapshak ki̶ mu nyem ɗi mo so ndang Jesu. Mwaan ɗi ni tongɗyen nJesu. Katɗang wu mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n ɗyen kì̵ Jesu, ɓe mi̶se fuu nin nle ku wu c`in ɗak ɗiiret mo, ki̶ wu sat a nwurang ndi̶ghi̶n man po nkaa Naan ɗak.
51001011	Muu c`in aduwa nee, Naan ɗi wuri ɓal met jir, wurin ncínɓal nwun, mpeku wu ɗar ɗi ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir. Ki̶ zak, koo ɗi a me c`in ye, ɓe wu sat a ngung ɗi ɗak, ki̶ wu kat retnyit ɗi zak.
51001012	Wu pi̶lang puun funu ɗi wuri aɗeng, wuri ɗi wuri wang ar ni mmun, mpeku mu sekop fi̶ri ɗi ashak ki̶ nyem fi̶ri mo ndi̶ghi̶n pee ɗiiɓang.
51001013	Wuri put ki̶ mun ndi̶ghi̶n iiko mu peenkoo, ɗangɓe wuri waa mang mun ɗel ki̶ mun ndi̶ghi̶n mulki kì̵ Làa fi̶ri.
51001014	A Làa fi̶ri, wuri ang mun, ki̶ wuri fwo shikbish funu mo mmun zak.
51001015	Ba mee ngo kì̵ kyam naa Naan kas, amma gurum mo kì̵ naa Jesu ɗi wuri lapshak kì̵ Naan. A wuri kám tong kì̵ Naan mmun agaak. Jesu wuri a Làa kì̵ Naan ɗin nshee, ɗi wuri met mbii ɗi Naan wuri le mmo jir.
51001016	A ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu, ɓe Naan wuri le mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni jir. Mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan ki̶ ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi. Mbii ɗi gurum moo mak naa mo, ki̶ mbii ɗi ba gurum moo mak naa mo kas. A ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiɗes fi̶ri, ɓe Naan wuri le mbii ɗi mo ki̶ iiko ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan. Mbii ɗiinan mo ki̶ ɗiiɗween mo ntiit-ntiit ki̶ ɓal furu mo. A ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu, ɓe Naan wuri le mbii mo jir, ki̶ mbii mo jir, a Jesu wuri ki̶ mo nsar, ki̶ mo a mu wuri jir zak.
51001017	Pugyet ɗi yam-yam, ɓe Jesu wuri ɗi, akuɗang Naan wurii le mbii mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni. Naan ɓàl mbii mo jir ashak a ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu.
51001018	Ndi̶ghi̶n nyem kì̵ Naan mo, ɓe Jesu wuri a káa kì̵ mo. Kaghar gurum ni mo a shin fi̶ri. A Jesu wuri a káa mu nyemso ndang Naan mo. A wuri a ɗin nshee, ki̶ zak, a wuri shee yaghal a peemúut. Mpee mbii ɗiisi mo, ɓe a wuri a ɗin nshee ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir.
51001019	Ni ret nNaan nyit, har wuri le ku ɗyen fi̶ri ni gam, ki̶ ni tong ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu.
51001020	Ni ret Naan nyit zak, mpeku wuri baaj`i ki̶ mbii mo jir pushin ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu. A ndi̶ghi̶n toghom ɗi Làa kì̵ Naan wuri ɓeer ni nkaa shiyeepyoghom, ɗangɓe Naan wuri riɓet waa baaj`i ki̶ mbii mo jir, pu shin ɗi. Mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, ki̶ ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ku mo cighi̶r ɗii putughup furu, mpeku mo baaj`i ɗi ndang wuri.
51001021	Jí mmee nnaar, ɓe wuu tong a jong-jong kì̵ Naan, ki̶ jí wun a shaarlek kì̵ Naan, mpee mbii ɗiibish, ɗi jí wuu c`in mo, ki̶ pan fuu ɗiibish mo.
51001022	Amma yaksi, mpee muut kì̵ Làa kì̵ Naan, ɗi mo làa wuri ndi̶ghi̶n nan, ɓe Naan wuri le ku wu ɗee a shaar fi̶ri mo, mpeku putughup fuu mo ɗee ɗi a ɗiiɓang, ki̶ mpeku wuri j`i ki̶ wun ɗi ntoghom kì̵ Naan, ɗi wuri a ɗiiɓang.
51001023	A mbii ɗi Jesu c`in nwun mmi̶ni, katɗang wu sekiyeen ki̶ cínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n po ɗiiret ni. Ki̶ zak, katɗang wu ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiisi mo. Wu sat a nleyit, nkaa mbii ɗi wu ki̶lingpo nkaa mo ndi̶ghi̶n po ɗiiret ni. A po nkaa po ɗiiret, ɗi moo ten sat ni nkoo a weye, ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi. Wan Pool, ɗak fi̶na ni a mpeku wan sat ɗi ngurum mo, po nkaa po ɗiiret ɗiisi ni.
51001024	Kaaɗi wan nkaa shwaajeel mpee sum fuu, ɓe wan ki̶ retnyit mputughup. Kaaɗi gyet Daa Jesu shwaajeel si, ɓe wan zak, ki̶n shwaajeel ndi̶ghi̶n nan mpee sum kì̵ nyem fi̶ri mo ɗi mo a shin fi̶ri. Wan shwaajeel ni a mpeku wan si̶ghi̶t nkyes kaghar ɗak fi̶ri ni ɗi.
51001025	A Naan wuri bi̶lip wan, mpeku wan ɗee ɗi a ki̶rom mu nyem kì̵ Jesu mo, har wuri le ɗak ɗiisi ni nsar fi̶na mpee sum fuu. Ɗak ɗi wuri le nsar fi̶na ni, a mpeku wan satpo fi̶ri ɗiiret ɗi ngurum mo hakyeng.
51001026	Po ɗi wan ki̶n sat ngurum mo, ɓe gyet yam, ɓe ni a ɗiisi̶sok. Mpeemi̶ni ɓe ba gyet gurum mo manshii ni kas, amma yaksi Naan wuri woo ni agaak nyem fi̶ri mo.
51001027	Ni ret nNaan nyit, har wuri le, ku nyem fi̶ri mo manpo ɗiijurung ɗiisi, ɗi ni a mbii aapo zam. Nii koghop ni hakyeng, mpee gurum mo jir, koo a ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiiɗang ye. Po ɗi wuri woo ni mmun, a nee, Jesu Kristi wurii tong ndi̶ghi̶n wun. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wu leyit, mpee parpuus ɗi wun ntong ashak ki̶ wuri ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiɗes fi̶ri.
51001028	A mpeemi̶ni ɓe muu satpo ngurum mo jir nkaa Jesu Kristi. Muu satpo nkoo a weye, ku wuri tap, ki̶ zak, muu kám seen ngurum mo nkaa mbii ɗiisi ni mo, a mpeku koo a weye, ɓe wuri ɗee ɗi ki̶ seen ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi.
51001029	A mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wan ki̶n c`in ɗak shiɓal ɗi Jesu wuri cín nwan, ki̶ wan ki̶n gung mpeku wan kyes ɗak ɗiisi ni ɗi.
51002001	Ɗyen nwan, ku wu man ɗak ɗi wan ki̶n gung mpee c`in ni mpee sum fuu, ki̶ mpee nyem ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil Lodisiya.
51002002	Wan nkaa c`in ɗak ɗiisi ni, a mpeku mo kat ɓal ɗi mputughup furu mo, mpeku mo wal ɗin nshak, har ku mo ɗee ɗi a ɗiimi̶ndong. Ɗyen nwan ku mo man jurung, ki̶ man nkaa Jesu hakyeng, mpeku mo manshii kì̵ mbii ɗiisi mo ɗi jir. Ɗiisi ni j`i ki̶ ɗiiret nkaa mo hakyeng. Mbii ɗiijurung ni, a Kristi shikáa fi̶ri.
51002003	Mo sok long mu seen ki̶ man mo jir, a ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu.
51002004	Wan ki̶n sat mbii ɗiisi mo nwun, a mpeku taji mee gurum num wun shi liispo ɗi ni shangki̶ling kas.
51002005	Koo ɗi ba wan ashak ki̶ wun ndi̶ghi̶n nan kas, ɓe wan ɗi ashak ki̶ wun ndi̶ghi̶n riin. Ni shang nwan zam, kaaɗi wan ki̶ling nee, wuu c`in mbii mo a ntiit-ntiit ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiret, ki̶ zak, wuu ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen fuu ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi.
51002006	Kaaɗi, wu mang Jesu Kristi kaa Daa fuu si, ɓe ni ret ku wu mwaan-mwaan ɗi ni ret ku nyem ɗi mo ɓàlkáa furu mo ashak ki̶ Jesu, mo c`in. Wu tong ndi̶ghi̶n wuri.
51002007	A mpee wuri, ɓe wu kat seen ki̶ ɓal. Wu sekiyeen ki̶ cínzeen nwuri azeen-nzeen, kaaɗi mu kám nwun si. Ki̶ zak, wu pi̶lang wuri shidaar-shidaar mpee mbii mo jir.
51002008	Wu tap, taji mee gurum num wun shiman mu yil ɗiisi, mpeku wu taa wu mer ɗi a ar ɗiiret ni kas. Kiyeet kì̵ man ɗi ni put a ndi̶ghi̶n waar mu gurum mo, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n riin ɗiibish mu yil ɗiisi, ba nii put a pe Kristi ɗi kas.
51002009	A ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu, ɓe muu naa gam kì̵ ɗyen kì̵ Naan, ki̶ tong ndi̶ghi̶n nan ni zak.
51002010	Mo cín seen nwun, a mpeeɗi wuu ɓàlkáa ashak kì̵ Jesu. A wuri a káa kì̵ mulki ki̶ iiko mo jir.
51002011	A ndi̶ghi̶n wuri, ɓe mo can wun, ba a can ɗi moo c`in shi sar ndi̶ghi̶n nan kas, amma a can ɗi Jesu Kristi wuri c`in nwun ɗi ni put ki̶ wun ndi̶ghi̶n shikbish.
51002012	Kaaɗi gyet mo c`in baptisma nwun si, ɓe ni ɗee a kaaɗi gyet mo wum wun ashak ki̶ Kristi si, ɗangɓe mo waa yaghal ki̶ wun ashak ki̶ wuri a peemúut si.
51002013	Gyet yam ɓe wun a ɗiimumuut mpee shikbish fuu mo, ki̶ ba gyet wun a nyem kì̵ Naan mo kas. Amma Naan wuri cín seen nwun ashak kì̵ Kristi, ki̶ zak, Naan wuri kì̵ fwo shikbish fuu mo jir.
51002014	Gyet yam ɓe mun a ɗiimumurap mo nder kì̵ waar mu Naan, mpeeɗi ba gyet muu c`in mbii ɗi waar kì̵ Naan ni sat kas. Amma yaksi, Naan wuri mang shikbish mi̶ni mo baa ki̶ni aku nkaa káa funu mo, ki̶ wuri fwo ɗi mmun jir zak. Mpeeɗi gyet mo pwas Jesu Kristi nkaa shiyeepyoghom, a mpee shikbish funu ɗiisi ni mo.
51002015	Kaaɗi gyet Jesu Kristi wuri muut nkaa shiyeepyoghom, ɓe wuri se koghorong nkaa riin ɗiibish mo ki̶ iiko mo, wuri kám ngurum mo a agaak nee, wuri ɓal met mmo jir.
51002016	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe taji wu yit ku mee gurum lewaar nwun nkaa mbii ɗi wuu se, ki̶ shwaa kas, koo a nkaa puus ɗiiɓang mo, koo nkaa mbii ɗi wuu c`in mo, mpee tar ɗiipoo, koo nkaa puus Nookɗi.
51002017	Mbii ɗiisi mo ɗee a muriin, ɗi gyet moo kám ngurum mo mbii ɗi mon ndung j`i akiyeen. Mbii ɗi gyet moo ɗee a muriin ɗiisi ni, moo gam, a Kristi wuri shikáa fi̶ri.
51002018	Mpeemi̶ni, taji wu yit ku nyem ɗi mo lesut a kaa nyemɗiinan mo si, mo tokɗiyeel ɗiibish nwun kas. Nyem ɗi mo sat nee, Naan kì̵ woo mbii mo nwuɗun zughum. Mo sat nee, wu sham ki̶ káa fuu mo, ki̶ zak, ne wu seyil nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo. Nyem mi̶ni, moo roghop, koo ɗi ba mo a mee mbii kas. Pan furu mo a mu yil ɗiisi.
51002019	Ba moo riɓet ɓàlkáa furu ashak ki̶ Kristi ɗi wuri a káa mu nyemso ndang Naan ni mo kas. Ɗi a wurii cínɓal mmo, ki̶ a wurii cín mbiise mmo zak. Jir nyem ɗi moo ɓàlkáa furu mo ashak kì̵ Jesu, ɓe wuri kì̵ cínɓal mmo, mpeku mo j`i ɗi ashak zak. Ki̶ mpeku, mo wurang ɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi mo a mu Kristi, kaaɗi Naan wurii riɓet si. Ɓeep mu sun funu moo lang ashak, mpeeɗi mo ki̶ peeɓal mo, ki̶ paar mo. Ni a kaaɗi Kristi wuri ɓàl nyemso ndang wuri mo, ɗi mo a shin fi̶ri si.
51002020	Katɗang wu murap ashak kì̵ Kristi, ɓe ba riin ɗii mu yil ɗiisi mon nkat ɓal nkaa wun kas. Amma a me le ɗang wuu sekiyeen ki̶ mwaan kaa kaghar gurum ɗii mu yil ɗiisi mo ye? A me le ɗangɓe wu cínkáa fuu nder kì̵ waar ɗi gurum sat ne, wu c`in ye?
51002021	Kaaɗi moo sat nwun nee, taji wu tuwaas mbii ɗiisi shi sar kas. Taji wu se mbii ɗiisi kas, ki̶ zak, taji wu tung mbii ɗiisi shi sar kas.
51002022	Kiyeet kì̵ waar ɗiisi mo, mo a kám mu gurum. Ɗi katɗang mo gung c`in ɗak ki̶ mo, ɓe mo ɗee a ɗiibuu.
51002023	Waar kaa ɗiisi mo si, mo ki̶ lapshak kaa mo aa mee koghop mu seen si. Mpeeɗi waar ni mo leting ngurum mo, ku mo seyil ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiret, ki̶ mo sham ki̶ káa furu mo, mu ɗung zak, ku moo cínjeel ɗi nsut furu mo, amma azeen-nzeen, ba moo mee koghop ni kas, mpeeɗi ba moo mee ɓal ɗi mon mɓam gurum, mpeku wuri tap ɗiikyaghar mu nan ni kas.
51003001	Mpeeɗi mo kì̵ yaghal ki̶ wun ndi̶ghi̶n seen ashak ki̶ Kristi, mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wu le putughup fuu mo nkaa mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, a peeɗi Kristi wurii tong ɗi, nsarse kì̵ Naan.
51003002	Wu lepan fuu mo a nkaa mbii ɗi mo aɗeng. Taji wu lepan fuu mo a nkaa mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi kas.
51003003	Mpeeɗi wuu murap, amma seen fuu ɗiipoo ni mo a si̶sok pe Kristi ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n Naan.
51003004	Katɗang Kristi ɗi wuri a seen fuu, wuri j`i put, ɓe wuwun zak, wun mput ashak ki̶ wuri ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiihai fi̶ri.
51003005	Wu twa mbii ɗi mo a mu yil ɗiisi, ɗi moo tong ndi̶ghi̶n seen fuu mo jir. Mbii kaa c`in ngaa mo si, ki̶ mwaan ɗiibish mo, ki̶ kyaghar mbii mu nan mo, ki̶ riɓet mbii ɗiibish mo, riɓet mbii mo met nNaan.
51003006	A mpee mbii ɗiibish kaa ɗiisi mo si, ɓe Naan wurii woo tughup fi̶ri nkaa nyem ɗi mo kwar ki̶ling ɗoo fi̶ri.
51003007	Gyet wun, shikáa fuu, wuu c`in mbii ɗiisi mo, har gyet wuu mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n mo.
51003008	Amma yaksi, kaaɗi wun ki̶ seen ɗiipoo si, ɓe ni ret ku wu shwat sar fuu mo aku, ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiibish ɗiisi ni mo jir. Mbii mo kaa langtughup, pan ɗiibish nkaa shak, po ɗiibuu nkaa shak, ki̶ jir po ɗii ba mo ki̶ mee koghop ni kas. Taji wu ba wu c`in mo ɗi zak kas koo diɓen.
51003009	Taji wu c`in ɗung nshak kas, mpeeɗi wuu ten wu yit shiimwaan fuu ɗi gyet yam ni mo. Gyet yam, ɓe wuu c`in mbii ɗiisi mo, amma yaksi taji, wu baa wu c`in mo ɗi kas.
51003010	Amma wu shee shiimwaan ɗiipoo ɗi Naan wuri le ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo, ɗi nin nɗak shiimwaan fuu mo, ku wu ɗee ɗi kaa wuri si, mpeku wu man wuri ɗiki̶-ɗiki̶.
51003011	Yaksi, ba mee shwatnyit ɗi nnaar kì̵ ngu Heleni kì̵ ngu Yahudi kas, koo nnaar kì̵ ngo ɗi moo can wuri ki̶ ngo ɗin nsuluk kas. Nnaar kì̵ nyemseen mo, ki̶ nyem ɗi ba moo seen kas, nnaar kì̵ mi̶zep mo, ki̶ nyemyil mo, nnaar kì̵ ki̶rom mo, ki̶ jeplu mo. Yaksi ɓe gurum mo ɗee a ntiit-ntiit, ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi, mpeeɗi wuri met mbii mo jir.
51003012	Taji wu mander nee, Naan wuri wal nwun zam, har wuri bi̶lip wun, mpeku wu ɗee ɗi a nyem fi̶ri mo. Ni a ting ku shiimwaan fuu mo ret, kaa jep kì̵ Naan mo si. Wu naajeel mu shak. Wu c`in mbii ɗiiret nshak. Wu sham ki̶ kaa fuu mo. Wu c`in mbii mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗyen, ki̶ zak, wu gung ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir.
51003013	Taji wu ki̶lak ki̶ langtughup ki̶ shak kas. Kat mee gurum c`in shikbish ngi̶ni̶ghi̶n, ɓe gwar ɗi mo c`in shikbish ni nwuri, wuri fwo ɗi nguc`in shikbish ni. Daa Naan wuri kì̵ fwo shikbish fuu mo, mpeemi̶ni, ɓe ni ret ku wuwun, wu fwo ɗi nshak zak.
51003014	Mbii ɗi nii koghop ni met jir, wu walnshak, mpeeɗi wal ni ki̶ ɓàl gurum mo ashak ndi̶ghi̶n tong ɗi mbii mo a ɗiigi̶gam jir.
51003015	Wu yit ku tongriyang mu Kristi, ni se mishkagham ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo. A mpeemi̶ni ɓe Naan wuri pi̶rep wun, mpeku wu tong ndi̶ghi̶n tongriyang mi̶ni. Wu pi̶lang Naan shidaar-shidaar.
51003016	Wu yit ku po kì̵ Kristi ni tong ndi̶ghi̶n wun hakyeng, kaaɗi wu c`in kám, ki̶ ɓamshak ndi̶ghi̶n seen ɗi Naan wuri c`in nwun si. Wu kwoop Naan shi kook mo, ki̶ kook ɗi mo a mu Riin, ɗi mo put ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu, ɗi Riin kì̵ Naan wuri c`in wun. Kaaɗi wuu kwoop Naan shi kook mo si, ɓe ni ret ku wu pi̶lang wuri ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo.
51003017	Ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi wuu c`in mo jir, koo ɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n ɗak, ɓe wu c`in mo jir a ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Daa funu Jesu. Wu pi̶lang Naan puun ndi̶ghi̶n sum fi̶ri.
51003018	Wun mat mo, wu sham ki̶ káa fuu mo nder kì̵ mish fuu mo, kaaɗi ni ret ku nyem kì̵ Naan mo c`in si.
51003019	Wun mish mo, wu wal mmat fuu mo. Taji wu tong ki̶ mo a shi lek kas.
51003020	Wun jep mo, wu ki̶lingpo kì̵ puun fuu mo, mpeeɗi mi̶ni ret nNaan nyit zam.
51003021	Wun puun mo, taji wu le ku jep mo langtughup kas, mpeeɗi kat wu le ku mo langtughup, ɓe nin nroghop kwak mmo.
51003022	Wun ki̶rom mo, wu c`in mbii ɗi nyemlu fuu mo sat ne wu c`in. Taji wu c`in mbii mo a mpeeɗi moo naa wun kas, mpeku wu kat ɗiiret ɗi pe mo ɓejee kas, amma wu c`in mbii mo a shi putughup ɗiimi̶ndong, ki̶ cín ɗiiɗes nNaan.
51003023	Koo ɗi ɗak fuu ni a meye, ɓe wu c`in ni shi putughup mi̶ndong, kaaɗi wuu c`in a nNaan si, ba a mpee gurum mo kas.
51003024	A Daa Jesu Kristi wuri a Daa fuu. Wun nlap kwat fuu mo a pu wuri ɗi. Kwat ɗi wurin ncín nwun ni, a sekop ɗi wuri ɗak ni le mpee nyem fi̶ri mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, mpeeɗi ɗak ɗi wuu c`in ni, ɓe wuu a seyil nDaa Jesu Kristi.
51003025	Ngo ɗi wuri c`in mbii ɗiibish, ɓe Daa wurin nkwat ngo mi̶ni a shi mbii ɗiibish, ntiit-ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗiibish ɗi gwar mi̶ni c`in. Ba mee shwatyit ɗi kas koo diɓen.
51004001	Wun nyem ɗi wun ki̶ ki̶rom mo, wu fwang mo ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiret, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n zeen zak, mpeeɗi wu man nee, wun ɗi ki̶ mee ngo ɗiiɗes zak, ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ɗi wurii fwang wun.
51004002	Wu c`in aduwa nNaan shidaar-shidaar. Wu tong shi gongpee, ki̶ zak, wu pi̶lang Naan mpee mbii mo jir.
51004003	Wu c`in aduwa mpee mun zak, mpeku Naan wang ar ɗi mmun, ku mu satpo fi̶ri ɗi ngurum mo. Ki̶ mpeku mu yakshii ni ɗi ngurum mo mbii ɗiijurung, ɗi Naan wuri woo mmun nkaa Jesu Kristi. A mpee po ɗiiret ni, ɗangɓe wan a shishaghat ndi̶ghi̶n lushaghat.
51004004	Wu ɗang pu Naan, mpeku wan satpo ɗiiret ni ɗi ngurum mo agaak, ku mo manshii ni ɗi, kaaɗi ni ret kun sat si.
51004005	Wu mwaan shi seen, pu nyem ɗi ba mo a nyemso ndang Naan mo kas. Wu c`in mbii ɗiiret koo a pi̶rang ye!
51004006	Wu yit ku liispo fuu mo shangki̶ling ngurum mo, kaa mbii ɗi mo tap le ki̶i̶n ɗiki̶ si, mpeku wu man mbii ɗi wun nlap ɗi ngurum mo katɗang mo tal mee mbii pu wun.
51004007	Tikikus wurin nsatpo wun, nkaa mbii ɗi wan ki̶n c`in mo jir. Wuri a ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ɗi muu wal wuri ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi. Wurii c`in ɗak kì̵ nyemso ndang Naan mo, a shi putughup mi̶ndong. Wan ki̶ wuri, mun a ki̶rom kì̵ Daa Jesu ndi̶ghi̶n ɗak fi̶ri.
51004008	Wan ki̶n lop wuri so pe wun ɗi, a mpeku wuri sat ɗi nwun mbii ɗi muu c`in mo jir, ki̶ zak, mpeku wuri caa wun ɗi.
51004009	Unisimus ɗi wuri a nguyil fuu, wuri so ashak ki̶ Tikikus. Mon nsat nwun mbii mo jir, nkaa wan. Unisimus wuri a ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu, ɗi muu wal nwuri. Wurii c`in ɗak kì̵ nyem so ndang Naan mo a shi putughup mi̶ndong.
51004010	Aristaakus ɗi wuri a shishaghat ashak ki̶ wan, wurii tok ki̶ wun jir. Maak kí̵n kì̵ Barnabas, wurii tok ki̶ wun zak. Wan ki̶n ten ran po nwun nkaa wuri zak. Katɗang wurin nso pe wun ɗi, ɓe wu lap wuri shi putughup mi̶ndong riret.
51004011	Joshuwa ɗi moo pet wuri a Jastus, wurii tok ki̶ wun. Das ɗiikun si mo, moo ɓam wan zam. A mo a nyem Yahudi ɗi moo c`in ɗak ashak ki̶ wan mpesi. Muu sat ngurum mo nee, Naan wuri a mishkagham.
51004012	Abafaras ɗi wuri a ndi̶ghi̶n wun, wurii tok ki̶ wun. Abafaras wuri a ki̶rom kì̵ Jesu Kristi. Wurii c`in aduwa mpee wun shidaar-shidaar. Wurii ɗang pu Naan, mpeku wu ɗar ɗi ɓal-ɓal, ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi mo a mu Naan, mpeku wu man mbii ɗi moo ret ɗi nNaan nyit. Ki̶ zak, mpeku wu ki̶ling ɗoo fi̶ri ɗi, ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir.
51004013	Wan shikáa fi̶na, wan ki̶n naa, kaaɗi wurii c`in ɗak ɓal-ɓal mpee sum fuu. Wun ɗi wun ndi̶ghi̶n Kolosi ki̶ Lodisiya.
51004014	Luk ɗi wuri a nguyen, muu wal nwuri zam, ki̶ Dimas moo tok ki̶ wun.
51004015	Wu tok ki̶ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n Lodisiya, ki̶ Nimfas, ki̶ nyemso ndang Naan ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n tulu fi̶ri.
51004016	Aɓwoon ɗi mo kì̵ tang wasika ɗiisí nwun, ɓe wu le ku mee gurum tang ni ndi̶ghi̶n nyemso ndang Naan ɗi mon nLodisiya zak. Wu tang wasika ɗiisi, ɗi nyemso ndang Naan ɗi mon nyil nLodisiya lop j`i nwun zak.
51004017	Wu sat Arkipus nee, "Wuri kyes ɗak ɗi jí Daa Jesu Kristi c`in nwuri, mpeku wuri c`in ɗi si."
51004018	A wan Pool ki̶n ran wasika ɗiisi nwun shi sar fi̶na. Taji wu mander nee, wan a shishaghat ndi̶ghi̶n lushaghat kas. Ɗiiret kì̵ Naan tong ashak ki̶ wun jir. Amin.
52001001	Wasika ɗiisi ni put a nsar kì̵ Pool ki̶ Silas ki̶ Timoti so pe nyemso ndang Naan ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil nTasoloni, ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n Naan puun kì̵ Daa Jesu Kristi. Naan wuri c`in ɗiiret nwun ki̶ tongriyang zak.
52001002	Koo pi̶rang ye, ɓe muu pi̶lang Naan mpee wun jir, ki̶ zak, muu pan wun jir ndi̶ghi̶n aduwa funu mo shidaar-shidaar.
52001003	Muu pan wun mpee Naan funu, ɗi wuri aɗeng, kaaɗi wu kám cínzeen fuu ni ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi wuu c`in mo. Ki̶ kaaɗi wal fuu nii le ku wu c`in ɗak shiɓal, ki̶ kaaɗi canciin fuu nkaa Jesu Kristi ni ɗar ɓal-ɓal si.
52001004	Ɗyemnaa mo, mu man nee, Naan wuri wal nwun, ki̶ wuri kì̵ ten bi̶lip wun, ku wu ɗee a nyem fi̶ri mo zak.
52001005	Mpeeɗi ba gyet mu satpo ɗiiret ni nwun a shi li̶po funu ɓejee kas, amma a ndi̶ghi̶n ɓal kì̵ Riin Ɗiiɓang. Ki̶ mun mu cínzeen nee, mbii ɗi mu sat ni azeen. Wuu man tong funu, kaaɗi gyet mun ɗi ashak ki̶ wun. Muu c`in mbii mo jir a mpee sum fuu.
52001006	Gyet wun, wuu yaa mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan funu, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan kì̵ Daa funu, koo ɗi wuu shwaajeel, amma mpeeɗi wun kì̵ lappo ɗiiret ni shi retnyit ɗi Riin Ɗiiɓang cín nwun.
52001007	Ni aasi ɓe, wu ɗee a mbiikám nkaghar nyemcínzeen nJesu Kristi ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n nyil mMasidoniya kì̵ Akaya.
52001008	A mpee wun ɗangɓe nyem ɗi mo kus, ki̶ ɗiijong mo, mo ki̶lingpo kì̵ Daa. Ba a mMasidoniya kì̵ Akaya ɓejee kas, amma cínzeen fuu ndi̶ghi̶n Naan nii so wul koo pee ɗiiɓang ye. Mpeemi̶ni, ba mun ki̶ mee mbii ɗiki̶, mpee sat nwun kas.
52001009	Gurum mo, koo a neye, ɓe moo sat a wun, kaaɗi gyet wu lap mun shi putughup mi̶ndong si, ki̶ kaaɗi gyet wu yit k`um fuu mo, mpeku wu seyil ɗi nNaan ɗi wurin mmeen ki̶ wuri azeen.
52001010	Ki̶ wuu tong shi gongpee mpee baaj`i kì̵ Làa fi̶ri ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, shii kì̵ mi̶ni a Làa fi̶ri Jesu Kristi ɗi Naan wuri yaghal ki̶ wuri a peemúut, ki̶ wuri ɓam mun ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiyeel kì̵ Naan ɗi nin ndung j`i zak.
52002001	Ɗyemnaa mo, wun wu man shikáa fuu nee, j`i funu pe wun ɗi ba ni a buu kas.
52002002	Wu man kaaɗi mun kì̵ ten shwaajeel ki̶ fulup ndi̶ghi̶n yil nFilipi, akuɗang muu j`i pe wun ɗi nTasoloni. Koo ɗi gyet gurum mo ɗes mo kwar mun, amma Naan funu wuri cínɓal mmun mputughup, mpeku mu satpo fi̶ri ɗiiret ni ɗi nwun.
52002003	Po ɗi mu sat nwun ni, ba ni a ɗung koo pan ɗiibish kas. Ba gyet mu sat ni, a mpeku mu num a mee gurum ɗi kas.
52002004	Amma mpeeɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten bi̶lip mun, ki̶ wuri kì̵ ten le po fi̶ri ni ndi̶ghi̶n sar funu. Muu c`in ku mu tong ɗyen ɗi a nNaan, ɗi wuri man putughup funu mo jir. Ba muu c`in ku mu tong ɗyen ɗi a ngurum kas.
52002005	Wu man nee, ba muu kyam j`i ki̶ mee po ɗiishang mmee gurum shi li̶po funu mo kas, mpeku mu num wun, ku mu kat shaghal ɗi pu wun kas. Naan wuri man ni aasi.
52002006	Ba muu kyam tang ɗiiɗes pe gurum mo ɗi kas, koo pu wun, koo pe nyemɗiici mo. Koo ɗi mun ki̶ pee mpee c`in ɗak ki̶ iiko funu kaa nyemlop kì̵ Kristi mo si.
52002007	Amma jir ki̶si, ɓe gyet muu fwang wun, a kaaɗi ni̶ghi̶n kwee wuraa fwang jep fi̶ra mo si.
52002008	Mpeeɗi mu wal nwun zam, har gyet muu riɓet mpeku mu cín seen funu mo mpee wun, ba a mpee po ɗiiret kì̵ Naan ɗi gyet mu sat nwun ɓejee kas.
52002009	Ɗyemnaa mo, taji wu mander nɗak ɗi gyet mun kì̵ c`in shiɓal pe wun kas. Gyet mun kì̵ c`in ɗak mpar ki̶ puus, mpeku taji mu lejeel nwun kas, nnaar ɗi gyet mun nkaa satpo ɗiiret mu Naan ni nwun.
52002010	Wun a langting funu, ki̶ Naan wuri man nee, mbii ɗi muu sat ni azeen zak. Gyet wu naa shi yit fuu, shiimwaan funu mo, kaaɗi gyet mun ashak ki̶ wun. Ɓe wu man nee, gyet mun a nyem ɗi sar funu mo, ki̶ shiimwaan funu mo a ɗin ndi̶re-ndi̶re, ba gyet mu c`in mee mbii ɗiibish nnaar fuu kas.
52002011	Wu man nee, mu tap ki̶ wun a kaaɗi puun ki̶ tap ki̶ jep fi̶ri mo si.
52002012	Muu caa wun, muu ɓam wun zak, ki̶ zak, mun kì̵ sat ni yit ɗes nee, ni ret ku wu mwaan a mwaan ɗi ni ret nNaan nyit. Naan ɗi wuri pi̶rep wun, mpeku wu ɗel ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n mulki fi̶ri, ki̶ mu tong ɗi ashak ki̶ wuri ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiɗes fi̶ri.
52002013	Mee mbii ɗi nii le, ku mu pi̶lang Naan shidaar-shidaar zak, gyet mu shee satpo kì̵ Naan ni nwun, ɓe kaaɗi wu ki̶ling, ɓe wu lap ni, ba a kaa po kì̵ gurum si kas, amma wu lap ni a kaa po kì̵ Naan si, ɗi ni nkaa c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo, wun nyem ɗi wu cínzeen.
52002014	Ɗyemnaa funu mo, wu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan kì̵ nyemso ndang Naan ɗi mo a mu Kristi Jesu, ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil nJudiya. Wuu nshwaajeel nsar kì̵ nyemyil fuu mo, kaaɗi gyet mu shwaajeel nsar ki̶ nyem Yahudi mo si.
52002015	Gyet a nyem Yahudi ni mo tu Daa Jesu, ki̶ mo twa nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan mo. Mo ceen mun zak. Ba mbii ɗi mo c`in ni ret nNaan nyit kas koo diɓen. Ki̶ zak, mo a shaarlek kì̵ gurum mo jir.
52002016	Mpeeɗi moo tangpee, mpeku mo cíi satpo ɗiiret ni ɗi mmun, mpee nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas, mpeku taji mumo kat seen ɗi zak. A ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiisi ɓe, mo gam shi ɓutbish furu ɗi moo naa nc`in ni, amma yaksi ɗiyeel kì̵ Naan nii taa nkaa mo jir.
52002017	Ɗyemnaa funu mo, kaaɗi gyet mu ɓàkshak ki̶ wun, mpee rep pee lee, yaksi ni daampee mmun, koo ɗi a yit funu mo ɓàkshak ɗak, ɓe putughup funu moo pan wun shidaar-shidaar.
52002018	Ɗyen mmun naa yit fuu mo zam. Muu fes mu riɓet baaso pe wun ɗi zam. Wan Pool, wan lepan fi̶na mpee baaso pe wun ɗi met nyitvul, amma Shetan ɗar ɗi a ar ni.
52002019	A me a mbii canciin funu, ki̶ retnyit funu, ɗi ni kám nee, muu se koghorong ye? A mpeku ni ret ɗi mmun nyit kì̵ Daa funu Jesu, parpuus ɗi wurin mbaaj`i? Ba a wun kas aa?
52002020	A wun a nyem ɗi wu le ku mu kat retnyit ki̶ nin nshang mmun parpuus ɗi mun nnaa Jesu Kristi.
52003001	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe ba mu mak yaasun funu kas. Ni aasi, ɓe riɓet funu nee, mun kaghar ni mo, mun ntong Afens mmusun.
52003002	Ku mu lop Timoti so pe wun ɗi. Timoti wuri a ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ndi̶ghi̶n ɗak kì̵ Naan, muu satpo ɗiiret nkaa Jesu Kristi. Mu lop wuri so pe wun ɗi, mpeku wuri caa putughup fuu mo ɗi, ki̶ wuri kám ɗi nwun, ku wu ɗar ɗi ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen fuu.
52003003	Mpeku taji jeel ɗi wun nkaa shwaa ni le, ku memee fuu baa mɓwoon kas. Wun wu man nee, Naan wuri kì̵ ten le ne, mun nyem fi̶ri mo mun nshwaajeel.
52003004	Kaaɗi gyet mun ɗi ashak ki̶ wun, ɓe muu sat nwun nee, ni a ting mun jir mun nshwaajeel. Yaksi wun nkaa naajeel ni, kaaɗi gyet muu ten mu sat nwun si.
52003005	Gyet wan man ne, wun nkaa shwaajeel, a ni le ɗangɓe wan lop Timoti so pe wun, mpeku wan man ɗi. Kyet wuu ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen fuu ni wa? Ba jí wan kuɗi ki̶n mak yaasan kas mpeeɗi ki̶i̶rmuut ɗoghom yaa wan. Wan pan nee, meeɓe ngujwaanpee wuri ki̶ cighi̶r ki̶ wun, mpeku ɗak ɗi gyet mu c`in ni nnaar fuu, ɓe ni ɗee a buu.
52003006	Yaksi Timoti wuri kì̵ j`i pe mun ɗi. Wuri satpo ɗi ni ret mmun nyit, kaaɗi wuu ɗar ɗi ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen fuu ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi, ki̶ wal fuu ni ɓal zak. Wuri sat mmun nee, wuu pan mun shidaar-shidaar shi retnyit, ki̶ ne ɗyen nwun nnaa mun kaaɗi ɗyen mmumun nnaa wun si zak.
52003007	Ɗyemnaa mo, kaaɗi mu ki̶ling nee, cínzeen fuu nii sekiyeen, ɓe koo ɗi mun nkaa shwaajeel, ki̶ mbii mo ɗes moo daampee mmun, ɓe ɗiisi ni, fes ɓam putughup mmun zam. A cínzeen fuu ni ɓam putughup funu mo.
52003008	Yaksi mun nkat ɓal, katɗang wu ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n Daa Jesu.
52003009	Mu pi̶lang Naan ɗiiɗes hakyeng mpee wun, ki̶ mu kat retnyit a kiyeen fi̶ri mpee wun. Mu pi̶lang wuri mpee retnyit ɗi mu kat ni ntoghom kì̵ Naan funu, mpee wun.
52003010	Muu naa nc`in aduwa shidaar-shidaar, par ki̶ puus, mpeku, katɗang mu katpee, ɓe mun nj`i pe wun ɗi, ku mu naa wun ɗi shi yit funu. Ku mu ɓam wun ɗi, ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi moo luk wun ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen fuu ni.
52003011	Muu c`in aduwa nee, Naan puun funu shikáa fi̶ri, ki̶ Daa funu Jesu Kristi wurin nwang ar ni mmun, ku mu so pe wun ɗi.
52003012	Daa wuri le ku wu sekiyeen ki̶ wal ashak ki̶ kaghar gurum mo jir, kaaɗi muu wal nwun si.
52003013	Mpeku wuri c`inɓal ɗi nwun ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo, mpeku mwaan fuu ni ɗee ɗi a ɗiiret, ki̶ ɗiiɓang nyit kì̵ Naan ɗi wuri a puun funu jir, parɗi Daa funu Jesu Kristi wurin mbaaj`i ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi ashak ki̶ nyem fi̶ri ɗiiɓang mo jir.
52004001	Ɗyemnaa mo peekyes ni, muu ɗang pu wun ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Daa Jesu. Wu kám shi mun, kiyeet ki̶ mwaan ɗi mun muu c`in, mpeku ni gam ɗyen kì̵ Naan ɗi. Azeen, wuu ten wu yaa kiyeet kì̵ mwaan mi̶ni, see wu sekiyeen ndi̶ghi̶n mwaan mi̶ni ɗiki̶-ɗiki̶.
52004002	Wu man kám ɗi gyet mu c`in nwun ndi̶ghi̶n ɓal kì̵ Daa Jesu Kristi.
52004003	Naan wuri riɓet ku wu ɗee a ɗiiɓang. Taji wu ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n shikbish ɗi ni a mu ngaa kas.
52004004	Koo weye ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ɓe ni ret ku wuri man kaaɗi wurin nlap mat fi̶ri ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiɓang, ɗi ni ret.
52004005	Ba a shi kyaghar mu nan kas, kaaɗi nyemk`um ɗi ba mo man Naan kas, moo c`in si.
52004006	Taji mee ngo c`in shikbish nkaa ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri ndi̶ghi̶n mbii kaa po ɗik si kas, mpeeɗi Daa wurii kwar nyem ɗi moo c`in kiyeet ki̶ mbii mi̶ni mo jir. Muu ten mu satpo nwun shiɓal nkaa ni.
52004007	Ba Naan wuri pet mun a mpeku mu ɗee ɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n shikbish kas, amma ku mu ɗee ɗi a ɗiiɓang.
52004008	Mpeemi̶ni kat mee gurum kwar kám ɗiisi mo, ɓe ba gwar mi̶ni kwar a gurum kas, amma wuri kwar a Naan, ɗi wurii c`in Riin fi̶ri Ɗiiɓang nwun.
52004009	Ba nii mee koghop ni ku wan ran mee mbii nwun, nkaa wal nɗyemni̶ghi̶n fuu mo kas, mpeeɗi Daa Naan shikáa fi̶ri, wuri kì̵ ten kám nwun kaaɗi wun nwal ɗin nshak zak.
52004010	Azeen, wu wal nyemso ndang Jesu Kristi ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n Masidoniya jir, amma muu ɗang pu wun ɗyemnaa mo, mpeku wu sekiyeen ɗi ki̶ wal ɗiki̶-ɗiki̶, mpee mo jir.
52004011	Wu gung ku wu mwaan ɗi shi mi̶se mu puɗok, mpeku wu naa mbii kì̵ Naan mo ɗiki̶ zak. Mpeku wu c`in ɗak ɗi shi sar fuu mo, kaaɗi gyet mu sat nwun si.
52004012	Katɗang wu c`in mbii ɗi mu sat nwun si mo, ɓe nyem ɗi ba mo cínzeen nDaa Jesu kas, mon ncín ɗiiɗes nwun, ki̶ ba wun ntaa wu kat mɓut mmee mbii kas.
52004013	Ɗyemnaa mo, mu riɓet ku wu man mee mbii hakyeng, nkaa nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap mo, mpeku taji putughup fuu mo wat, kaa nyem ɗi ba mo cínzeen nyaghal a peemúut ni si kas.
52004014	Mun mu cínzeen nee, Jesu wuri kì̵ muut, ki̶ wuri kì̵ baa yaghal a peemúut. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe mu man nee, katɗang Jesu wurin mbaaj`i, ɓe Naan wurin nle ku nyem ɗi mo ki̶ murap ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu, ɓe mon nj`i ashak kì̵ Jesu.
52004015	Po ɗi muu sat nwun si, ni put a pe Daa ɗi shikáa fi̶ri. Katɗang Daa Jesu wurin mbaaj`i ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, ɓe mun nyem ɗi mu kuɗi mmeen, ba a mun ntaa ti̶leng, nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap mo kas.
52004016	Parpuus mmi̶ni, ɓe Daa wurin nɗiyeep ɗoo shiɓal, ki̶ ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes, wurin ntaa feer. Ɗangɓe Daa Jesu wurin nyaghal yit ɗengnaan ku wuri sham ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi. Nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi, a mon nshee yaghal a peemúut ni.
52004017	Mun nyem ɗi mu kuɗii mmeen ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, ɓe Naan wurin nlap mun kàa ki̶ mun ndi̶ghi̶n nluu, mpeku mu kaat ɗiki̶ Jesu nnaar kì̵ ɗengnaan. Yaghal mmi̶ni ɓe mun ntong ashak kì̵ Daa har ngaa-ngaa.
52004018	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wu caa putughup nshak shi po ɗiisi mo.
52005001	Ɗyemnaa mo, ba nii mee koghop ni, ku mu ran mee mbii nwun nkaa parpuus ki̶ peeɗi Daa Jesu wurin mbaaj`i kas.
52005002	Wuu ten wu man po nkaa ni. Wun shikáa fuu, wuu ten wu man nee, parpuus mi̶ni ɓe Daa wurin mbaaj`i a kaa wat ɗii j`i mpar si.
52005003	Ntiit ki̶ mi̶ni, ɓe gurum mon mɓwot sut, ɗang mon nsat nee, "Koo meye, ɓe ni ɗi riyang, ki̶ mbii mo ɗi ndi̶re." Ɗangɓe, nɗin mman, mee jeel ki̶ shwal ntaa nkaa mo, kaa shwal ɗi mat moo ki̶ling ni, kaaɗi mon ndung làa-làa si. Parmi̶ni ɓe ba mee ngo mbar kas koo mi̶ndong.
52005004	Amma wun ɗyemnaa fi̶na mo, ba wun a ndi̶ghi̶n peenkoo kas. Mpeemi̶ni taji parpuus mi̶ni ɗee nwun a mbii aapo, kaaɗi j`i kì̵ wat ki̶ aapo ngurum mo si kas.
52005005	Wun jir, wun a nyem ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n peeɓang, ɗi wuu mwaan mpuus, ba wun a nyem ɗin ndi̶ghi̶n peenkoo mo kas, ɗi moo tong ndi̶ghi̶n peenkoo si kas.
52005006	Mpeemi̶ni, taji wu saam kaaɗi kaghar gurum moo c`in si kas, amma mu yaasun, ku mu tong ɗi shi gongpee.
52005007	Gurum moo saam a mpar, ki̶ gurum moo shwaayughur a mpar,
52005008	amma mun, muu mwaan a mpuus. Mpeemi̶ni ɓe mu yaasun funu mo. Mu sat a nsekiyeen ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen, ki̶ wal ndi̶ghi̶n Daa Jesu. Mpeeɗi ɗiisi mo a kaa nli̶r shaghal, ɗi sooja moo lop ni mpee fwang tughur kì̵ mo, mpeku taji mee mbii tuwaas mo kas si. Ki̶ zak, wu yit ku mu sat a nleyit nkaa Daa Jesu ɗi wurii ɓam mun. Mpeeɗi leyit ɗiisi ni ɗee a kaa mbiikáa shaghal ɗii fwang káa ngurum ndi̶ghi̶n lek si.
52005009	Mu man nee, Naan wuri bi̶lip mun, ba a mpeku mu ɗel ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n jeel ki̶ ɗiyeel fi̶ri kas, amma wuri bi̶lip mun a mpeku mu kat ɓam ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n Daa Jesu Kristi.
52005010	Wuri ɗi wuri muut, mpeku katɗang wurin mbaaj`i, ɓe koo ɗi mu kuɗi mmeen ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni, ki̶ koo ɗi muu ten mu murap, ɓe mun ntong ashak ki̶ wuri.
52005011	Mpeemi̶ni wu cínɓal nshak, ki̶ wu ɓamshak kaaɗi wuu naa nc`in ni si.
52005012	Ɗyemnaa mo, mu ɗang pu wun ku wu c`in ɗiiɗes nyem ɗi moo c`in ɗak pe wun ɗi. Muu sat a nyem ɗi moo fwang wun ndi̶ghi̶n ki̶i̶r kì̵ Daa.
52005013	Wu c`in ɗiiɗes mmo hakyeng, ki̶ wu wal mmo zak, mpee ɗak ɗi moo c`in ni. Wu tongriyang ki̶ shak jir.
52005014	Ɗyemnaa mo, muu ɗang pu wun, mpeku wu gwak nyemseer mo, ɗi sar furu mon nfii. Wuu gang putughup nyem ɗi moo ki̶i̶rmuut mo, ki̶ wu ɓam nyem ɗi ba moo ɓal kas, ki̶ wu gung ki̶ shak jir zak.
52005015	Wu tap, mpeku taji mee ngo kwat ɗiibish shi ɗiibish kas, amma wu gung ku wu c`in ɗiiret ɗin shak ki̶ gurum mo jir, koo pi̶rang ye.
52005016	Wu c`in retnyit koo pi̶rang ye.
52005017	Wu c`in aduwa shidaar-shidaar.
52005018	Ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir, ɓe wu pi̶lang Naan, mpeeɗi nii ret nNaan mpee wun nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ɓal wun kì̵ Jesu Kristi, ku wun c`in zak.
52005019	Taji wu cíi c`in ɗak nRiin kì̵ Naan ɗi wuri ndi̶ghi̶n wun kas.
52005020	Taji wu ɓákpo ɗi mo put a pe Naan ɗi kas.
52005021	Wu kyam mbii mo jir, mpeku wu man ɗi ni a zeen ɗi. Wu yaa mbii ɗi mo a ɗiiret.
52005022	Taji wu c`in mee mbii ɗiibish kas koo diɓen.
52005023	Wan c`in aduwa nee, Naan shikáa fi̶ri, wuri ɗi wuri c`in tongriyang nwun, wurin nle ku wu ɗee a ɗiiɓang ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir. Ndi̶ghi̶n riin fuu mo, ki̶ seen fuu mo, ki̶ suk fuu mo, mpeku wu ɗak suk fuu mo ɗi, mpee puus j`i kì̵ Daa Jesu Kristi, ɓe ba wun nɗen ki̶ mee naashoop kas.
52005024	Naan ɗi wuri pi̶rep wun ba wurin mmak vwet wun kas.
52005025	Ɗyemnaa mo, wu c`in aduwa mpee mun.
52005026	Wu tok ki̶ nyemcínzeen ni mo jir shi tokshik ɗiiɓang, [wu yaa sar nshak ndi̶ghi̶n wal ɗi ni a mu Naan.]
52005027	Ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Daa, ɓe wan ki̶n satpo nwun shiɓal nee, ni a ting wu tang wasika ɗiisi ni nkom kì̵ nyemcínzeen ni mo jir.
52005028	Ɗiiret kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi ni tong ashak ki̶ wun. Amin.
53001001	Wasika ɗiisi ni put a nsar kì̵ Pool ki̶ Silas, ki̶ Timoti. Muu tok ki̶ nyemso ndang Naan ɗi mon nTasoloni, ɗi mo a mu Naan puun funu ki̶ Jesu Kristi.
53001002	Naan puun funu ki̶ Daa Jesu Kristi mo c`in ɗiiret nwun ki̶ tongriyang zak.
53001003	Ɗyemnaa mo, ni a ting ku mu pi̶lang Naan mpee wun shidaar-shidaar. Ni ret ku mun, mu pi̶lang wun aasi zak, mpeeɗi cínzeen fuu ni nkaa wurang hakyeng, ki̶ zak, wal fuu mpee niyee fuu mo nii si̶ghi̶t ɓuɓul.
53001004	A ni le ɗang mun shikáa funu muu canjagham shi wun nyemso ndang Naan mo, mpee gung fuu, ki̶ cínzeen fuu, ki̶ kaaɗi wuu ɗar ɗi ɓal-ɓal jir ki̶ wuu gung ki̶ jeel ɗi wuu shwaa mo shini-shini.
53001005	Mpee mbii ɗi wuu shwaajeel ni mo yaksi, parmee puus ɓe mon nkat wun ki̶ koghop ni mpee mulki kì̵ Naan. Ɗiisi mo ɗee a langting mpee kám nwun nee,
53001006	Naan wuri a ngucanɗiyeel ɗiiret ndi̶re. Mpeemi̶ni, wurin nc`injeel nyem ɗi mo cínjeel nwun.
53001007	Wurin nc`in nookɗi nwun ki̶ mun jir ndi̶ghi̶n jeel ɗi muu shwaa mo yaksi. Mbii ɗiisi mon nɗen aasi parɗi Daa funu Jesu wurin ntong ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan sham. Wurin nkámkáa fi̶ri ashak ki̶ nyemlop fi̶ri ɗiiɓal mo.
53001008	Wurin nj`i shi wus ɗi nii ɓi̶lempee, mpeku wuri kwat nyem ɗi mo kwar Naan ɗi, ki̶ nyem ɗi mo kwarpo ɗiiret nkaa Daa funu Jesu Kristi.
53001009	Kwat ki̶ mo nin nɗee a muut ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa. Ba mon mmak kyam naa yit kì̵ Naan koo ɗiiɗes mu iiko fi̶ri kas, koo diɓen.
53001010	Katɗang wurin mbaaj`i, parpuus ɗiiɗes mi̶ni, ɓe nyem fi̶ri mo jir, mon ncín ɗiiɗes nwuri. Jir nyem ɗi mo cínzeen nwuri, ɓe mon nkwoop wuri, ki̶ wun zak wun nɗee ndi̶ghi̶n nyem ɗi mon nkwoop wuri, mpeeɗi wuu ten wu cínzeen mpo fi̶ri ɗi mun kì̵ sat ni nwun.
53001011	Mpeemi̶ni ɓe muu c`in aduwa mpee wun shidaar-shidaar, mpeku Naan wuri le ku wu ɗee ɗiikoghop ni, mpee zeen ɗi Naan wuri pi̶rep wun mpeemi̶ni. Naan wuri le ku wu mak c`in koo a mbii ɗiiret ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wuu pan c`in ni mpee cínzeen fuu shiɓal fi̶ri.
53001012	A ndi̶ghi̶n kiyeet ki̶ ar ɗiisi, ɓe gurum mon nle ɗiiɗes nsum kì̵ Daa Jesu ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ki̶ wun ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n wuri zak, shi ɗiiret kì̵ Daa Naan funu kì̵ Daa Jesu Kristi.
53002001	Po nkaa baaj`i kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi, ki̶ kuur funu pe wuri ɗi. Ɗyemnaa mo, mu ɗang pu wun,
53002002	taji pan fuu mo ɗee a ɗiicicighi̶r koo ni daampee nwun kas. Mpeeɗi pak gurum moo sat nee, puus kì̵ Daa nii ten baaj`i. Koo ɗi gurum mo satpo mi̶ni a ndi̶ghi̶n Riin, ne puus nii ten ɗel, koo a shi liispo nee, mo aasi. Koo kaaɗi pak mo nkaa sat ni nee, jí mu ran po nwun, nkaa ni aasi ndi̶ghi̶n po ɗi jí mu ran nwun si.
53002003	Taji wu le ku mee gurum num wun kas, koo diɓen. Ba puus ni kì̵ baaj`i kas, see nnaar ɗi gurum mon ncíi tuwap ki̶ mo kwar Naan, nin nshee j`i akuɗang, ki̶ ngo ɗiibish, ɗi wuri ɗee a ɗiili̶lagham, ɗi mon nvwet wuri ndi̶ghi̶n wus, wurin nj`i put agaak akuɗang zak.
53002004	Wurin nc`in lek nkaa mbii ɗi gurum mo ki̶ seyil mmo jir, ki̶ wurin nlekáa fi̶ri a kaa Naan si. A wurin nsat nee, wuɗi met mmo jir, ki̶ zak wurin nɗel ndi̶ghi̶n Lu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes, ki̶ wurin ntong a peetong, ɗangɓe wurin leshin a Naan.
53002005	Ba wu pan kas aa? Ɗyemnaa mo, kaaɗi gyet mun ashak ki̶ wun si, ɓe gyet wan ki̶n ten nsat nwun nee, mbii ɗiisi mo jir mon nɗen aasi.
53002006	Yaksi ɓe, a mee mbii ki̶ yaa wuri baa ki̶ni. Wun shikáa fuu, wu man mbii mi̶ni. Katpee ni wul, ɓe ngo ɗiibish wurin nj`i put agaak.
53002007	Jurung ki̶ ɓal ki̶ ngo ɗiibish ni nkaa c`in ɗak yaksi ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi ni. Amma mee ngo ki̶ yaa wuri baa ki̶ ni mpee reppee ɗiɓen ɗak. Katɗang mo mang ngo ɗi nii yaa wuri baa ki̶ni,
53002008	ɓe ngo ɗiibish ni wurin nj`i put. Amma Daa Jesu wurin ntu ngo ɗiibish ni shi nook kì̵ po fi̶ri. Katɗang Daa Jesu wurin mbaaj`i ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiɗes fi̶ri.
53002009	Katɗang ngo ɗiibish wurin nj`i put, ɓe wurin nj`i a ndi̶ghi̶n ɓal mu Shetan. Wurin nnum gurum mo shi mbii aapo mo ɗes ɗi wurin nc`in mo.
53002010	Wurin nc`in ɗak ki̶ koo mbii ɗiibish ɗiiɗang ye, mpeku wuri num nyem ɗi mon nlagham ɗi. Nyem ɗiisi mo ɗee a ɗiili̶lagham mpeeɗi jí mo kwar cínzeen, ki̶ mo kwar wal nzeen. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe ba mo kat ɓam kas.
53002011	Aasi ɓe, Naan cighi̶r ki̶ pan furu mo, mpeku mo cínzeen ɗi a mbii ɗi ni a ɗung ɓejee ɗak.
53002012	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe mon nɗee a ɗiili̶lagham, mpeeɗi mo kwar cínzeen see mo ki̶ling a shang mu c`in shikbish ɗak.
53002013	Ɗyemnaa funu mo, Daa wuri wal nwun. Mpeemi̶ni ɓe ni ret ku mu pi̶lang Naan mpee wun. Naan wurii ten bi̶lip wun, pugyet ɗin nshee, mpeku wu kat ɓam ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n ɓal kì̵ Riin fi̶ri ɗiiɓang, ɗi wuri le wu ɗee a nyem fi̶ri ɗiiɓang mo shi cínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi ni azeen-nzeen.
53002014	Naan wuri pi̶rep wun, mpeku wu tong ɗi ashak ki̶ Daa Jesu ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiɗes fi̶ri, mpee po ɗiiret ɗi mun kì̵ sat ni nwun.
53002015	Mpeemi̶ni ɗyemnaa mo, wu ɗar ɓal-ɓal, ku wu yaa mbii ɗi gyet mu kám mo ɗi, koo ɗi gyet mu sat a shipo, ki̶ koo ɗi gyet mu sat a shi wasika ɗi gyet mu ran mo nwun zak.
