62001001	Mbii ɗi pugyet ni ɗin nshee, ɗi muu ki̶ling, ɗi muu naa shi yit funu mo, har mu naa ni hakyeng, ki̶ zak, muu tuwaas shi sar funu mo, muu sat a po nkaa Po seen.
62001002	Seen ni j`i put agaak ki̶ muu naa ni, har mun a langting mu seen ni. Muu sat a ni nwun shiɓal, po nkaa seen, seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa, ɗi gyet ni ashak ki̶ puun, har ni j`i put mmun agaak.
62001003	Mbii ɗi mu naa, ki̶ mbii ɗi mu ki̶ling, muu satpo nwun shiɓal a nkaa ni, mpeku wu ɗee ɗi a shaarshak, ki̶ shaar ashak funu ni ashak ki̶ Naan puun ki̶ Làa fi̶ri Daa Jesu Kristi.
62001004	Mu ran mbii ɗiisi mo nwun a mpeku retnyit funu ni gam ɗi hakyeng.
62001005	A po ɗi mu ki̶ling nin nshee pu wuri ɗi nɗiisi, ki̶ mu sat ni nwun zak nee, Naan wuri a peeɓang, ki̶ ba mee peenkoo ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n wuri kas koo diɓen.
62001006	Katɗang mu sat nee, muu shaar ashak ki̶ wuri, ɗangɓe muu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n peenkoo, ɓe mu ɗee a nyemɗung mo, ki̶ ba muu mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n zeen ni kas.
62001007	Amma katɗang muu mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n peeɓang, kaaɗi wuri ndi̶ghi̶n peeɓang ni si, ɓe mun ki̶ shaar ashak ki̶ niyee funu mo, ɗangɓe toghom kì̵ Làa fi̶ri Jesu, ni vwang mun mɓut shikbish mo jir.
62001008	Katɗang mu sat nee, ba mun ki̶ shikbish kas, ɓe muu num a káa funu, ki̶ ba zeen ni ndi̶ghi̶n mun kas.
62001009	Katɗang mu woo shikbish funu mon nNaan, ɓe Naan wurii ɗar nkaa mbii ɗi wuri kì̵ ten sat, ki̶ wurii c`in mbii ndi̶re, wurin nfwo shikbish funu mo jir, ki̶ wurin nvwang mun ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiibish mo jir.
62001010	Katɗang mu sat nee, ba mun kì̵ cín shikbish kas, ɓe mu le Naan wuri ɗee a nguɗung, ɓe ba po fi̶ri ni ndi̶ghi̶n mun kas zak.
62002001	Jep fi̶na ɗiiɗween mo, wan ki̶n ran mbii ɗiisi mo nwun, a mpeku taji wu c`in shikbish kas, amma katɗang mee ngo c`in shikbish, ɓe mun ki̶ Nguɓam ɗi wurin nkatpo mpee mun pe Naan puun ɗi. Ngukatpo ɗiisi a Jesu Kristi ngo ɗin ndi̶re.
62002002	A mpeeɗi Jesu Kristi wuri cín káa fi̶ri, ɗangɓe Naan fwo shikbish funu mo mmun. Ba a shikbish munu ɓejee kas, amma shikbish mu yil ni jir.
62002003	Katɗang mu tap ki̶ waar kì̵ Naan mo, ɓe mu man Naan azeen.
62002004	Ngo ɗi wuri sat ne, wuɗi man Naan, amma katɗang ba gwar mi̶ni tap ki̶ waar kì̵ Naan kas, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a nguɗung, ki̶ zak, ba zeen ni ndi̶ghi̶n gwar mi̶ni kas.
62002005	Amma ngo ɗi wuri tap ki̶ po kì̵ Naan, ɓe a gwar mi̶ni gam ki̶ wal kì̵ Naan hakyeng.
62002006	Koo a weye ɗi wuri sat nee, wuɗii tong a ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu, ɓe ni a ting ku gwar mi̶ni mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan kì̵ Jesu Kristi.
62002007	Shaar fi̶na mo, waar ɗi wan nkaa ran ni nwun si, ba ni a ɗiipoo kas, ni a ɗiisi̶ghi̶r, ɗi wun ki̶ ni pugyet ɗin nshee. Waar ɗiisi̶ghi̶r ni a mbii ɗi wuu ten wu ki̶ling.
62002008	Jir ki̶si, wan a nkaa ran waar ɗiipoo wun, mbii ɗi ni azeen ndi̶ghi̶n seen kì̵ Kristi, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n wun zak, mpeeɗi peenkoo ni nkaa ɗel so, peeɓang ɗi ni azeen-nzeen ni nkaa ɓangpee.
62002009	Ngo ɗi wuri sat nee, wuɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n peeɓang ni, amma katɗang wurii kwar ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ɓe gwar mi̶ni ɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n peenkoo har yaksi.
62002010	Gwar ɗi wuri wal ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a ndi̶ghi̶n peeɓang. Ba mee mbii ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n gwar mi̶ni ɗi nin nle canshii nwuri kas.
62002011	Amma ngo ɗi wuri kwar ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a ndi̶ghi̶n peenkoo, ki̶ gwar mi̶ni ki̶ mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n peenkoo zak, ki̶ zak, ba wuri man peeɗi wurii so ɗi kas, mpeeɗi peenkoo ni kì̵ vum yit fi̶ri ni mo.
62002012	Wan ran nwun, jep ɗiiɗween mo, mpeeɗi Naan wuri kì̵ fwo shikbish fuu mo nwun mpee sum kì̵ Jesu Kristi.
62002013	Wan nkaa ran ni nwuwun puun mo, mpeeɗi wu man wuri, ɗi wuri ɗi pugyet ɗin nshee kì̵ yil ni. Wan nkaa ran nwun jepzi̶lang mo, mpeeɗi wun wuu se koghorong nkaa ngo ɗiibish ni. Wan nkaa ran ni wun njep mo, mpeeɗi wuu man puun ni.
62002014	Wan ran nwun puun mo, mpeeɗi wu man wuri, ɗi wuri ɗi pugyet ɗin nshee kì̵ yil ni. Wan ran nwun jepzi̶lang mo, mpeeɗi wun a ɗiiɓal, ki̶ mpeeɗi po kì̵ Naan ni ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo, ki̶ wuu se koghorong nkaa ngo ɗiibish ni.
62002015	Taji wu wal nyil ni kas, koo a mbii ɗi mo a mu yil ni. Katɗang mee gurum wal nyil ni, ɓe ba wal kì̵ Naan ni ndi̶ghi̶n gwar mi̶ni kas.
62002016	Mpeeɗi mbii ɗi mo a mu nan jir ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni, kaa kyaghar mu yit, ki̶ roghop mu seen ɗiiyaksi, ba mo a mu Naan puun kas, amma mo jir mo a mu yil ɗiisi.
62002017	Yil ɗiisi ni, ki̶ mbii ɗi gurum moo kyaghar ndi̶ghi̶n ni jir, ni nkaa ɗel so sí, amma jir ngo ɗi wuri c`in ɗyen kì̵ Naan, ɓe a gwar mi̶nin nkat seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa.
62002018	Jep fi̶na mo, pee ni kus ki̶ kyes kì̵ yil ni, kaaɗi wuu ki̶ling nee, ngo ɗi wuri kwar Kristi wurii j`i, koo ni a yaksi, ɓe nyem ɗi mo kwar Kristi mo kì̵ ten j`i. Mpeemi̶ni ɓe mu man nee, kyes kì̵ yil ni kus.
62002019	Mon nyaghal pwat a ndi̶ghi̶n mun, mpeeɗi ba jí tong ashak furu ki̶ mun ni azeen-nzeen kas. Mpeeɗi katɗang ɗi jí mo a ndi̶ghi̶n mun azeen-nzeen, ɓe ɗi mon nsat a nsekiyeen ndi̶ghi̶n tong ashak ki̶ mun vit ɗak. Amma mo pwat so, a mpeku gurum mo naa ɗi agaak nee, ba jí mo a munu kas.
62002020	Amma wuwun, ɓe Kristi wuri kì̵ ten ɗoo Riin fi̶ri Ɗiiɓang nkaa wun, mpeemi̶ni ɓe wun, wu man mbii ɗi mo azeen jir.
62002021	Wan ki̶n ran nwun, ba nee, wu nook a man zeen ni kas, amma a mpeeɗi wu man zeen ni. Wu man zak nee, ba mee ɗung kì̵ kyam put ndi̶ghi̶n zeen kas.
62002022	A we a nguɗung ye? Nguɗung ni a, jir ngo ɗi wuri cíipo nee, ba Jesu wuri a Kristi ɗi Naan lop kas. Ngo mi̶ni a shaarlek kì̵ Jesu, ki̶ a ngo mi̶ni kwar, ki̶ cíipo kì̵ Naan puun ki̶ Làa fi̶ri Jesu.
62002023	Jir ngo ɗi wuri kwar Làa ni, ɓe ba gwar mi̶ni wuri ki̶ Naan puun ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri kas. Jir ngo ɗi wuri lap Làa ni, ɓe gwar mi̶ni kì̵ lap Naan puun ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri mi̶ni zak.
62002024	Wu yit ku mbii ɗi gyet wu ki̶ling nin nshee, ni tong ndi̶ghi̶n wun. Katɗang mbii ɗi gyet wu ki̶ling nin nshee, ni tong ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ɓe wun wu tong ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n Naan puun fi̶ri zak.
62002025	Naan wuri c`in seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa mmun, a ni a mbii ɗi Jesu wuri kì̵ ten sat nee, wuɗin ncín mmun.
62002026	Wan ki̶n ran ɗiisi nwun, a nkaa nyem ɗi moo riɓet num wun.
62002027	Amma mpeeɗi Kristi wuri kì̵ ten ɗoo Riin Ɗiiɓang nkaa wun, ki̶ zak, katɗang Riin fi̶ri ni tong ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ɓe ba ni ki̶ mee koghop ni ku mee ngo kám mee mbii nwun kas. Mpeeɗi Riin fi̶ri ni kì̵ kám mbii mo nwun jir, ki̶ zak, mbii ɗi Riin ni kám nwun, ɓe ni azeen-nzeen, ba a ɗung kas. Wu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n kám kì̵ Riin ni, ki̶ wu tong ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi zak.
62002028	Yaksi jep fi̶na mo, wu tong ndi̶ghi̶n wuri, mpeku parpuus ɗi wurin nj`i put ɗi agaak, ɓe taji mee yitluwaan koo ki̶i̶rmuut yaa mun parpuus ɗi wurin mbaaj`i kas.
62002029	Katɗang wu man nee, Kristi wuri a ngo ɗin ndi̶re, ɓe wu man azeen-nzeen nee, jir ngo ɗi wuri c`in mbii ɗiiret, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a làa kì̵ Naan.
62003001	Kai! wu naa wal ɗi Naan puun funu wuri wal mmun, har wuri pet mun a jep kì̵ Naan mo. Azeen mun a jep kì̵ Naan mo. Mbii ɗi ni le, ɗangɓe ba yil ni man mun kas, a mpeeɗi ba yil ni kì̵ man Naan kas.
62003002	Mun a jep kì̵ Naan mo yaksi. Ba mo kì̵ kám mmun yaksi, kaaɗi mun nyaghal mu ɗen ɗi si kas aku. Amma mu man nee, katɗang Kristi wurin mbaaj`i, ɓe mun nɗee a kaa wuri si, mpeeɗi parpuus mi̶ni, ɓe mun nnaa wuri ndi̶ghi̶n shin fi̶ri ki̶nɗing.
62003003	Jir ngo ɗi leyit nkaa Kristi, ɓe ni a ting gwar mi̶ni ɗee a ɗiiɓang kaaɗi Kristi wuri a ɗiiɓang si.
62003004	Jir ngo ɗi wuri c`in shikbish, ɓe gwar mi̶ni tep a Waar kì̵ Naan. Shikbish ni a tep Waar kì̵ Naan.
62003005	Wu man nee, gyet Kristi wuri sham ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, a mpeku wuri mang shikbish funu mo ɗi. Ba mee shikbish ndi̶ghi̶n wuri kas, koo diɓen.
62003006	Jir ngo ɗi wuri tong ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi, ɓe ba wurin nki̶i̶ sat a nc`in shikbish kas. Ngo ɗi wurii sat a nc`in shikbish ɗak, ɓe ba gwar mi̶ni ki̶ kyam naa Kristi, koo man wuri kas.
62003007	Jep fi̶na ɗiiɗween mo, taji wu le ku mee gurum num wun kas. Ngo ɗi wuri c`in mbii ɗiiret, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a ɗin ndi̶re, kaaɗi Kristi wuri a ngo ɗin ndi̶re si.
62003008	Ngo ɗi wuri c`in shikbish, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a mu Shetan, mpeeɗi gyet Shetan wuri c`in shikbish, pugyet ɗin nshee har yaksi. Mbii ɗi ni le ɗang gyet Làa kì̵ Naan wuri j`i ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, a mpeku wuri tu ɗak kì̵ Shetan mo ɗi jir.
62003009	Ba mee ngo ɗi wuri a mu Naan, wurin mmak tong ndi̶ghi̶n shikbish vit kas, mpeeɗi wuri a mu Naan.
62003010	Ni aasi zak, mu man nyem ɗi mo a jep kì̵ Naan mo agaak, ki̶ nyem ɗi mo a jep kì̵ Shetan mo zak. Jir ngo ɗi wuri c`in mbii ɗiibish, ɓe ba gwar mi̶ni a ngo kì̵ Naan kas, ki̶ zak, ngo ɗi wuri kwar ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ɓe ba gwar mi̶ni a ngo kì̵ Naan kas.
62003011	Po ɗi wu ki̶ling nshee ni nɗiisi, ne mu walnshak.
62003012	Taji mu ɗee kaa Kein si kas, mpeeɗi gyet wuri a mu Shetan, har wuri tu ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri. Gyet a me le ɗangɓe wuri tu ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri ye? Mpeeɗi gyet pan fi̶ri ni mo a ɗiibish, amma gyet mu ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri mo a ɗiiret.
62003013	Taji ni ɗee nwun a mbii aapo kas ɗyemnaa mo, katɗang yil ɗiisi ni kwar wun.
62003014	Mu man nee, muu yaghal mu yit peemúut, ku mo ɗel ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa, mpeeɗi mu wal nɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu mo. Ngo ɗi ba wuri wal ngurum mo kas, ɓe wurii tong ɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n peemúut.
62003015	A ngo ɗi wuri kwar ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ɓe ngo mi̶ni a ngutukáa, ki̶ wu man nee, ba seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa nin ntong ndi̶ghi̶n nyemtukáa mo kas.
62003016	Mu man wal ni aasi si, Jesu wuri cín seen fi̶ri mpee mun. Ni ret ku mu ɗak sun, mpeku mu cín seen funu ɗi mpee ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu mo.
62003017	Amma katɗang mee gwar ki̶ long mu yil ɗiisi, ɗangɓe gwar mi̶ni naa mee ɗyemni̶ghi̶n mɓut njeel, amma wuri kwar ɓam ngujeel ni. Ɓe c`in arang ɗang mun nsat nee, wal kì̵ Naan ki̶ tong ndi̶ghi̶n putughup kì̵ ngulong mi̶ni ye?
62003018	Jep fi̶na ɗiiɗween mo, taji wu walnshak a shi mi̶shpoo kas, amma mu walnshak ndi̶ghi̶n ɗak ɗiiret mo, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n zeen zak.
62003019	A ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiisi, ɗangɓe mu man nee, mun a mu zeen ni. Ni aasi, ɓe mun nɗar ntoghom kì̵ Naan, ba a shi yitluwaan kas.
62003020	Katɗang putughup funu mo tokɗiyeel ɗiibish mun, ɓe mu man nee, Naan wuri ɗes met mputughup funu mo, ki̶ wuri man mbii mo jir.
62003021	Wun ɗi wan wal nwun, katɗang ba putughup funu mo tokɗiyeel ɗiibish mmun kas, ɓe mun mmak ɗar pe Naan ɗi, nɗin naashoop.
62003022	Ki̶ zak, koo meye ɗi mu ɗang pu Naan, ɓe wurin ncín mmun, a mpeeɗi muu kiyeer Waar fi̶ri mo, ki̶ mu c`in mbii ɗi mo ret wurin nyit zak.
62003023	Mbii ɗi Naan wuri sat ne, mu c`in ni nɗiisi, nee; ni a ting ku mu cínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Làa fi̶ri Jesu Kristi, ki̶ zak, nee mu walnshak ntiit-ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi wuri sat ne mu c`in mo.
62003024	Jir nyem ɗi moo tap ki̶ Waar kì̵ Naan, ɓe moo tong a ndi̶ghi̶n wuri, ki̶ wuri ndi̶ghi̶n mo zak. Mpee Riin Ɗiiɓang ɗi Naan wuri cín mmun, ɓe yaksi mu man nee, Naan wurii tong ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu mo.
62004001	Wun ɗi wan wal nwun, taji wu cínzeen koo a riin ɗiiɗang ye kas, amma wu kyam riin ni mo, ku wu man ɗi nee, kyet mo a mu Naan wa? Koo mo a mu Shetan ye? Mpeeɗi nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan mu ɗung mo ɗi, koo pee ɗiiɗang ye.
62004002	Wun mman Riin ɗi ni a mu Naan ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiisi, koo a riin ɗiiɗang ye ɗi ni sat nee. Gyet Jesu Kristi wuri j`i ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi a ndi̶ghi̶n nan, ɓe riin mi̶ni a Riin kì̵ Naan.
62004003	Amma koo riin ɗiiɗang ye, ɗi ni cíipo nee, ba gyet Jesu Kristi wuri j`i ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi ni a ndi̶ghi̶n nan kas, ɓe ba riin mi̶ni a mu Naan kas. Riin mi̶ni a riin ɗi nii kwar Kristi; ɗi jí wu ki̶ling ne, nin nɗung j`i. Amma yaksi ni kì̵ ten j`i wul ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni jee.
62004004	Jep fi̶na ɗiiɗween mo, wun a mu Naan, wun kì̵ se koghorong nkaa riin ɗi mo kwar Jesu Kristi, mpeeɗi Riin kì̵ Naan ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ni ɓal met nriin ɗi mo kwar Jesu Kristi, ɗi mo ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni.
62004005	Mo a mu yil ɗiisi, mpeemi̶ni, ɓe mbii ɗi moo sat jir, ni a mu yil ɗiisi, ki̶ yil ɗiisi nii ki̶ling mo.
62004006	Amma wuwun, a mu Naan, koo a weye ɗi wuri man Naan, ɓe wurii lekom mpee ki̶ling mun. Ngo ɗi ba wuri man Naan kas, ɓe ba wurin nlekom mpee ki̶ling mun kas. A shi ɗiisi, ɗangɓe mu man riin ɗi ni azeen ki̶ riin ɗi ni a mu ɗung.
62004007	Wun ɗi wan wal nwun, wu yit ku mu walnshak, mpeeɗi wal ni put a pe Naan ɗi. Koo weye ɗi wuri wal ngurum mo, ɓe wuri a ngo kì̵ Naan, ki̶ wuri man Naan zak.
62004008	Ngo ɗi ba wuri wal ngurum mo kas, ɓe ba ngo mi̶ni man Naan kas, mpeeɗi Naan wuri a wal.
62004009	Naan wuri kám wal fi̶ri ni mmun, a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiisi. Wuri lop Làa fi̶ri ɗiimi̶ndong sham ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, mpeku mu kat seen ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n sum fi̶ri.
62004010	A wal ni nɗiisi nee, ba a mun shee wal nNaan kas, amma a Naan wuri shee wal mmun, har wuri lop Làa fi̶ri sham ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, mpeku wuri ɗee ɗi a ar ɗi Naan nfwo shikbish funu mo ɗi mmun.
62004011	Wun ɗi wan wal nwun, katɗang Naan wuri fes wal mmun aasi, ɓe ni ret ku mu walnshak aasi zak.
62004012	Ba mee gurum kì̵ kyam naa Naan kas, amma katɗang mu walnshak, ɓe Naan ki̶ tong ndi̶ghi̶n mun, ki̶ wal fi̶ri ni ɗee a ɗin ndi̶re ndi̶ghi̶n mun zak.
62004013	Mpeeɗi Naan wuri kì̵ cín Riin fi̶ri mmun, ɓe yaksi mu man nee, muu tong a ndi̶ghi̶n wuri zak.
62004014	Ki̶ zak, muu ten mu naa, ki̶ mu c`in langting ni nee, puun wuri kì̵ ten lop Làa fi̶ri sham, ku wuri ɗee ɗi a Nguɓam mu yil ɗiisi.
62004015	Koo a weye ɗi wuri wangpo ku wuri sat ɗi nee, Jesu a Làa kì̵ Naan, ɓe Naan ndi̶ghi̶n ngo mi̶ni, ki̶ ngo mi̶ni ndi̶ghi̶n Naan zak.
62004016	Mun shikáa funu mu man, ki̶ mu cínzeen nwal ɗi Naan wuri ki̶ ni mpee mun. Naan wuri a wal, koo a weye ɗi wurii mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n wal fi̶ri shidaar-shidaar, ɓe gwar mi̶nii tong a ndi̶ghi̶n Naan, ki̶ Naan ki̶ tong ndi̶ghi̶n putughup kì̵ gwar mi̶ni zak.
62004017	Wal ni ɗee ndi̶ghi̶n mun, a mpeku taji mu kat naashoop parpuus tokɗiyeel ni kas, mpeeɗi muu mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan kì̵ Daa Jesu ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi.
62004018	Ba mee ki̶i̶rmuut ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n wal kas. Wal ɗi ni azeen, nii ceen ki̶i̶rmuut jir. Ki̶i̶rmuut ki̶ j`i, a mpee kwat ɗiibish, mpee mbii ɗiibish ɗi gurum kì̵ c`in. Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶i̶rmuut, ɓe ba wal ni ɗar ndi̶re-ndi̶re ndi̶ghi̶n wuri kas.
62004019	Muu wal Naan, a mpeeɗi Naan wuri shee wal mmun.
62004020	Katɗang mee gurum sat nee, wuɗi wal nNaan, amma wurii kwar ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a nguɗung. Mpeeɗi katɗang ba gurum wal nɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ɗi wurii naa shi yit shidaar-shidaar kas, ɓe ba gwar mi̶ni mmak wal nNaan, ɗi ba wuri kì̵ kyam naa wuri kas.
62004021	A Waar ɗi mu lap pe Naan ɗi nɗiisi, nee gwar ɗi wuri wal nNaan, ɓe ni a ting ku gwar mi̶ni wal nɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri zak.
62005001	Koo ngo ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wuri cínzeen nee, Jesu wuri a Kristi ɗi Naan lop, ɓe ngo mi̶ni a gwar kì̵ Naan, ki̶ koo ngo ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wuri wal mpuun, ɓe ngo mi̶ni wal nLàa ni zak.
62005002	Katɗang mu wal nNaan ki̶ mu tap waar fi̶ri mo, ɓe mu man nee, muu wal nyem kì̵ Naan mo zak.
62005003	A wal funu ni pe Naan nɗiisi, mu tap ki̶ waar fi̶ri mo. Ba waar kì̵ Naan ni mo met mmun mɓal kas,
62005004	mpeeɗi koo a ngo kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗang ye, wurii mak se koghorong nkaa yil ɗiisi ni. Muu se koghorong nkaa yil ɗiisi ni, a mpeeɗi mu cínzeen nNaan.
62005005	A we mak se koghorong nkaa yil ni ye? See a ngo ɗi wuri cínzeen nee, Jesu wuri a Làa kì̵ Naan.
62005006	Jesu Kristi wuri a ngo ɗi gyet wuri j`i, ɓe mo c`in baptisma wuri shi am, ki̶ gyet wuri ɓeer toghom fi̶ri, kaaɗi gyet mo pwas wuri nkaa shiyeepyoghom si. Ba gyet mo c`in baptisma wuri a shi am ɓejee ɗak kas. Amma gyet wuri ɓeer toghom fi̶ri,
62005007	ki̶ Riin Ɗiiɓang wuri a langting kì̵ mi̶ni, ki̶ zak, Riin Ɗiiɓang wuri azeen.
62005008	Langting mo ɗi kun, Riin, ki̶ am, ki̶ toghom mo jir kun mo c`in langting a nkaa mbii ɗiimi̶ndong.
62005009	Muu lap langting ɗi gurum mo sat, amma langting kì̵ Naan ni nɗiisi. Naan wuri c`in langting nee, "Jesu Kristi wuri a Làa fi̶ri"
62005010	Mpeemi̶ni; koo a weye ɗi wuri cínzeen nLàa kì̵ Naan, ɓe gwar mi̶ni ki̶ langting kì̵ Naan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri. Amma ngo ɗi ba wuri cínzeen nNaan kas, ɓe gwar mi̶ni le Naan a nguɗung, mpeeɗi ba gwar mi̶ni ncínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n langting ɗi Naan c`in nkaa Làa fi̶ri kas.
62005011	A langting ni nɗiisi, nee, Naan wuri cín seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa mmun, seen ɗiisi ni a ndi̶ghi̶n Làa fi̶ri.
62005012	Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ Làa kì̵ Naan, ɓe ngo mi̶ni ki̶ seen, amma ngo ɗi ba wuri ki̶ Làa kì̵ Naan kas, ɓe ba ngo mi̶ni ki̶ seen kas.
62005013	Wan ran po ɗiisi mo nwun, a mpeku wu man ɗi nee, wun ɗi wu cínzeen nLàa kì̵ Naan, ɓe wu kat seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa.
62005014	Ba mun ki̶ mee naashoop ntoghom kì̵ Naan kas, mpeeɗi mu cínzeen nee, wurii ki̶ling mun, katɗang mu ɗang mee mbii pu wuri, ɗi nin ntiit-ntiit ki̶ ɗyen fi̶ri.
62005015	Katɗang mu man nee, wurii ki̶ling mun, ndi̶ghi̶n koo meye ɗi mu ɗang pu wuri, ɓe mu man nee, wuri kì̵ ten c`in mun mbii ɗi mu ɗang pu wuri ni.
62005016	Katɗang mee ngo naa mee ɗyemni̶ghi̶n nkaa c`in mee shikbish ɗi ba nin nso ki̶ wuri a peemúut kas, ɓe gwar mi̶ni c`in aduwa nNaan, mpeku Naan cín seen ɗi ngo ɗi wuri kì̵ ten c`in shikbish ni. Muu sat ɗiisi ni a mpee shikbish ɗi ba ni wul ki̶ mo a peemúut kas. Mee shikbish ni ɗi, ɗi nin nso ki̶ gurum a peemúut, ba wan ki̶n sat nee, ɗi mee gurum nc`in aduwa a mpee mi̶ni kas.
62005017	Ɗak ɗiibish mo jir a shikbish, amma mee shikbish ɗi, ɗi ba ni mak so ki̶ gurum a peemúut kas.
62005018	Mu man nee, ngo ɗi wuri a gwar kì̵ Naan, ba wurin nsat a nc`in shikbish vit kas. Mpeeɗi Jesu Làa kì̵ Naan wurii tap fwang ngo mi̶ni, ki̶ ba Shetan mak cínjeel wuri kas.
62005019	Mu man nee, mun a mu Naan, koo ɗi yil ɗiisi ni a nder kì̵ Shetan.
62005020	Mu man nee, Làa kì̵ Naan wuri kì̵ ten j`i, ki̶ wuri jí cín man mmun zak, mpeku mu man Naan ɗi wuri azeen ɗi. Mun a ndi̶ghi̶n wuri, ɗi wuri azeen, ndi̶ghi̶n Làa fi̶ri Jesu Kristi. A wuri a Naan ɗi azeen, ki̶ seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa.
62005021	Jep ɗiiɗween mo, taji wu ɓàlkáa fuu mo ashak ki̶ k`um kas.
63001001	Wasika ɗiisi ni put a nsar fi̶na ngunan, so pe wii ɗi, mat ɗiibi̶bi̶lip, ki̶ jep fii mo. Wii ɗi wan ki̶n wal yi ndi̶ghi̶n zeen, ba a wan ɓejee ɗak kas, amma jir ki̶ nyem ɗi mo man zeen ni.
63001002	Mpeeɗi zeen ɗi ni tong ndi̶ghi̶n mun yaksi, nin ntong ndi̶ghi̶n mun har vit.
63001003	Daa Naan puun ki̶ Làa fi̶ri Jesu Kristi, mo c`in ɗiiret mmun, ki̶ mo naa mun shi yit naajeel, ki̶ tongriyang. Ɗiisi mon nɗee ashak ki̶ mun ndi̶ghi̶n zeen ki̶ wal zak.
63001004	Ni ret nwan nyit zam, mpeeɗi wan kat pak jep fii moo mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n zeen ni, ntiit ki̶ kaaɗi puun wuri sat ne, mu c`in si.
63001005	Yaksi wan ki̶n ɗang pu yi naa, yi yit ku mu walnshak. Ba ɗiisi ni a mee waar ɗiipoo ɗi wan ran ni nyi kas, amma a ɗi mun ki̶ ni pugyet ɗin nshee.
63001006	A wal ni nɗiisi, nee, mu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n waar fi̶ri mo. Ɗiisi ni a waar ni, kaaɗi wuu ki̶ling nshee si, nee, wu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n wal.
63001007	Nyemnumpee mo ɗes, mo kì̵ ɗel ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni jir. Nyem ɗi mo cíipo nee, ba gyet Jesu wuri j`i ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi a ndi̶ghi̶n nan kas. Kiyeet kì̵ nyem mi̶ni mo a nyemnumpee mo, ki̶ a mo a shaarlek kì̵ Kristi.
63001008	Wu tap ki̶ káa fuu mo, mpeku taji wu vwet mbii ɗi gyet muu ten mu c`in ɗak mpee ni si kas, amma wu gung, ku wu lap kwat ni ɗi.
63001009	Koo a weye ɗi wuri so akiyeen, amma katɗang ba wuri mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n kám kì̵ Daa Jesu kas, ɓe ba wuri ki̶ Naan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri kas. Amma jir ngo ɗi wuri mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n kám kì̵ Daa Jesu, ɓe gwar mi̶ni ki̶ Naan puun ki̶ Jesu Làa fi̶ri ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri.
63001010	Katɗang mee gurum j`i pe wun ɗi, ɗang ba gwar mi̶ni j`i aa kám ɗiisi nwun kas, ɓe taji wu lap wuri wu le ntulu fuu mo, koo wu kaat gwar mi̶ni kas.
63001011	Mpeeɗi jir ngo ɗi wuri tok ki̶ gwar mi̶ni, ki̶ ngo ɗi wuri lap gwar mi̶ni zak, ɓe wurii ɓal a káa ashak ki̶ gwar mi̶ni ndi̶ghi̶n ɗak fi̶ri ɗiibish mo.
63001012	Koo ɗi wan ki̶ mbii mo ɗes mpee ran mo nwun, ɓe ba wan nran mo nwun shi haal mu takarda ki̶ ing kas, amma wan ki̶n lepan nee, wan nj`i kun naa wun ɗi, ku mu katpo ɗi ashak zak, mpeku retnyit funu ni gam ɗi.
63001013	Jep kì̵ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fii ɗiibi̶bi̶lip, moo tok ki̶ yi.
64001001	Wasika ɗiisi ni put a nsar fi̶na ngunan, so pe wugha Gayus ɗi, ɗi wan wal nwugha ndi̶ghi̶n zeen.
64001002	Shaar fi̶na, wan ki̶n c`in aduwa pe wugha, mpeku a kat ɗiiret ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir, ki̶ zak, mpeku a tong ɗi nkagham, kaaɗi seen fugha ni kat ɗiiret si.
64001003	Ni ret nwan nyit zam, kaaɗi pak ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu mo j`i satpo ɗiiret nwan nkaa wugha nee, aa ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen ni, ki̶ kaaɗi wugha ki̶ mwaan ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen ni si zak.
64001004	Ba mee retnyit ɗi wan ki̶ ni waa met nɗiisi kas, ku wan ki̶ling nee, jep fi̶na moo mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen ni.
64001005	Shaar fi̶na, aa ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n ɗak ɗi aa c`in ni mpee ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu nyemso ndang Jesu mo, har met jir ɓe a mpee mi̶zep mo.
64001006	Mo kì̵ satpo nyemso ndang Naan ɗin mpesi mo nkaa wal fugha ni. Nin nret zam katɗang wugha ɓam mo mɓut mwaan furu, ɓe nin nɗee a mbii ɗi nin nret Naan nyit.
64001007	Mpeeɗi mo yaghal yaa mwaan ni a mpee sum kì̵ Daa. Ba mon nwaa lap mee mbii pu nyemk`um mo kas.
64001008	Mpeemi̶ni, ni ret ku mumun nyemso ndang Jesu mo, mu lap nyem mi̶ni mo ndi̶ghi̶n lu funu mo, mpeku mu ɗee ɗi a shaar ɗak ashak ki̶ mo ndi̶ghi̶n zeen ni.
64001009	Wan ki̶n ran mee mbii nyemso ndang Naan ni mo, amma Diyoturifis ɗi wuri fes leshin a ɗiiɗes mɓut mmo, wuri kwar lappo funu.
64001010	Katɗang wan j`i, ɓe wan nsat nwuri mbii ɗi wurii c`in ni nkaa mun. Po ɗiibuu ɗi wurii naa nsat ni nkaa mun, ba mi̶ni mak wuri kas, har wuri kwar lap nyemso ndang Jesu mo ndi̶ghi̶n tulu fi̶ri zak, ki̶ wuri cíi nyem ɗi moo riɓet lap mo ndi̶ghi̶n tulu furu mo. Har wuri pwat ki̶ nyem ɗi moo riɓet kaat mi̶zep ni mo ndi̶ghi̶n nyemso ndang Naan ni mo!
64001011	Wugha ɗi wan wal nwugha si, taji a mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiibish mo kas, amma a mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiiret mo. Koo weye ɗi wurii c`in mbii ɗiiret, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a mu Naan. Amma jir ngo ɗi wurii c`in mbii ɗiibish, ɓe ba gwar mi̶ni man Naan kas koo diɓen.
64001012	Gurum mo jir mo satpo ɗiiret nkaa Dimitiriyus, har zeen ni shikáa fi̶ra ni kì̵ c`in langting ɗiiret nkaa wuri zak. Mumun zak, mun a langting fi̶ri, wugha man nee, mbii ɗi muu sat ni mo azeen.
64001013	Wan ki̶ mbii mo ɗes mpee ran mo nwugha, amma ba wan nran wugha a shi haal ki̶ ing kas.
64001014	Wan kì̵ lepan nee, kat mun nkaat, ɗangɓe mun nkatpo ki̶ shak yit ki̶ yit hakyeng.
64001015	Wu tongriyang. Shaar funu moo tok ki̶ wugha. A tok ki̶ shaar funu mo jir, koo weye ndi̶ghi̶n mo.
65001001	Juud ki̶rom mu Jesu Kristi, ɗyemni̶ghi̶n kì̵ Jemis so pe nyem ɗiipi̶pi̶rep mo, ɗi Naan puun wuri wal mmo, ki̶ mo ɗee a ɗi fufwang ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi.
65001002	Kussuk kì̵ Naan, ki̶ riyang, ki̶ wal fi̶ri, mo sat a nwurang ndi̶ghi̶n wun ɗak.
65001003	Wun ɗi wan wal nwun si mo, gyet wan ki̶n fes nlepan, mpeku wan ran ɗi nwun nkaa cínzeen ɗi mun ki̶ ni ashak. Amma mee pan le kun ran nwun, mpeku wan caa wun, ku wu sekiyeen ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n lek, mpee cínzeen ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten cín nyem fi̶ri mo, yit mi̶ndong ɓejee har mpee vit.
65001004	Mpeeɗi pak gurum mo ɗi, ɗi ba mo man Naan kas. Moo tap j`i ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n mun a si̶sok. Nyem ɗi mo cighi̶r ki̶ po kì̵ Naan ki̶ ɗiiret fi̶ri, mpeku mo katpee c`in mbii ɗiibish mu nan mo ɗi. Ki̶ zak, moo cíipo kì̵ Daa Jesu Kristi. Ki̶ mo kwar wuri ɗi wuri a Daa funu kì̵ Nguɓam funu. Pugyet mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan, po nkaa kwat furu ɗi mon nlap ni a muut.
65001005	Koo ɗi wuu ten wu man mbii ɗiisi mo jir, amma wan ki̶n riɓet le a pan nwun, kaaɗi gyet Naan wuri put ki̶ nyem Isreil mo nyil Ijip. Amma aɓwoon kì̵ mi̶ni, ɓe gyet Naan wuri twa nyem ɗi mo kwar cínzeen.
65001006	Ki̶ zak, wu man nee, nyemlop kì̵ Naan ɗi mo aɗeng, ɗi mo kwar peetong furu, mpeku mo tang peetong ɗi ni ɗes met ɗi Naan kì̵ cín mmo, ɓe mo ɓwaghat mo shi ti̶sek ɗii ngaa-ngaa ndi̶ghi̶n peeɗi ni nkoo ɗiirap shek-shek. Naan wuri le mo a peemi̶ni, har parpuus ɗiyeel nin nj`i wul. Parɗi Naan wurin ncanɗiyeel ɗiibish ɗi mmo.
65001007	Ni aasi zak, ɓe taji wu mander nyil nSodom ki̶ Gomora, ki̶ yil ɗi mo kus ki̶ mo kas. Gyet yil ɗiisi mo cín káa furu mo, mpee c`in ngaa ki̶ mbii ɗiibish mo. Mo lap kwat kì̵ shikbish mi̶ni mo a ndi̶ghi̶n wus ɗi ni so ngaa-ngaa. Ɗiisi ni ɗee a mbiikám ngurum mo jir.
65001008	Ni a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiisi, ɓe nyem ɗiisi mo naa sughun mo, ɗi ni le ku mo waa cighi̶r c`in shikbish nkaa sut furu mo. Mo kwar ɗiiɗes kì̵ Naan, ki̶ mo satpo ɗiibish nkaa nyem ɗiiret mo ɗi mo, ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan.
65001009	Mbii ɗi koo a Makiyel ɗi wuri a ngo ɗiiɗes mu nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo, ba wuri mak sat ni kas. Kaaɗi gyet Makiyel ki̶ Shetan mon njighi̶r nkaa kúm kì̵ Mosis, ɓe ba Makiyel mak wangpo, mpeku wuri kàss Shetan ɗi kas, amma wuri sat nee, "a Daa wurin ngwak wugha ɗak."
65001010	Amma nyem ɗiisi mo cínkáa nkaa mbii mo jir, ɗi ba mo man shii ni kas, ki̶ mbii ɗi mo man ni shi pan mu nan. Mo a kaa long mo si. A mbii mi̶ni moo waa cighi̶r twa mo.
65001011	Jeel mpee mo, mpeeɗi moo mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n ar kì̵ Kein, ki̶ mpee tang li̶ɓet mu shaghal, ɓe mo cínkáa furu, ku mo mwaan ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗi gyet Balam taa pal ɗi. Mo ɗee a nyemkáaɓál mo, nyemciishik mo, kaaɗi gyet Kora ɗee si. Mon mmurap a kaaɗi gyet Kora muut si.
65001012	Ɗiisi mo ɗee a kaa mi̶mer ɗi nii wat shin kì̵ gurum si, ki̶ mo ɗee a kaa pee ɗiirap si ndi̶ghi̶n wun, kaaɗi wun nkaa se tong ashak fuu. Moo tap aa káa furu mo ɓejee ɗak. Mo a kaa nluu fwan ɗi kut ki̶ mang ni so ki̶ ni si, ɗi ba ni mak kyam j`i ki̶ fwan kas. Mo a kaa ting ɗi ni kwar làa-làa har tar waap j`i mang si. Ting ɗi mo kì̵ ɓwan seen ni, ki̶ ni ɗee a ɗii mumuut.
65001013	Mo a kaa am ɗi kut ki̶ cut ni ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n bahar si. Moo woo ti̶fil mu mbii naashoop ɗi moo c`in mo zak. Mo a kaa zar ɗi moo mwaan si. Naan wuri tap ɗak mee pee ɗiijurung, ɗiirap shek-shek, le mpee mo.
65001014	Enok zak, ɗi wuri a dang ɗiipovul ndi̶ghi̶n cirem kì̵ Adam, wuri satpo nkaa mo nee, "Wu naa, Daa wurin nj`i ki̶ nyemlop fi̶ri ɗiiɓang mo ɗes.
65001015	Mpeku mo canɗiyeel ɗi ngurum mo jir, ki̶ mo woo ɗi agaak jir, ɗak ɗiibish ɗi nyem ɗi ba mo ki̶ Naan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup furu mo kas; ɗi mo kì̵ ten c`in ni ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗi ba ni a mu Naan kas. Ki̶ jir po ɗiiɗeet ɗi nyemshikbish ɗiisi ni mo kì̵ ten sat nkaa Naan."
65001016	Nyem ɗiisi mo naa nkatpo nɗagham-nɗagham, nyemsatpo ɗiibuu nkaa gurum mo, nyemmwaan ndi̶ghi̶n kyaghar mu nan furu mo, nyemcanjagham mo shi po furu mo, nyemcaa gurum mo, ba a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiret kas, mpeku mo kat mee li̶ɓet ɗi.
65001017	Amma wun ɗi wan wal nwun si mo, taji wu mander mbii ɗi gyet jeplop kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi mo sat nwun kas.
65001018	Mo kì̵ sat nwun nee, "Ndi̶ghi̶n teer mu peekyes ni mo, ɓe nyemɓákpee, mon nj`i put," mpeku mo nwangpo ɗi nwun. Nyem ɗi moo mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n kyaghar mu nan furu mo, ɗi ba ni a ar mu Naan kas.
65001019	A nyem ɗiisi mo, moo j`i ki̶ yilangpee ndi̶ghi̶n gurum mo. A mo a nyem ɗi mo kyaghar mbii ɗiibish mu yil ɗiisi shi mi̶se furu mo. Ba mo ki̶ Riin kì̵ Naan kas.
65001020	Amma, wuwun, ɗi wan wal nwun si mo, wu ɗiksuk fuu mo ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen fuu ɗiiɓang. Wu c`in aduwa ndi̶ghi̶n Riin Ɗiiɓang zak.
65001021	Wu sat a nlesuk fuu mo ndi̶ghi̶n wal kì̵ Naan, kaaɗi wuu leyit nkaa Daa Jesu si, mpeku shi naajeel fi̶ri, ɓe wurin ncín seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa nwun.
65001022	Wu naajeel kì̵ nyem ɗi mo ɗee mɓeetshik ki̶ wun.
65001023	Wu ɓam pak mo. Wu put ki̶ mo aku mɓut nwus, ki̶ mpee pak mo, ɓe wu naajeel kì̵ mo shi ki̶i̶rmuut. Amma wu kwar lée furu mo, mpeeɗi lée furu ni kì̵ ten ɗee a ɗiirap shi shikbish furu mo.
65001024	Pe wuri ɗi wuri mak fwang wun, mpeku taji wu táa wu pal kas, ki̶ wurin nj`i ki̶ wun ntoghom kì̵ ɗiiɗes mu Naan ndi̶ghi̶n retnyit, ba ki̶ mee rap kas.
65001025	Pe Naan ɗi wuri mmi̶shin, Nguɓam funu ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi, Daa funu ɗiiɗes, Ɗiihai fi̶ri, ki̶ mulki ɗiiɗes ki̶ iiko, mo ɗee a mu wuri, pugyet ɗi yam-yam, ki̶ har yaksi, ki̶ har ngaa-ngaa. Amin.
66001001	Ndi̶ghi̶n takarda ɗiisi, ɓe mo ran a mbii ɗi Jesu Kristi wuri woo nki̶rom kì̵ Naan nee. A Naan wuri shee le mbii ɗiisi ni mo, nsar kì̵ Jesu Kristi, mpee ku wuri woo ni ɗi nyem fi̶ri mo, mpeku mo man mbii ɗi mon ndung j`i, ki̶ ɗi mo ɗi yaksi. Ni aasi ɓe, Jesu Kristi wuri lop ngulop fi̶ri so pe ki̶rom fi̶ri Joon ɗi, mpeku wuri woo mbii ɗiisi mo ɗi nwuri.
66001002	Joon wuri kì̵ ten sat agaak mbii ɗi wuri kì̵ naa mo jir, ki̶ wuri ten ran po kì̵ Naan ɗi Jesu Kristi woo mo nwuri ne, ni azeen.
66001003	Koo a weye, ɗi wuri tang takarda ɗiisi ni, ɓe wurin nkat retnyit, ki̶ nyem ɗi mo lekom mpee ki̶lingpo ɗiisi ni ɗi Naan kì̵ woo ni, ki̶ moo c`in mbii ɗi ni sat, ɓe mon nkat retnyit, mpeeɗi pee ni kì̵ wul kus, mpeku mbii ɗiisi ni mon ngam ɗi.
66001004	Wan Joon ki̶n tok ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗiipovul si mo, ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil nEshiya. Naan wuri naa wun shi yit naajeel fi̶ri, ki̶ wuri cín tongriyang nwun zak. Naan ɗi wuri ɗi yaksi, ɗi pugyet wuri ɗi yam, ki̶ ɗi wurin ndung j`i, ki̶ Riin ɗiipovul ni mo, ɗi moo ɗar kus ki̶ Naan a peetong fi̶ri ɗiiɗes.
66001005	Ki̶ Jesu Kristi, ɗi wuri a langting ɗi azeen, wuri a ɗin nshee, ɗi mo shee yaghal ki̶ wuri a peemúut, ki̶ zak, a wuri a Mishkagham nkaa mishkagham ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi jir. Wuri wal mmun. A mpee toghom fi̶ri, ɓe wuri fwoon mun mɓut shikbish funu mo.
66001006	Wuri le mu ɗee a mishkagham mo ki̶ pris mo, mpeku mu seyil ɗi nNaan puun fi̶ri. Ɗiiɗes, ki̶ iiko, mo ɗee a mu wuri har ngaa-ngaa. Amin!
66001007	Wu naa wurin ndung j`i nkaa nluu. Gurum mon nnaa wuri jir, har ki̶ nyem ɗi gyet mo pwas wuri. Gurum ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi jir, mon nwal maap mpee wuri. Nin nɗee aasi! Amin.
66001008	Daa Naan ɗiiɗes wuri sat nee, "A wuɗi a Alfa, ki̶ Omega, shee kì̵ mbii mo, ki̶ kyes kì̵ mbii mo jir zak. Naan ɗi wuri ɗi yaksi, pugyet wuri ɗi yam, ki̶ a wurin ndung j`i zak."
66001009	A wan, Joon ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fuu nguso ndang Jesu, wan a memee ndi̶ghi̶n wun nyem ɗi wuu gung ki̶ shwaajeel, mpeeɗi wu le Kristi a kaa Mishkagham fuu si. Jí mo ɓwaghat wan, mo so ki̶ wan mee laayil, ɗi am neer ni cighi̶r kaat, ɗi moo pet ni a Patmos, mpeeɗi gyet wan ki̶n satpo Naan ni ngurum mo, ɗi Jesu wuri c`in langting ni.
66001010	Kaaɗi wan ɗi nyil mPatmos, parpuus kì̵ Daa, ɓe Riin kì̵ Naan wuri j`i ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n wan. Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling mee ɗoo ɗiiɗes mɓwoon fi̶na, kaa wal kì̵ feer si.
66001011	Ni sat nwan nee, "A mang takarda, a ran mbii ɗi wugha nkaa naa ni, ku a lop so nEki̶lisya ɗiipovul, ɗi mon nyil Afisus ki̶ Simena, ki̶ Pagamum, ki̶ Tayati̶ra, ki̶ Sardis, ki̶ Filadalfiya, ki̶ Lodisiya."
66001012	Wan cighi̶r mpeku wan naa ngo ɗi wurii katpo ni ɗi. Kaaɗi wan cighi̶r, ɓe wan naa, peele fitila mo povul, ɗi mo ɗak mo a shi zinariya.
66001013	Nnaar kì̵ peele fitila ɗiipovul ɗiisi ni mo, ɓe wan naa mee gwar wurii ɗar ɗi, ɗi wuri lapshak ki̶ Làa Gurum. Wuri lop mee nli̶r ɗi ni sham wul wurin nkwakshii, ki̶ wuri ɓwaghat mee teng si cighi̶r nkaa tughur fi̶ri, ɗi mo ɗak mi̶ni a shi zinariya.
66001014	Shoopkáa fi̶ri ni mo piyaa kaa shuu si, ki̶ ni kaa ɗaghar si. Yit fi̶ri ni mo lapwus kaa liis kì̵ wus si.
66001015	Shii fi̶ri mo mi̶lep, kaa shaghal ɗiimi̶lep, ɗi mo tap ɗak shi wus mpeku ni ɗee a ɗiiret si. Ɗoo fi̶ri ni a kaa wal ki̶ am ɗi moo sham mputughul si.
66001016	Wuri ki̶ zar mo povul nsarse fi̶ri, ki̶ mee kwai ɗii se, ɗi ni se koghop weet mpo fi̶ri. Yit fi̶ri ni fes ɓangpee hakyeng kaa puus a naar si.
66001017	Kaaɗi wan naa wuri, ɓe wan taa nyil nder shii fi̶ri kaa wan ki̶n mumuut si. Ɓe wuri le sarse fi̶ri nkaa wan, ɗangɓe wuri sat nee, "Taji ki̶i̶rmuut yaa wugha kas. A wan a ɗin nshee, ki̶ a wan a kyes ni.
66001018	A wan a ɗin mmeen. Gyet wan ki̶n muut, amma yaksi, ɓe wan ki̶ seen. Wan ntong ɗi ki̶ seen har ngaa-ngaa. Wan ki̶ makuli mu wang peemúut, ki̶ peeso kì̵ nyem mumuut mo, a sar fi̶na.
66001019	"A ran mbii ɗi aa ten a naa mo yaksi, ki̶ mbii ɗi wugha nkaa naa mo, ki̶ mbii ɗi mon ndung j`i.
66001020	A ɗiisi ni a shii kì̵ zar ɗiisi̶sok ɗiipovul ɗi mon nsarse fi̶na, ki̶ peeɗar mu fitila ɗiipovul ɗi mo ɗak a shi zinariya. Zar ɗiipovul ni mo, a mo a nyemlop kì̵ Eki̶lisya ɗiipovul ni mo, ki̶ peeɗar kì̵ fitila ɗiipovul si mo, mo a Eki̶lisya ɗiipovul ni mo zak."
66002001	"A ran lop so pe ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii tap ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi nin nyil Afisus nee, Lop ɗiisi ni, a po ɗi ni put mpo kì̵ gwar ɗi wuri ki̶ zar mo povul nsarse fi̶ri si, ɗi wurii mwaan nnaar kì̵ peele fitila ɗiipovul si mo, ɗi mo ɗak mo a shi zinariya si.
66002002	Wan man ɗak ɗi wun kì̵ ten c`in ni, ki̶ jeel fuu, ki̶ gung fuu zak. Ba wuu shaar ki̶ nyemɗiibish mo kas. Wuu kyam shiimwaan kì̵ nyem ɗi mo sat nee, wuɗun a jeplop kì̵ Jesu mo, amma ba mo a jeplop kì̵ Kristi kas. Wuu ten wu man ne, moo c`in a ɗung.
66002003	Wu gung, koo ɗi wun nkaa shwaajeel mpee sum fi̶na, ɓe taji wu baa mɓwoon kas.
66002004	Amma wan ɗi ki̶ mee mbii mi̶ndong nkaa wun ɗi wan ki̶n riɓet sat ni nwun. Ba wu kuɗi wuu wal nwan kaa ɗi gyet wuu wal nwan nshee si kas.
66002005	Taji wu mander nshiimwaan fuu ɗi gyet yam, akuɗang wuu táa wu pal si kas. Wu tuwap, mpeku wu baa wu mwaan ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n ar ni, kaa gyet yam si. Katɗang ba wu tuwap kas, ɓe wan ndung j`i, kun mang peele fitila ni ɗi a peeɗar ki̶ni.
66002006	Amma mbii mi̶ndong ɗi wan ki̶n kwoop wun mpee ni a nɗiisi, wuu kwar ɗak kì̵ nyem Nikolaitan mo, kaaɗi wan ki̶n kwar si.
66002007	Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ kom, mpee ki̶lingpee ɓe wuri ki̶ling mbii ɗi Riin ni nkaa sat ni nyemso ɗang Naan mo. Ngo ɗi wuri se koghorong, ɓe wan ncín pee nwuri se laating ɗi ni a mu seen, ɗi ni kàa ndi̶ghi̶n bong kì̵ Naan."
66002008	"A ran lop so pe ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii tap ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi nin nyil nSimena nee, Lop ɗiisi ni a po ɗi ni put mpo kì̵ gwar ɗi wuri a ɗin nshee, ki̶ a wuri a kyes ki̶ mbii mo jir, ɗi gyet wuri kì̵ muut, amma yaksi wuri ki̶ seen.
66002009	Wan man jeel fuu, ki̶ zak, wan man nee, ba wun a nyemlong mo kas, amma shi zeen, ɓe wun a nyemlong. Wan man po ɗiibish mu nyem ɗi moo lesut a nyem Yahudi mo, amma shi zeen, ɓe ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas. Mo a nyem kì̵ Shetan mo.
66002010	Taji wu kat mee ki̶i̶rmuut nkaa jeel ɗi wun ndung shwaa ni kas. A ki̶ling! Shetan wurin nkyam wun. Wurin nle pak fuu mo ndi̶ghi̶n lushaghat, wun nshwaajeel mpee teer mo kaghapaat. Amma wu gung, taji wu kwar wan kas, koo ɗi mon nti̶twa wun, ɓe wu gung, mpeku wan cín zughum ɗiiɗes ɗi ni a seen ɗi nwun.
66002011	Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ kom, ɓe wuri ki̶ling mbii ɗi Riin wuri nkaa sat ni (Eki̶lisya) nyemso nɗang Naan mo. Ngo ɗi wuri se koghorong, ɓe ba muut ɗi vul nin ntung wuri kas."
66002012	"A ran lop so pe ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii tap ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi nin nyil Pagamum nee, Lop ɗiisi ni put a mpo kì̵ gwar ɗi wuri ki̶ kwai ɗi ni se koghop vul si.
66002013	Wan man nee, peeɗi wuu tong ɗi ni, ɓe Shetan wuri kì̵ le mbiitong mu mulki fi̶ri a mpee mi̶ni. Wuu yaa sum fi̶na ɓal-ɓal. Ba wu cíipo fi̶na kaaɗi gyet mo tu Antipas nguc`in langting fi̶na azeen-nzeen ndi̶ghi̶n peetong kì̵ Shetan si kas.
66002014	Amma wan ki̶ rep pak mbii mo lee nkaa wun. Wun ki̶ pak gurum mo nnaar fuu, ɗi moo so a ndang kám mu Balam. Gyet a Balam wuri kám mBalak, ku wuri num nyem Yahudi mo, har gyet mo c`in shikbish mpee se mbiise ɗi gyet mo kì̵ ten c`in nk`um, ki̶ c`in mbii ɗiibish mo kaa ngaa si.
66002015	Ki̶ zak, wun ki̶ nyem ɗi moo so ndang kám ki̶ Nikolaitan mo.
66002016	Wu tuwap, kasɓe wan nɗung j`i, kun c`in lek ɗi ki̶ wun, shi kwai fi̶na ɗi ni j`i put mpo fi̶na si.
66002017	Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ kom, mpee ki̶lingpee, ɓe wuri ki̶ling mbii ɗi Riin wuri nkaa sat ni (Eki̶lisya) nyemso nɗang Naan mo." Ngo ɗi wuri se koghorong, ɓe wan ncín pak manna ɗi ni a si̶sok nwuri. Ki̶ zak, wan ncín jwak ɗiipiyaa ngwar ni, ki̶ sum ɗiipoo a riran ɗiki̶ nkaa jwak ni. Gwar ɗi wurin nlap jwak ni, ɓe a wuri man mbii ɗi mo ran nkaa ni ɓejee ɗak.
66002018	"A ran lop so pe ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii tap ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi nin nyil nTayati̶ra nee, Lop ɗiisi ni put a mpo kì̵ Làa kì̵ Naan ɗi yit fi̶ri moo lapwus kaa mbi̶lem ki̶ wus si, ɗi shii fi̶ri moo mi̶lep kaa shaghal ɗi mo tap ɗak ni si.
66002019	Wan man ɗak fuu, ki̶ wal fuu, ki̶ cínzeen fuu, ki̶ ɗak ɓam ɗi wu c`in mo, ki̶ gung fuu, ki̶ zak, yaksi ɓe wun nkaa c`in ɗak ni met ɗi gyet wu shee c`in nin nshee.
66002020	Amma jir ki̶si, ɓe wan ki̶ mbii ɗiisi mo nkaa wun. Mpeeɗi wu tap wu kiyee mat ɗi moo pet wura a Jezebel sí, ɗi wuraa pet sat a mat satpo kì̵ Naan. A shi ar kám fi̶ra, ɓe wura le ku ki̶rom fi̶na mo c`in mbii ɗiibish mo kaa c`in ngaa, ki̶ se mbiise ɗi mo kì̵ ten cín nk`um.
66002021	Wan ki̶n cín pee nwura, mpeku wura tuwap ɗi, amma wura kwar tuwap mpee shikbish fi̶ra, ɗi ni a mu ngaa.
66002022	Wan nle ku shwal yaa wura, ki̶ wuran nshwaajeel a peesaam ki̶ nyem ɗi moo c`in ngaa ashak ki̶ wura, katɗang ba mo tuwap kas, ku mo nook c`in mbii ɗiibish mi̶ni mo kas, ɓe wan ncín jeel mmo.
66002023	Wan nle ku jep fi̶ra mo murap ki̶ shwal, mpeku Eki̶lisya mo jir mo man ɗi nee, wan a ngo ɗi wan ki̶n man pan ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n putughup kì̵ gurum mo, ki̶ zak, wan ki̶n leng putughup furu mo. Wan nkwat koo a weye ntiit ki̶ ɗak ɗi ngo ni kì̵ ten c`in.
66002024	Yaksi mpee kaghar wun nyem Tayati̶ra, ɗi ba wu lap kám kì̵ Jezebel ni kas, ba wu man mbii ɗiibish, ɗi gurum moo pet ni a jurung kì̵ mbii ɗi mo a mu Shetan kas, (ba wan ɗi ki̶ mee mbii mpee sat nwun ɗik mpeku wu c`in kas.)
66002025	See wu ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi wuu ten wu kám, har parɗi wan mbaaj`i zak.
66002026	Mpee nyem ɗi moo ɗar ɓal-ɓal har mo se koghorong, ki̶ mo c`in ɗyen fi̶na zak, har peekyes ni, ɓe wan ncín ɓal mmo nkaa yil ni mo, kaaɗi wan ki̶n kat ɓal nsar kì̵ puun fi̶na si.
66002027	Mon nc`in mulki nkaa yil ni mo, a shi kám shaghal, ɗang mon mpyan mo, a kaa tughulwan ɗi gurum ki̶ piin ni si.
66002028	Nyem ɗi mo ɗar ɓal-ɓal har mo se koghorong, ɓe wan ncín zar mangɓit mmo zak.
66002029	Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ kom, mpee ki̶lingpee, ɓe wuri ki̶ling mbii ɗi Riin kì̵ Naan wuri nkaa sat ni (Eki̶lisya) nyemso ndang Naan mo."
66003001	"A ran lop so pe ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii tap ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi nin nyil nSardis nee, A lop ni nɗiisi, ɗi ni put a mpo kì̵ gwar ɗi wuri ki̶ Riin kì̵ Naan mo povul, ki̶ zar mo povul zak. Wan man ɗak fugha, wugha le ku gurum mo pan ne, wugha ɗi ki̶ seen, amma wugha a ɗiimumuut.
66003002	A yaghal ating, mpeku a fwang rep kaghar seen ɗi ni ɗee ni ɗi, mpeku taji ni si̶ghi̶t muut ki̶n ndi̶ng-ndi̶ng. Wan naa, ba shiimwaan fugha ni a ɗiiret nyit kì̵ Naan kas.
66003003	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wan ki̶n sat nwugha, a pan mbii ɗi gyet aa ten a ki̶ling mo, ɗi gyet har aa lap mo. A cínzeen mi̶ni mo ɓal-ɓal. A tuwap. Katɗang ba wugha yaghal kas, ɓe wan mbaaj`i a kaa wat si, ɗi ba wughan mman parpuus baaj`i fi̶na ni kas.
66003004	Amma rep pak gurum mo ɗi, nyil nSardis, ɗi mo tap le lée furu mo a ɗiiɓang. Nyem mi̶ni moo mwaan ashak ki̶ wan. Mon nlop lée ɗiipiyaa-piyaa mo, mpeeɗi shiimwaan furu ni mo ret, ki̶ mbii ɗi mo kì̵ ten c`in mo.
66003005	Nyem ɗi mo se koghorong, ɓe mon nlop lée ɗiipiyaa-piyaa mo zak. Ba wan nkyam tu sum furu ndi̶ghi̶n takarda mu nyemseen mo kas. Pe Naan puun fi̶na, ki̶ nyemlop fi̶ri mo, ɓe wan nsat agaak ne, mo a nyem fi̶na mo.
66003006	Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ kom mpee ki̶lingpee, ɓe wuri ki̶ling mbii ɗi Riin kì̵ Naan wuri nkaa sat nin (Eki̶lisya) nyem so ndang Naan mo."
66003007	Gwar ni sat nwan zak nee, "A ran lop so pe ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii tap ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi nin nyil nFiladalfiya. "Lop ɗiisi ni put a mpo kì̵ gwar ɗi wuri a ɗiiɓang ki̶ wuri azeen. A wuri ki̶ makuli kì̵ Devid. Katɗang wuri wang polu ni, ɓe ba mee gurum mak shaghat ni kas, ki̶ zak, katɗang wuri shaghat pee ni, ɓe ba mee gurum mmak wang ni kas.
66003008	Wan man ɗak fugha. A naa, wan ki̶n ten wangpee nwugha, ɗi ba mee ngo mmak kyam shaghat ni kas. Wan man nee, koo ɗi ba ɓal fugha ni ɗes kas, ɓe wugha kì̵ ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n po fi̶na, ki̶ zak, ba wugha ki̶ cíipo nee a nook man wan kas.
66003009	A ki̶ling, wan nle nyem mu Shetan ɗi moo le sut a nyem Yahudi si mo, amma ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas, moo c`in a ɗung. Wan nle ku nyemɗung ɗiisi mo j`i kurum ntoghom fugha, ki̶ nder shii fugha, ku mo man ɗi zak nee, wan wal nwugha.
66003010	Kaaɗi wugha kì̵ ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n po fi̶na, ki̶ gung zak, mpeemi̶ni ɓe wan ntap ki̶ wugha, mpeku taji mee mbii tung wugha kas, ndi̶ghi̶n teer mu jeel ɗi nin ndung j`i nkaa yil ni, mpeku ni kyam gurum mo ɗi jir ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni.
66003011	Wan ndung j`i ki̶lak-ki̶lak. A yaa mbii ɗi wugha ki̶ ni ɓal-ɓal, mpeku taji, mee gurum yaa wugha ki̶ zughum mu koghorong ni kas.
66003012	Jir nyem ɗi mo se koghorong, ɓe wan nle ku mo ɗee a kaa ndwet mo si ndi̶ghi̶n Lu kì̵ Naan fi̶na, ɗi ba nin nkyam put ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n lu ni kas. Wan nran sum kì̵ Naan fi̶na nkaa pukiyeen furu, ki̶ sum mu yil kì̵ Naan fi̶na, ɗi moo pet ni a Jerusalem ɗiipoo, ɗi ni sham a pe Naan ɗi. Ki̶ zak, wan nran sum fi̶na ɗiipoo nkaa mo.
66003013	Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ kom mpee ki̶lingpee, ɓe wuri ki̶ling mbii ɗi Riin kì̵ Naan wuri nkaa sat nin (Eki̶lisya) nyem so ndang Naan mo."
66003014	Gwar ni sat nwan nee, "A ran lop so pe ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii tap ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi nin nyil nLodisiya. "Lop ɗiisi ni put a mpo kì̵ gwar ɗi moo pet wuri a Amin. Shii kì̵ mi̶ni nee, 'ni aasi'. Wuri a ngo ɗi azeen-nzeen, ki̶ wuri a langting ɗi azeen. A wuri a kuk kì̵ mbii ɗi Naan wuri le mo jir.
66003015	Wan man ɗak fugha, ba wugha a ɗiizughum koo ɗiital kas. Ngyal ɗi wugha a ɗiizughum, koo ɗiital.
66003016	Amma mpeeɗi wugha anaar-anaar, ba wugha a ɗiital kas, koo ɗiizughum kas, mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wan ntus wugha put aku mɓut mpo fi̶na.
66003017	Wugha sat nee, wugha ki̶ long, ki̶ wugha ki̶ mbii ɗi aa riɓet mo jir! Amma ba wugha man nee, wugha a ngujeel, ɗi ni ret ku gurum mo naa wugha ki̶ yit mu ɓam kas. Wugha a kaa nyemvum mo si. Wugha a kaa nyemjeel ɗi moo mwaan ngum si.
66003018	Wan ki̶n satpo nwugha nee, a seet zinariya pe wan ɗi, zinariya ɗiiret, mpeku a ɗee ɗi a ngulong. A seet lée ɗiipiyaa mo pe wan ɗi, mpeku a paa sak fugha ni ɗi. A j`i a seet yen mu yit zak, mpeku a le ɗi nyit fugha mo, mpeku a naapee ɗi.
66003019	Nyem ɗi wan ki̶n wal mmo, a mo a nyem ɗi wan ki̶n gwak mo. Wan ki̶n cín kar mmo, mpeku mo kám seen ɗi. Mpeemi̶ni, a yaghal azeen-nzeen, mpeku a tuwap ɗi.
66003020	A naa, wan ki̶n ɗar mpolu mu putughup. Wan nkaa ɓwap polu ni, katɗang mee ngo ki̶ling ɗoo fi̶na, ki̶ har gwar mi̶ni wang polu ni, ɓe wan nɗel ndi̶ghi̶n lu ni, har wan se mbiise ashak ki̶ gwar mi̶ni, ki̶ gwar mi̶nin nse mbiise ashak ki̶ wan zak.
66003021	Nyem ɗi mo se koghorong, ɓe wan ncínpee mmo, mpeku mo tong ɗi ashak ki̶ wan nkaa mbiitong mu mulki fi̶na, kaaɗi gyet wan ki̶n se koghorong si. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe yaksi, wan ki̶n tong ashak ki̶ puun fi̶na nkaa mbiitong mu mulki fi̶ri.
66003022	Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ kom mpee ki̶lingpee, ɓe wuri ki̶ling mbii ɗi Riin kì̵ Naan wuri nkaa sat nin (Eki̶lisya) nyem so ndang Naan mo."
66004001	Aɓwoon mi̶ni, ɓe wan ɗiyeep yit fi̶na. Ɓe wan naa mee polu ɗi ni a wuwang ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ɓe wan ki̶ling ɗoo ɗi ni wal ntiit ki̶ feer, ɗi jí ni katpo ki̶ wan nshee. Ni sat nwan nee, "A kàa mpesi. Wan nkám nwugha mbii ɗi yak mon nc`in akiyeen."
66004002	Nɗin mman, ɓe Riin kì̵ Naan wuri j`i ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n wan, ɗangɓe ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ɓe wan naa mee peetong mu mulki, ɗi mee gwar ki̶ tong nkaa ni.
66004003	Yit kì̵ gwar ɗi wurii tong nkaa ni, nii lapwus kaa jwak ɗiiret ɗi moo pet mo a jaspa, ki̶ kaneliyan, ki̶ lilliu ɗi ni lapshak ki̶ mee jwak ɗi moo pet ni a emeral, mo tap neer peetong mu mulki ni cighi̶rkaat.
66004004	Mee peetong mu mulki mo laarvul baafeer, mo neer peetong mu mulki ɗiiɗes ni le nnaar. Nyemnan mo laarvul baafeer, moo tong nkaa peetong mu mulki ɗiisi ni mo. Nyemnan ɗiisi ni mo, moo lop a lée ɗiipiyaa-piyaa mo, ki̶ zak, mo lop a mbiikáa mu mulki, ɗi mo ɗak mo a shi zinariya.
66004005	Mi̶lep kì̵ pee ki̶ put ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n peetong mu mulki ɗiiɗes ni, ki̶ or ɗiiɗes ki̶ nluu pi̶rep. Akiyeen kì̵ peetong mu mulki ɗiisi ni mo, ɓe fitila mo povul mo nkaa lapwus. A ɗiisi ni mo a Riin kì̵ Naan ɗiipovul si mo.
66004006	Ki̶ zak, akiyeen kì̵ peetong mu mulki ɗiiɗes ni, ɓe wan naa mee mbii káa bahar si, ɗi ni mi̶lep kaa gi̶las si, ki̶ ni ɗong kyet-kyet. Mee mbii ɗi mo kì̵ seen, mo feer, moo ɗar mpeefeer, cighi̶r mɓwoon kì̵ peetong mu mulki ɗiiɗes ni, mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen ni mo, mo gam ki̶ yit nkoghop mɓwoon ki̶ nkoghop ndi̶ghi̶n.
66004007	Ɗin nshee ni, lapshak ki̶ mbwoor, ɗiivul ni lapshak ki̶ kus randong, ɗiikun ni, ɓe yit kì̵ ni ntiit ki̶ mu gurum, ɗiifeer ni lapshak ki̶ puul ɗi ni nkaa yaghal ncáap si.
66004008	Koo a ɗiiɗang ye ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi mo ki̶ seen feer ɗiisi ni mo, ɓe ni ki̶ cáap mo peemee, ki̶ mo ki̶ yit nkoghop mɓwoon ki̶ nkoghop ndi̶ghi̶n zak. Ba moo mee nookɗi kas, mpeeɗi mpar ki̶ puus, ɓe mo nkaa sat nee: "Ɗiiɓang, ɗiiɓang, ɗiiɓang! A Daa Naan wuri ɓal met mbii mo jir. A wuri ɗi yam, ki̶ a wuri ɗi yaksi, ki̶ a wuri ɗi akiyeen zak."
66004009	Kaaɗi mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen ɗiisi mo, mo kwoop, ki̶ mo cín ɗiiɗes mu pi̶lang, pe gwar ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki ni, a wuri ɗi wuri ki̶ seen har ngaa-ngaa.
66004010	Nyemnan ɗii laarvul baafeer si mo, mo zum ntoghom kì̵ gwar ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki ni, mo seyil nwuri. Wuri ɗi wurin mmeen har ngaa-ngaa. Nyemnan ɗiisi ni mo shwat mbiikáa ɗi mu mulki furu mo ntoghom fi̶ri, ɗang mo nkaa sat nee:
66004011	"Daa Naan funu a wugha mak lap ɗiiɗes, ki̶ kwoop, ki̶ ɓal. A wugha le mbii mo ɗi jir. A shi pan fugha ɓe wugha le mo ɗi, ki̶ zak. A wugha cín nseen mo."
66005001	Wan naa mee takarda ɗi ni a ciciɓet ndi̶ghi̶n sarse kì̵ gwar ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki ni. Mo ran-ran nkaa takarda ɗiisi ni, nkoghop mɓwoon ki̶ nkoghop ndi̶ghi̶n zak. Mo lus ni mpee mo povul shi stam.
66005002	Ɗangɓe wan naa mee ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes, ɗi wuri nkaa satpo ɓal-ɓal nee: "A we mmak fi̶lap káa kì̵ stam ɗiipovul ni mo, har ku wuri wang takarda ɗiiciciɓet ni ɗi ye?"
66005003	Amma ba mee gurum ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, koo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, koo nder kì̵ yil ni, ɗi wuri mak wang takarda ɗiisi ni, ku wuri mak naa ɗi̶ghi̶n ni ɗi kas.
66005004	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wan wal hakyeng, mpeeɗi ba mo kat mee gurum ɗi wuri mak wang takarda ni, koo naa ɗi̶ghi̶n ni kas.
66005005	Ɗangɓe memee ndi̶ghi̶n nyemnan ni mo, sat nee: "Taji a wal kas, a naa mbwoor mu dang kì̵ Juda, ki̶ mu dang kì̵ Devid wuri kì̵ se koghorong nkaa mbii mo jir. Wurin mmak fi̶lap stam ni, ki̶ wuri wang takarda ni, ki̶ stam ɗiipovul ni mo."
66005006	Ɗangɓe wan naa mee Laatum ki̶ ɗar, nnaar kì̵ peetong mu mulki ni mo, ki̶ mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen si mo, ki̶ nyemnan ɗii laarvul baafeer si mo, mo neer ni le nnaar. Laatum ɗiisi ni lapshak ki̶ ɗi gurum mo kì̵ fet ni. Laatum ɗiisi ni ki̶ soghom mo povul, ki̶ yit mo povul zak. Ɗiisi ni mo a Riin kì̵ Naan ɗiipovul si mo, ɗi Naan wurii lop mo koo a pee ɗiiɗang ye ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi.
66005007	Laatum ɗiisi ni yaghal so lap takarda ɗiiciciɓet ɗi ni nsarse kì̵ gwar ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki ni.
66005008	Kaaɗi wuri lap takarda ɗiisi ni nsar kì̵ gwar ɗi wurii tong a peetong mu mulki ni, ɓe mbii ɗi mo ki̶ seen feer sí mo, ki̶ nyemnan ɗii laarvul baafeer sí mo, mo kurum nyil, ntoghom kì̵ Laatum ni. Koo a weye ndi̶ghi̶n nyemnan ɗii laarvul baafeer si mo, ɓe mo ki̶ nɗeng-nɗeng, ki̶ ɗaa mo nsar, ɗi mo ɗak mo a shi zinariya, ɗi ni gam ki̶ mee mwoor ɗiiɗu shang-shang. Mwoor ɗiisi ni a aduwa kì̵ nyem kì̵ Naan mo.
66005009	Mo c`in mee kook ɗiipoo nee: "A wugha mak, har a mang takarda ni, ku a wang stam ni mo, mpeku takarda ni ɗee ɗi a wuwang. Gyet mo kì̵ tu wugha, ki̶ a shi toghom fugha, ɓe a wugha can gurum mo ɗes, ki̶ a j`i ki̶ mo nDaa Naan. Nyem ɗi wugha can ni mo, mo put a ndi̶ghi̶n koo a kiyeet ɗiiɗang ye. ki̶ koo a ndi̶ghi̶n liispo ɗiiɗang ye, ki̶ koo a ndi̶ghi̶n gurum ɗiiɗang mo ye, ki̶ koo a ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiiɗang ye zak.
66005010	Wugha le mo ɗee a mishkagham mo, ki̶ mo ɗee a pris ɗi moo c`in ɗak nNaan funu, ki̶ zak, mo se mulki nkaa mishkagham mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni."
66005011	Kaaɗi wan naapee, ɓe wan ki̶ling ɗoo kì̵ nyemlop mo ɗes, ɗi mo duɓu kaghapaat nkaa duɓu kaghapaat, ɗi mo neer peetong mu mulki ni cighi̶rkaat, ki̶ mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen si mo, mo neer mbiitong mu mulki ni cighi̶r. Nyemnan si mo neer peetong mu mulki ni cighi̶r zak.
66005012	Mo c`in kook shi ɗoo ɗiiɗes nee: "Laatum ɗi gyet mo kì̵ tu ni, a wuri mak lap ɗiiɗes, ki̶ long, ki̶ seen, ki̶ iiko. Wu yit ku gurum mo cín ɗiiɗes nwuri, ki̶ mo kwoop wuri zak."
66005013	Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling mbii ɗi mo ki̶ seen jir, ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ki̶ ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil, ki̶ ɗi mon nder kì̵ yil, ki̶ ɗi mo nkaa am, ki̶ ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n am zak, ki̶ mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n mo jir, mo c`in kook nee: "Mpee wuri ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki, kì̵ Laatum, wu yit ku mu kwoop wuri, ki̶ cín ɗiiɗes nwuri, ki̶ iiko mo har ngaa-ngaa."
66005014	Ɗangɓe mbii ɗi mo ki̶ seen feer si mo sat nee, "Amin." Nyemnan sí mo nkurum furum, ku mo seyil ɗi nwuri.
66006001	Wan naa kaaɗi Laatum ni, wuri fi̶lap ndiɓen ki̶ stam ɗin nshee. Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling ɗoo ki̶ memee mɓut mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen si. Wuri petpee shi ɗoo ɗiiɓal kaa k`oot kì̵ nluu si nee, "J`i!"
66006002	Kaaɗi wan naapee zak, ɓe wan naa mee bi̶ring ɗiipiyaa ki̶ j`i. Gwar ɗi wuri lang bi̶ring ɗiisi, wuri ki̶ mbuka nsar fi̶ri. Mo c`in mbiikáa ɗi ni a mu koghorong nwuri zak, wuri j`i put kaa gwar ɗi wurii naa nse koghorong a peelek si. Wuri ɗel so, mpeku wuri so se mee lek ni ɗi zak.
66006003	Kaaɗi Laatum ni wuri fi̶lap ndiɓen ki̶ stam ɗiivul ni, ɓe wan ki̶ling ɗoo ki̶ mbii ɗiivul ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen si mo, wuri petpee nee, "j`i!"
66006004	Ɗangɓe wan naa mee bi̶ring ɗiivul j`i put, ni a naat kaa wus si. Gwar ɗi wuri lang bi̶ring ɗiinaat ɗiisi ni, mo cín iiko nwuri mpeku wuri mang tongriyang baa ki̶ ni aku ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, mpeku gurum mo ɗoghom twa shak ɗi, mo cín mee kwai ɗiiɗes nwuri zak.
66006005	Kaaɗi Laatum ni wuri fi̶lap ndiɓen ki̶ stam ɗiikun ni, ɓe wan ki̶ling ɗoo kì̵ mbii ɗiikun, memee mɓut mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen si mo, wuri petpee nee, "J`i!" Kaaɗi wan naapee zak, ɓe wan naa bi̶ring ɗiitup ki̶ j`i. Gwar ɗi wurii lang bi̶ring ɗiitup ni, wuri ki̶ ɗaa mu kám mbii mo kaa muudu si ndi̶ghi̶n sar fi̶ri.
66006006	Ni ɗee kaa wan ki̶ling a rep mee ɗoo si, ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen si mo, ɗoo ni sat nee, "Gurum mmang shaghal ɗak fi̶ri, mu puus mi̶ndong, ku wuri seet muudu mu alkama ɗi mi̶ndong, ki̶ zak, gurum mang shaghal ɗak fi̶ri, mu puus mi̶ndong, ku wuri seet muudu mo kun mu parpi̶ra ɗi. Amma taji a wat mwoor ni ki̶ am anab ni kas."
66006007	Kaaɗi Laatum ni wuri fi̶lap ndiɓen ki̶ stam ɗiifeer ni, ɓe wan ki̶ling ɗoo kì̵ ɗiifeer mɓut mbii ɗi mo ki̶ seen si mo, wuri sat nee, "J`i!"
66006008	Ɗangɓe wan naa mee bi̶ring si, ni a vuun, akiyeen fi̶na, moo pet gwar ɗi wuri lang bi̶ring ɗiisi a muut, ki̶ peetong mu nyemmuut mo nwurin mɓwoon. Mo cín iiko mmo nkaa mi̶ndong mɓut feer ki̶ yil ni, mpeku mo twa gurum mo shi kwai, ki̶ shi neen, ki̶ shi shwal, ki̶ shi luwayil mo zak.
66006009	Kaaɗi Laatum ni wuri fi̶lap ndiɓen ki̶ stam ɗiipaat ni, ɓe wan naa seen kì̵ gurum mo nder kì̵ peewus mbiizughum. A seen kì̵ nyem ɗi gyet mo twa mo, mpeeɗi gyet mo satpo Naan ni, ki̶ zak, mpeeɗi gyet mo sat agaak nee, wuɗun cínzeen, ki̶ gyet mo ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n satpo ni zak.
66006010	Mo petpee shi ɗoo ɗiiɗes nee: "Daa Naan ɗiiɗes, ɗiiɓang, ki̶ ɗi wugha azeen, a pi̶rang ɗang wughan ntokɗiyeel nyemyil ni mo ye? Nyem ɗi gyet mo twa mun si mo, mpeku wugha kwat mo ɗi ye?"
66006011	Mo cín lée ɗiipiyaa mo jwal jir. Ɗang mo waa sat mmo nee, "Wu gung, ɗiilee aku, see ɗuu kì̵ shaar ɗak fuu mo, ki̶ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fuu ɗi mon ntwa mo, kaaɗi mo twa wun si wul akuɗang."
66006012	Kaaɗi Laatum ni wuri fi̶lap ndiɓen ki̶ stam ɗiipeemee ni, ɓe wan naa yil ni yoghon ɗes zam, ɗangɓe puus ni cighi̶r ɗee a tup kaa lée ɗiitup shek-shek si, ki̶ tar ni cighi̶r ɗee a naat kaa toghom si.
66006013	Zar mo pwat ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, har mo sham ɗyong nyil, kaaɗi laating ɗiinung moo ɗyong nyil, katɗang kut cutpee ɓal-ɓal si.
66006014	Ɗengnaan ni ɗel lagham kaa ɗi gurum ki̶ ciɓet ti̶barna si, ki̶ mo hi̶r jwak mo, ki̶ jepyil ɗi am neer mo le nnaar, mo hi̶r mo jir aku a pee furu.
66006015	Ɗangɓe mishkagham mu yil ni mo, ki̶ nyem ɗi mo se mulki mo, ki̶ ɗiinan-nan mu sooja mo, ki̶ nyemlong mo, ki̶ nyem ɗi mo ki̶ iiko mo, ki̶ kaghar gurum mo jir, ki̶rom mo, ki̶ jeplu mo, mo so lagham ndi̶ghi̶n goghot mo, ki̶ gaghap ɗin njwak mo.
66006016	Mo ɗang pu jwak ni mo nee, "Wu j`i wu taa nkaa mun, mpeku taji mu naa yit kì̵ gwar ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki si, ki̶ zak, mpeku taji tughup mu ɗiyeel kì̵ Laatum ni kat mun."
66006017	Mpeeɗi puus tughup furu ɗiiɗes nii j`i wul. A we mmak ɓamkáa fi̶ri mpuus mi̶ni ye?
66007001	Aɓwoon ɗi mbii ɗiisi moo kyes, ɓe wan naa nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo feer, moo ɗar nkoghop kwang ɗiifeer mu yil ni, mo yaa kut ɗin nkwang ɗiifeer mu yil ni mo ɗar ki̶ ni, mpeku taji mee kut cutpee nkaa yil ni, koo nkaa bahar, koo nkaa ting mo kas.
66007002	Ɗangɓe wan naa mee ngulop kì̵ Naan, ɗi wuri put a nkoghop puus ki̶kàa, wuri ki̶ ndiɓen ki̶ stam ɗi ni a mu Naan ɗi mmeen nsar fi̶ri. Wuri pet nyemlop ɗiifeer ɗi mo cín iiko mmo, mpeku mo wat yil ki̶ am, shi ɗoo ɗiiɓal.
66007003	Ɓe wuri sat nee, "Taji wu wat yil ni, koo bahar ni, koo ting mo kas. Wu ɗar akuɗang, see mu le alama mu stam mu Naan nkaa pukiyeen ki̶ ki̶rom fi̶ri mo akuɗang."
66007004	Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling ɗuu kì̵ nyem ɗi mo le alama ni mmo mpukiyeen furu mo, mo wul duɓu ɗari mi̶ndong ki̶ laarfeer baafeer. Nyem ɗiisi ni mo pwat a ndi̶ghi̶n koo a saghan ɗiiɗang ye mu nyem Yahudi mo.
66007005	Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Juda mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul. Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Ruben mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul. Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Gad mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul.
66007006	Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Asher mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul. Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Naftali mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul.
66007007	Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Simiyon mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul. Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Livai mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul. Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Isakar mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul.
66007008	Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu nyem Zebulun mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul. Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Josep mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul. Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Benjami mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul.
66007009	Aɓwoon ɗiisi, ɓe wan naa ɗuu gurum mo ɗes, ɗi ba mee gurum mak tang mo kas. Nyem ɗiisi ni mo pwat a ndi̶ghi̶n yil mo shini-shini ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mo shini-shini, ki̶ liispo mo shini-shini, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n koo a pee ɗiiɗang ye ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi. Moo ɗar ntoghom ki̶ peetong mu mulki, ki̶ ntoghom kì̵ Laatum. Mo jwallée ɗiipiyaa mo, ki̶ mo ki̶ kom kí̵kar nsar furu mo zak.
66007010	Mo ɗiyeep ɗoo furu mo ashak shiɓal, nee, "Ɓam funu ni a pe Naan funu, ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki si, ki̶ Laatum ni wuri zak."
66007011	Nyemlop mo jir, moo ɗar ating neer peetong mu mulki ni, ki̶ nyemnan si mo, ki̶ mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen si mo zak. Nyemlop ni mo zum káa furu nyil ntoghom kì̵ peetong mu mulki ni, ki̶ mo seyil nNaan zak.
66007012	Mo sat nee, "Amin, kwoop, ki̶ ɗiihai, ki̶ seen, ki̶ pi̶lang, ki̶ ɗiiɗes, ki̶ iiko, ki̶ ɓal, mo ɗee a mu Naan funu har ngaa-ngaa, Amin."
66007013	Ɗangɓe memee mɓut nyemnan ni mo wuri cighi̶r pe wan ɗi, ɓe wuri sat nee, "A man nyem ɗi mo jwallée ɗiipiyaa-piyaa si mo me? A man peeɗi mo pwat ɗi me?"
66007014	Wan lap nwuri nee, "Daa fi̶na, ba wan man kas, a wugha man." Ɗangɓe wuri sat nee, "Nyem ɗiisi mo, a nyem ɗi mo pwat ndi̶ghi̶n jeel ɗiiɗes si mo, mo ki̶ vwang lée furu mo, ku mo ɗee a ɗiipiyaa mo, ndi̶ghi̶n toghom kì̵ Laatum.
66007015	A mpeemi̶ni, ɓe moo ɗar ntoghom kì̵ peetong mu mulki kì̵ Naan, ki̶ moo seyil nNaan ndi̶ghi̶n Lu fi̶ri, mpar ki̶ puus. Gwar ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki ni, wurin ntong ashak ki̶ mo.
66007016	Ba neen nkyam láa mmo kas, ki̶ zak, ba neen am nkyam tu mo kas. Ba puus, koo tal kì̵ puus nin nkyam mo kas.
66007017	Laatum ɗi wurin nnaar kì̵ mo, wurin nɗee a ngukiyeer furu. Wurii so ki̶ mo a pee tuɓut ɗi ni a mu seen ɗi. Naan wurin mpwos yitmwaan ɗi nin nyit furu mo jir."
66008001	Aɓwoon ɗi mbii ɗiisi moo kyes, ɓe Laatum ni wuri fi̶lap ndiɓen ki̶ stam ɗiipovul ni. Kaaɗi wuri wang, ɓe gurum mo ɗok titik ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, har ni kus ki̶ kaghar mu awa mi̶ndong.
66008002	Wan naa nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo povul, ɗi moo ɗar ntoghom kì̵ Naan, ɓe mo cín feer, nkoo a ɗiiɗang ye, mɓut mmo povul ni.
66008003	Mee ngulop kì̵ Naan wuri j`i ɗar kus ki̶ peewus mbiizughum, wuri ki̶ mee ɗaa wus mbiizughum, ɗi mo ɗak ni a shi zinariya. Mo cín mwoor ɗiiɗu shang-shang mu wus mbiizughum nwuri ɗes, mpeku wuri cín mo ɗi ashak ki̶ aduwa mu nyem ɗiiɓang mo ɗi nkaa peewus mbiizughum ɗi mo ɗak ni a shi zinariya, ɗi ni ntoghom ki̶ peetong mu mulki ni.
66008004	Ɗangɓe ɗiyeel mu mwoor wus mbiizughum ɗiiɗu shang-shang ni, ki̶ aduwa mu nyem kì̵ Naan mo, ɗi nin nsar kì̵ ngulop kì̵ Naan ni, ni kàa wul pe Naan ɗi.
66008005	Ɗangɓe ngulop ni wuri mang ɗaa mu wus mbiizughum ni, wuri gam ɗaa ni shi wus, ɗi ni nkaa peewus mbiizughum ni, ɓe wuri vwet nkaa yil ni. Kaaɗi wuri vwet wus ɗiisi ni nkaa yil ni, ɓe nluupet, ki̶ ɗoo mo, ki̶ pee mi̶lep ɗes, ki̶ yil ni yoghon zak.
66008006	Aɓwoon ɗiisi, ɓe nyemlop kì̵ Naan ɗiipovul, ɗi mo ki̶ feer mo povul si, mo ɗak sut, mpeku mo ɗoghom taa feer ni mo ɗi.
66008007	Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗin nshee, wuri taa feer fi̶ri, ɓe ɗaghar, ki̶ wus, riyeep ki̶ toghom, mo sham ɓeer nkaa yil ni. Mi̶ndong nkaa kun, mu yil ni caan, ki̶ mi̶ndong nkaa kun, mu ting mo caan zak, ki̶ shit mo caan jir zak.
66008008	Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiivul, wuri taa feer fi̶ri, ɓe mee mbii kaa kus jwak ɗiiɗes si, nii lapwus, ɓe mo vwet ni ndi̶ghi̶n bahar.
66008009	Nɗin mman, ɓe mi̶ndong nkaa kun, mu bahar ni cighi̶r ɗee a toghom. Mi̶ndong nkaa kun, mu mbii ɗi mo ki̶ seen jir, ɗi moo tong ndi̶ghi̶n bahar, mo murap. Mi̶ndong nkaa kun, mu jirgi am mo lagham.
66008010	Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiikun, wuri taa feer fi̶ri, ɓe mee zar ɗiiɗes, ɗi ni lap wus hi̶lak-hi̶lak, ni put aɗeng har ni sham táa nkaa mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu dung mo, ki̶ tuɓut am mo.
66008011	Sum kì̵ zar ɗiisi ni a, Ɗeet. Ɓe mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu am, mo cighi̶r ɗee a ɗiiɗeet, gurum mo ɗes mo murap, mpeeɗi mo shwaa am ɗiiɗeet ɗiisi ni.
66008012	Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiifeer, wuri taa feer fi̶ri, ɓe mo cut mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu puus, ki̶ mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu tar, ki̶ mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu zar mo. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu peeɓang furu, ba mo kuɗi kì̵ ɓangpee kas. Mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu wet, ba ni kuɗi ki̶ peeɓang kas, ki̶ mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu mpar, ba ni kuɗi ki̶ peeɓang kas zak.
66008013	Kaaɗi wan naapee, ɓe wan ki̶ling mee puul, ɗi nii mwaan aɗeng, nii petpee shi ɗoo ɗiiɓal, nee, "Jeel! Jeel Jeel. Mpee gurum ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni, mpeeɗi nyemlop kì̵ Naan ɗi mo kuɗi kun sí, mo kus kì̵ taa feer furu mo."
66009001	Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiipaat wuri taa feer fi̶ri, ɓe wan naa mee zar ɗi ni put ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, har ni sham taa nyil ɗiisi. Mo cín makuli mu wang po tughun ɗiijurung, ɗi ba ni ki̶ peeɗar kas si nwuri.
66009002	Kaaɗi wuri wang po tughun ɗiijurung ɗiisi ni, ɓe ɗiyeel kàa put ndi̶ghi̶n tughun ni, kaa ɗiyeel kì̵ wus ɗi nii se lu si. Ɗiyeel ɗiisi ni kàa paa puus, ki̶ ɗengnaan, har pee ni rap kaa par si.
66009003	Ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiyeel ɗiisi ni, ɓe ciɓel mo sham nkaa yil ni, mo cínɓal mu nungpee nciɓel ɗiisi ni mo, kaa mu ɗi̶ghi̶r mo si.
66009004	Mo sat mmo nee, taji lejeel nshit koo ting ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni kas, amma mo cínjeel a nyem ɗi ba mo ki̶ mbii aapo ndiɓen stam mu Naan nkaa pukiyeen furu kas.
66009005	Ba mo cín iiko ni mo a mpeku mo tutwa nyem ɗiisi ni mo kas, amma mo cín iiko mmo, a mpeku mo cínjeel ɗi nyem ɗiisi ni mo mpee tar mo paat. Jeel ɗi mo shwaa ni, ni shwal kaa shwal ɗi gurum ki̶ ki̶ling, katɗang ɗi̶ghi̶r nung wuri si.
66009006	Ndi̶ghi̶n tar ɗiipaat ɗiisi ni mo, ɓe nyem ɗiisi ni mo tang muut, amma ba mo kat kas. Mo riɓet muut, amma muut ni so jong ki̶ mo.
66009007	Ciɓel ɗiisi ni mo lapshak ki̶ bi̶ring ɗi mo tap ɗak mo mpee so nlek. Mo jwal mee mbii mo nkáa furu, kaa mbiikáa ɗi mo ɗak mo shi zinariya si, ki̶ zak, yit furu mo lapshak ki̶ yit kì̵ gurum mo.
66009008	Shoopkáa furu, mo shwal kaa mu shirop mo si, ki̶ zak, aghas furu ni a kaa aghas mu mbwoor mo si.
66009009	Mo paa tughur kì̵ mo ni mo, shi shaghal, ki̶ cáap furu mo wal ntiit ki̶ wal mu shii kì̵ bi̶ring ɗi moo ɗul keke bi̶ring mo mpee so nlek.
66009010	Mo ki̶ dang ɗi nii nung gurum mo kaa ɗi̶ghi̶r mo si. A shi dang ɗiisi mo, ɓe mo kat ɓal mpee cínjeel ngurum mo, mpee tar mo paat.
66009011	Mishkagham furu ni a ngulop mu tughun ɗiijurung, ɗi ba ni ki̶ peeɗar kas si, sum fi̶ri shi liispo mu nyem Yahudi mo, ɓe ni a Abaddon, ɗangɓe sum fi̶ri shi liispo kì̵ nyem Heleni mo, ɓe ni a Apoliyon. Shii kì̵ mi̶ni nee, "Nguwat mbii mo."
66009012	Jeel ɗiiɗes ɗin nshee ni ɗel mmi̶ni. Ɗee jeel ɗiiɗes mo ɗi vul, ɗi mon ndung j`i.
66009013	Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiipeemee ni wuri taa feer fi̶ri, ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling mee ɗoo ni j`i put ndi̶ghi̶n kwang ɗiifeer mu peewus mbiizughum ɗi mo ɗak ni a shi zinariya, ɗi nii ɗar ntoghom kì̵ Naan.
66009014	Ɗoo ni katpo ki̶ ngulop ɗiipeemee ni nee, "A fwoon nyemlop ɗiifeer si mo, ɗi gyet mo ɓwaghat mo le ndung Yufiretus ɗiiɗes si."
66009015	Nyemlop ɗiifeer ɗiisi mo, gyet mo ɓwaghat mo le ɗi, a mpeku mo gong wul kì̵ pee, ki̶ teer, ki̶ tar, ki̶ ɓit ni, mpeku mo ɓwot mo, ku mo so twa gurum mo ɗi. Kaaɗi mo fwoon mo, ɓe mo so twa mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu gurum ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi.
66009016	Wan ki̶ling nee, ɗuu kì̵ sooja ɗi mo lang bi̶ring ni mo, mo a miliyon ɗari vul.
66009017	Bi̶ring ni mo ki̶ nyemlang ni mo, ɗi wan naa mo ndi̶ghi̶n sughun fi̶na ni, mo lapshak zam. Mo jwal mee shaghal nkaa tughur furu mo, ɗi ni naat kaa wus si, ki̶ ni pan a tup kaa ɗengnaan si, ki̶ zak, ni a kaa yara si. Káa kì̵ bi̶ring ni mo lap ki̶ mu mbwoor mo. Wus ki̶ ɗiyeel, ki̶ fwat mu pus binti̶ka, mo j`i put mpo kì̵ bi̶ring ni mo.
66009018	A shi jeel ɗi nii wus, ki̶ ɗiyeel, ki̶ fwat mu pus binti̶ka, ɗi mo j`i pwat ndi̶ghi̶n po kì̵ bi̶ring ɗiisi ni mo, ɓe mo twa mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu gurum ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni.
66009019	Ɓal kì̵ bi̶ring ɗiisi ni mo, a ndi̶ghi̶n po furu, ki̶ dang furu mo. Dang furu ni mo a kaa nw`oo mo si, ɗi mo ki̶ káa. A shi dang ɗiisi ni mo, ɓe bi̶ring ɗiisi mo cínjeel ngurum mo.
66009020	Kaghar gurum ɗi ba mo murap nsar kì̵ jeel ɗiisi mo kas, ɓe ba mo tuwap kas, mo sat a nseyil nriin ɗiibish mo, ki̶ k`um ɗi mo ɗak shi zinariya, ki̶ azurfa, ki̶ mu boong ɗiinaat, ki̶ mu jwak, ki̶ mu yoghom mo. K`um ɗiisi mo, ba moo naapee, koo ki̶lingpee, koo mee mwaan kas.
66009021	Ba mo waa tuwap mpee tukáa ɗi moo c`in ni kas, ki̶ nyem mu numpee mo ki̶ c`in ngaa, ki̶ wat kas.
66010001	Ɗangɓe wan naa mee ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes, wurii tong a ɗengnaan sham. Nluu paa wuri kaa nli̶r si, ki̶ zak, lilliu neer káa fi̶ri cighi̶rkaat. Yit fi̶ri ni a kaa puus si, ki̶ shii fi̶ri ni mo a kaa ndwet ɗiinan-nan mu wus si.
66010002	Wuri ki̶ mee làa takarda, ɗi ni a wuwang nsar fi̶ri, wuri leshii fi̶ri ɗin nsarse ni nkaa bahar, ki̶ wuri ten yil ni ki̶ shii fi̶ri ɗin nsarkul.
66010003	Ɗangɓe wuri petpee shi ɗoo ɗiiɓal ɗi ni lap shak ki̶ or mu mbwoor. Kaaɗi wuri kì̵ petpee ni, ɓe nluupet, ki̶ pee mo povul mo lap nwuri.
66010004	Kaaɗi pee ɗiipovul ni mo lap, ɓe wan ki̶n riɓet ran ni, amma wan ki̶ling mee ɗoo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan sat nee, "A paa mbii ɗi nluu ɗi mo petpee povul ni mo sat. Taji a ran mbii ɗi mo sat ni kas."
66010005	Ɗangɓe ngulop kì̵ Naan, ɗi mee shii fi̶ri ni nkaa bahar, ki̶ mee shii fi̶ri nkaa yil sí, wuri ɗiyeep sarse fi̶ri kàa aɗeng.
66010006	Wuri tuwoorpo ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Naan ɗi har ngaa-ngaa. Wuri ɗi wuri le ɗengnaan, ki̶ mbii ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n ni jir. A wuri leyil, ki̶ mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni jir zak, ki̶ a wuri le bahar, ki̶ mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ni jir. Ngulop ni wuri sat nee, "Ba mee ɓes kuɗi kas, pee ni wul."
66010007	Katɗang teer ni wul, mpeku ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiipovul wuri taa feer fi̶ri ni, ɓe mbii ɗiisi̶sok mu Naan mon ngam, kaaɗi gyet wuri kì̵ ten sat nki̶rom fi̶ri mo, nyemsatpo fi̶ri mo mmi̶ni.
66010008	Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling mee ɗoo si ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ni katpo ki̶ wan zak nee, "A so, a mang takarda ɗi ni a wuwang, nsar kì̵ ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii ɗar nkaa yil ni ki̶ bahar sí."
66010009	Ni aasi, ɓe wan so pe ngulop kì̵ Naan ni wuri ɗi, wan sat nwuri nee, "A cín làa takarda ni nwan." Ɓe wuri sat nwan nee, "A mang, a se. Nin nɗeet ɓut nwugha, amma nin nshang mpo fugha, kaa am nshii si."
66010010	Wan lap làa takarda ɗin nsar kì̵ ngulop kì̵ Naan ni, ɓe wan se làa takarda ni. Ni shang ndi̶ghi̶n po fi̶na kaa am nshii si, amma aɓwoon ɗi wan ki̶n ten nse ni, ɓe ni le ku ɓut fi̶na ni ɗeet.
66010011	Ɗangɓe mo sat nwan nee, "Ni ating a baa a satpo kì̵ Naan ɗi nkaa gurum ɗi mon nyil mo shini-shini, ki̶ liispo mo shini-shini, ki̶ nkaa mishkagham furu mo shini-shini zak."
66011001	Mo cín mee kam nwan, mpee kám mbii mo, ɗangɓe mo sat nwan nee, "A so a kám Lu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes ni, ki̶ peewus mbiizughum ni, ki̶ zak, a tang ɗuu kì̵ nyem ɗi mo nkaa seyil nNaan ɗi nlu ni.
66011002	Amma taji a kám pee ɗiineer cighi̶r mɓwoon ni kas, mpeeɗi mo kì̵ ten cín mi̶ni, nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas. Nyem ɗiisi mon mmwaan nkaa birni mu Naan ni, mpee tar mo laarfeer baavul.
66011003	Wan ncín iiko fi̶na nlangting mo vul, mpeku mo satpo ɗi Naan ki̶ riɓet ku mo sat ɗi akiyeen, mpee teer mo duɓu mi̶ndong ki̶ ɗari vul ki̶ laarpeemee, ki̶ zak, mon njwal a leemaap mo."
66011004	Nyemlangting ɗiivul ɗiisi ni mo, a mo a tingpaat ɗiivul si mo, ki̶ fitila ɗiivul si mo zak, ɗi moo ɗar ntoghom kì̵ Daa ɗi mu yil ɗiisi ni.
66011005	Katɗang mee gurum ki̶ riɓet wat mo, ɓe wus nj`i put mpo furu, har ni se shaarlek furu. A ɗiisi ni, a ar muut kì̵ jir nyem ɗi moo tang wat mo.
66011006	Nyem ɗiisi ni mo ki̶ iiko, mpeku mo shaghat ɗengnaan, mpeku taji fwan j`i kas, ndi̶ghi̶n teer ɗi mon nkaa satpo ɗi Naan ki̶ riɓet ku mo sat akiyeen. Ki̶ zak, mo ki̶ iiko, mpeku mo le am mo jir, mo ɗee a toghom. Moo mak cut yil ni shi shwal mo shini-shini, kaaɗi mo naa ni ret mmo nyit si.
66011007	Aɓwoon ɗi mon nkyes sat langting furu ni mo, ɓe mee luwa ɗi ni kàa put ndi̶ghi̶n tughun ɗi ba ni ki̶ peeɗar kas si. Luwa ɗiisi nin mɓwot lek nkaa mo, har nin nse koghorong nkaa mo, ɗangɓe nin ntwa mo zak.
66011008	Kúm kì̵ das ɗiivul ɗiisi ni mon ngi̶rang ndi̶ghi̶n birni ɗiinan-nan si mo, ɗi moo pet mo a Sodom ki̶ Ijip, yil ɗiivul si mo ɗee a mbiikám. A ndi̶ghi̶n birni ɗiiɗes ɗiisi, ɓe gyet mo pwas Daa furu ɗi.
66011009	Gurum mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil mo shini-shini, liispo mo shini-shini, dang mo shini-shini, ki̶ jep gurum mo shini-shini, mon nnaa kúm kì̵ mo ni, mpee teer mo kun ki̶ kaghar, ki̶ gurum mon nkwar wum kúm kì̵ mo ni.
66011010	Nyem ɗi moo tong ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, mon nc`in retnyit mpee murap kì̵ das ɗiivul ɗiisi ni mo. Mon mmi̶reppee, ki̶ zak, mon nlop mbiizughum mon nshak, mpeeɗi po kì̵ Naan ɗi jí langting ɗiivul ni mo sat, ni le ku gurum ɗi mon nyil ɗiisi mo shwaajeel ɗes.
66011011	Aɓwoon kì̵ teer mo kun ki̶ kaghar, ɓe Naan wuri le ku nook mu seen ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n mo, har mo yaghal ɗar nkaa shii furu mo, ɗangɓe mee ki̶i̶rmuut ɗiiɗes ni yaa nyem ɗi mo naa mo.
66011012	Ɗangɓe mo ki̶ling mee ɗoo ɗiiɗes ɗi ni put ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan ni sat mmo nee, "Wu kàa si." Ɓe mo yaghal kàa ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan mɓut nluu, ki̶ shaarlek furu mo naa pe moo kàa ɗi.
66011013	Nɗin mman, nnaar kì̵ mi̶ni, ɓe yil ni yoghon ɓal-ɓal. Mi̶ndong mɓut nkaghapaat mu birni ni pyan, ki̶ gurum mo duɓu povul, mo murap ndi̶ghi̶n yoghon kì̵ yil mi̶ni. Ki̶i̶rmuut ɗiiɗes yaa kaghar nyem ɗi moo seen mo, har mo cín ɗiiɗes nNaan ɗi wuri ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan.
66011014	Aɓwoon kì̵ mbii ɗiisi mo, ɓe jeel ɗiivul ni ɗel, amma jeel ɗiikun nin nj`i ki̶lak-ki̶lak.
66011015	Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiipovul ni wuri taa feer ɗiipovul ni, ɓe wan ki̶ling ɗoo ɗiiɓal-ɓal mo ɗes ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, mo sat nee, "Mulki mu yil ɗiisi ni, ni ɗee a mulki mu Daa funu, ki̶ mu Làa fi̶ri Kristi, wurin nc`in mulki ni a har ngaa-ngaa."
66011016	Ɗangɓe nyemnan ɗii Laarvul baafeer si mo, ɗi moo tong nkaa mbiitong mu mulki furu mo ntoghom kì̵ Naan si, mo kurum nyil, ku mo seyil ɗi nNaan.
66011017	Mo sat nee: "Mu pi̶lang wugha, Daa Naan ɗiiɓal met jir, wugha ɗi wugha a shee kì̵ mbii mo jir, ki̶ zak, wugha ɗi yaksi, mu pi̶lang wugha, mpeeɗi aa mang ɓal fugha ɗiiɗes ni nsar fugha, ku a yaa se mulki ɗi nkaa yil ɗiisi.
66011018	Nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem kì̵ Naan mo kas, ndi̶ghi̶n yil mo shini-shini, ni làa mmo mɓut, mpeeɗi tughup kì̵ Naan ni j`i wul. Mpeeɗi pee ni wul, mpeku wugha woo tughup fugha ɗi nkaa mo. Pee ni wul, mpeku wugha tokɗiyeel ɗi nyem ɗi gyet mo kì̵ ten murap mo, ki̶ mpeku a cín kwat ɗiiret ɗi nki̶rom fugha mo. Nyemsatpo fugha mo mmi̶ni, ki̶ nyem fugha mo, ki̶ nyem ɗi gyet mo lesum fugha ni a ɗiiɗes, nyem ɗiiɗween mo, ki̶ nyem ɗiinan mo zak. Wugha wat nyem ɗi mo wat yil ni mo."
66011019	Mo wang Lu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ɓe mo naa kwati mu tuwoorpo shi toghom mu Naan, ni ɗi nLu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes ɗiisi ni. Ɗangɓe pee ni mi̶lep ɗes, ki̶ ɗoo ɗiiɗes mo, ki̶ nluupet, ɓe yil ni yoghon, ki̶ ɗaghar ɗiinan-nan mo sham nkaa yil ni.
66012001	Mee alama ɗiiɗes ɗi ni aapo, ni j`i put ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan. Mee mat wura, ɗi wura lop puus kaa nli̶r si nkaa sat, ki̶ tar nder shii fi̶ra, ki̶ wura lop zar mo kaghapaat baavul nkáa fi̶ra, kaa mbiikáa mu mulki si.
66012002	Mat ɗiisi wura ki̶ aak. Kaaɗi aak ni mak làa, ɓe wura ɓwot or ɗiiɓal mu jeel, kaaɗi aak ni ɗoghom se wura.
66012003	Ɗangɓe mee alama ni j`i put ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan ni zak, mee kus nw`oo ɗiiɗes, ɗi ni a naat, ki̶ káa mo povul, ki̶ soghom mo kaghapaat, ki̶ mbiikáa mu mulki mo, nkaa koo káa ɗiiɗang ye, ɗi ni j`i put ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan ni.
66012004	Shi dang kì̵ nw`oo ɗiisi, ɓe ni tup mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu zar ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan sham ɗyong nyil. Nw`oo ni ɗar akiyeen kì̵ mat ɗi wuran ndung làa-làa si, mpeku ni se làa ɗi mat ni wuran nlàa ni ɗi.
66012005	Mat ni wura làa-làa ɗiimish, ɗi wurin nse mulki nkaa gurum ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n nyil ni mo shini-shini jir, shi kam ɗi mo ɗak ni a shi shaghal. Kaaɗi làa ni sham taa nyil, ɓe mo ɓam wuri kwet, ɗel kàa ki̶ wuri pe Naan ɗi, ki̶ peetong mu mulki fi̶ri.
66012006	Mat ni wura su so a naar yil, a peeɗi Naan wuri tap ɗakle nwura, ɗi mon ntap ki̶ wura, har teer mo duɓu mi̶ndong, ki̶ ɗari vul ki̶ laarpeemee.
66012007	Lek yaghal ndi̶ghi̶n nɗengnaan, Makiyel ki̶ nyemlop fi̶ri mo, mon nkaa lek ki̶ nw`oo ni ki̶ nyemlop fi̶ri mo, lek ni naat a mo. Nw`oo ni ki̶ nyemlop fi̶ri mo, mo c`in lek ni shiɓal hakyeng.
66012008	Amma Makiyel ki̶ nyemlop fi̶ri mo, mo se koghorong nkaa nw`oo ni, mo ceen nw`oo ni ki̶ nyemlop fi̶ri mo aku ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan.
66012009	Mo mang nw`oo ni, ɓe mo vwet wuri sham ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, ashak ki̶ nyemlop fi̶ri mo. Sum kì̵ nw`oo ɗiisi ni a Shetan, mishkagham kì̵ riin ɗiibish mo. Pugyet wuri ɗi mmuyíi, gyet yam-yam ɓe wurii num yil ni so ki̶ni a ar ɗin nkan.
66012010	Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling mee ɗoo ɗiiɗes ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan ni sat nee: "Yaksi, ɓe ɓam kì̵ Naan ni j`i wul! Naan wuri kám iiko fi̶ri agaak. Yaksi, ɓe Kristi wuri nkám ɗiiɗes fi̶ri, mpeeɗi mo kì̵ vwet ngumwaanaa kì̵ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu mo sham nyil, wuri ɗi wuri kì̵ c`in mwaanaa furu ntoghom funu mpar ki̶ puus.
66012011	Mo se koghorong nkaa wuri a mpee toghom kì̵ Laatum ni, ki̶ zak, mpeeɗi mo c`in langting nee, po fi̶ri ni azeen-nzeen, har mo cín seen furu mo mpee sum fi̶ri.
66012012	Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wu c`in retnyit, wun ɗengnaan mo, ki̶ nyem ɗi moo tong ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan ni mo zak. Amma jeel ɗi mpee yil ni, ki̶ bahar mo, mpeeɗi Shetan wuri sham pe wun ɗi. Wuri gam ki̶ putughup ɗiiwuwat. Wuri man nee, pee fi̶ri ni ɗee a lee ɗak."
66012013	Kaaɗi nw`oo ɗiisi ni naa, nee; mo vwet wuɗi sham ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, ɓe ni yaa sushii ndang mat ɗi wura làa-làa ɗiimish sí.
66012014	Amma mo cín cáap ɗiinan-nan mo nwura vul, ɗi mo a kaa mu puul si, mpeku wura katpee yaghal so wul ɗi a peeɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten tap ɗakle nwura a naaryil ni. A peeɗi mon ntap ki̶ wura mpee ɓit mo kun ki̶ kaghar, peeɗi ba nw`oo nin mmak wul ɗi, ku ni kat, wura ɗi kas.
66012015	Nw`oo ni fuut am mpo fi̶ri, so ndang mat ni wura, kaa am ɗi nii sham ndung si, wuri c`in ɗiisi, a mpeku am ni mang mat ni wura ɗi.
66012016	Amma yil ni ɓam mat ni wura, yil ni wang po ki̶ ni, har ni shwaa am ɗi nw`oo ni fuut ni.
66012017	Tughup fes tu nw`oo ni ndang mat ni wura, kaaɗi ni naa ba ni mak yaa mat ni wura kas, ɓe ni so yaa lek nkaa dang kì̵ mat ni mo. Dang kì̵ mat ni, a nyem ɗi moo ki̶ling ɗoo ki̶ Naan, ɗi mo lappo kì̵ Jesu.
66012018	Nw`oo ni ɗar nkaa po ɗiyees mu am bahar ni.
66013001	Ɗangɓe wan naa mee luwayil, ɗi ni kàa put ndi̶ghi̶n am bahar. Luwa ɗiisi ni ki̶ soghom mo kaghapaat, ki̶ káa mo povul, ni ki̶ mbiikáa mu mulki mo kaghapaat nkaa soghom fi̶ri ni mo, ki̶ zak, koo a káa ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe mo ran mee sum ɗi ni satpo ɗiibish nkaa Naan.
66013002	Luwa ɗi wan naa ni, ni lapshak ki̶ lushim, shii ni lapshak ki̶ mu mee luwayil ɗi moo pet a beyar. Po ni lapshak ki̶ mu mbwoor. Kus nw`oo ɗiiɗes si cínɓal fi̶ri nluwa ni, ki̶ peetong mu mulki fi̶ri, ki̶ iiko fi̶ri ɗiiɗes ni.
66013003	Mee káa kì̵ luwa ɗiisi ni, ni ɗee kaa mo le a láa ɗi ni mak muut nluwa ni si, amma láa ni kì̵ zughum. Luwa ɗiisi ni c`in mbii aapo mo ngurum mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni zam, har gurum mo ɗoghom so ndang ni.
66013004	Gurum mo seyil nw`oo ni, mpeeɗi ni kì̵ ten cín iiko fi̶ri nluwa ni, ki̶ zak, mo seyil nluwa ni, har mo sat nee, "A we kaa wugha luwa si ye? A we mmak cín lek ki̶ wugha ye?"
66013005	Mo cín po nluwa ɗiisi ni, har ni satpo roghop, ki̶ po ɗiibuu mo nkaa Naan. Mo cínɓal nni, mpee sat mbii mo kaa mi̶ni mo si, mpee tar mo laarfeer baavul.
66013006	Luwa ni wang po fi̶ri, har ni satpo ɗiibuu mo, nkaa Naan ki̶ peetong fi̶ri ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ki̶ nkaa nyem ɗi mo ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan zak.
66013007	Mo cínɓal nni, mpeku ni c`in lek ɗi nkaa nyem kì̵ Naan mo, har ni se koghorong nkaa mo, ki̶ zak, mo cín iiko nni nkaa saghan kì̵ gurum mo shini-shini, ki̶ liispo mo shini-shini, ki̶ yil mo shini-shini, zak.
66013008	Gurum ɗi moo tong ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi jir mo seyil nni, amma nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten ran sum furu, pugyet ɗin nshee kì̵ yil ni, ndi̶ghi̶n takarda ɗi ni a mu seen, ɗi ni a mu Laatum ɗi gyet mo tu wuri si, ɓe ba mon nseyil nluwa ni kas.
66013009	Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ kom mpee ki̶lingpee, ɓe wuri ki̶ling.
66013010	Katɗang mo mang mee ngo so ki̶ni, mpeku wuri ɗee a ki̶rom, ɓe ni a ting mon mmang wuri so ki̶ni ku wuri ɗee ɗi a ki̶rom. Katɗang mon ntu mee ngo a shi kwai, ɓe ni a ting mon ntu wuri a shi kwai ni, ɗiisi ni ɗee a petpee, mpee nyem kì̵ Naan mo, mpeku mo gung, ki̶ mo ɗar ɗi ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen furu.
66013011	Ɗangɓe wan naa mee luwa zak, nii kàa put ndi̶ghi̶n yil. Luwa ɗiisi ni ki̶ soghom mo vul kaa laatum si. Amma ni katpo kaa nw`oo ni si.
66013012	Luwa ɗiisi ni c`in ɗak ki̶ iiko mu luwa ɗin nshee si. Ni leting ngurum ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni, mpeku mo seyil nluwa ɗin nshee ni, ɗi láa ɗiimumuut ɗi jí mo le nni, ni kì̵ zughum nni si.
66013013	Ni c`in mbii aapo mo ɗes hakyeng, ni le ku wus tong a sham nkaa yil ɗiisi, har gurum mo naa sham kì̵ wus ni.
66013014	Mpee mbii aapo ɗi luwa ɗiivul ɗiisi ni c`in, nyit kì̵ luwa ɗin shee ni, ɓe ni num gurum ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi. Ni leting ngurum mo, ku mo ɗik muriin kì̵ luwa ɗin nshee si, ɗi gyet mo le láa ni shi kwai, amma ba ni muut kas si.
66013015	Mo cínɓal nluwa ni, mpeku ni cín nookɗi mmuriin kì̵ luwa ɗin nshee, ɗi gurum mo kì̵ ten ɗik ni, har muriin ni katpo. Nyem ɗi mo kwar seyil nni, ɓe muriin ni le ku mo twa mo.
66013016	Luwa ɗiivul ni, ni leting ngurum mo jir, nyem ɗiiɗes mo, ki̶ ɗiilee mo, nyemlong mo, ki̶ nyemjeel mo, jeplu mo, ki̶ ki̶rom mo, ku mo lap mee alama nkaa sarse furu, koo nkaa pukiyeen furu mo.
66013017	Mpeku taji mee gurum katpee mpee c`in nwor kas, see ngo ni ki̶ alama ni akuɗang. Alama ɗiisi ni a sum kì̵ luwa ni, koo namba ki̶ sum fi̶ri.
66013018	Ɗiisi ni, ɓe see a ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ seen, ɗang wurin mmak manshii kì̵ namba kì̵ luwa ɗiisi ni, mpeeɗi namba ni a namba kì̵ gurum, ni ɗar a koppee mu sum kì̵ luwa. Namba kì̵ luwa ni a ɗari peemee ki̶ laarpeemee baapeemee (666).
66014001	Kaaɗi wan ɗiyeep yit, ɓe wan naa Laatum akiyeen fi̶na, wuri ɗar nkaa jwak nZayon, ashak ki̶ nyem fi̶ri mo, ɗi mo wul duɓu ɗari mi̶ndong ki̶ laarfeer baafeer (144,000). Das ɗiisi ni mo ki̶ sum kì̵ Laatum ni, ki̶ sum kì̵ puun fi̶ri a riran nkaa pukiyeen furu mo jir.
66014002	Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling mee ɗoo si ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ɗi ni ntiit ki̶ wal kì̵ am ɗi nii sham ndung ɗes, ki̶ ni wal kaa petpee kì̵ nluu si. Ɗoo ɗiisi ni shang ki̶ling, kaa mee das mo nkaa taa nɗeng-nɗeng mo si.
66014003	Mo c`in kook ɗiipoo ntoghom kì̵ mbiitong mu mulki ni, ki̶ ntoghom kì̵ mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen si mo, ki̶ ntoghom kì̵ nyemnan si mo. Ba mee ngo mak kám kook mi̶ni kas, see a das ɗiiduɓu mi̶ndong ki̶ laarfeer baafeer ni mo ɓejee. A mo a nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten ang mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni.
66014004	Das ɗiisi ni mo a nyem ɗi ba gyet mo kyam wat sut shi ngaa kas, mo ki̶ tap ki̶ káa furu mo. Mo a nyem ɗiiɓang mo. Mo so ndang Laatum ni, koo a pee ɗiiɗang ye. Mo ang mo mɓut ngurum mo, ki̶ mo cín mon nNaan, ki̶ Laatum ni, kaa mbiizughum ɗin nshee si.
66014005	Ba mee ɗung kyam put mpo furu kas, mpeeɗi ba mo ki̶ mee shikbish kas.
66014006	Ɗangɓe wan naa mee ngulop kì̵ Naan, nkaa mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n kut a shi cáap, wuri ki̶ po ɗiiret, ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa, mpeku wuri sat ni ɗi nyem ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi. Po ɗiisi ni, ni a mpee koo a yil ɗiiɗang ye, ki̶ mpee koo a saghan ɗiiɗang ye, koo a liispo ɗiiɗang ye, ki̶ ni a mpee gurum mo jir ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni.
66014007	Wuri sat shi ɗoo ɗiiɗes nee, "Wu ki̶i̶r Naan, wu cín ɗiiɗes nwuri, mpeeɗi puus tokɗiyeel fi̶ri ni j`i wul. Wu seyil nNaan, mpeeɗi a wuri le ɗeng mo ki̶ yil ni. A wuri le am ndi̶ghi̶n bahar, ki̶ tuɓut mo zak."
66014008	Mee ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiivul, wuri j`i mɓwoon kì̵ ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗin nshee ni, wuri sat nee, "Wuraa pal, wuraa pal. Yil Babilon ɗiiɗes ni wuraa pal. Gyet a wura le ɗang gurum ɗin ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni mo shini-shini mo shwaa am anab fi̶ra, ɗi ni a mu c`in ngaa ki̶ wura."
66014009	Mee ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiikun wuri j`i mɓwoon kì̵ ngulop ɗiivul ni, wuri sat nee, "Katɗang mee gurum seyil nluwa si, ki̶ muriin fi̶ri, har ku ngo mi̶ni lap alama mu luwa ni nkaa sarse fi̶ri, koo nkaa pukiyeen fi̶ri,
66014010	ɓe gwar mi̶nin nshwaa am anab ɗi ni a mu tughup kì̵ Naan. Ɗi wuri kì̵ ten ɗoo shiɓal ndi̶ghi̶n ɗaa fi̶ri ɗi ni a mu tughup fi̶ri. Mon ncínjeel ngwar mi̶ni shi wus ɗiinaat, ki̶ jwak mu wus mo, ntoghom kì̵ nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo, ki̶ Laatum ni.
66014011	Ɗiyeel mu shwaajeel kì̵ das mi̶ni mo, ni yaghal kàa aɗeng har ngaa-ngaa, par ki̶ puus. Ba mee nookɗi pe nyem ɗi mo seyil nluwa ni, ki̶ muriin fi̶ri ni kas. Ki̶ koo nyem ɗi mo lap alama mu sum kì̵ luwa ni."
66014012	Ɗiisi ni ɗee a petpee mpee nyem kì̵ Naan mo, mpeku mo gung ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n tap ki̶ Waar kì̵ Naan, ki̶ zak, mpeku mo ɗar ɗi ɓal-ɓal shi cínzeen furu ndi̶ghi̶n Daa Jesu.
66014013	Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling mee ɗoo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ni sat nee, "A ran mbii ɗiisi mo. Ɗiiret ni ɗee nkaa nyem ɗi mo murap mo, nyem ɗi mon mmurap mpee sum ki̶ Daa, yaghal nyaksi." Riin ni lap nee, "Ii, ni aasi, mpeeɗi mon nnookɗi mɓut nɗak furu mo, ki̶ ɗak furu ni moo so ndang mo zak."
66014014	Kaaɗi wan naapee, akiyeen fi̶na, ɓe wan naa mee nluu ɗiipiyaa, ki̶ mee gwar wurii tong nkaa nluu ni, ɗi wuri lapshak ki̶ Làa kì̵ Gurum. Wuri ki̶ mbiikáa mu zinariya nkaa káa fi̶ri, ki̶ wuri ki̶ mee cuk ɗiisese nsar fi̶ri.
66014015	Mee ngulop kì̵ Naan wuri j`i put ndi̶ghi̶n Lu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes, ɓe wuri pet gwar ɗi wurii tong nkaa nluu si, shi ɗoo ɗiiɓal, nee, "A mang cuk fugha ni, ku a yaa ɗiip ɗiɓen ɗin mmaar ni ɗi, mpeeɗi pee mu ɗiip ɗiɓen ɗin mmaar ni kì̵ j`i wul. Ɗiɓen ni kì̵ nung mak ɗiip."
66014016	Gwar ɗi wurii tong nkaa nluu sí, wuri wiip cuk fi̶ri nkaa maar ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni, ɓe mo ɗiip ɗiɓen ni mo ɗak.
66014017	Mee ngulop kì̵ Naan, wuri j`i put ndi̶ghi̶n Lu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes ni ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ngulop ɗiisi wuri ki̶ cuk ɗiisese nsar fi̶ri zak.
66014018	Mee ngulop kì̵ Naan, ɗi a wurii tap ki̶ wus, wuri j`i put a peeɗi moo wus mbiizughum ɗin nNaan, wuri pet ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wuri ki̶ cuk ɗiisese sí shi ɗoo ɗiiɓal nee, "A mang cuk fugha, ku a yaa saa tuwoon laating anab ɗii mu yil ɗiisi ni ɗi, mpeeɗi laating anab ni mo kì̵ nung."
66014019	Ngulop kì̵ Naan ni wuri wiip cuk fi̶ri nkaa yil ni, ɓe wuri yaa saa tuwoon anab mo, ɗangɓe wuri le mo ndi̶ghi̶n pee ɗwat am anab, ɗi ni a tughup kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes.
66014020	Mo ti̶reng, ki̶ mo ɗwat làa anab ni mo, aɓwoon kì̵ birni ni. Toghom put ndi̶ghi̶n làa anab ɗiisi ni mo, har toghom ni sham kaa am ndung si, mpee meel mo ɗari vul, jurung kì̵ ni a kaa kám kì̵ shii mo paat si.
66015001	Wan naa, mee alama ɗiiɗes, ɗi ni ɗee a mbii aapo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan. Wan naa nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo povul, ki̶ jeel ɗi mu kyes ni mo povul zak. A shi jeel ɗiisi mo, ɓe Naan wuri woo kyes kì̵ tughup fi̶ri.
