66015002	Aɓwoon mi̶ni, ɓe wan naa, mee mbii ɗi nin ntiit ki̶ am bahar mu gi̶las, ɗi mo riyeep ni ashak ki̶ wus. Nyem ɗi mo se koghorong nkaa luwa sí, ki̶ nkaa muriin fi̶ri, ki̶ nkaa gwar ɗi sum fi̶ri a namba, moo ɗar ɗi mpo dung ni. Mo ki̶ nɗeng-nɗeng mo nsar furu, ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ cín ni mmo.
66015003	Mo c`in kook mu Mosis ki̶rom ki̶ Naan, ki̶ kook mu Laatum ni, mo c`in kook ni nee: "Ɗak fugha ni mo, a ɗiinan-nan mo, ɗi mo aapo, wugha Daa Naan ɗi a ɓal met mbii mo jir. Ar fugha ni mo a ɗin ndi̶re, ki̶ mo azeen-nzeen zak. Wugha a Mishkagham mu gurum ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni mo jir.
66015004	A we nki̶i̶r wugha kas ye? Ki̶ zak, a we nnook kwoop sum fugha ye? Daa a wugha mmi̶sak, a ɗiiɓang. Gurum ɗin ndi̶ghi̶n yil mo jir, mon nj`i seyil nwugha. Mpeeɗi gurum mo jir, mo naa ɗak fugha ɗiiret ni mo."
66015005	Aɓwoon ɗiisi, ɓe wan naapee aɗengnaan, ɓe wan naa mo wangpee ɗiiɓang mu Tent mu Naan, ɗi ni a langting kì̵ po ɗi gyet Naan wuri kì̵ ten tuwoor ni.
66015006	Nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo povul, ɗi mo ki̶ jeel mu kyes ɗiipovul si, mo j`i pwat ndi̶ghi̶n Lu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes, ɗi ni a mu tent ni. Mo jwal a lée ɗiiɓang, fuwaat ɗiimi̶lep mo, ɗi moo mangyit. Mo ɓwaghat tughur furu mo shi beel ɗi mo ɗak mo a shi zinariya.
66015007	Memee ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen sí, mo cín ɗaa mu zinariya mo povul, nyemlop kì̵ Naan ɗiipovul ni mo. Ɗaa ɗiisi ni mo gam kì̵ tughup kì̵ Naan ɗi wuri kì̵ seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa.
66015008	Lu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes ni gam ki̶ ɗiyeel mu ɗiiɗes fi̶ri, ki̶ iiko fi̶ri zak. Ba mee gurum mak ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n Lu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes ni kas, see aɓwoon ɗi jeel ɗiipovul ni mo gam.
66016001	Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling mee ɗoo ɗiiɓal ndi̶ghi̶n Lu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes ni, ni sat nyemlop ki̶ Naan ɗiipovul ni mo nee, "Wu so wu ɗoo mbii ɗin ndi̶ghi̶n ɗaa ɗiipovul ɗii mu tughup kì̵ Naan ni mo nkaa yil ni."
66016002	Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗin nshee wuri so ɗoo mbii ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n ɗaa ɗi wuri ki̶ ni nkaa yil ni. Ɗangɓe si̶rap ɗiishwal ɗi mo bish naa, mo pwas nyem ɗi mo ki̶ alama mu luwa nkaa sut si, ki̶ nyem ɗi jí mo seyil mmuriin kì̵ luwa ni.
66016003	Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiivul wuri so ɗoo mbii ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n ɗaa ɗi wuri ki̶ ni nkaa bahar, ɗangɓe am ni cighi̶r ɗee kaa toghom kì̵ ngu mumuut si. Mbii ɗi mo ki̶ seen ɗi moo tong ndi̶ghi̶n am, mo murap jir.
66016004	Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiikun, wuri so ɗoo mbii ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n ɗaa ɗi wuri ki̶ ni nkaa dung am mo, ki̶ tuɓut mo. Am ni mo cighi̶r ɗee a toghom.
66016005	Wan ki̶ling ngulop ɗi wurii tap ki̶ am mo, wuri sat nee: "Wugha a ɗin ndi̶re, mpee canɗiyeel ɗiisi mo. Wugha a ɗiiɓang, wugha ɗi gyet yam, ɓe wugha ɗi, wugha ɗi wugha ɗi yaksi.
66016006	Mpeeɗi gyet mo ɓeer toghom kì̵ nyem fugha mo, ki̶ toghom kì̵ nyemsatpo fugha mo zak. Amma wugha ki̶ cín toghom mmo shwaa ntiit-ntiit ki̶ kwat furu."
66016007	Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling mee ɗoo a peewus mbiizughum ni sat zak nee, "Ii, Daa Naan ɗiiɓal met jir. Azeen-nzeen, canɗiyeel fugha ni mo azeen, ki̶ mo a ndi̶re zak."
66016008	Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiifeer, wuri so ɗoo mbii ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n ɗaa ɗi wuri ki̶ ni, nkaa puus. Ɗangɓe mo cínɓal mpuus ni, mpeku ni caan gurum mo ɗi shi wus.
66016009	Tal kì̵ puus ni fes ɓaan gurum mo, shiɓal, har mo satpo ɗiibuu nkaa sum kì̵ Naan, ɗi wuri ki̶ iiko nkaa jeel ni mo. Amma mo kwar tuwap, ba mo kwoop ɗiiɗes kì̵ Naan kas.
66016010	Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiipaat, wuri so ɗoo mbii ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n ɗaa ɗi wuri ki̶ ni, nkaa pee mu mulki mu luwa ni. Ɗangɓe mulki kì̵ luwa ni cighi̶r ɗee a peenkoo. Ɓe gurum mo i̶rap liis furu mo mpee jeel ɗi mon nkaa shwaa ni.
66016011	Gurum mo waa satpo ɗiibuu nkaa Naan, mpee shwaajeel ɗi mo nkaa shwaa ni, ki̶ si̶rap furu mo zak, amma jir ki̶si, ɓe mo kwar tuwap, mpee ɗak ɗiibish ɗi mo kì̵ ten c`in mo.
66016012	Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiipeemee, wuri so ɗoo mbii ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n ɗaa ɗi wuri ki̶ni, nkaa dung Yufiretus ɗiiɗes si, ɓe am ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n dung ɗiisi ni ɗel fii, mpeku ni ɗak ar ɗi mmishkagham ɗi mon nj`i nkoghop puus ki̶kàa.
66016013	Ɗangɓe wan naa riin ɗiibish mo kun, ɗi mo kaa nzargong mo si, mo j`i pwat ndi̶ghi̶n po kì̵ kus nw`oo sí, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n po kì̵ luwa sí, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n po kì̵ ngusatpo Naan mu ɗung sí.
66016014	Riin ɗiibish ɗiisi ni mo nkaa c`in mbii aapo mo ɗes hakyeng. Mo so pe mishkagham mu yil ɗiisi mo jir, mpeku mo kyak mo le ɗi ashak mpee c`in lek parpuus ɗiiɗes mu Naan ɗiiɓal met jir sí.
66016015	"Wu naa wan nj`i a kaa wat si! Nyem ɗi mo tong shi gongpee, ɗi mo ki̶ lée furu mo a li̶lop, mpeku taji mo put ngum, ku mo kat naashoop ɗi kas, ɓe nyem mi̶ni mon nkat ɗiiret."
66016016	Riin ɗiibish ɗiisi ni mo kyak mishkagham mu yil ɗiisi mo le ashak, mmee peeɗi moo pet ni shi liispo mu nyem Yahudi mo a Armageddon.
66016017	Ngulop ɗiipovul, wuri so ɗoo mbii ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n ɗaa ɗi wuri ki̶ni nkaa kut. Ɗang mee ɗoo ɗiiɓal j`i put ndi̶ghi̶n Lu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes, a peetong mu mulki ni nee, "Ni kì̵ c`in!"
66016018	Ki̶ zak, pee ni mi̶lep, nluupet, ki̶ pee ni gwan. Yil ni yoghon shiɓal, ɗi ba yil kì̵ kyam yoghon kaa mi̶ni si kas, pugyet ɗi gurum mo yaa tong ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni.
66016019	Birni ɗiiɗes ni ɓàk kun, ki̶ kaghar birni ɗin ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni mo jir, mo shirip. Naan wuri pan Babilon ɗiiɗes si, har wuri cín kap ɗi ni gam ki̶ am anab ɗi ni a mu tughup fi̶ri nwura shwaa.
66016020	Koo rep laayil ɗiiɗang ye ɗi am neer ni cighi̶rkaat, ɓe ni su so lagham, ki̶ ɗengjwak mo su so lagham zak.
66016021	Ɗaghar ɗiinan-nan mo pwat nɗengnaan, har mo sham taa nkaa gurum mo, koo a ɗaghar ɗiiɗang ye ɓe toghon kì̵ ni wul kaa mu bufu ki̶i̶n si. Gurum mo satpo ɗiibuu nkaa Naan, mpee shwal ɗi moo shwaa ni, mpee sham kì̵ ɗaghar ɗiisi ni mo, ki̶ zak, mpeeɗi jeel ni fes shwal zam hakyeng.
66017001	Aɓwoon mi̶ni, ɓe memee mɓut nyemlop kì̵ Naan ɗiipovul si mo, ɗi mo ki̶ ɗaa mo povul sí, wuri j`i mpee wan ɗi, ɓe wuri sat nwan nee, "A j`i, ɓe wan nkám nwugha, ɗiyéel ɗi mo can mmat ngaa ɗiiɗes si wura. Mat ngaa ɗiisi ni wura ɗee a mishkagham, nkaa birni ɗi mo ɗik ni kus ki̶ dung am si mo.
66017002	Mishkagham ɗii mu yil ɗiisi mo c`in ngaa ashak ki̶ wura, ki̶ gurum ɗin ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi mo fes yughur ki̶ am anab mu ngaa fi̶ra ni."
66017003	Ɗangɓe Riin kì̵ Naan ni j`i ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n wan, ɓe ngulop kì̵ Naan wuri mang wan so ki̶ni a mee naar yil sí, a peeɗi ba am ɗi kas. A naar yil ni, ɓe wan naa mee mat ki̶ tong nkaa mee luwayil ɗi ni a naat. Mo ran sum ɗiibish mo, ɗi mo satpo ɗiibuu nkaa Naan. Luwayil ɗiisi ni ki̶ káa mo povul, ki̶ soghom mo kaghapaat.
66017004	Mat ni wura tap jwal a lée ɗi mo pan a naat mo, ɗi mo ret naa zam, wura kì̵ tap ɗak mo a shi mbii ɗi mo ɗak mo a shi zinariya ki̶ jwak ɗiilapwus mo, ki̶ mbii jwat ɗii riret mo, kaa mbii ɗi moo pet ni a peyal mo si. Mat ni wura ki̶ mee kap nsar fi̶ra, ɗi mo ɗak ni a shi zinariya, ɗi ni gam ki̶ mbii ɗiibish mo, ɗi mo a mu ar tong fi̶ra ɗiibish mu ngaa.
66017005	Mo ran mee sum, ɗi shii ki̶ni a ɗiisi̶sok, nkaa pukiyeen fi̶ra nee, "Babilon ɗiiɗes, ni̶ghi̶n kì̵ mat ngaa mo, ki̶ mbii ɗiibish ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni jir."
66017006	Wan naa mat ni wura ɗee a ɗiiyuyughur, ki̶ toghom kì̵ nyem mu Naan mo, ɗi wura kì̵ ten shwaa ni. Toghom kì̵ nyem ɗi gyet mo twa mo, mpeeɗi gyet mo c`in langting mpee sum kì̵ Jesu. Kaaɗi wan naa mat ni wura, ɓe ni fes aapo nwan zam.
66017007	Ngulop kì̵ Naan wuri sat nwan nee, "A me aapo nwugha ye? Wan woo shii kì̵ mbii ɗiisi̶sok kì̵ mat ɗiisi ni nwugha, ki̶ shii kì̵ mbii ɗiisi̶sok mu luwayil ɗi wuraa lang nkaa ni, ɗi ni ki̶ káa mo povul, ki̶ soghom mo kaghapaat si.
66017008	Luwayil ɗi a naa si, gyet yam ɓe ni ki̶ seen, amma yaksi, ɓe ba ni kuɗi ki̶ seen kas, nin nyaghal kàa put a ndi̶ghi̶n tughun ɗi ba nii peeɗar kas si, mpeku ni so ɗi a peeɗi mon ntu ni ɗi vit, har ngaa-ngaa. Nyem ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, ɗi pugyet ɗin nshee kì̵ yil ni, ɓe ba mo ran sum furu mo ndi̶ghi̶n takarda mu seen kas. Nin aapo mmo mpee naa luwa ɗiisi ni, mpeeɗi gyet ni ɗi ki̶ seen, amma ni kì̵ muut, jir ki̶si, ɓe nin nwaa baaj`i put ki̶ seen zak.
66017009	"Manshii kì̵ mbii ɗiisi ni, see, ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ seen mpee manshii kì̵ mbii mo. Káa kì̵ luwa ɗiipovul ni mo, mo a ɗushuu mo povul, ɗi mat ni wuraa tong nkaa mo si. Ki̶ zak, mo a mbiikám, káa mishkagham mo povul si.
66017010	Mo kì̵ sham ki̶ paat mo ndi̶ghi̶n mulki furu, amma mi̶ndong ɗi nkaa se mulki yaksi. Ba ɗiivul ni ki̶ j`i wul kas, amma katɗang wurin nj`i wul, ɓe wurin nse mulki ni a mpee rep pee lee ɓejee ɗak.
66017011	Luwayil ɗi jí ni ki̶ seen amma yaksi ɗi ba ni kuɗi kì̵ seen kas. Luwayil ni shikáa fi̶ri a mishkagham ɗiipokun, amma ni a ndi̶ghi̶n saghan kì̵ mishkagham ɗiipovul si mo. Nin nkaa so a peelagham kì̵ ni.
66017012	"Soghom ɗiikaghapaat ɗi a naa si mo, mo a mishkagham mo kaghapaat, ɗi ba mo kì̵ cín mulki furu kas aku. Amma mpee awa mi̶ndong, ɓe mon ncín iiko mmo kaa mishkagham mo si, ku mo c`in mulki ɗi ashak ki̶ luwayil ni.
66017013	Mishkagham ɗiikaghapaat si mo, pan furu ni mo a ɗiimi̶ndong, mon ncín ɓal furu, ki̶ iiko furu nluwayil ni.
66017014	Mon nc`in lek ki̶ Laatum ni, amma Laatum ni wurin nse koghorong nkaa mo, mpeeɗi a wuri a Daa kì̵ daa mo, Mishkagham kì̵ mishkagham mo, ki̶ ashak ki̶ wuri, ɓe nyem ɗi wuri kì̵ ten pi̶rep, ki̶ bi̶lip mo, mon nse koghorong zak."
66017015	Ɗangɓe ngulop kì̵ Naan wuri sat nwan nee, "Am ɗi a naa sí, a peeɗi mat ngaa si wuraa tong ɗi, gurum mo ɗes shini-shini, ki̶ yil mo shini-shini, ki̶ liispo mo shini-shini zak.
66017016	Soghom ɗiikaghapaat ɗi a naa sí mo, mo ki̶ luwayil ni, mon nfes kwar mat ngaa ni. Mon nhi̶r mbii ɗi wura ki̶ mo jir, har mo yit wura ɗee ngum, mon nse luwa fi̶ra, ki̶ mon ncaan wura shi wus.
66017017	A Naan wuri kì̵ ten le mi̶ni ndi̶ghi̶n putughup furu, mpeku mo c`in mbii ɗi ni gam ɗyen fi̶ri ɗi, kaaɗi mo ɓàlkáa furu mo, mpeku mo cínɓal furu mo, mpee se mulki kì̵ luwayil ni, har parɗi po kì̵ Naan ni gam.
66017018	Mat ɗi wugha naa ni, ni a birni ɗiiɗes ɗi ni kì̵ c`in mulki, nkaa mishkagham mu yil ni mo."
66018001	Aɓwoon ɗiisi, ɓe wan naa mee ngulop kì̵ Naan wurii sham ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan. Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiisi wuri ki̶ iiko ɗiiɗes zam, har peeɓang mu iiko fi̶ri ni ɓang yil ni kaa puus si.
66018002	Shi ɗoo ɗiiɗes, ɓe wuri le or nee: "Ni kì̵ taa! Ni kì̵ taa birni mBabilon ɗiiɗes. Wura ɗee a tulu ki̶ riin ɗiibish mo. Wura ɗee a peetong mu koo a riin ɗiibish ɗiiɗang ye. Wura ɗee a peetong mu koo a mbii ɗiirap, ki̶ koo a ny`er ɗiibish ɗiiɗang ye.
66018003	Mpeeɗi gyet gurum mu yil mo shini-shini, gyet mo c`in ngaa ki̶ wura, gyet mo shwaa a am anab mu ngaa ashak ki̶ wura. Ki̶ nyemnwor ɗii mu yil ɗiisi mo, moo long a shi li̶ɓet kì̵ mbii ki̶kat fi̶ra ɗi mu yil ɗiisi, ɗi ni met mu sat."
66018004	Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling mee ɗoo ɗi ni put ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ni sat nee: "Wun nyem fi̶na mo, wu pwat aku ndi̶ghi̶n wura, mpeku taji mo cín kwat nwun ashak ki̶ wura mpee shikbish fi̶ra ni mo kas. Mpeku taji wu lap memee ndi̶ghi̶n jeel fi̶ra ni mo kas.
66018005	Mo ak shikbish fi̶ra ni mo kàa wul aɗengnaan, ki̶ ba Naan kì̵ mander nshikbish fi̶ra mo kas.
66018006	Wu baa ki̶ mbii fi̶ra mon nwura, kaaɗi gyet wura kì̵ cín mo nwun si. Wu kwat wura yitvul, mpee mbii ɗi gyet wura kì̵ cín mo nwun. Wu riyeep mo yitvul, mbii ɗi gyet wura kì̵ riyeep ni nwun.
66018007	Wu yit ku kwat ɗi ni a mu kar ki̶ jeel ɗi wura lap ni, ni ɗee ntiit-ntiit ki̶ ɗiiɗes kì̵ long ɗi gyet wura cín nkáa fi̶ra, mpeeɗi wura nkaa ɗiyeep kaa ne wuɗa a mishkagham ɗiimat nkaa mbii mo jir. Ne, ba wuɗa a matkáa kas, ki̶ zak, ne, ba wuɗa kì̵ kyam wal maap kas.
66018008	Mpeemi̶ni ɓe, jeel fi̶ra ni mon nj`i taa nkaa wura nɗin mman, mpeeɗi a parpuus mi̶ndong, ɓe muut ki̶ maap, ki̶ neen, mon ntaa nkaa wura. Ɗangɓe wus ncaan wura, mpeeɗi Daa Naan ɗi wurin ntokɗiyeel nwura, wuri ki̶ iiko ɗes."
66018009	"Katɗang mishkagham mu yil ɗiisi mo, ɗi gyet mo c`in ngaa ashak ki̶ wura, ɗi gyet mo se pak long fi̶ra ni mo ashak ki̶ wura, ɓe mon nnaa ɗiyeel ɗi ni caan wura, ɓe mon nwal ki̶ maap mpee wura.
66018010	Mpee jeel ɗiiɗes ɗi wuraa shwaa ni. Ɓe ki̶i̶rmuut nyaa mo, har mon nɗar a jong-jong ku moo wal ɗi, ki̶ mon nsat nee: 'Jeel! Jeel! mpee wii birni ɗiiɗes. Babilon birni ɗi gyet wii ki̶ iiko ɗes, ndi̶ghi̶n awa mi̶ndong, ɓe lagham fii ni j`i wul.'
66018011	Nyemnwor ɗi mon nyil ni mo, mon nwal ki̶ maap nkaa wura, mpeeɗi ba mee ngo kuɗi, ki̶ seet lée nwor fi̶ra mo kas.
66018012	Lée nwor ɗi mo a zinariya mo, ki̶ mu azurfa mo, ki̶ mu jwak ɗiiret ɗi moo mi̶lep yilak-yilak, ki̶ nli̶r ɗiiriret mo shini-shini, ki̶ nli̶r ɗi pan a naat mo, ki̶ katako ɗiiret mo, ki̶ mbii ɗi mo ɗak mo a shi aghas kì̵ níi mo, ki̶ katako ɗiiki̶rim mo, ki̶ mbii ɗi mo ɗak mo a shi shaghal ɗiiret mo, ki̶ jwak ɗiiret ɗii mu ɗiklu mo.
66018013	Mbii ɗi mo ɗu shang-shang, kaa sinamon, ki̶ mi̶r, ki̶ frankisens, ki̶ mwoor ɗi gurum ki̶ caan, mpeku wuri ki̶ling ɗu ɗiishang ni ɗi si, ki̶ mu am anab, ki̶ mu mwoor paat, ki̶ mu áas ɗiiret mo, mu alkama, ki̶ mu randong mo, ki̶ tum mo, ki̶ mu bi̶ring mo, ki̶ mu keke bi̶ring, ki̶ ki̶rom mo, ki̶ seen kì̵ gurum mo."
66018014	Nyemnwor ni mon nsat nwura nee, "Jir mbii ɗiiriret ɗi jí yii leyit nkaa mo, moo ɗel so jee. Long fii mo jir, ki̶ ɗiiɗes fii ni mo jir, mo lagham. Ba wii kuɗi yii kat mo ɗi zak kas."
66018015	Nyemnwor, ɗi mo si̶rep mbii ɗiisi mo, har mo kat li̶ɓet, ki̶ long mpee wura, mon nɗar jong-jong, ki̶ ki̶i̶rmuut fes yaa mo, mpee shwaajeel ɗi wuran nkaa shwaa ni. Mon nwal ki̶ maap.
66018016	Har mon nfwo ruruu nee: "Jeel fii, jeel fii, wii birni ɗiiɗes, gyet yam, ɓe wii yii jwal a lee mulki ɗiiriret mo ɗiitap piyaa mo, ki̶ ɗiitap naat juwal mo. Ɗi mo mi̶lep shi zinariya, ki̶ shi jwak ɗiiriret mo, ki̶ lilliu.
66018017	Ndi̶ghi̶n awa mi̶ndong ɓejee, ɓe long fii ɗiiɗes si mo ɗee a ɗiibuu!" Jir nyemtung jirgi am mo, ki̶ gurum ɗi moo hi̶r mo njirgi ni mo, ki̶ nyem ɗi moo kat mbii teer furu mo a ndi̶ghi̶n bahar mo, das ɗiisi mo jir, mon nɗar jong-jong, ki̶ wura.
66018018	Katɗang mon nnaa ɗiyeel mu caan fi̶ra ni kàa, ɓe mon nfwo or shiɓal nee, "Ba mo kì̵ kyam kat mee birni ɗiiɗes kaa wii si kas."
66018019	Mon nhi̶r ɓuk le nkaa káa furu mo, ashak ki̶ wal, ki̶ maap nee: "Jeel fii, jeel fii, wii birni ɗiiɗes, Gyet yam ɓe nyem ɗi mo ki̶ jirgi am mo nkaa bahar, moo kat long a mpee long fii, amma ndi̶ghi̶n awa mi̶ndong, ɓe wii ɗee a ɗiili̶lagham jee.
66018020	Wii ɗengnaan, yi c`in retnyit, mpee mbii ɗi ni kat birni ɗiisi wura. Wu c`in retnyit, wun nyem kì̵ Naan mo, ki̶ wun jeplop mo, ki̶ nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan mo, mpeeɗi Naan wuri canɗiyeel nwura, mpee mbii ɗi gyet wura kì̵ c`in mo nwun"
66018021	Ɗangɓe mee ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiiɓal, wuri mang mee nhi̶k ɗiiɗes kaa fin ɗiyees shiit si, wuri vwet ni ndi̶ghi̶n am bahar, ki̶ wuri sat nee, "Mon mbet Babilon birni ɗiiɗes si vwet a shiɓal aasi zak. Ki̶ zak, ba mon nkuɗi ki̶ naa wura ɗi zak kas.
66018022	Ba mon mbaa ki̶ling wal ki̶ nɗeng-nɗeng, ki̶ ɗoo ki̶ nyemkook mo, ki̶ wal ki̶ ɓel, ki̶ wal ki̶ feer mo ndi̶ghi̶n wii Babilon kas. Ba mon nwaa kat mee nguc`in ɗak shi sar, mu koo a kiyeet kì̵ ɗak ɗiiɗang ye ndi̶ghi̶n wii kas. Ba mon waa ba ki̶ling wal ki̶ fin ɗiyees shiit mo ndi̶ghi̶n wii kas.
66018023	Ba mee wus fitila nwaa baa ɓangpee ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n wii kas. Ba mon waa baa ki̶ling mee ɗoo ki̶ mi̶shpoo ki̶ matpoo ndi̶ghi̶n wii kas. Gyet yam, ɓe nyemnwor fii ni mo, a nyem ɗiinan-nan mu yil ni mo. Gyet a shi mulgut mu soghot fii, ɓe yii le gurum ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni mo jir, mo taa mer.
66018024	Gyet a ndi̶ghi̶n wii, ɓe mo kat toghom kì̵ nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan mo, ki̶ toghom mu nyem kì̵ Naan mo, ki̶ toghom mu gurum ɗi gyet mo twa mo jir ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni."
66019001	Aɓwoon ɗiisi, ɓe wan ki̶ling mee ɗoo ɗi ni kaa ɗoo ɗiiɗes, mu gurum mo ɗes-ɗes si ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan. Ɗoo ni mo sat nee: "Haliluya! Wu kwoop Naan! Mpeeɗi ɓam, ki̶ ɗiiɗes, ki̶ iiko mo a mu Daa Naan funu.
66019002	Mpeeɗi canɗiyeel fi̶ri ni azeen, ki̶ ni a ndi̶re. Wuri ki̶ canɗiyeel ɗiibish, mmat ngaa sí. Ɗi gyet wura wat yil ni shi ngaa fi̶ra si. Wuri baa kwat wura, ntiit ki̶ toghom kì̵ nyem fi̶ri ɗi gyet wura twa mo."
66019003	Ki̶ zak, mo waa baa fwo or shiɓal nee, "Haliluya, wu kwoop Naan." Ɗiyeel ɗi mu caan wura ni sat a nkàa ɗak vit har ngaa-ngaa, ki̶ ngaa-ngaa.
66019004	Nyemnan ɗii laarvul baafeer si mo, ki̶ mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen si mo, mo kurum nyil, ku mo seyil ɗi nNaan, ɗi wurii tong a peetong mu mulki. Mo seyil nwuri, mo sat nee, "Amin! Haliluya! Wu kwoop Naan!"
66019005	Ɗangɓe mee ɗoo j`i put ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n peetong mu mulki ni nee: "Wu kwoop Naan, wun ki̶rom fi̶ri mo, wun ɗi wuu ki̶i̶r wuri, nyem ɗiiɗween mo, ki̶ nyem ɗiinan mo jir."
66019006	Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling mee mbii kaa ɗoo kì̵ gurum mo ɗes si, nin ntiit ki̶ wal ki̶ am ɗiiɗes, ɗi nii sham ndung, ki̶ ni wal kaa nluu ɗi nii pet si. Ɗoo ni mo sat nee: "Haliluya! Mpeeɗi Daa Naan funu ɗiiɓal jir, wuri se mulki.
66019007	Wu yit ku mu c`in retnyit shi putughup ɗiiɓang, wu yit ku mu cín ɗiiɗes nwuri. Mpeeɗi pee ni wul, ɗi Laatum kì̵ Naan wurin nc`inɗik. Matpoo ni wura kì̵ ɗak sat mpee ɗik ni.
66019008	Mo cín lée ɗiipiyaa peng-peng mo nwura, mpeku wura lop. Lée ɗiipiyaa peng-peng ni mo, moo kám a ɗak ɗiiret ɗi nyem kì̵ Naan mo kì̵ ten c`in."
66019009	Ɗangɓe ngulop kì̵ Naan wuri sat nwan nee: "A ran ɗiisi. Ɗiiret nkaa nyem ɗi mo pi̶rep mo mpee se gwommat mu Laatum ni." Ngulop kì̵ Naan wuri waa baa sat nwan nee: "Ɗiisi ni a po kì̵ Naan azeen-nzeen."
66019010	Wan taa nyil ntoghom fi̶ri, mpeku wan seyil ɗi nwuri, amma wuri sat nwan nee: "Taji a c`in mi̶ni kas, wan a ki̶rom kì̵ Naan kaa wugha si, ki̶ kaghar ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ɗi mo lap langting mu Jesu si. A seyil a nNaan." Po ɗi Jesu wuri woo ni, a ni a káa kì̵ po mu nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan mo.
66019011	Wan naa Ɗengnaan a wuwang, ɓe mee bi̶ring ɗiipiyaa ɗi, ɗi sum kì̵ gwar ɗi wurii lang bi̶ring ɗiipiyaa ni a Ngo ɗin ndi̶re, ki̶ Nguzeen. Ngo ɗi ba wurii tep mbii ɗi wuri kì̵ sat kas. Wurii canɗiyeel a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗin ndi̶re, ki̶ c`in lek zak.
66019012	Yit fi̶ri mo a kaa aawus si, ki̶ wuri ki̶ mbiikáa mu mulki mo ɗes nkaa káa fi̶ri zak. Wuri ki̶ mee sum ɗi ni a riran nkaa shin, ɗi ba mee gurum mak man ni kas, see a wuri shikáa fi̶ri ɓejee ɗak.
66019013	Wuri lop a lée ɗi mo kì̵ lop ndi̶ghi̶n toghom, ki̶ sum fi̶ri ni a po kì̵ Naan.
66019014	Nyemlek ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, moo mwaan ndang wuri nkaa bi̶ring ɗiipiyaa-piyaa mo, ki̶ mo tap lop a lee lillin ɗiipiyaa mo.
66019015	Mee kwai ɗiisese j`i put mpo fi̶ri. A shi kwai ɗiisi ɓe wurin nsaa gurum ɗi mon nyil ni mo shini-shini. Wurin nse mulki nkaa mo a shi sar ɗiiɓal. Wurin nti̶reng am anab ni a peeti̶reng anab ɗi ni a mu tughup kì̵ Naan ɗiiɓal met jir.
66019016	Nkaa nli̶r fi̶ri, ki̶ nkaa c`ii fi̶ri, ɓe mo ran sum ɗi ni sat nee, "Mishkagham mu mishkagham mo, Daa mu daa mo."
66019017	Ɓe wan naa mee ngulop kì̵ Naan wurii ɗar nkaa puus, wuri pi̶rep ny`er ɗi moo yaghal ncáap shi ɗoo ɗiiɗes, nee, "Wu j`i, wu kaat ashak jir, mpee seriɓet ɗiiɗes mu Naan.
66019018	Mpeku wu se luwa kì̵ mishkagham mo ɗi, ki̶ luwa kì̵ ɗiinan-nan mu nyemlek mo, ki̶ luwa ki̶ nyem ɗiinan-nan mo, ki̶ luwa mu bi̶ring mo, ki̶ mu nyemlang bi̶ring ni mo, ki̶ luwa kì̵ gurum mo jir, mu jeplu mo, ki̶ mu ki̶rom mo, ɗiiɗween mo, ki̶ ɗiinan mo jir."
66019019	Wan naa luwayil si, ki̶ mishkagham mu yil ni mo, ki̶ nyemlek furu mo, mo kuur ashak, mpeku mo c`in lek ɗi ki̶ ngulang bi̶ring ɗiipiyaa si, ki̶ nyemlek fi̶ri mo.
66019020	Amma mo yaa luwayil ni ashak ki̶ ngusatpo kì̵ Naan mu ɗung si, ɗi gyet wuri c`in mbii aapo, ki̶ alama mo a koppee mu luwayil ni. A shi mbii aapo ɗiisi mo, ɓe gyet wuri num nyem ɗi mo lap alama mu luwayil ni, ki̶ gyet mo seyil muriin fi̶ri zak. Mo vwet mo weet mmeen ndi̶ghi̶n aawus ɗi nii lap a shi fwat mu binti̶ka.
66019021	Mo twa kaghar ni mo shi kwai ɗi ni j`i put po ki̶ ngulang bi̶ring ɗiipiyaa si. Ny`er mo jir, mo se luwa kì̵ mo ni, har ni mak mo.
66020001	Wan naa mee ngulop kì̵ Naan ki̶ sham put ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, wuri ki̶ makuli mu wang tughun ɗiijurung, ɗi ba nii peeɗar kas si, ki̶ wuri ki̶ mee ti̶sek ɗiiɗes nsar fi̶ri.
66020002	Wuri yaa nw`oo si, nw`oo ɗi pugyet ni ɗi yam-yam si. A nw`oo ni wuri a Shetan, mishkagham ki̶ riin ɗiibish mo jir. Ngulop kì̵ Naan wuri ɓwaghat Shetan mpee ɓit mo duɓu mi̶ndong.
66020003	Ngulop kì̵ Naan wuri vwet nw`oo ni sham ndi̶ghi̶n tughun ɗi ba nii peeɗar kas si. Aɓwoon mi̶ni, ɓe wuri shaghat po tughun ni, ki̶ wuri lus ni, mpeku taji Shetan wuri katpee mpee num gurum ɗin ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni mo ɗi zak kas, see aɓwoon kì̵ ɓit mo duɓu mi̶ndong akuɗang. Aɓwoon kì̵ ɓit mo duɓu mi̶ndong ni, ɓe mon mɓwot Shetan wuri, mpee reppee lee ɗak.
66020004	Ɗangɓe wan naa nyem ɗi mo cín iiko mmo, mpeku mo tokɗiyeel ɗi. Moo tong nkaa mbiitong mu mulki mo, ki̶ zak, wan naa seen kì̵ nyem ɗi gyet mo kì̵ saa káa kì̵ mo, mpeeɗi gyet mo c`in langting mpee Jesu, ki̶ mpee satpo kì̵ Naan. Ba gyet mo seyil luwayil ni, koo muriin fi̶ri kas, ki̶ ba gyet mo lap alama mu luwayil ni nkaa pukiyeen furu mo, koo nkaa sar furu mo kas. Mo baa cín seen mmo, har mo se mulki ashak ki̶ Kristi mpee ɓit mo duɓu mi̶ndong.
66020005	A ɗiisi ni a yaghal a peemúut ɗin nshee. (Kaghar nyem ɗii mumurap ni mo, ba mo baa kat seen kas, see mɓwoon kì̵ ɓit mo duɓu mi̶ndong akuɗang.)
66020006	Jir nyem ɗi mo mak yaghal a peemúut ɗin nshee ɗiisi ni, ɓe a nyem mi̶ni mon nkat ɗiiret, ki̶ a nyem mi̶ni mo a ɗiiɓang. Ba muut ɗiivul mak kat ɓal nkaa mo kas, amma mon nɗee a pris mu Naan mo, ki̶ mu Kristi, har mon nse mulki ashak ki̶ wuri mpee ɓit mo duɓu mi̶ndong.
66020007	Aɓwoon ɗi ɓit duɓu mi̶ndong ni mo ɗel, ɓe mon nfwoon Shetan ndi̶ghi̶n tughun ɗi mo ɓwaghat wuri ni ɗi.
66020008	Ɓe Shetan wurin mput so, mpeku wuri num gurum ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil mo ɗi, ndi̶ghi̶n kwang ɗiifeer mu yil ni. Yil ɗiisi ni mo a Gog, ki̶ Magog, wurin nkyak mo le ashak mpee lek. Ɗuu kì̵ mo ni ɗee a kaa ɗiyees mpo am bahar si.
66020009	Mon mpweer nkaa yil ni jir, har mon nso neer peeɗi nyem kì̵ Naan moo kuur ɗi, ki̶ birni ɗi wuri wal nni. Amma wus ntong a ɗengnaan sham ɗi, har nin nsham se mo.
66020010	Shetan ɗi gyet wuri num mo, mon nvwet wuri ndi̶ghi̶n aawus ɗi nii lap a shi fwat mu binti̶ka, peeɗi luwayil ki̶ ngusatpo kì̵ Naan mu ɗung si mo ɗi. Mon nshwaajeel a peemi̶ni mpar ki̶ puus, har ngaa-ngaa.
66020011	Ɗangɓe wan naa mee peetong mu mulki ɗiiɗes a piyaa, gwar ɗi wuri tong nkaa peetong mu mulki ɗiisi ni, ɓe yil ki̶ ɗengnaan mo lagham shiir nyit fi̶ri, ba mee gurum mak man peeɗi mo lagham ɗi kas.
66020012	Wan naa nyem mumuut moo ɗar ntoghom fi̶ri, nyem ɗiinan mo, ki̶ ɗiiɗween mo. Mo wang takarda mu seen ni, ki̶ pak takarda mo, ɗi mo ran mo nkaa ɗak ɗi gyet nyem mumuut ni mo kì̵ c`in, ɓe mo kuɗi mmeen. Mmo tokɗiyeel mo a ntiit-ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi mo a riran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda ni mo.
66020013	Bahar wura fuut nyem mumuut ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n wura, ki̶ muut mu peemúut mo cín nyem mumuut ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n mo, koo a ngo ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe mo tokɗiyeel wuri a ntiit-ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi wuri kì̵ ten c`in mo.
66020014	Mo vwet muut, mu peemúut ndi̶ghi̶n aawus. Aawus ɗiisi ni a peemúut ɗiivul mmi̶ni.
66020015	Katɗang ba sum kì̵ gurum a riran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda mu seen kas, ɓe mon nvwet gwar mi̶ni ndi̶ghi̶n aawus ni.
66021001	Wan naa ɗengnaan ɗiipoo ki̶ yil ɗiipoo, mpeeɗi ɗengnaan ɗin nshee, ki̶ yil ɗin nshee ni, mo ki̶ ɗel so jee, ki̶ ba mee bahar kuɗi kas.
66021002	Wan naa birni ɗiiɓang, Jerusalem ɗiipoo, ni sham put ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan pe Naan ɗi. Mo tap ɗak wura a kaa matpoo ɗi wura lop lée riret mpee kaat ki̶ mish fi̶ra si.
66021003	Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling mee ɗoo put a peetong mu mulki ni, ni sat nee, "Yaksi peetong kì̵ Naan ni ashak ki̶ gurum mo, ki̶ wurin ntong ashak ki̶ mo, ki̶ mon nɗee a nyem fi̶ri mo, ki̶ Naan wuri shikáa fi̶ri wurin ntong ashak ki̶ mo, ki̶ wurin nɗee a Naan furu zak.
66021004	Wurin mpwos koo a yitmwaan ɗiiɗang ye ndi̶ghi̶n yit furu mo. Ba mee muut koo maap, koo wal, koo shwal kuɗi kas, mpeeɗi mbii ɗiiyam mo kì̵ ɗel so jee."
66021005	Wuri ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki ni wuri sat nee, "Wan nkaa ɗak koo meye, a ɗiipoo." Ɗangɓe wuri sat nee, "A ran mbii ɗiisi mo, mpeeɗi mo mak ku gurum cínzeen, ki̶ mo a zeen zak."
66021006	Wuri sat nwan nee, "Nii c`in. A wuɗi a Alfa ki̶ Omega, ɗin nshee, ki̶ kyes kì̵ mbii mo jir. Ngo ɗi neen am tu wuri, ɓe wuɗin ncín am ngwar ni shwaa nzughum, ndi̶ghi̶n tuɓut mu am mu seen si.
66021007	Ngo ɗi wuri se koghorong, ɓe wurin nse kop kì̵ mbii ɗiisi mo jir. Wuɗin nɗee a Naan kì̵ ngo ni, ki̶ gwar mi̶nin nɗee a làa fi̶ɗi.
66021008	Amma nyemki̶i̶rmuut mo, ki̶ nyemkwar cínzeen mo, ki̶ nyemɗiibish mo, ki̶ nyemtukáa mo, ki̶ nyemngaa mo, ki̶ soghot mo, ki̶ nyemseyil nk`um mo, ki̶ nyemc`in ɗung mo, nyemc`in mbii ɗiisi mo jir, mon nfwo mo ndi̶ghi̶n aawus ɗi nii lap wus a shi fwat mu binti̶ka. Ɗiisi ni a muut ɗiivul mmi̶ni."
66021009	Memee mɓut nyemlop kì̵ Naan ɗiipovul si mo, ɗi mo ki̶ ɗaa mo povul, gam ki̶ jeel ɗiipovul mu kyes ni si mo, wuri j`i sat nwan nee, "A j`i, ku wan kám mpee matpoo ɗi wura a mat kì̵ Laatum ni ɗi nwugha."
66021010	Ɗangɓe Riin kì̵ Naan ni j`i ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n nwan, ɓe ngulop kì̵ Naan wuri mang wan so ki̶ ni nkaa mee jwak ɗiiɗes ɗiiwurang, ɗang wuri kám mpee birni ɗiiɓang ni nwan. Jerusalem, ni sham put aɗeng pe Naan ɗi.
66021011	Ni ɓangpee shi ɗiiɗes kì̵ Naan. Ɓangpee ni a kaa mu jwak ɗiiki̶rim mo si, kaa ɓangpee mu jaspa si. Ni ɓangpee kyel-kyel!
66021012	Ni ki̶ mee fwang ɗiiɗes, ɗiiwurang, ɗi ni ki̶ polu mo kaghapaat baavul. Nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo kaghapaat baavul, moo ɗar mpolu ɗiisi mo, shimi̶ndong-shimi̶ndong. Mo ran sum kì̵ saghan ɗiikaghapaat baavul mu nyem Isreil mo nkaa polu ɗiikaghapaat baavul ɗiisi ni mo shimi̶ndong-shimi̶ndong. Koo polu ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe ni ki̶ sum mi̶ndong mmi̶ni.
66021013	Nkoghop puus ki̶kàa, polu mo kun, nkoghop ngween, polu mo kun, nkoghop nɗeng, polu mo kun, nkoghop puusru, ni ki̶ polu mo kun.
66021014	Fwang kì̵ birni ni ki̶ kuk mo kaghapaat baavul. Mo ran sum kì̵ jeplop kì̵ Laatum ni mo nkaa kuk ɗiisi mo shimi̶ndong-shimi̶ndong.
66021015	Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wuri katpo ki̶ wan, wuri ki̶ mbiikám pee, ɗi mo ɗak ni a shi zinariya, mpeku wuri kám birni ni ɗi, ki̶ polu ni mo, ki̶ fwang ni.
66021016	Shwal ki̶ birni ni ki̶ kaam ki̶ni, mo a ntiit-ntiit. Ngulop ni wuri mang kam, mpee kám birni ni, kaam kì̵ birni ni, kì̵ shwal ki̶ birni ni, ki̶ wurang ki̶ ni, a meel duɓu mi̶ndong ki̶ ɗari paat.
66021017	Ngulop ni wuri waa kám kaam kì̵ fwang ni, ɓe ni a shii ɗari vul ki̶ kaghapaat baapeemee, kaaɗi gurum ki̶ kám mbii si, ntiit ki̶ mbiikám peeɗi ngulop wuri ki̶ c`in ɗak ki̶ni.
66021018	Mo ɗak fwang kì̵ birni ni a shi jaspa, ki̶ birni ni a shi zinariya ki̶n ndi̶ng-ndi̶ng, ni aasi kyel-kyel.
66021019	Mo tap c`in jwat nkuk kì̵ fwang mu birni ni mo shi jwak ɗiiriret mo. Mo c`in jwat kì̵ kuk ɗin nshee ni a shi jaspa, ɗi nii lapwus yilak-yilak, ɗiivul ni a shi safir ɗi mi̶ni a tup, ɗiikun ni a shi aget, ɗi mi̶ni ki̶ kalla mo shini-shini, ɗiifeer ni a shi emeral, ɗi mi̶ni yilak-yilak a tup.
66021020	Ɗiipaat ni a shi Onis, ɗi nii lapwus yilak-yilak, ɗiipeemee ni a shi kaneliyan, ɗi ni lapshak ki̶ shoop mu luɓang. Ɗiipovul ni a shi krisolai ɗi ni a kaa yara si, ɗiipokun ni a shi beril, ɗi nii mi̶lep riret kaa ɗem si, ɗiipofeer ni a shi tapas, ɗi ni a kaa yara ɗiiɓang kyet-kyet si, ɗiikaghapaat ni a shi krisoprez, ɗi ni mi̶lep kaa shit si, ɗiikaghapaat baa mi̶ndong ni a shi jasit, ɗi ni a tup kaa ɗengnaan si, ɗiikaghapaat baavul ni a shi ameshist, ɗi ni a naat juwal kaa mwoorɓang si.
66021021	Mo ɗak koo a polu ɗiiɗang ye ɗiikaghapaat baavul si mo shi mee jwak ɗiiret ɗi moo pet ni a peyal. Koo a polu ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe ni mang peyal mi̶ndong. Ar ɗi mon mbirni ni, mo ɗak a shi zinariya ki̶n ndi̶ng-ndi̶ng, nii lapwus yilak-yilak.
66021022	Ba wan naa mee Lu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n birni ni kas, mpeeɗi Daa Naan ɗiiɓal met jir, ki̶ Laatum ni, mo a Lu kì̵ Naan mu birni ni.
66021023	Ba birni nii riɓet puus, koo tar kas, mpeeɗi ɗiiɗes kì̵ Naan nii ɓang birni ni jir, ki̶ Laatum wuri a fitila kì̵ birni ni.
66021024	Gurum ɗin ndi̶ghi̶n yil mo, mo mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n peeɓang kì̵ ni, ki̶ mishkagham mu yil ni mo, mon nj`i ki̶ ɗiiɗes furu mo ndi̶ghi̶n ni.
66021025	Ba mon nkyam shaghat polu ni mo koo yit mi̶ndong kas, mpeeɗi ba mee peenkoo nɗen ɗi mpee mi̶ni kas, koo ɗiɓen.
66021026	Ɗiiɗes ki̶ ɗiihai mu yil ni mo, mon nj`i ki̶ mo ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n ni jir.
66021027	Ba mee mbii ɗiirap mmak ɗel ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n birni ni kas. Koo ngo ɗi wurii c`in mbii ɗii mu nashoop, koo numpee, ɓe ba mon nkyam ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n birni ni kas, amma see a nyem ɗi sum furu mo a riran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda mu seen mu Laatum ɓejee ɗak.
66022001	Ɗangɓe ngulop kì̵ Naan wuri kám mee dung nwan, ɗi ni a mu am mu seen. Am ni ɗong yet-yet. Am ni put a peetong mu mulki kì̵ Naan, ki̶ mu Laatum ni.
66022002	Am ɗiisi ni sham a naar kì̵ ar ɗiiɗes mu birni ni. Ting mu seen nii ɗar mpo dung ni koo nkoghop ɗiiɗang ye. Nii làa-làa mu kiyeet mo kaghapaat baavul, koo tar ɗiiɗang ye mu laating mo. Komting ɗiisi ni a mpee bar gurum ɗii mu yil ni mo jir, shini-shini.
66022003	Ba mee mbii ɗiibish mmak ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n birni ni kas. Peetong mu mulki kì̵ Naan ki̶ Laatum, mon ntong ndi̶ghi̶n birni ni, ki̶ ki̶rom fi̶ri mon nseyil nwuri.
66022004	Mon nnaa yit kì̵ Naan, ki̶ mon nran sum fi̶ri nkaa pukiyeen furu mo.
66022005	Ba mee par kuɗi zak kas. Ba mon nwaa kuɗi ki̶ c`in ɗak ki̶ peeɓang mu fitila, koo mu puus kas, mpeeɗi Daa Naan wurin ncín peeɓang mmo, ki̶ mon nse mulki har ngaa-ngaa.
66022006	Ngulop kì̵ Naan wuri sat nwan nee, "Po ɗiisi ni mo mak ɗi gurum ncínzeen mmo," ki̶ mo azeen zak. Daa Naan ɗi wuri cín Riin fi̶ri nyemsatpo fi̶ri mo, wuri lop ngulop fi̶ri, mpeku ngulop ni wuri kám ɗin nki̶rom fi̶ri mo, mbii ɗi yak mon nc`in akiyeen ki̶lak.
66022007	"Wu naa wan ki̶n j`i ki̶lak. Ngo ɗi wuri tap ki̶ po ɗi mo ran mo ndi̶ghi̶n takarda ɗiisi, ɗi mo put a pu Riin kì̵ Naan ɗi, ɓe ngo mi̶nin nkat ɗiiret."
66022008	A wan Joon ɗi wan ki̶ling, ki̶ wan naa mbii ɗiisi mo, kaaɗi wan ki̶ling mbii ɗiisi mo, ki̶ wan naa mo, ɓe wan taa nyil ntoghom kì̵ ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wuri kì̵ kám mbii ɗiisi ni mo nwan.
66022009	Amma wuri sat nwan nee, "Taji a seyil nwan kas, ne wuɗi a ki̶rom kaa wan si, ki̶ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan mo, ki̶ jir nyem ɗi moo tap ki̶ po ɗiiriran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda ɗiisi ni. Wu seyil a nNaan!"
66022010	Ngulop ni wuri sat nwan nee, "Po kì̵ Naan ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n takarda ɗiisi, taji a sok mo kas, mpeeɗi pee ni wul, mpeku mbii ɗiisi ni mo c`in ɗi.
66022011	Wu yit ku nguc`in mbii ɗiibish mo, ɓe wuri sekiyeen ɗi ki̶ c`in ni. Wu yit ku nguc`in mbii ɗiirap mo, ɓe wuri sekiyeen ɗi ki̶ c`in mo. Nguc`in mbii ɗin ndi̶re mo, wu yit ku wuri sekiyeen ɗi ki̶ c`in ɗin ndi̶re fi̶ri. Ngo ɗi wuri a ɗiiɓang ɓe wuri sekiyeen ɗi a ɗiiɓang."
66022012	"Wu naa wan ki̶n j`i ki̶lak, ashak ki̶ kwat fi̶na. Wan ncín ni nkoo a weye, ntiit-ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi gurum kì̵ ten c`in mo.
66022013	Wan a Alfa ki̶ Omega, ɗi a wan a ti̶leng ki̶ mbii mo, ki̶ ɗin mɓwoon kì̵ mo, wan a ɗin nshee ki̶ kyes kì̵ mbii mo jir zak.
66022014	Nyem ɗi mo vwang lée furu mo ɓang-ɓang, ɓe mon nkat ɗiiret, mpeeɗi a mon nkat iiko mpee se laating ɗii mu seen ni, ki̶ mon nɗel mpolu ni mo, mpee ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n birni ni.
66022015	Mɓwoon kì̵ birni ni, ɓe as mo ɗi, ki̶ soghot mo, ki̶ nyemngaa mo, ki̶ nyemtukáa mo, ki̶ nyemseyil nk`um mo, ki̶ jir nyem ɗi mo wal nc`in ɗung mo.
66022016	A wan Jesu ki̶n lop ngulop fi̶na, mpeku wuri c`in langting ɗiisi mo nwugha, mpee Eki̶lisya mo. A wan a cirem mu dang kì̵ Devid, ki̶ a wan a Zar mangɓit, ɗi nii ɓangpee si."
66022017	Riin ki̶ matpoo ni, mo sat nee, "A j`i" Wu yit ku koo a weye, ɗi wuri ki̶lingpee, ɓe wuri sat nee, "A j`i." Wu yit ku koo a weye ɗi neen am tu wuri, mpee am mu seen, ɓe wu yit ku wuri j`i, mpeku wuri lap am mu seen ni shwaa ɗi shi zughum.
66022018	Wan ki̶n sat, nkoo a weye shiɓal ne koo a weye ɗi wuri ki̶lingpo ɗi mo ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda ɗiisi, ɗi mo put a pe Riin kì̵ Naan ɗi. Katɗang mee ngo le mee po ɗiki̶ nkaa ɗi mo kì̵ ten ran mo ndi̶ghi̶n takarda ɗiisi ni, ɓe Naan wurin ncín kwat ngwar mi̶ni a shi jeel ɗi mo kì̵ ten ran mo ndi̶ghi̶n takarda ɗiisi.
66022019	Katɗang mee ngo mang mee mbii baa ki̶ ni, ndi̶ghi̶n po ɗi mo a riran, ɗi mo put a pe Riin kì̵ Naan ndi̶ghi̶n takarda ɗiisi, ɓe Naan wurin nshang pak ɗiiret fi̶ri baa ki̶ni aku ndi̶ghi̶n laating mu seen ɗi gwar mi̶nin nse, ki̶ wurin mbaa ki̶ pak mbii ɗi gwar mi̶ni nkat ndi̶ghi̶n birni ɗiiɓang ni zak, kaaɗi mo sat ndi̶ghi̶n takarda ɗiisi ni si.
66022020	Gwar ɗi wuri kì̵ c`in langting mpee mbii ɗiisi ni mo jir, wuri sat nee, "Ii, wan j`i ki̶lak-ki̶lak. Amin. A j`i, Daa Jesu."
66022021	Ɗiiret kì̵ Daa Jesu tong ashak ki̶ wun jir. Amin.
